1b1: 'phags pa yab dang sras mjal pa zhes bya ba de kha na nges par bstan pa
1b2: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pe tA bu tra sa mA ga nA ma ma hA yA na sUH/ bod skad du
1b3: 'phags pa yab dang sras mjal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / bam po dang po
1b4: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
1b5: thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
1b6: ldan 'das grol ba grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dul ba dul ba'i
1b7: 'khor dang ldan pa/ zhi bzhi pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rgal ba
1b8: rgal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan

2a1: bathang la phyin pa'i thang la phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa'i dbugs phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge slong dge slong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa bcom pa
2a2: nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge sbyong dge sbyong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ sdig bstsal ba sdig bstsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ tshangs pa tshangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sdig bcwa
2a3: sa na cag parnas pa gas kyi'ab dang pa/ ga / parnyan kyi bar dang na/ um byas pa zlas byas pa'i 'a ba dang / pa sngags /
2a4: 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa byang ba nyo/ mongs pa byang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par bstsal ba/ yan lag lnga rnam par bstsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa rnam par bral/
2a5: ba sgrib pa rnam par bral ba'i 'khar dang ldan pa/ yid rnam par dad pa yid rnam par dad pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan/
2a6: pa bsnyen bsring dang bral ba bsnyen pa srid dang bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bsrung ba gcig pa bsrung ba gcig pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dran pa'i sgo bsrungs phun sum tshogs pa/ dran pa'i sgo bsrungs
2a7: ba phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rton pa zhi ba dang ldan pa rton pa zhi ba dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyi tse ba'i bden pa bstsal ba/ nyi tso ba'i bden pa bstsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ stsal
2a8: ba spangs pa/ stsal ba skrangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mthar phyin pa'i mthar phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ don gyi mthar thug pa don gyi mthar thug pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid bsgoms pa/

2b1: bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa'i med pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa'i med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa/ rnam par rtog pa yod su chad pa'i
2b2: 'khor dang ldan pa/ lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bstsal ba/ lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bstsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa/ mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/
2b3: sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ shes rab shinatu/ rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa 'pham
2b4: pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yal ga dang lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / lcug ma dang / shun phrags kyi skyon dang bral ba dag pa/ snying po la gnas pa/ shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gnas/ shing nazo d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na/
2b5: lnga sde dang / grags byin dang / 'char ka dang / lteng rgyas 'od bsrungs dang / ga ya 'od srungs dang / chu rlung 'od srung dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / shA ri'i bu dang / ma'u gal gyi bu la sogs pa/ dge slong stong nyis
2b6: lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par
2b7: grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag
2b8: pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ de'i tshe nam gyi tho rangs kyi res la/ bcom ldan 'das dge

3a1: slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/ bragab med pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar thams cad dang
3a2: ldan pa'i 'khor dge slong gi dge 'dun cad mi smra ba la gzegs so/ / thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong gang gis
3a3: rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'ga' zhig tshel cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau'u don n+ya bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
3a4: lha ngar sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nasu/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dang
3a5: par bgyi'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau'u din rgyal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau'u don na 'od ni blam bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug
3a6: shig/ de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa brlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags sbyin dang / lteng rgyas 'od bsrungs dang / chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung dang / 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / meru
3a7: dgal gyi bu chen pos kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsad ma mngon par dad par bsti'o// da skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
3a8: kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mi'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyang blam bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal

3b1: kyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig bcom ldan 'das bzhed snyam ste/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen pos
3b2: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bus mnyam par bzhag ste/ de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la gnas shing / dge slong 'char
3b3: mar ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa ste mthong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na khang pa brtsegs pa 'am/ khang pa brtsegs pa'am/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i khams
3b4: sgo byang phyogs su lta ba'i skar khung shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas/ nyi ma'i 'od gzer byung ste/ nub phyogs kyi rtsig dos la shar ba de bzhin du// de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ btsem
3b5: ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la shar cing / dge slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u dag la gyi
3b6: bu chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka/ bcom ldan 'das ni khyod
3b7: la dge slong 'char kas/ rgyal po zas gcad ma mngon par dad pa bya bar nus so zhes dgongs shing gshed do// tshe dang ldan pa 'char kaM de lta yin gyis khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dang bang
3b8: bya bar dad pa bskyed cig de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas tsha dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa me'u bgal gyi bu chen po rigs rnams ni dad par bya bar dka'

4a1: ste/ rgyal ba' dgas ni lhag par dka/ dpa' phyir na na/ rgyal pa rgyal rigs kyi skye bo nas dbang zung pa rnams ni 'gu bar bka' ba ste/ me dang ldan pa dang
4a2: gal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na shing khung bcu'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum bcu'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu'am/ shing khur brgya yang rung ste/ gsher bag med cing
4a3: skam la lo mang du lon pa zhig yod la/ de la mi la la zhig gis me btang na/ me'i phung po chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de la la zhig gis yang mar ram/ 'bru ma sha gyis gtor na//
4a4: me'i phung po de bas ches che bar 'bar te/ de'i steng ngam/ drung gi 'khor yug tu 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigra
4a5: spyi bo nas dbang bsrung ba rnams ni mgu bar dka'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ glang po che mche ba can kha gdangs pa'i so phrag du 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o//
4a6: tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams kyang mgu bar dka'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/
4a7: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan po 'char ka de ni de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni dge slong 'char ka 'dis/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya
4a8: bar nus so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs zhing bzhed pa yin no/ / smras pa tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag rgyal po chen po zas gtsang ma dad par byed par dgongs

4b1: sa ma/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'char ka ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed do zhes dgongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis/ tshe dang
4b2: ldan pa 'char ka la bka' stsal pa/ / 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni yang des dpa bya'o// yang na khyod kyis dad par bya'o//
4b3: 'char ka nga'i nyan thos ji snyed gcig yod pa de dag gi nang na/ khyod ni 'di ltar rigs dad par byed pa'i mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la tshigs su bcad de
4b4: bka' stsal pa/ / 'char ka bzang po nga la mnyen par byos// khyod ni rigs dang byed mchog rab yin gyis// shAkya'i rigs rnams dka' ba skyed pa yi// rgyal po dam pa rab tu dad par byos// rgyal po'i
4b5: rab de dad par byas na ni/ / rigs kyi bu lha dag dang mi rnams la// mtha' dbus med pa'i legs pa 'byung 'gyur gyis// mi'i dam pa mu tu dad par byos// de lta na ni shAkya'i bdag po de// mngon pa'i
4b6: rgyal rtogs pas dkrugs shing nyams/ / re'i ngos nas ngazab 'dril ji bzhin du// brtson 'grus brtson pa thams cad btang ste gnas// dbang phyug nyams pa rjes su dran byed pas// yid pa gnod gyur
4b7: sems dang yid kyang stor/ / dper na tshong dpon nor dang bral ba dag/ rjes su dran zhing nyon mongs gnas pa bzhin// lha'i gnas nas lha dag shi 'phos shing // lha rdzas 'dod pa rjes su dran pa bzhin// rgyal
4b8: ba'i bstan pa mngon par mi shes shing / / rgyal po bde nyams snying rjer smre bsngags 'don// de yi rin po che ni sna bdun dang // mi'i phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po dang // longs spyod dag ni rjes su dran byed cing //

5a1: sa bdag de mi i sngags 'don// mdangs 'phrog byed pa ldan pa stabs can gyis// de ltar mazhig yongs su can kyang // bdag kyang thogs gzhan yang migs swA/ @
5a2: bdag po de yang de bzhin no/ / ti se'i gangs kyi ri bos bsgribs gyur na// ji ltar mi dag blta bya mi mthong ba// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos bsgribs pas na// rgyal pos blta bar bya ba mi mthong ngo //
5a3: nyid kyis lagag sa sha bas mas gyur ba'i// mis ni rang gi sems kyang mi shes te// de bzhin rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas// rgyal ba des ni dge ba mi shes so// dper na khyi mtha' shibs mas
5a4: ye/ / bud med ni rjeng smre bsngags 'don byed pa// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas// rgyal po de yang snying rje smre sngags 'don// de lta bas na 'char ka thabs mkhas pas// khyod kyis 'dir
5a5: ni rgyal po dang bar bgyis/ / nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bskal bar byos// chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bslang bar bgyis// 'char ka khyod ma gtogs par bsring ba'i// 'gro ba dag na skal 'thun spyad
5a6: med pas/ / rgyal po'i sems ni rab tu dang bya bar// gang gis nus pa'i dge slong gang yang med// 'char ka sngon gyi dus na byung ba ni// 'das pa'i dus nas gzhi bdag po zhig/ ming ni bden pa 'phel
5a7: zhes bya ba ste/ / sa spyong byed pa'i rnam par grags bzung // de ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// rgya mtsho'i mtha mar thug pa'i sa 'di ni// chos dang
5a8: ldan pa'i rgyal po des kyang bskyangs/ / grong dang grong khyer dag kyang 'dab nye zhing // bza' shing 'bras bu me tog rgyas pas gang // 'phags pa'i skye bo dag dang shed las skyes// sdig dang bral ba'i rnams
5a9: kyis rab tu gang / / dri za brgya mang dag gis gang ba ste// sdong du mtsher maH shing ngan pa med// 'jam zhing dge sbyong rnams kyi tshogs kyis spras// chu rlung 'bab stegs bde bas rab tu brgyan//

5b1: drang srong tshogs brgya rjes su rgyu ba ste// skye bo'i dkar chos rnams kyis kun tu bsgrubs// ngan song lam ngan rnams ni bar tu bcad// de nas sems can thams cad lha gnas 'dod// rgyal po de
5b2: la bu dag yod pa ni/ / sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba mthong ba ste// dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni skyed pa can// yon gtan mang pos bsgos pa'i blo gros ldan// ming ni blo gros snying po zhes bya ste// srog chags/
5b3: bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// 'dod pa rnams la bskyon du lta ba can// mi bdag khyim na gnas kyang dben la dga'// rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba des// lha'i pho zang 'dra ba'i khyim mchog
5b4: 'dir/ / na chung tshogs kyis kun nas mdun bdar te// 'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces smras// bu yi dam pa khyod la nga yis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba gang ma byas// 'dod pa rnams la khyod/
5b5: yid ci yi phyir// ma mos nga la bu khyod myur tu smros// srid pa'i 'gro ba'i yon tan mkhas bgyis te// bu khyod rin chen khyim la dga' ba skyed// bud med rin chen 'khor dang grogs bgyis te//
5b6: yul la dga' zhing mos pa bskyed par bgyis// dka' thub nags na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag/ de btang nas ni phyir yang 'di dag na// dka' thub btang zhing 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// 'dod pa
5b7: de dag bu gcig khyod la bstabs/ / de lta bas na 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// nga dang rgyal srid thams cad khyod dang mthun// rnam thos bu'i yi gnas dang 'dra ba yi// gzhal med khang gi rgyan can khyim 'dir
5b8: spyod/ / 'di dag rnams kyang mchog gi gzugs ldan zhing // lha mo 'di la sgyu rtsal tshar phyin pa// rol mo'i sgra'i tshul dang glul mkhas// bsnyen bkur snyoms shing yon tan yid kyang 'phrog/ mig ni

6a1: pad ma'i lo ma 'dra ba ste/ / bim pa'i mdog 'dra ma chu mdzes yid du 'ong // so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med cing bzang // 'phral ba smin ma legs shing mgul ba sdug/ brla ni glang po'i
6a2: che'i sa yang 'dra/ / phrag so shas rgyas thal gong legs dang ldan// lag dang rkang pa'i mthil na zangs kyi mdog/ sor po byin pa phra ba legs dang ldan// lce ni zangs mi dag 'dral bsrab cing
6a3: dag/ tshig ngan 'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan// so ni thags bzang so rnams rang rod med// mche ba rab dkar mchog gi brgyan dang ldan// lto ba pyad der 'dug cing lte ba sdug/ sta zlar
6a4: yangs shing rked pa rdo rje 'dra/ / byin pa glang po che'i so 'dra zhing // mda' rgyu snying po legs par skyes pa bzhin// dregs bcas glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gro sa dang ldan// gzhan du mi sems yid
6a5: kyis khyod la lta/ / brtse ba 'dod bu cing dar la bab dang ldan// gzhon nu snying rje ltos la rtse ba byos// bu gcig khyod dang bud med 'di dag gis// mdog bzang ba dang dar la bab pa yang // shing gi brtse
6a6: mo'i me tog bzhin lhung gis/ / nga rgyal thod la 'dod pa bsten par bgyis// blo gros snying po ldan des smra ba yi// tha dang 'khor rnams kun la 'di skad smra// yab cig khyod ni mda' bar gsungs pa lags//
6a7: gang dag cig gis sngags pa ma smad med// yon tan rnams la mos pa bdag gi tshig/ bsams te gtan la bab la rgyal ba gson// ji ltar rma lam na yang 'dod la bdag/ sems mi dga'
6a8: zhing ma mos de 'dra gson/ / sa'i bdag pos bka' phrul 'di dag ni// mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te// mi mkhas skye bo rnams kyis yang dag bsams// mkhas pa rnams kyis

6b1: de dag drug tu sdung / / leng ba ma lags ci rgyu zhig gis// yang ba tshig gis lam 'gol 'dzin par bgyid// thang la gnas pa su zhig ji ltar na// mgan med chus khyer ba la 'dad pa bskyed//
6b2: grol ba ji ltar bur na bcings pa yi// tshig gis btsonar der ni 'jug par bgyid// sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar na// nyamang gnas la 'dod pa bskyed par bgyid// sa bdag 'a
6b3: pa rnams la chags bcas shing / / 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gis chus khyer ba// long ba chus khyer brtson rang gnas pa dang // nyams rang gnas 'drar bdag ni de snyam bgyid// mi'i bdag po khyod ni long ba bzhin// bdag/
6b4: ni mig can khyad par mthong ba lags khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyer ba lag/ bdag ni 'dod pa rnam la rnam par spod// 'dod pa dag ni dug gi lo ma bzhin// sbrul gyi mgo 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa ste// rtse gsum pa dang ral gri mdud thung 'dra/
6b5: me'i phung po shin tu 'bar bya bzhin/ blo gros snying po ldan pas de skad du// smre sngags 'don pa'i pha dang 'khor la smas// na chen sna bdun dag la ni ma ltas par// rgyal srid rnam par spangs te rab tu byung // sbrul gyi shun gas rjes pa ci 'dra dang // ngar snabs
6b6: sdus pa'i thal pa bzhin spangs te/ / blo gros snying po ldan pa chags med par// sdig dang rnam par bral te rab tu byung // gzho nu ltar rab tu byung gyur nas// blon po'i bu zhig rjesu rab byung ba// ming ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste// blo gros snying po'i rjes su
6b7: rab tu byung / / gzho nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po bskyed nas ni// grogs dang bcas pas mngon par shes pa lnga// ma lus mtha' dag bskyed par byas par gyur// 'dod pa rnams la skyon/
6b8: du lta bas na// mi'i seng gi de ni 'dod khams 'das// tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya phyir// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba byas// de ltar gzhonu rab tu byung bas na//

7a1: pa de bu la ma dang gyur pa dang / zla bas byin pa de yi gan song nas/ legs par shad pa'i tshig gis dga' bar byas/ 'char ka khyod ni de la dza snyam sems// de tshe blo bros snying po gzhan snyam 'am// da nyid de yi chen der gyur te// 'dod pa'i
7a2: longs spyod don du gnyer ba med/ / 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems// bden pa 'phel ba gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am// mi bdag zab gtsang 'di nyid de yitshe// rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar gyur// char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems// rjes su rab byung
7a3: zlas byin gzhan snyam sems/ / khyod nyid de tshe de'i dus na ni// bden pa 'phel ba dad par byed pa yin// de lta bas na 'char ka khyod kyis 'dir// rgyal po zas gtsang dad pa mngon skyed gcig/ ba skyor byed pa 'di ni dar gyur na// skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs
7a4: par 'gyur/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bar khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas zhag de 'das nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang / sham thabs bgos lhung bzed thogs te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer/
7a5: chen por song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po bras gtsang ma btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun na shAkya stong tsam zhig dar dgos pa zhig gis/ ched du 'dus shing 'khod do// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang / bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su byon cing / seng skye'i gnas 'di
7a6: nyid na/ shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// zhes thos nas de 'di snyam sems du te/ gzhonu de rab tu byung bas/ bdag ni dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so// gal te gzhonu de khyim na gnas na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
7a7: mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan ga chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang /
7a8: kyisang dag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che ste bdun no// de la bu dpa' bo// rtul phung ba/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi bde b.rab tu 'joms pa// stong yang tshad par 'gyur ba/

7b1: shig/ des gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang tshang pa med cing / mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ mnyam ste mi mnyam pa med cing chos dang mthun pas legs par babanas/ bskal pa rdzogs
7b2: par bskyangs par 'gyur bzhig ste/ de ltar gyur na/ bdag cag kyang 'khor los skur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phug gi dbang dang ldan zhing rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas
7b3: pa dang / mchod par byas pa dang / dbang phyug gi dbang chen po yang rnyed par 'gyur bzhig na/ de ltar bdag cag ni gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas/ de ltar bu'i longs spyod kyi dbang chen po dang bral bur to snya ma ma/
7b4: des de snyam du bsams nas/ shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ da'i bu de lta lha'i pa'am/ bsnyen bkur byed par su yang ma 'gro shig/ la la zhig nga'i bu de la blta ba 'am/ blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gron/
7b5: de'i lus gnod pa'i chad pa gcad do// de'i tshe shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i gzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung bar gyur te/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyad ring po nas 'od pa thod nas
7b6: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring
7b7: zhiganas byon to/ / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan mi mnga'a'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam rab ci yang mi mda' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das
7b8: bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces smras so// /

8a1: dga' ba'i bzhin de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun minga'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam ngab ci yang mi mnga'o// bde bar byon to/ mnyel ba med do//
8a2: bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal la med do/ shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par shin tu sad kyis kyang // shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pan yod pa mthong nas 'khor de nas byung ste// tshe dang
8a3: ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur byon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so// cha dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring mo zhig nas byon
8a4: to/ / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka/ bcom ldan 'das pa snyan mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ me bde ba mi mnga' 'am// de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/
8a5: shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgya tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad la 'di skad ces smras so// shin tu legs par sa dad de
8a6: bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la snyan mi mnga'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba ma mda' 'o// da la zhes rab ci sang mi sa 'o// / bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyi sa 'o stsal
8a7: ba med do/ / shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral gyis kyang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin dang / shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad dang gnas dben pa na 'khod pa mthar
8a8: nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so//

8b1: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la
8b2: nyam nga ba cid mi mnga' 'am byon/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu 'o ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'om pa rgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAkya'i bu
8b3: mya ngan med dang / / mya ngan bral la/ 'di skad ces smras so// mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral dang / bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga ba ci
8b4: yang med do/ / bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das
8b5: la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par byed do/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / shA kye'i bu de dag gis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'char ka bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das la blta
8b6: ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod na/ bdag cag gis de ltar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po zas tsang mas/ nga'i bu la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir su par ma 'gro shig/ la la zhig de la
8b7: blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song na/ lus la gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do zhes bka' stsal to// de bas na 'phags pa 'char ka de ltar bdag cag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das
8b8: la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed du 'dod par mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni shin tu yang nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na/ ji ltar bdag gis de'i

9a1: drung du 'gro bar bya snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams so// 'on tang bdag gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags la/ steng gi bar snang la 'phags la skyil mo krung
9a2: bcas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de la bul mnyam par bzhag ste/ sems na yang bzhag pa des/ nam mkha' la
9a3: shing tal bdun srid du 'phags nas/ bar snang la skyil mo dkrung bcas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang mgal ba der song ngo // rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring
9a4: bo nas/ nam mkha' la shing tal bdun srid du 'phags ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nga da pa skyil mo krung bcas shing 'ong ba mthong nas/ de la thal mo sbyar te tshigs su gcad nas smras pa/ mtshon bsgyur gos can khyod ni
9a5: gang nas 'ongs/ / khyod la ci dgos myur tu smra bar byos// khyod la gang dgos de yang myur tu sbyin// brtul zhugs grub pa mthong bar shin tu dka'// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char
9a6: kas/ rgyal po zas gtsang mal tshigs su bcad de skad smras pa/ rgyal po bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi // bdag la chos dgos rgyal ba gang na bzhugs// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos skyel te/ bde
9a7: bar gshegs pa de la bshos skur ro/ / yul 'khor bdag po che' ba'i dpal mda' ba// khyod la mi mchog sras mnga' grags pa thog/ gzi brjid kyis ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar// ston gyi nya gung gi 'od dang 'dra// ji ltar
9a8: sprin med nam mkha'i nyi ma ni/ / phyogs rnams kun tu 'od byed mngon par 'bad// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// ye shes mnga' bas phyogs rnams kun tu snang // ji ltar ston gyi nyi ma shar ba na// srin bu ma

9b1: khyer zil gyis mnan cing snang / / de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// mu stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom lam mer bzhugs// ji ltar nyi ma zil non sgyur ma'i rnams// nyin par 'od sbyor lam mer
9b2: mi rung ba/ / de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod ky-i sras// zil gyis mnan pas mra stegs gzhan mi snang // ji ltar nyi ma'i zil non zla ba ni// nam mkha' dbyings na 'ad stong nyid me snang // de bzhin khyod sras
9b3: zil mnan mu stags rnams/ / nyi ma'i zil non za bzhin gsal ba med// seng ge'i ngar thos na phra mo rnams// shugs kyis mongs nas bsam pa ji bzhin du// ri phul gseb dbyer nas 'khra zhing
9b4: gnas/ / stag gi nga ro gzhan gyis bzod par dka'// de bzhin rgyal po drang srong chen po'i gsung // bdag me dang ros mu stegs gzhan thos nas// shes rab dman pa srid pa'i rtser phyin kyang // gsung thos
9b5: pas ni thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la// spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang stsal// snang ba mdzad cing rdul kyang rnam par sbyangs// ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor
9b6: mngon par shar/ / bde dang mi bde lam gnyis rab tu bstan// lam dang gol ba'i lam yod rgyal bas bstan// lam stong skye bo rnams ni lam du btsud// 'dam du bying ba rnams kyang thang la ston// ji ltar skom/
9b7: pa'i sa la sprin gyisi ni// sgang dang gshor bcas char kyis ngoms par byed// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba lhor bcas chos kyis ngoms par mdzad// ji ltar char kyis ngoms pa'i mji shu la nags/
9b8: rtsa dang ge la ba nags tshal shing rnams dang // 'khri shing sdong po sman gyi rnam pa dang / me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes pa bzhin/ de bzhin stobs bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang // ma 'dres bco brgyad chos mnga'i sdong

10a1: po la/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang // 'bras bus spras pa'i rgyal po'i sras mdzes so// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na ldan po'i ri// lha'i gnas grur mi skul rnam par mdzes
10a2: de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/ / dge sbyong rgya mtsho'i nang na rnam par mdzes// bde srogs khyim thab brgya byin lha dbang po// lha'i spyan la 'dug na mdzes pa ltar// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi bsras//
10a3: dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// byams pa'i stobs can zab mo'i 'brug bsgrags te// thugs rje chen po'i glog 'breng rir ldan pas// dran pa nyer bzhag char rgyun 'dab 'khrigs te/
10a4: rgyal po klu mchog de ni chos char 'bebs// yongs dag dkyil 'khor tshul khrims rab kyi gzer// ting 'dzin nyon mongs lha min rab 'joms nyid // ye shes nyi zer sbrid pa'i sred pa skems//
10a5: rgyal ba'i gnyi chen 'gro bar rnam par mdzes// ting 'dzin dang tshul khrims gzings dang gru chen te// dran pa nyer bar bzhag nor bu rin chen tshogs// byang chub yan lag rin 'byung gnas bsam
10a6: gtan rlabs/ / thar pa 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho brten paraH// tshul khrims rnam dag rtsa ba brtan par zug/ ting 'dzin lo ma dran pa yal ga 'dag/ byang chub yan lag me tog stong pa'i sdong //
10a7: bdag med grib ldan rgyal ba'i sdong po bsten// tshul khrims nags mtha' sten pa'i stobs chen po// ting nge 'dzin zhi ba'i ri khrod phug na gnas// stong pa mtshan med smon med spyod yul can// rgyal ba
10a8: stobs can seng ge khyod kyi sras/ / thub pa mi gnas gnas pa rnam par ston// rgyal bI khyu mchog brjid pa'i stebs bzhud pas// byis pa so so'i mu stegs gzhan bsngags te// khyod kyi sras ni khyu

10b1: mchog sgra yang 'byin/ / tshul khrims gter dang yon tan dbyig gis brgyan// bsam gtan dang po'i zhi gnas nye bar bskyabs// ye shes kyis bsrungs thar pa'i spyod yul
10b2: can/ / rgyal po'i tshong dpon gtso bo nor gtod mdzad// dge ba yongasu bzungs pas sdig bcom s+ho// nyon mongs zhi mdzad dge bsnyen bka' stsol pas// lha dang lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/
10b3: rgyal po khyod kyisas mchog rnam par mdzes// tshul khrims mchog sprin tho gros klog 'byin cing // yan lag brgyad la mchar chen dran gyis stengs// thub pa gces pa'i lo tog 'bras bu stsol/
10b4: khyod kyi sras ni klu chen 'brug sgra sgrogs// rgyal pos smras pa// gang zag mchog de bde bar 'ongs sam ci// bsod snyoms rgyu bas 'dren pa mi mnga'a'am// de'i lus la dal pas drab med dam// thang gnas
10b5: ud dpal la bzhin ma rnyis sam/ / 'char kas smras pa// rdzu 'phrul stobs mnga' bsam gtan spyod yul can// dgyes shing bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te// thub pa zhi ba'i snyoms 'jug gnas
10b6: bcas bas/ gser gyi pad ma lta bur rgyal mi rnyis// rgyal pos smras pa/ sngan chad rdza rnga rnga bran sgras bskul zhing // gling bu'i sgra snyan nga ros bskul byas te// bud med glu'i dbyangs kyis bslang bslad nas/
10b7: de ltar sa ngan ba sdug bsngal mi myong ngam// 'char kas smras pa/ bsam gtan dgongs pas ting 'dzin ni yum can// ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste// mnal tan bzhengs sam
10b8: bzhud dam bzhugs pa na/ / sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dgyes// rgyal pos smras pa/ che ba'i rkyen 'as mal mchog bshams pa la// me mar sdong pos kun nas mtha' bskor te// bud med tshogs

11a1: kyis bskor cing nyal nyal na/ / da ltar mun par nyalan cis mi mongs// 'char kas smras pa/ thub chen 'phags pa gzims mal gzims pa ni// byams pa'i gangan bting thugs rjes bde bar bzhengs/
11a2: dga' ba'i gnas pas dgyes dang ldan pas na// srid med btang snyoms can la rmongs mi mnga'// rgyal pos smras pa// shAg kya dpa' bos de rtag mdun du ba dang // brtan bcos mkhas dang rtsa
11a3: zhing dga' byas te/ / gzhal med khang 'dre'i khyim du dga' byas na// nga'i bu de nags na ji ltar dga'// 'char kas smras pa// chos kyis 'byung bzhi sems ldan rnams kyis// zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun
11a4: dub dang / / zhi ba'i dgon par zhings rten mdzad pas// ston pa 'jigs bram do ni der dgyes so// rgyal pos smras pa/ sngun chad gzhon nu khyim na gnas pa'i tshe// yan lag spos kyi 'brum shi thugs te/
11a5: rgyal po'i rkyen du 'os pas khrus byas na// nag kyi bza' na thub pa su yis bkru// 'char kas smras pa/ khrims gcad 'bab snyigs chos chu rdzi dbu ste// bapas de ba kus gzhan yang bkru bar mdzad// skul mi gshed
11a6: sras dang bcas su 'bog/ rang yang rgal la skye bo phal cher sgrol// rgyal pos smras pa/ gser gyi skud pa nor bu'i 'phreng bas brgyan// rgyal po'i rkyen du 'os gos mchog gtsang gyon
11a7: tsan dan zhib pos shing dab legs par bris/ / nags chen de gseb thub pa bu'i brgyan// 'char kas smras pa// tshul khrims spos blugs yon tan phreng bas brgyan// khrel yod na bza' ting 'dzin
11a8: bsam gtan rgyan/ / mngon shes rig pa rnam thar brgyan pa'i sku// rnam grol gzi mang thub pa nags na 'dzes/ rgyal pos smras pa/ rtse gnyis mtshon dang ral gri mtshan thogs pa'i

11b1: da ga tu du zu sas/ / ga/ gas dag na na m+b+ha la / / pang+gAs pa rdzams sa ba kya sa sus nga gas
11b2: g.yog/ yin tan tshogs pa des pas 'jigs mi mnga'// stobs bcud gyis pa mang bzhing mi 'jigs pa rnyes// rgyal pos smras pa/ bre'i yon tan khyod kyis sgras/ chos legs spyad cing drab med brjod pa thos// khyod kyang can thob sod /
11b3: bar bgyis// dag kyang mi dang po/ / ga ma smras pa dang // dang phrapa chags rgyal ba ma kyad ma pa den sa smrasas// rgya dzin po maldan da don tshogs kyi pa dpo/ tshogs gyur cho/ spyo
11b4: yongs su srung gadrang srong chen po ste/ dge sbyong gatshogs kyin na pa zhugs dade spyong gi rgyal po lam mthun ni mang ngo// rgyal po chen po 'diste sted po sgrub sang byed ces paco A thA ba/ ste yongs su rgyas pa'i rka ma'i rdzogs kyis kla
11b5: nas bskor ba ni lam me lhan ne spyan dang/ / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi shin tu tshogs kyi nan bzhugs na la ma me g+han na ltung // rgyal po che po bdi lta ste/ dper na nyi mi ni ston ka'i dus na shin tulam me stan ne lhung ngo// de bzhin/
11b6: du com ldan das de yang da sbyong gi tshigs kyi nan zugs na shi tulam ma na myu 'o// di sa snyed pe na rgyal po brtsa ma ma na na 'dug pa ni lamam thun na snang // de bzhin du seMmaldan das de yang dge slong gi tshogs kyin
11b7: na bzhugs pa nas ma me lhan ni myang ga/ / 'di ste ste pe na/ lha'i dbang pob rgya byin chos bzang d+ha'i 'dun sa na gnas na la ma me ldan ni ltang ngo'o// de bzhin du com ldan 'das de pang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nangan bzhugs na/ lamam/
11b8: pa // dag da pa / shA bu pathal dang / rgyu brasangs su sa nga/ shA sa la da da/ 'i brag /

12a1: gnas na lam me ldan ni lhang ngo'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne ltang de'o// 'di lta ste dper na mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni/ tshangs pabye/
12a2: baphrag stong gis bskor na lam me lhan ne ltang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan de lnga bu
12a3: brjod pa 'di thos nas/ / 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di nis bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos su zad na/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul re zhing 'di ltar mthu chel 'di ltar dbang che bar grags na/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma btsas pa nyid
12a4: kyi tshe/ / sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab du ltag/ che mche ma rab tu chemachem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur
12a5: rab tu bur bur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'brags rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing snang ba dpag tu med pa byung ba lta ci smos// btsas ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa la gom pa bdun por ba dang / steng gi bar snang lam
12a6: chu'i rgyun grang dro rnam pa gnyis byung ste/ de gnyis kyis khrus byas pa dang / de'i lha'i khri bzang po dbus gser las byas pa byas pa dang / steng gi bar snang las lha'i gdugs dang / rnga yab dang bcas ma byung blta ci smos
12a7: btsas ma thag tu rna thams cad phyag 'tshal bar gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe btsas nas gang gi tshe mngon par byung ba de'i bar du nam yang 'khrul ba med ba rtag tu dam bcas pa la brtan pa/ ji skad smras bde ltar byed pa// rtag tu
12a8: rkun mi gcod par brtson 'grus brtan pa/ yang dag par smra ba/ sgrub med pa gci smom// gang gi tshe bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rgol nas bsgral bar bya'o zhes smras

12b1: pa lta ci smos snyam ste/ des de ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i dam bcas pa de dran nas tshigs su bcad de 'di dag smras so// blo mchog ldan pa gang zhig pa ltam ma thag
12b2: nor ba med pa'i gsung ni rjod mdzad do/ / gang zhig la ni bden pa'i gsung mnga' ba// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bltam par gyur ma thag nyid du// 'jig rten gtso bos gyur par bya'o zhes/
12b3: mgon pos nyams pa med pa'i gsung brjod na// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// su zhig rmid lam rmi ba'i dus na yang // rdzun gyi tshig ni nam du yang ma gsungs te// ji skad gsungs pa de ltar mdzad mdzad pa/
12b4: de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// gserang gi phung po gangs ri mnyam pa yi// gang zhig chags par bya bar mi nus shing // gang zhig chags las rnam par 'das gyur pa/ de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches//
12b5: mtshon rnon 'dra ba'i ngag rtsub tshig rnams kyis// gang zhig khro bar bya bar mi nus shing / zhe sdang dngos po las ni rab 'das pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// chags par 'gyur dang zhe sdang rmongs 'gyur bas// gang
12b6: zhig thul par nus par ma gyur te/ / shes rab rgyal po dang ni ldan gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// 'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnams du ma dang // longs spyod dag la rtog pa'i rnam pa yis// gang zhig
12b7: bcing bar nus bu ma gyur pa/ / de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// rmad du byung ba rnam pa brgyad dag gis// ngo mtshar 'dzin gzhugs nam yang ma nus ste// dpag sdug ldan zhang rtag tu mi dam pa// de la mkhas pa
12b8: su zhig yid mi ches/ / mkhas pa dag gis brjod pa'i tshig snyan pa// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i tshogs kyis kyang // gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa/ de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// don gyi tshul la brtson 'grus

13a1: ldan pa dang / chos dang 'dod la nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis// gang shig ba cing bar nus par mgyur pa// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mches// dri med stobs dang mtha' yas ldan gyur ba// gang ni ga grong khyer mchog nas 'ahU~M
13a2: ba'i tshe/ / dpung rnams kyis ni thub par ma gyur pa// de'i gsung la sugagi yid mi ches// byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhing ba'i phyir// gang shig 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs nas su// 'chi med rgyu byir ri dgas srid mdzad pa// de ci gsungal su nig yi
13a3: byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhing pa'i phyir/ / zhan pa ma yin sems can gang zhig gis// lo drug par du bzha' thub drug spyad pa// de'i gsungal su zhig yid mi ches// 'jig rten la ni pan dang bde ba'i phyir// byang chub dam pa don du gnyer ba na// lo drug lon
13a4: pa'i tha mar yod khug sol/ / de'i gsung la su zhigi yid mi ches// gang la lo drug par du bdud kyis ni// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brangs te glags bcil kyang // de la glags ni rnyed par mgung ba// de yi gsungal su zhig yid mi ches// gang nig 'dod chags ne
13a5: dang bral gyur cing / / sul chung zad tsam yang mi slong la// 'jig rten dag gi don ni 'dzad gyur pa// de'i gsung la su nig yid mi ches// gang zhig gzhan la bsan par ma 'dzad par// rtogs par dga' ba rab tu zhi ba yi// byang chub bla med
13a6: mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas/ / de'i gsungal su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig tshangs pa nyid kyis gsol gtab pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshig gsan te// nyid kyis chos ni rab tu bshad pa na/
13a7: de'i gsungal su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bdag la thugs brtse don gyi phyir// shag kya'i grong khyer khyim du byon gyur te// shAkya'i tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad pa na// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/
13a8: rgal bar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gang gis// sngon gyi thugs dam bcas pa dgongs mdzad de// bdag cag srid pa'i rgyun las sgrol mdzad na// de'i gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// de dus de 'bab

13b1: deltar dus mkhyen pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus mkhyen te// 'dzin pa dus su thugs brtse mdzad pa'o// de yi gsungal su zhig yid mi ches// mi yi 'drin pa yi ni sku mchog la// blta ba'i/
13b2: don du bdag ni 'gro bya zhes// rgyal po des ni rang gi sems kyis su// de snyam du ni rjes su bsam pa byas// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas// de ltar ring zhig tu rjes su bsams nas// tshadang ldan/
13b3: pa'achar ka la smras pa/ dge slong khyod la ci zhig dgos/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de skur smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyi don du bsam byas te// khyong nyi
13b4: dad par bya byi bdag 'dir 'ongs/ / stobs bcu mnga' la dad pa'i sems bskyed na// skyes bu bud med dag kyang mtho rimi 'dod// stobs bcu mnga' zhing yon tan tshad med ldan// drang srong chen po shAkya dag
13b5: mdzad pa/ / 'dir byon rgyal po thugs dang skyed gcig dang // khyod kyi grags pa tshad med 'jig rten 'byung // khod kyi sras ni mi dbang dam pa ste// stobs bcu thugs rje thugs brtse che mnga' ba// chu khrod pa dam rdza
13b6: bzhin tshags med par/ / stobs bcu chags mid thugs mnga' spyod pa 'dzad// srid pa'i chu bo bzhi las rgal gyur nas/ 'gro ba mang po chu bo che las sgrol/ rkang gnyis gtso bo mi 'jigs thad 'don
13b7: gyis/ / 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dang bskyed// srid pa'i zug rngu bzhi po kun bton to// sman pa'i gtso bo skye dgu'i zug rngu 'byin// gso ba byed pa mkhas pa dam pa'i mchog/ 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skye// bdud kyi
13b8: sde chen dpag med pa ma mdzad de/ / nag po'i phyogs rnams sder bcas yongs su mnan nas// mchog tu zhi ba'i byang chub brnyes gyur gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed// 'gro ba dkrol zhing chos kyang bstan pa dang // 'chi med zhib ma lan bshad gsol zhes// mi dbang la ni

14a1: snru byu gsapa 'bas kyis/ / den pa mi mchog la ni nga ba bsnyed// kyi rnal pa chags rnams cis mnan// sa yang dag las 'a'angs bsor skasems can ba ma 'das pa dbyas/
14a2: 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dang bskyed/ nam dag stan ma dini slob du// mun pa ba gi sugs thos pasgri pa yi// ma stong pa bsrem ci dgas pa 'ad kyis// dren pa'i la gas ni
14a3: rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas nyon mongs la/ / gshi med mchog mi la ston mdzad cing // 'chi med gnas su sems can 'don mdzad kyis/ 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dang pa
14a4: skyed/ me chen gsum gyis bsregs pa'i 'jig rten 'di// mes tshigs la sprin chen char rab bzhin// gzhi gnyis dam pa'i sprin gyis char 'bebs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed// dri ma sum dri ma spangs shing
14a5: skyon bsal te/ / dri ma gsum las skye bo 'grol 'dzad cing // ston pa stobs bcu rnam snang spyod mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa bskyed// skye dgu kun la pha bzhin thugs brtse bas// stobs bcu thugs
14a6: rjemanga' ba byams par dgongs/ / thugs rje thugs brtses sems can 'grol mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dang bskyed// bcom ldan 'das de ni mdul sems can 'dul// thugs rje mang 'bam 'i'i mdzad cing // rgong pa
14a7: rnams kyang nyon mongs ni mdzad cing / / 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// skye bo rnams kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho bsdoms// rgya mtsho'i la ni lu 'ji lta bar// stobs bcu thugs rje mnga' sgrol mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi
14a8: mchog la ni dad paskyed/ / tshad med yon tan tshogs kyis 'dzes gyur pa// thugs rje chen po 'gro ba'i thugs kyis spyod// yun rings 'khrugs pa'i skye bo 'dron mdzad kyis/ 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dang pa skyed// nor bu rin chen

14b1: chu dngas byed pa bzhin/ / rgyal ba skye bo dad par spyod mdzad cing // mi yi 'thab rnyog rab tu dang mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// nor bu rin chen rang bzhin yongs dang pa// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga'
14b2: ba yongs su bskyed/ / rgyal ba de bzhin spyon gsal dag pa'i thugs// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su ba skyed// 'jig rten gcol dad pa thob kur na// lha dang mi dag sdug bsngal bur yang 'dor// srid pa bcud
14b3: spangs zhi ba mchog tu 'dod/ / 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig brjod pa ni// nam mkha'i dbyings la mkha' lding rjes bzhin te// bdag ni rgyal po'i yon tanamathar phyin min/
14b4: 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dab bskyed// de nas rgyal po za ba gca mas// na pa char galegs par bshad pa yang thosan// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa'inan tan de// bu yang nyid kyis man du mang
14b5: sngon bdag nal nas skyes bu zhu bcog rtsod kyang bsgral par bgyi'o/ / zhes dam bcas pa yang rjes su dranas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das pa dang pathob par gyur to// de/ dad pa thob pa'i sems kyis/ tshe dang na pa cha ga sa di
14b6: sems po/ / ga tsud ni chol la pa skyes 'i bu zhin/ thod bdag / bcom ldan das kyi ba gos pa// khong gi/ de yang ma na das sag pa'i byed bye bzhi /
14b7: nas tshe dang ldan pa 'chararags/ deltar rgyal po bas gtsang ma mngon par da par byas nas can thos te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bgos byer nas song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong rnams
14b8: la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni dge slong charags dad par byas te/ ded skye bo bal po che'i don tu 'gyur ro// den pa tshe dang ldan pa pa da / bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos zer /

15a1: bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste// bdag gis byas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la legs pa zhes bya ba gnang ste/ 'char ka legs so lags/
15a2: so/ de ring rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byas pas khyod kyis bsod nams kyi mang du bskyed do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag de ring dge slong 'char kas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma
15a3: mngon par dad par byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bskyed pa de la gal te gzugs shig yod na ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten khams su yang bsod nams kyi phung po de mi shod ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni de tsam du dpag tu med do/
15a4: / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bam po gnyis pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas phyag bcabs su lhung bzed bkrus te// mtshan ma'i rnam pa
15a5: 'di lta bu mdzad do/ / mtshan ma'i rnam pa de lta bu mdzad pas/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis bskor yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs
15a6: dang ldan pas/ lags pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to// des bcom
15a7: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ byang phyogs su brten te steng gi bar snang las gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par
15a8: to/ / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang yang dr-i za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas bsnga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das

15b1: gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su rten te/ steng gi bar snang la dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur te/ rgyal po chen/
15b2: po 'phags skyes po yang grul bum bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos/
15b3: phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogs logs su rten te steng gi bar snang la grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po mig
15b4: mi bzang yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas nub phyog
15b5: su rten te/ steng gi bar snang la klu'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba
15b6: khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mdun du bdar nas/ ldan gcig tu snga ma bzhi ni steng gi bar snang la thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur te/ de bzhin du lha'i bu rgyal po rab 'thab bral
15b7: dang / rab dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / mi mjed gyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang /
15b8: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang gnas gtsang ma'i ris nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/

16a1: steng gi bar snang la re re zhing yang g.yog lnga'i bubye ba khrag khrig bcu stong dum dang lhan gcigaH/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun lamachod cing 'dug par gyur to// l+h+wam yid kyi dang tu
16a2: thag bzangs ris kyang / lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po
16a3: thag zangs ris lha ma yin gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la
16a4: mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/ / bya'i rgyal po mdab bzangs brgyad khri drug stong yang rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
16a5: 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rgyal po'i khabs tha dad pa nas lhags pa bye ba phrag brgyad bcu yang 'dus par gyur to// de la 'di skad
16a6: ces bya ste/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i dbyings dkyil du// ma lus rdzogs gyur zla ba nya ba yis// skar ma'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// nam mkha' zla ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes// zla ba dri med dkyil
16a7: 'khor zhal mnga' ba/ / mun pa rab rib sel cing dri gsum 'joms// rtog ge can tshogs zil gyis mnan nas ni// mkha' la skar ma'i tshogs bdag bzhin du mdzes// nyi ma'i 'od gzer brgya'i lus mdzes pa// ston
16a8: gyi dus na mun sel rnam mdzes shing / / lha min tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// nyi ma de ni pad ma kha yang 'byed// nyi ma 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas// stong gsum po dgazil gyis mnan nas ni// mi'i nyi ma rnam

16b1: par mdzes gyur cing / / nyan thos pad ma'i tshal mchog kha yang 'byed// lha'i rgyal po dbang po brgya byin ni// mdun sar lha'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba// lha'i 'khor rnams zi gyis mnan nas ni// bde stsogs khyim
16b2: zathab sbyin ldan rnam par mdzes/ / rkang gnyis dbang po dpal sngags stobs bcu yang // dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun ba dar stong gsum na// rtog ge'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas na// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam
16b3: pabar mdzes/ / lha'i rgyal po 'thab bral dbang byed dang // 'thab bral bzang po lhas mchod btsun byas pa// 'thab bral bzang po lha tshogs nang bzhugs te// 'thab bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug par mdzes// gzi' brjid
16b4: mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang / / lam ngan ngan 'gror 'dong bar zil mnan nas// yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston mdzad cing // stobs bcu yon gtan rnams kyis rab tu mdzes// lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan de// /
16b5: dga' ldan gnas na lha'i 'khor kyis bskor// lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas ni// sngon gyi dge ba'i brtsa bas rab tu mdzes// de bzhin lha dang lha min bla ma yang // lha dang lha min tshogs kyis bla mar byas// 'khor
16b6: brgyad po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni/ / skyes bu seng ge dam pa 'jig rten mdzes// lha'i rgyal po dbang po bdag po rab 'phrul ni// lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas su// rang gi bsod nams mthu yis lha gnas na//
16b7: gnas shing de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes// de bzhin nyon mongs rnam las rnam par grol zhing // stobs cu mnga' ba nyon mongs bral ba bo// ma dul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal po yang // skye bo zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes/
16b8: lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur byed pa ni// lha'i gnas 'dug cing lha tshogs zil mnan te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis// rnam par mdzes pa gyur ba ji bzhin du// de ltar rgyal ba stobs bcu'i spyod pa dag/ sngon char//

17a1: spyad pas lha min tha'i mnan te// sngon gyi dge mi na pa'i gzibarjid kyis// / rgyal po de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na ni tshangs pa yang // tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rang gis zil mnan te//
17a2: shin tu snyan pa yan lag brgyad ldan dag/ yongs su brjod pa med cing mngon du mdzes// de ltar rgyal ba tshangs pa 'drar gyur pa// dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshogs rnams kyis// mngon du bdar te bden pa'i gtam
17a3: gsung zhing / / 'dzag rten gsum po dag ni mngon du mdzes// nyan par 'dod/ lha dang mi rnams dang // sgo 'phye chen po dag ni 'dus mkhyen nas// skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi// gsung rnams kyis ni rab
17a4: ston par mdzad/ / bya la ma nam mkha' dpag par nus kyang srid// rgya mtsho bum pas gzhal du rung yang srid// ri rab srid brgyar gcal tu rung yang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' rtogs mi nus so//
17a5: rgyal po mngon par dad par byas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka song nas ring po ma lon par rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya rnams la bsgob// grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma 'char ba'i snga
17a6: ltas ni gang 'di lta ste gang 'di dmar rerang 'char ba'o/ / dmar reng shar na nyi ma 'char bar shes so// grogs po dag de bzhin du dge slong 'char ka yang // bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i snga lta sa yin te/
17a7: dge slong 'char kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni/ nges par thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin no// grogs po dag de lta bas na/ bzhon pa'i mchog rnams stong de sta gon gyis shig/ de'i phyir zhe na/
17a8: de ri kho na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das mchog tu blta na sdug pa de lta zhing 'dod do// lU legs so zhes gsol nas// shAkya rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i ltar mnyan te// theg pa'i mchog rnams

17b1: la skur tu bstod do/ / de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang mas ser skya'i gnas dang / n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag thams cad rgyal ba gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du bcug ste/ nyams dga' ba dang / me tog sil/
17b2: mas gang ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / phreng ba mang pos rgyan to/ skabs skabs su gar mkhan dang / gru mkhan dang / kyang dang / bum rnga thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo dang / glu'i cha byad dang / yo byad thams cad thogs
17b3: pa dag bkod par gyur to/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gzhon pa'i mchog dang chos pa rnams dang / bdag nyid kyang bzhon pa'i mchog la zhon te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po byung nas/ n+ya gro da'i kun
17b4: dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo / / de'i tshe shAkya la la'i bzhon pa'i mchog ni 'di lta bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad sngo la rta sngon po rnams kyis drangs shing brgyan rnams kyang sngol/ dril bu g.yer ka'i
17b5: dra bas brgyan pa/ 'khor brgyan sngon po can gyis bskor ba/ gdugs dang / ral gri dang / thod pa dang / nor bu can gyi rnga yab dang // lham rgyun can sngon po dang ldan pa/ kha tsar ma bcad pa'i ras sngon po la gyon zhing
17b6: rgyan sngon po thogs pa'i zhal ta pa rnams zhal ta byed pa/ brgyan sngon po can gyi lcags pa dang / khrid pa du ma dang ldan pa/ rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng ba sha steg ste/ shing ta re re zhing yang rgyan sngon po can gyi mi
17b7: brgya brag re res bskor bar gyur to/ / shAkyil la'i bzhon pa ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ 'di ltar shing tadag kyang thams cad du ser ba nas/ thams cad du dmar ba dang / thams cad du dkang ba dang / thams cad du/
17b8: bkra ba dang / shing rtare re zhing yang rgyan khra bo can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// shing te de dag re re'i phyi bzhin du yang glang po che brgyad khri/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi brgyan

18a1: mtshan can gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ sha stag bshams ste// glang po che brgyad khri bo de dag gis steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa bkrab/ bltan sdug pa brgyad khri bzhag nas 'dod
18a2: par gyur to/ / glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi phyi bzhin rta gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer ga brgyus pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan dang ldan pa brgyad khri bshams te 'dod par gyur to//
18a3: denas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya rnams rgyang ring nas 'ong ba gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khye gang dag gis// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha bskyed mos
18a4: tshal du 'dong ba ma mthong na de dag gis/ / shAk+Sha se r+ya m+b+ha'i gnas nas 'od ba 'di dag la ltos shig/ de ci'i phying zhen/ dge song dgu shA kya rnams sa kya'i gnas nas 'byung ba da kAta~M/ sum ban+d+hartags man+ta lA stsa
18a5: mos tshal du 'dod pa dang rjes su mthun no/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste// ser skya zhes bya'i grong khyer dab pa nas// rgyal po zas gtsang mig ye 'khyu mchog ste// 'khor dang bcas te ji ltar 'od gyur ba// de ltar bstan kyis khyed
18a6: cag de nyon cig/ shing rtabaN+Da stong mchog dang bcas pa dag/ legs par brgyan cing mdzes par smras nas ni// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong byer dam pa nas// mi'i dbang po dam pa byung bar 'gyur// shing rta sngo zhing rgyan yang
18a7: sngob dang / / rta yang sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang sngob ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang sngo// lcags kyang sngo zhing thag srang rnams kyang sngo// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang
18a8: bcas/ mi rnams dag kyang sngon po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta ser zhing rgyan kyang se rab dang // rta yang mir zhing ser po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma

18b1: lnga po de dag ser po ste/ / de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang ser// lcags kyang ser zhing thag srang rnams kyang ser// dril bu ga yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams dag kyang ni ser po'i gos can te// rgyal
18b2: mtshan ser po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/ / shing rta dmar zhing rgyan kyang dmar ba dang // rta yang dmar zhing dmar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dmar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi das padag kyang dmar//
18b3: ljags kyang dmar zhing thag srang nas kya yang // d+hil bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// me rnams kyang ni dmar po'i gos nAn te// rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta dkar zhing rgyan
18b4: kyang dkar ba dang / / rta yang dkar zhing dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam po dag kyang dkar// lcags kyang dkar zhing thag srang rnams kyang dkar
18b5: dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang rnams dang bcas/ / mi rnams dag kyang dkar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dkar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta bkra zhing rgyan kyang bkra ba dang // rta yang bkra zhing bkra
18b6: ba'i 'khor dang bcas/ / mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang bkra ba ste// de bzhin gos kyang dam pa dag kyang bkra// lcags kyang bkra zhing theg srang rnams kyang bkra// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams
18b7: dag kyang bkra ba'i gos can te/ / rgyal mtshan khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta de dag byi rnams kyi phye bzhin du// glang po brgyad khrir tshang bar bshams pa ni// gser gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis leg
18b8: par brgyan/ / glang po che rnams gser gyis 'tshal bar brgyan// de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun gyi// khang pa brtsegs pa dag ni gzhag nas su// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// shing rta rnams kyi

19a1: kye bzhin du 'brang ba sham s+ya/ / de bzhin d+ha margyag/ dpag brgyad ban+d+ha yang // ngan nan sna ban brgyan gyis dga' bar bskrun// rgyal po'i brtan 'asargyal ba ma skabs pa can// rgang pa dang /
19a2: rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'brang // rab tu dri zhim kha dog lnga ba yi/ me tog gsil margyal po'i lam du bkram// dar gyil sdi dag kya rab tu bres// bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni legs par bcan// klu mkhan gar mkhan rnams dang gyang rnams
19a3: dang / / bum rnga thogs pa rnams kyis mchod par byas// rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yang // rab tu dga' zhing rgyal po'i phyi bzhin 'brang // rgyal po gshegs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
19a4: de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAg kya rnams rtab pas sa'i bar tu bzhon pa dang / dong ste phyin nas bzhon pa las babs te// rkang pang gi mtho gyis yongams bskor cing mdun du bdar te// n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'i ra bar dod /
19a5: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma nga rgyal che bar mkhyen nas// mi gang tsam balhag tsam gyis steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dang par bya ba'i phyir// 'chag cing
19a6: bzhugs par gyur to/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chag pa'i la g.yas phyogs nA mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zha 'bring du chag 'chagacing 'dug par 'gre'o// g.yon phyogs nas lha'i dbang
19a7: bo brgya byin zha 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o/ / de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i zha 'bring du lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab thal dang // rab dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams/ bcom ldan
19a8: 'das mchod pa'i bya ba'i phyir gdugs 'dzin cing gsil yab kyis g.yob par gyur to/ / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi

19b1: thog man tha gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ brus ma g.yas pa'i lda smad nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de lags su thal ma sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to//
19b2: rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang gnyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i nub phyogs logs kyi thog man/ thaM gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang smad nas
19b3: bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab
19b4: bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad
19b5: ma dang / ku mu da dang / bun da ri ka dang / lha'i man da ra ba dang / man da rab chen po dang / lha'i spos kyi phye ma rab tu 'thor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i rol mo sil snyan dang / klu
19b6: dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to/ / mi'i las 'das pa'i glu'i nga ro yang steng gi bar snang las byung bar gyur to// sprin las spos kyi char zam zim yang 'bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog
19b7: ud pa la dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi bye ma'i char yang 'bab par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad pas/ lha dang mi rnams gcig gis gcig mtha
19b8: bar gyur pa de lta bu rje 'phrul mngon par mdzad do/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas lha de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byed pa yang mthong / lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi hUM las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa/

20a1: kyang bar snang la gang bar mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ dzi nam du bcom ldan 'das kyis lags par gsungs danang ranaH/ ldan bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur bur pa'am/ 'di skad du/
20a2: dal ni gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la dbang bar 'gyur ba ngo mtshar mi che ste/ ngas ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su// lha dang / mi'i nang du chos kyi dbang la dbang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ bcom
20a3: ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang ba de ni 'di ni yin pa lta zhig ste/ bdag ni mi'i 'khor can du zad/ bcom ldan 'das ni la dung mi'i 'bar can du gyur to snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tha gas phyogs
20a4: gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bltam ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par
20a5: mchen po la gom pa bdun bzhud de/ phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gsung brjod pa/ nga ni 'jig rten na mchog/ nga ni 'jig rten na gtso/ nga ni 'jig rten na rab ste/ des skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes
20a6: gsungs pa de'i tshe yang / bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te phyag bgyis so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhing pa'i grong du bzhud pa'i nas 'dzam bu'i grib ma bsil
20a7: bal bzhugs pa'i tshe/ nyi ma yol yang 'dzam bu'i grib mas bcom ldan 'das kyi sgyum btang ste/ lha'i bu gzhon drug thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la
20a8: phyag bgyis so/ / da yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang lan gsum du phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso ba khyod bltam nas// sa chen 'di la gom pa

20b1: bdun pa rung te/ / nga ni 'jig rten 'de na mchog ces gsungs// de tsho mkhas brgyad la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang tshe thub chen ning pa'i grong bzhud de// 'dzam bu'i gribams bzhugs pam btang zhing // ga bu gnon drug
20b2: gis bcud gyur pa/ / de cho mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// da yang 'di dang khyod la lan gsum du// thub pa khyod kyi 'a bsngal phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje che mnga' lha mis mchod pa gtso// khyod 'dra 'jig rten
20b3: ma mchis lhag ci smos/ / mtshan ni don grub lags shes sngon brjod pa// pa dang ma yis bsams te btags pa lags// khyod kyi bas ma rdzogs bdud rtsi brnyes pas na/ don grub lags par bdag gis dgadod 'tshal/
20b4: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi ser ge'i khri lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu bting ba rnam pa sna tshogs su spel ba bshams so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar yang
20b5: lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu sa yog par bting ngo / / steng du yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i bla ras bres so// de nas bcom ldan 'das par snang gi 'chags de nas babs te/ gdan khri bshams pa la bzhugs so//
20b6: rgyal po bras gtsang ma yang 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
20b7: zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bar snang la 'khod par gyur to// 'di la 'di ni chos zhing yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// ser skye zhes bya grong khyer dam pa yi/ n+ya gro d+ha'i rab zhams dga' bar// rgyal po zas katsang de dang gang gi tshe/
20b8: 'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de'i tshe// skye bo mang po dag ni 'dus gyur te// lha ma yin dang mkha' lding dbang po dang // klu tshogs rnams dang de bzhin grul bum dang / dri za rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par

21a1: g+hur/ / de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams 'dus te// ma'am ci'i tshogs dang mi rnams dang // de bzhin 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha// rab du dga' ba rnams kyang 'dum par gyur// de bzhin gzugs kyi khams
21a2: bu gtogs pa'i/ / tshangs pa rnam da ma pa'i ris lha rnams dang / 'od gsal ba dang dge rgyas bdag dang // 'bras bu rnabar gtogs dang gnas gtsang 'dus// dge slong dag dang de bzhin brab ze dang // spyod pa can dang kun
21a3: tud+hU dag dang / / gcer bu pa dang mu stegs gzhan mang po// log lam rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang 'dus// sangs rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid dam pa yis// rgyal po tshon po zas gtsang de'i sems// yongs su smin par bya
21a4: ba don gyi phyir/ / de'i tshen 'dus pa chen por gyur// stan chad bcom ldan 'das kyis legs pa shad pa'i// tshig gis 'khor rnams yongs su tshim par 'dzad// nga ni rgyal brtul pa zas gtsang la// rgyal po'i mthu ni rahA
21a5: bstan par shed/ / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis// gzhonu khyod nis bdag chen po'i yi// rgyal por 'gyur zhes mkhas pas lung bstan gyis// khab nas ma byung shig ces sngon gsol pa// gling bzhir dbang ba'i
21a6: 'khor los sgyur ba ste/ / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// rin chen sna bdun dag dang ldan par 'gyur// 'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur// chos la gnas shing sa yang skyod pa ste// gling bzhi dbang
21a7: bar rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur/ / mi'i yi bdag dang mi yis mchod par 'ong // lto phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba btab// de nas de tshe byang chub sems dpa' des// bskal pa bye bo khrag khrig dpag med nas
21a8: bdag ni rtag tu don pa'i tshig smras kyis/ / rgyal po bdag gi tshig la gson ces gsungs// 'di ltar gling bzhi pa yi rgyal ba srid kyis// bdag la slu bar mdzad par bzhed pas na// de lta'i tshul las

21b1: rgyal po chen po khyod/ / bdag la cung zad tsam yang thugs mer// rgyal so sngon na 'byung ba ni// rgya mtsha'i brlabs kyis rung sbal gcig cig 'phangs// rgya mtsha'i badrabs na byar la gzung ba dang // sna
21b2: de ni khron pa'i nang du lhung / / de la khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal gyis// rgya mtsho'i ru sbal gang nas 'dir 'ong gi/ nga yi the tsom skyes pa bcad pa'i phyir// myur dung la spros shes de skad smras// khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal de
21b3: nyid la/ / rgya mtsho'i ru sbal blo chen des smras pa// nga ni rgya 'tsho'i brlabs kyis bkur bkur ste// khron pa 'dir ni de ring por bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho'i brlabs chen de ni phyir log song // nga ni slar log 'gro bar ma nus te// nga
21b4: ni brlabs dang bral bar gyur pas na/ / ru sbal khyod kyis khron par gnas 'cha'o// de la khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal gyis// rgya mtsho de ni khron pa 'di tsam 'am// 'on te khron pa 'di pas che ba zhig/ dris lan ngal myur tu smos shes
21b5: smras/ / rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo gros chen po des// khron pa'i ru sbal de la tshig smras pa// khron pa'i ru sbal khyod ni byis pa ste// blo rgya chung zhib shes pa rab tu gzhan// nga ni lan tsA can gyi chu der btsas// yun ring dus nas de na skye
21b6: skye yang / / rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma shes par ma nus na// dbus lta shes par ga la nus shes smras// de ltar mi'i bdag po khyod kyis kyang // bdag gi mthu ni thugs su ma chud de// gling bzhi pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis ni//
21b7: khyod kyis bdag la bslu bar mdzad par bzhed// bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// chad pas mi gtsang mtshon chas bder med par// stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di bskyang bar bya// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mdzod
21b8: pa thob par 'gyur/ / rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgoms pa yi bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon tshig sbyangs bzhed nas// de phyir 'khor chen po ni de dag dang // sems can rnams la thugs kyis dgongs pa mdzad//

22a1: rgyal po zas gtsang sems ni mgu bya phyir// thugs kyis yongs su bskul bar mdzad pa dang // 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag ma lus par// de'i tshen der ni 'dus par 'gyur/
22a2: rgyal po 'dun par byas pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i sems thog mar /
22a3: par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtshan mas do// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris/ lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug bcu dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo khrag khrig drug cu dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la mdzod
22a4: pa thog mar byas te/ des rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na/ rin po che rin thangar yod pa dang / rin thang med pa ji snyed gcig yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir phul lo// rin po che gzhan rgya mtsho chen po
22a5: bopo de na med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te/ mchod par phul lo// rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing rta khrag khrig drug bcu yang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag re re zhing yang rta cang shes khrag khrig
22a6: phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ / rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba can rkang lag gi/ rgyan gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi si spras pa dang ldan pa// rin po che sna bdun las byas
22a7: da mdo ma can dbyar 'ad bzong / gser gyi brgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag ga/ rta cang shes de dag gi rgyad tubya ba'i phyir rin sna bdun gyi tha sa dge kyang mngon par sprul te// shing rta de dag gser gyi rgyal mtshan
22a8: can gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla res dag kyang steng gi bar snang las shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur te/ shing rta de dag 'dod na ni rjes su 'dong // shing rta

22b1: de dag sdod na ni sdod pa sha stag go/ / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re dag la yang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sbyangs so// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i tha res ded kyang rin po che sdang
22b2: bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang ldan par sprul to/ / shing rta'i brgyan dang / rta'i rgyan dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na// sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba la mnyan na bde ba sha stag
22b3: 'byung bar 'gyur te/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ rol mo sil stan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ mkhas pas sgra phyung na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang // mnyan na bde ba 'byung ba de de bzhin du shing rta'i brgyan de dag dang
22b4: rta'i brgyan de dag dang / / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i brgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na// sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur to// shing rta de dag gi 'phang gis kyang steng gi bar snang la dpag
22b5: tshad drug cu bsgribs te 'khod par gyur to/ / shing rta de dag gi phyi gzhin yang rol ma sil snyan sna tshogs rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// shing rta de dag thams cad la'ang lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyan thams cad kyis
22b6: brgyan pa dag 'khod de/ / bcom ldan 'das la mchod la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni sil snyan dgrol/ la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni tsan dan dang / ud pa la'i phye mas
22b7: 'thor/ la la ni a ga ru dang / tam pa la'i lo ma'i phye mas 'thor/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi byems 'thor/ la la ni gser dngul gyi phye mas 'thor/ la la ni man dar ba dang / man rab chen po dang /
22b8: man 'dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / ba ru sha ka dang / ba ru sha ka chen po dang / kar kar dang / kar kar chen po dang / ta ma la dang / ta ma la chen po dang / tsatra ba ta la dang / tsa t+ya btal chen pa ba tag mngan pa

23a1: sprul cing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/ / la la ni gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / shel gyi me tog dang / be dUr+ya'i me tog dang / spug gi me tog dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog dang
23a2: rdorje'i snying po'i me tog dag gis mngon par 'thor ro/ / la la ni rin po che sna bdun dang / dbyig gis snyam pa bkang zhing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ngo ro// la lani ni bza' dab rgyan 'bul lo// la la ni gser gyis
23a3: rigs dang / zhabs kyi brgyan dang / phyag gi brgyan dang / sor gdub dang / gdu bu dang / gdubu tham pa dang / dbu brgyan rtsa gsum pa dang / dpung brgya nga / cod pan dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi do shal dang / nor
23a4: do shal dang / se mo do dang / gyang do dang / mgul brgyan sna tshogs 'thor bar gyur to// la la ni tshong tshong gshibs pa/ la la ni mgor rgyan/ la la ni rna ca ga dub kor/ la la ni gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa/ la la ni
23a5: rin po che gser gyi dra ba/ la la ni gser gyi phreng ba dang / nor bu dang nor bu'i phreng ba dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs pa so// la la ni gser gyi gdugs dang / dngul gyi gdugs dang / bai dUr+ya'i gdugs dang / shel gyi
23a6: gdugs dang / spug gi gdugs dang / rdo'i snying po'i gdugs dang / mu tig dmar po'i gdugs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / ri po che'i rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa dang / nib che'i thams cad
23a7: kye ba dang kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can mang po thogs paso// las ni spos chu'i char 'bebs shing 'khod par gyur to// la la ni bcom ldan 'das la chags su gcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par stong par gung
23a8: to/ / mi mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi phul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rkang gnyis gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod la do zla yongs ma mchis// 'jig rten gang la la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes mtsho la phyag

23b1: 'tshal lo/ / dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs sel la phyag 'tshal lo// spyod dang ldan la phyag la lo// bud dag rgyad
23b2: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sems dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'// le lo mi mnga' nod mi mnga'// brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtun pa nyid// nges par rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo//
23b3: po che'i pho brang gis rdal bltan sdug par mdzes pa// rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu yang mngon par sprul te 'duH rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag re re zhing yang bzhugs sa khrag
23b4: khrig thag drug cu drug cu yang mon par sprul te/ / bzhugs sa de dag de re zhing yang ba gam bkra ba/ blta na bsdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ brgya phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// ba ga ma
23b5: de dag re re la yang khang pa gartsegs pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ khrag khrig drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re zhing yang khyams bkra ba blta na bsngag pa
23b6: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ / de la gser gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung byams ni dngul/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni bai d+har+ya/ them pa dang kha khyer ni shel/ ka ba ni smug
23b7: pa/ kazhu ni mu tig dmar po// sa gzhini sngo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// dngul gyi rnams rnams kyi gdung bya ma ni gser/ bral bu dang sgo 'phar ni bai dur+ya/ them pa dang // khal khyer ni shel/ ka ba ni sdug pa/ kazhun
23b8: mu tig dmang po dang / sa gzhini rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ bai dUr+ya'i khyams rnams kyi gdung byam ni shel/ thal bu dang / sgo 'phang ni gser/ them pa dang kha khyer ni dngul/ ka bi na sdug/ kany+dza/

24a1: ni pra tig dmar po// sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can gastag go// shel gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung byam ni bai d+d+haH/ gral ba dang / sgo bar ni sdug/ thel pa dang / kha khyung ni rje'i sri
24a2: rang bzhin can no/ / ka ba ni gsesang/ ka'u ni dngul/ sa bzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// sdug gi khyams rnams kyi gdung bya ma ni rdo'i snying po// bral bu dang sgo bar ni/ mu tig dmar po// ma
24a3: dang / khal khyer ni gser/ ka ba ni dngul/ kazhu ni shal/ sa bzhi ni bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// mu tig dmar po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni spug/ gral bu dang / sgo bar ni rdo'i snying po// them pa
24a4: dang / / kha khyer ni dngul/ ka ba ni gser// ka zhu ni bai DUr+ya/ sa gzhi ni ke ke ru'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ rdo'i snying po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni mu tig dmar po/ gral bu dang / sgo 'phar ni gser
24a5: them pa dang / khal khyer ni dngul/ ka ba ni bai DUr+ya/ ka zhu ni ka kai ru/ sa gzhi ni shel gyi rang bzhin nan sha stag go/ khyams de dag tu yang seng ge'i khri rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi gos
24a6: sna tshogs bting ba/ ka tsa la ni di'i steng g.yogs can/ mtha' gnyis su rten ma bzang po bkod pa/ khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// seng ge'i khri de dag gi rkang rten rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can dag
24a7: la yang ras bcos bu sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ shing bal las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / srin pa la byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / zar ma'i shun pa las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / shun pags pa las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang /
24a8: ga shi ka las byas pa shin tu phra ba dbye pa phrag drug cu drug cu bting bar gyur to// seng ge'i khri re re'i ngos gnyis su yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i bsal

24b1: yab thogs par gnyis gnyis mngon par sprul te/ seng ge'i khri de dag la lnga yin gyi bu mo gzhon nu 'khod pa dag la g.yob bo// khyams de dag re ning yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i bsil gdugs khrag
24b2: brag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/ / khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan ldagag/ drug cu drug tu mngon par sprul to// de la gser gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan sngon po la yab
24b3: ser po shel gyis spras pa dag btsugs/ / dngul gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan ser po yu ba dmar po gser gyis spras pa dag btsugs/ baiDUr+ya'i khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan dmar po yu ba ser po/
24b4: shel gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan dkar po yu ba bai DUr+ya gser gyis spras pa dang bsus// rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi lhums rnams srani rgyal mtshan khra bo gser gyi yu ba bai DU r+yas smras pa dag btsugs
24b5: so/ / de la rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni tog ser po/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni stog sngon po// rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po// rgyal mtshan dkar po rnams ni tog dmar po/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal
24b6: mtshan rnams ni/ tog rin po che sna bdun pa sha stag go// rin ba che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed par gyur to// de 'di lta ste dper na/
24b7: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po la srung gi bu ni bar snang gi nam mkha' las 'gro zhing sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal yongs su 'du bas rtol du nye bar 'jog go// de bzhin pho brang gi
