24b8: rdal de dag kyang bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byed do// rin po che'i po phreng gi rda la de ga dang bag mede dag dang // bzhugs sa de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang /

25a1: khyams de dag dang / seng ge'i khri de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag las lha'i tsan dan dang / ut+pal dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang phye ma'i cad 'bab par gyur to//
25a2: me tog man dar ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / ka ra ka ra dang / ka ra ka ra chen po dang / pa ta la dang / pa ta la chen po dang / tsi tra pa
25a3: ta la dang / tsi tra pa ta la chen po'i char yang mngon par 'bab par gyur to// gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang / sprug pa dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog dang /
25a4: dbyig dang / gser dang / yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i char yang mngon par 'bab par gyur to// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla res de dag gi mthus lha ma yin gyi bu de dag rin po che gang dang gang gi char dbab par 'dod
25a5: pa de dang de dag las mngon par 'bab par gyur to/ / de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas khor yug tu ni dpag tshad drug khri/ 'bang du yang dpag tshad drug khrir lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de lta bus rgyas par
25a6: gang bar gyur to/ / rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po yang
25a7: mi 'greng bdun tsam du/ me tog man da ra bas rgyas par gang bar gyur to// spos chus kyang rdzing du gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang spos chu'i rdzing tu dri des
25a8: khyab par gyur to/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can gang dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub tu sems

25b1: dang po bskyed pa dag ni smos kyang mi dgos so/ / de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan gyi phye mas
25b2: mngon par gtor te/ / tshigs su gcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// byang chub dam pa don tu gnyer slad du// skyabs bgyi dam pa rab tu mi sprul pa// lhar bcas 'jig rten mi 'jigs stsol pa po//
25b3: khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// gang la dga' ba'i yid kyis skyabs song nas// log ltung dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyur ba// de la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// dpe' med byang chub 'tshal ba'i slad du'o// /
25b4: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag ni bshig bcom zhing // mya ngan las rgal nyon mongs dag gyur la// 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa// khyed la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// rga dang na dang 'chi bas
25b5: nyen gyur pa'i/ / lha dang mi rnams 'dren pas bcom ldan 'das// gang la skyabs song phyis kyang mi skye ba// khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mtsho// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs
25b6: ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ / rta'i rgyan de dag dang / shing rta'i brgyan de dag dang // lha ma yin gyi brgyan de dag dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan de dag
25b7: dang / tha ra dang / dril brag yar ka'i brgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na dga' ba 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar dper na rol mo sel snyan yan lag brgyad pa mkhas/
25b8: bas sgra phyung ba bzhin no// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyis// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ steng gi bar snang las lha'i tsad dan dang / ud pal dang / ud

26a1: la dang / a ga dra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phyi ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lham yin gyi spos kyi rgya ma rnam pa sna tshogs du ma char mngon pa bab par gyur ta/ man dang bad
26a2: man dar ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / ba ru sha ka dang / ba ru sha ka chen po dang / ka ra ka ra dang / ka ra ka ra chen po dang / pa ta la dang / pa ta la chen po dang / tsi tra pa ta la dang / tsa tra pa ta la
26a3: chen po nga / me tog rnams dang / sprul pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab po// steng gi bar snang las gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po
26a4: dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab po// lha dang lha ma yin gyi spos chu'i char yang mngon par zab po// spos chu'i char chen po dbab pas/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po
26a5: nas/ bor yug tu dpag tshad drug nu tshun chad spos chus rdzab du gyur to// spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to// sems
26a6: can gang dag gis ba spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyis//
26a7: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe// bar snang las lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi sel snyan gyi sgra dag byung ngo // sil snyan de dag gi sgras kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
26a8: su grags par gyur to/ / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can gang dag gis// sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir me ldog par gyur//

26b1: 'di ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi/
26b2: dbang po thag zangs ris kyis// 'khor bya'i ba'i phyir// la la ni glu len/ la la ni sel snyan byed/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sbyar// la la ni tsan dan dang / ut+pal dang / a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i
26b3: lo ma'i phye ma 'thor/ la zhi lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man dar ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / ba dra sha ka dang / ba ru sha ka chen po dang / ka ra ka ra dang / kar ka rab
26b4: chen po dang / ba ta la dang / ba ta la chen po dang / tsi ta pa ta la dang / tsi tra pa ta la chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams dang / gser dang / dngul dang / be dur+ya dang / shel dang / sprug pa dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig
26b5: dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog rnams 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das la mengon par 'thor ro// la la ni na bza' dang rkang gdub dang / sku rigs dang / phyag gi brgyan dang / so gdu ba dang / gdub
26b6: bu dang / gdub bu tham pa dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum dang / cod pan dang / dbu brgyan dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi de shal dang / nor bu'i de shal dang / se mdo dang / gya do dang / mgul brgyan sna
26b7: tshitshogs dang / rna cha dang / rna cha gdub 'khor dang / tsheng tshong gshibs dang / mgo rgyan dang / phreng ba'i lda ldi dang / spos kyi lda ldi dang / nor bu'i lda ldi dag 'thong zhing / me tog gi bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu'i
26b8: bla re dag thogs so/ / la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs so// la la ni phye ma'i char 'bebs so// la la ni mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// de la la ni rin po ches snyam

27a1: bab gang ste/ / lal ni gser gyis snyim pa ba gang ste// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thong ngo ro// tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// gang brtan gang la gnas pacas nas// gang zag mchog mdzod
27a2: bar 'gyur/ / de 'dra ba'i grogs po dang // rtag par rgyun tu phrad par shog/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyis ji ltar byas pa dbanan du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas nas rin po ches
27a3: bdun gyinang rtal zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// stobs bcu brtson pa den khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi rigs
27a4: 'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / chos lam dres nges par gyur pa go// 'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khod rgyud mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mthar phyin
27a5: tha ga nas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'gro ba bying ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can 'grogs pa kyang nod pa mi mnga' zhing // 'gro bkun las thugs ni rnam grol te// pad mchu yis mi gos 'dra ba po// blo zab pas ma mi
27a6: khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid mkhyen// rnam pa kun tu mtshan ma thams cad shig/ khyod ni gang du'ang smon pa yod mi mnga'// mi gnas nam mkha' mnyams la phyag 'tshal lo// lha ma yin gyi dbang
27a7: bor bsim gyis ji ltar byas pade bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtal zhon te bcom ldan 'das la yan gsum bskor ba byed cing / gser phye dag
27a8: gis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ / sa dang bar snang dang ni lha yul na'ang // bde gshegs khyod man ma ma mchis lhag ma mchis

27b1: mtshan mar bzung nas byin ci lo gzhugs pa'i/ / 'gro ba'i sdig sgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis mkhyen// 'din byed med tshor ba sems can med// gang zag med cing bdag gi dbya ba med// chos thun stong zhing byed
27b2: pa kun nas dben/ / rang bzhin med cing g.yo med zhi zhes stan// su zhig bde gshegs bstan pa 'dis mos te/ chos kun byas pa med pa'i rjes 'brang ba// de 'dir 'dren pa'i sras su gyur pa ste// ji ltar
27b3: bstan pa de bzhin yab ltar spyod/ / rnam 'dren khyod la bdag stod bsod nams gang skyes te// ji ltar rgyal ba mkhyen pa yis ni mkhyen gyur pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba de kun ma lus mtha' dag 'dir// 'gro ba rtsal//
27b4: kyis thams cad sangs rgyas grub par shog// bam po gsum pa// lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis
27b5: kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing lha la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis/
27b6: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu las pha rol rnam rgal ba// rgal nas skye bo rgyun gyi rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing // bde gshegs pa rol thang bde 'jigs pa med 'jog pa// spyan
27b7: mdzes bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi zhabs 'jug pa/ / tho mchog khyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad kun tu mkhyen// phyin ci log lha thibs por rab zhes tho ldan te// 'khrul pa smig sgra lta bur ma shes gyur rnams la//
27b8: mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rje skyed nas rtogs par mdzad// mi mchog khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma dang // smig rgyu 'dra zhing mig yor mtshungs shes rab tu bstan// thub pa dam pa khyod kyis chos kyis

28a1: sras mchog bskyed/ / srid pa gsum po dag na mi chags spyad pa spyod// dngos po log pa'i don gyur rang bzhin bral ba dang // gzhan gyi dngos pos stong par mi dbang khyod kyis mkhyen// byis
28a2: pa'i rmongs pa'i blo gros rmi lam dga' lta bur/ / mi dbang khyod kyis sras kyis 'tshal nas spyad pa spyod// lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po dgrag can gyis kyang //
28a3: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog ci tra brtul rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
28a4: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par brjod pa/ / mi mchog khyod kyi sku yis ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di zil mnan// ri rab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang // rgya mtshos sa rjes chu bzhin no// gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis par du
28a5: brgyan/ / gzugs kyis gzugs kyi dam pa dang // gzugs rnams thams cad zil gyis mnan// dper na nyi mas me khyer bzhin// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid kyis// sems can gzi ldan zil gyis mnan//
28a6: zil mnan de dag lam me min// nyi mas me khyer zil brlag bzhin// ye shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis// 'jig rten gsum gun zil gyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam me min// nyi mas zla 'od zil brlag bzhin/
28a7: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra ba can gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan
28a8: 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing me tog tsi tra ba las mngon par gtor te/ / tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// 'dren pa blo gros zhi ba po// zhi gnas dgyes pas 'gro ba

28b1: yi/ / 'dod sdang gti mug rdul zhi mdzad// char bas rdul rnams zhi bgyid bzhin// 'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar mdzad// blugs byin gyis ni me bzhin no// nags btang nags mes shing bsreg ltar/
28b2: de bzhin nyon mongs drab bsreg/ bskal pa bya ba khrag khrig ni// dpag tu med par dge rtsa 'dzin// nyon mongs thams cad 'jom mdzad de// mun khung mun nas sel mdzad de/ mun khung sprin ma
28b3: 'bang ba bzhin/ / chos kyi tshul yang ston mdzad de// nor mkhan na chen yon tan bzhin// lham yin gyi dbang po bde ma chog gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lA ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas cang
28b4: bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas nas/ / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rdal zhon te// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing rin po'i me tog rnams kyis gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das
28b5: la mngon par bstod pa/ / gdul dka' ma zad sems ni khyad kyis btul// g.yul la dpa' bos g.yul dod dpa' bzhin// shani tu tsha bcad rang gi dbang du mdzad// thugs dul mi bsnyengs spyod la phyag/
28b6: 'tshal lo// khyod kyis dbang po thul cing dadagra yang bcom// gang du mi bskyengs mi bskyod pa de ba bsnyes/ khyod ni nyon mongs rnams kyis yang mi 'jugs// rnam pa kun du drug ni ma lus
28b7: bcom/ / mthu chen khyod kyis byams pa legs bsgoms te// khyod kyis thugs ning gra dang byams la mnyam/ thub pa khyod kyis sems can gyi thos pashig/ bcwo bdun tu khyod ni/
28b8: Sharung mi mnga'// shes rab rnam grol srid pa'i sred par skams// shes rab rnam dag khyod kyi thugs kyang dag/ chos rnams kun lathugs ni chags mi mngang// thams cad zil mnan thub dang /

29a1: khyod 'dra med// lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzangs kyis kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin
29a2: sna bdun gyi shing ta la zhon te/ / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / bcom ldan 'das la gter chen po yang bral nas/ tshigs su bcad bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstong pa/
29a3: dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis ni// chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen// gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang // de ni brdar brtags tshig tu zad// chos rnams chos kyi ngo bo yis// rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs so// gang 'idi
29a4: chos shes brjod pa yang / / de ni ming tsam zad ces gsungs// ming ni ming gis dben pa te// mtshan nyid kyang ni de bzhin no// chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste// ming yang med ces khyod kyis shad// rab tu
29a5: bshad ces bgyi ba yang / / bshad pa ci yang ma mchis te// gang gis kyang ni sa bshad cing // su la 'ang yang bshad pa ma mchis so// chos kyi sras po mi mchog rnams// chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas
29a6: ni/ / chos rnams la yang mi chags par// rnam par spyad do thub pa che// lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzangs kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par mnon pas kyang //
29a7: bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas nas// rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing // bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal yang bul nas/ tshigs su bcad bdag
29a8: gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ / dgra zla ma mchis khyod la bdag bstod do// tshul khrims dang ni gzugs dang ye shes stobs// des ni 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis/

29b1: de phyir khyod ni dgra thul mtshungs ma mchis// khyod kyi gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pas na// gzugs kyi stobs kyis khams gsum zil gyis mnan// sbyin pa'i stobs
29b2: kyis mnin rgyas phun sum tshogs/ / dpe byad can sa 'tshogs shing gzugs kyang dag/ tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni ci bskyod de// skye bo mkhas pas so sor bsas mi la // khyo na
29b3: tshul khrims ldan zhing thugs kyang dag/ me'i seng ge mdzad pa thams cad 'byor// shes rab stobs kyis khyod mtshungs 'ga' ma mchis// drin mo bsnyings 'jig rten gsum brgyal nas// 'khor dus dgi
29b4: bur sgra bsgrags te/ / rtog ge tshogs kyi tho gros bzil gyis mnan// lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par mnon gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams bar snang
29b5: byed kyis kyang / / bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas nas// rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / rin po ma snyim pa bkang ste/ tonanas tshigs su bcad
29b6: pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ / thub pa chen po skye bo tshogs pa 'dir// dang ba'i yid kyis khyod kyi zhal du blta/ kun gyis rgyal ba mdun ni bzhugs par mthong // de ni rgyal ba'i
29b7: sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa las// skyob bsam pa ji bzhin so sor 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyis gsung de de ltar 'byung // de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas
29b8: ma 'dres mtshan/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gcig brjod pa las// 'khor gyis tha dad gsung du rnam 'tshal cing la// 'gro bas rang don ji lta bzhin du'ang 'tshal// de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan//

30a1: gsung gcig rab tu brjod pa mdzad pas na// gcig la 'dzag pas gzhan ni dgag pa mdzad// 'dren pa su dag ma bslabs rtogs par mdzad// de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma// 'dres
30a2: mtshan lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po btang gzungs kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod bar byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan
30a3: 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / / mu tig dmar po sa snyim pa bkang ste/ gtor nas tshigs su bcad bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod brgyags dang rgyal sdig pa'i lta ba spyod pa gang / yid dga'
30a4: rab tu dang bas mi dbang bde gshegs kyi/ / blo la mngon par dga' ba de dag ma mchis te// mtshungs med bsnyen kur bgyid pa de dag stong pa'i sras// chos rnams 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyi sa ma mchis te/ rmi lam
30a5: dga' ba thams cad tshad ma ma lags 'dra/ rmi lam dga' spyod ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis// de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs// ston dka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing chu'i zla ba 'dra//
30a6: byis pa'i blo can rnams kyi yid ni rmongs par bgyid// gang dag rtag tu bag mchis pa de gshegs blo dga' ga/ mkhas pa'i skye bo dag la 'di ni rmongs mi bgyid// rgyal ba khyod kyi brtan la rtag du bag mchis gang // mi mcho//
30a7: dam pa de dag ming la yongs mi mchi// chos rnams thams cad rmil ma 'dra bar rnam rtogs nas// yang dag mthong ba de ga ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur// de nas thag zangs ris la sogs pa// lha ma yin gyi dbang po
30a8: bye ba phrag drug bcu po de dag gis mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu byas nas/ byang chub la bzhol ba'i sems kyis tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba bskyes te/ thal

30b1: mo sbyar nas/ / bcom ldan 'das nyi la phyag 'tshal zhing // bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lod par gyur to// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i mchod pa de dag
30b2: kyang go zigs/ lha ma yin de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang thugs su chungad nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de// gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe
30b3: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs du ma 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / lebargan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/ de dag gis
30b4: thams cad dang ldan pa 'jig rten snang bas rgyas par bkang ste phyir log nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug du nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul stan
30b5: las langs te/ bla gos phrag ba gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs ste/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba re logs su thar mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad
30b6: ba'i don tshigs su bcad de zhus pa/ 'jig rten phan bzhed rgyud zhig ma mchis par// mi'i seng ge 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// drang srong chen po ci sbyar 'dzum pa mdzad// skyes bu mchod gis 'dzum pa'i nA yang
30b7: gsungs/ / lha min mchod pa rgya chen gzigs gyur nas// 'jig rten pan bzher khyod ni mdzum mdzad na// lha mi ni rnams la lung bstan bka' ba stsal gsol// de thos bdag cag rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// de ring su yis
30b8: dogogs med rgya chen sems/ / 'khor 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur gcig gu// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi zas ma mkhyen nas// mi'i seng ges 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// de ring yongs su dag bi'i yid kyis su/

31a1: mi'i mchog la dad pa gang gis bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen te// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// 'di ltar ba
31a2: gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di/ / su yis dpung bcas bdud ni deng bcom zhes// 'khor 'di de ring the tsom 'tshal bar 'gyur// drang srong chen po rgyal ba dgra las rgyal// the tsom 'tshal ba'i som nyi ga cad du gsol/
31a3: mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba yi// the tsom sbyar te legs par bcad du gsol// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la
31a4: slar bka' stsal pa/ / rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa// de'i 'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya// bstan pa de ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bla na med pa'i byang chub
31a5: 'dod pa'i phyir/ / lha min rnams kyis sang mchod pa 'di byas te// de dag sems ni ci la'ang chags med pas// nam mkha'i ngos la lag mthil chags med bzhin// lha min tshogs kyis dang ba'i yid byas te//
31a6: de dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pas// blo can de dag lha min ris bor te// mtho ras dong nas yun ring dga' bar 'gyur// de dag phyi dus rgyal ba mi'i seng ge/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba snyed// bsnyen bkur byas
31a7: nas yid 'ong bskal pa la/ / de dag thams cad mtshan 'thun rgyal bar 'gyur// de tshe bde gshegs khrag khrig drug bcu rnams// 'jig rten sgron ma phyogs su bsgrags pa ste// de dag mi gnas chos ni ston mdzad/
31a8: cing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'grol bar 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag rnams kyi zhing // shin tu yangs shing snyigs ma med par 'gyur// de tshe khrag khrig drug cung tshang ba yi// rgyal ba rnams kyi

31b1: gsuspyod par 'gyur/ / ded/ ngan song thams cad sil bar mdzad// de gag dang dga' bar spyod par 'gyur// btan pa de dag ma kham thams cad stong // ldan ma dpa'i zag pa ston par 'jug
31b2: de dag tshe'i tshad du 'byur ba ni/ / bskal pa khrag thig drug rgya tshang bar yang // rnam par 'dren pa de dag tsha bar 'gyur// chags pa med pa'i chos kyang ston par mdzad// thub pa de dag mya ngan 'das gyur ti// 'jig rten
31b3: mkhas pa rab tu ni gyur nas/ / bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar ni// rang byung rnams kyi dam chos gnas par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa de dag 'gro ba'i tshogs// gang ga'i bye ma snyed kyi skye bo 'dral// dgra
31b4: las rgyal ba'i rgyal bar mtshan mthun 'gyur/ / zhing dang tshe dang chos gnas 'gyur ba'ang mthun// bde gshegs de dag khrag khrig drug cu yi// skyes pa bud med yongs su smin mdzad de// bla na med pa'i theg pas 'dems
31b5: par 'gyur/ / mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i gdung yang mdzin// rgyal ba lha min de dag lung bstan pa/ 'jig rten phan phyir drang srong chen pos gsungs// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten de thos nas// yid rangs gyur
31b6: cing stobs kyang skyes par gyur/ / lha ma yin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos lha ma yin gyi mchod pa rnam pa de lta bu 'di mthong nas/
31b7: ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig mngon par 'du mdzad na/ 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin par grub snyam nas/ de'i tshe sems ji
31b8: ltang mnyam par bzhag pas bskal pas grangs med pa yang rjes su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa'i rgyud de dang der 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / dge ba'i

32a1: ba gang dag gis pan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis phyir mi ldog pa bcos par gyur pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba daH
32a2: bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po rjes su dran par gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
32a3: dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po de lta bu mdzad na/ de'i thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad mi'i lus thob par gyur
32a4: te/ lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji snyed pa de snyed du sems can re res bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod par byas kyang de dag gis thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang lan lon par mi nus so snyam mo// de nas tshe dang
32a5: ldan pa 'od srungs chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ ngo mtshar dang / dad pa thob par gyur nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la/ tshigs su bcad de mngon par yodas// thub pa byang chub gzhol ba yi// thugs myed
32a6: pa ni re re la'ang / / lha ma yin gyi mchod pa 'dis// cha tsam mi spyod kyi seng ge/ de lta'i yon tan mthar phyin te// lha dang mi yis mchod gyur pa// tsan dan phur ma ri rab tsam// mi mchog khyod la mchod par
32a7: 'os/ / mi'i seng ges khyod la ni// gang ga'i bye mches meng pa'i// rgya mtsho rab tu bkad ba yi// spos chu 'dag gis mchod par 'os// yon gtan chen po mnga' ba la/ gang ga'i bye mches mang ba'i//
32a8: me tog tshogs ni ri bo mchog/ khor yug chen po mnyam mchod 'os// rgyal ba sgron ma rang 'byung ba// mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam// 'bru mar rgya mtsho'i chu snyed kyi// mar me rnams kyis

32b1: mchod par 'og/ mthu chen mnga' ba de lta zung // yon tan pa rol phyin byung ba// gad ga'i byas kyis mang ba'o// tog mdod rten mchod pa 'os// mi dbyu sa pas thugs /
32b2: ba// rin chen gdugs na che rnams kyis// bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su yang // sems can mchog la mchod par 'os// yon tan mtha' yas mnga' ba khyod// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis//
32b3: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste// bskal pa bsam yas mchod par 'os// mi'i seng ge khyod la ni// bskal pa khrag khrig dpag med par// gang ga'i bye mches mang ba'i// ba dan rnams kyis
32b4: mchod par 'os/ / drang srong chen po smra ba'i stag/ lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang // gzhan yang sems can gang tshogs pa// brtag bzung dpel gsan du gsol// gal te gang ga'i bye snyed kyi// phyogs bcu'i
32b5: 'jig rten khams rnams kyi/ / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su// mi mchog stobs bcu'i stobs ldan la// de dag re re'i mgo po yang // gang ga'i bye ma snyed gyur te// mgo bo de dag re re zhing // de snyed
32b6: kha dang ldan gyur la/ / kha rnams de dag re re zhing // lce dang kha'i grangs mnyam la// gang ga'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// bskal par bstong bar bgyis kyang ni// rgyal ba de dag spobs med pas// khyod kyi yon tan mthar mi byin//
32b7: rgyal ba de lta'i yon tan gyi// pha rol tu ni byin par 'gyur// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag legs so legs so// nga'i nyan thos rnams ni drang por gyur pa/
32b8: ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa/ chos su gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa sha stag gnas te/ de dag ni nga'i yon tan gyi tshogs la 'jug pa sha stag go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa/

33a1: na yan tan dpag tum pa nga na sa// yon napas mabyas makya pa dang ldan pa'o// dge slang dag bzhin gshegs pa 'ayon ta rnams dang / ra bzhin gshegs pa'i yan tan kyi pa 'du byen pa dang /
33a2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi sags ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i glang bye ma
33a3: snyed du shor bar mi 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa re de'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gang ga'i bye ma snyed kyis bskal pa ga ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gang 'di grangs kyi tshad bzung bar brjod kyang brjod par mi nus/ bsams cad
33a4: bsam par mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems bskyed pa gang yang sems tsam du bsdu bar bsdus pa sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i sems can de dag thams
33a5: cad la phan pa dang bad pa'i don du ma bskyed pa gcig kyang med de/ sems can gyi khams ni tshed med pas sems can gyi khams ji snyed kyi bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo // sems can gyi khams ni mi zad pa ste/
33a6: sems can gyi khams ji ltar mi zad pa de ltar mi zad pa'i bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo // sems de ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du skyes pas sems can thams cad kyis mchod kyang lan lon par
33a7: mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni zang zing dang bcas pa ya ni la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du 'byung ba'i ni/ sems can 'khor ba la gzhol pa 'di dag/ mya ngan
33a8: las 'das pa la ji ltar gzhol bar 'gyur shes te zang zing med pa'i phyir ro/ / de bzhin gshegs bsngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyi don du zang zing med pa'i sems dpag tu med

33b1: pa bskyed par gyur to/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal ba dpag du med pa bgrang du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ 'das pa de'i tshedor
33b2: dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ reg pa dang thabs su ldan pa/ de bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha le stA ba/ than mdapa/
33b3: dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten tu byung ste/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sems bskyed par rere zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
33b4: rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la phan dgo nges par gyur te don kyang mdzad do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang
33b5: gcig tu gyur te/ yongs su dag cing ngan song dang / mi khom pa thams cad yongs su chad pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na log par nges pa'i sems can gyi bskye ba yongasu med par
33b6: gyur to/ / lta ba'i rnam pa yong su med par gyur to// mngon pa'i nga rgyal ba can yongasu med par gyur to// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yongasu med par gyur to// ngan song gi
33b7: rgyur 'gyur ba'i nyan mongs pa dang / lam 'byung ba yongasu med par 'gyur te// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa des/ yun ring po nas sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba chos rnams la btsang cing btams te/
33b8: rjes su bstan cing bslangs pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang ba'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khos pa'i sems can rnams kyang bde ba lnga thob par

34a1: g+hu to/ / 'di ltar la la ni 'dod pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni khyi mnas 'byung ba'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni bsam tan gyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni snyoms
34a2: par 'jug pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ / la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// de dag bde ba de la yang spyod la bde ba de dag la yang mngon
34a3: par zhen pa med par gyur to/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ bud pa me tog gi khra bas nye bar 'tshe yang mngon par zhen pa med de// de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do//
34a4: 'di lta ste dper na/ bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya ni par snang la yang rgyu la de la mngon par chags pa med do// de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin
34a5: gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la yid la mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i mi dga' ba med/ / rmongs par 'gyur po med de// gzhan du na yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i
34a6: dga' ba'i sha stag la yongs su spyod de/ / de ni 'di ltar sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu bskyed pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad/
34a7: pa spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dge ba las yongs su zlog ste/ dge ba la bcud pas/ de dag la las gang gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa dbang med par 'byung ba mi dge ba'i las de lta bu yod med de/
34a8: de mi brtsegs pa'i phyir// sdug bsngal tsher bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin par mi 'byung ngo // de dag ni rmongs pa'i sems tsam gyis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa rnams la sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin

34b1: pa'i phyir tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mngon du ma byas te/ de ma brtsegs pa'i phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal yang ma yin// bde ba yang ma yin pa'i de mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dbang
34b2: po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rgyu gang gis sems can de dag dus gyur pa las 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas/ nyams su mi bde ba'i nyi ma mi 'char ro// nyams su mi bde ba mi ldang do// char nyams su mi bde ba mi
34b3: 'bab bo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag la lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon tu 'gro zhing / shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba
34b4: bstan cing bshad pas/ sems can de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de las bstan pa de thos nas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad shes pa'i sngon tu 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yongs su bsgrub
34b5: pa sa las de'i rnam par smin pas de dag la rmongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ yid kyi dga' ba med par 'gyur ba med do// rmongs par rnams la rgyu gang gis bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba med//
34b6: do// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zha de na sems can de dag sdug bsngal gyi tshang ba med cing bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa yang med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i sems can de bzhin gshegs pa des
34b7: gtams pa de dag ni tshes la rim 'gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par gyur to/ / de dag 'chag na yang chos nyid la sems shing chos la mos pas zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag ste/ chos la mos shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag
34b8: bde dag yar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo / / de bzhin du 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / sad pa dang / spyod lam thams cad du yang sdug bsngal mi 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can de dag

35a1: la yang bam spangs pa med do/ / de'i phyir yang ba ma spangs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo // yang dag pa'i spong ba yod pas de dag la skyo ba med de/ de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par spang bar bya
35a2: ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do/ / sems can de dag la 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa/ med pa'i phyir ro// de dag la mi sdug pa dang ma ma grang
35a3: pa'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro// de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ci'i phyi zhe na/
35a4: 'di ltar de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro// sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni sdug pa las 'byung ste/ de'i phyir de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do// sems
35a5: can de dag la sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ngo / / 'di ltar de ni sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyub med pa'i phyir ro// gzhan du na 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gcig pu yod de/ 'di lta ste mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal
35a6: nyid do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de ni don dam pa'i chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs pa'i tshe/ des gsungs pa la phyir smra ba'i sems can gang
35a7: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste/ de ni 'di ltar sngon sems can de dag legs par yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir ro// dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum
35a8: pa dang chud pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / zhes par brtsams pa dang / zhes par bsgrubs pa'i

35b1: dade 'i rtsal ba sems can de snyed cig gis don bya ba'am/ de la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ bsdug bsngal bsngal ba'am de ltar thag gra che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/
35b2: sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar mi nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni sa legs so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ sems zhan pa dang / sems dma' ba nas
35b3: nyes par bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sems kyis sems can de snyed gcig gi don bya ba'am/ de dag la phan par bsams pa 'am/ bde bar bsgrub pa'am/ sdug bsngal bstsal pa 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs
35b4: rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems//
35b5: sems zhan pa dang / sems dman pa nas/ nyes par bsgrubs pa'i bar kye sems kyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal ba bstsal
35b6: pa 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa
35b7: dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ dad pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dad pa'i bar dang / tshul khrims zhan pas nas/ nyes par bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang / thos pa zhan pa nas/ nyes par
35b8: bsgrubs pa'i thos pa'i bar dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar dang / dran pa zhen pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dran pa'i bar dang / ting nge 'dzin zhan

36a1: pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang / shes rab zhen pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi bar gyis sems can de snyed gcig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa dang /
36a2: bde bar bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am gsal ba'am/ de 'thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am// sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/
36a3: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag legs so legs so// de ni dge ba'i rtsa bzhan pa dang / sems zhan pa dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims
36a4: dang / thos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / 'dres pa
36a5: dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / nyes par brtsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis/ sems can de snyed kyi don bya ba 'am/ ded / pa phan par bsam pa'am/
36a6: bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal brtsal ba'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya ba mi nus so// dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/
36a7: de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba gang zhig yin snyam/ des skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dedag cang mi zer bar 'khod do// de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig
36a8: rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od gzer gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhug

36b1: ste/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
36b2: pagam brjid 'phags pa'i rgya yod pa 'dis daces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di sa pa lang ci 'jog rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thab pa chos ston gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thab pa des
36b3: bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
36b4: 'jam dpal de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur ba/ stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag
36b5: 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskus pa las rkyang ba 'am/ brgyad pa las bskum pa tsam gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi
36b6: khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan drang zhing gnas par gyur to// des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig
36b7: tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i
36b8: dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang shig yen snyam zhes bka' stsal pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyid ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dbang po'i tog ces bgyi ba'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur to//

37a1: de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni ba ma gyi me pa'i babs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la chog pa mi mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par brgya
37a2: la lda mi mdzad par bgyibam mchis/ sems can rnams byang chubasams dpa' chos rnams la dgod pas chog pa'i mad 'gre/ la la zhig yang dag par sgrubs yang dag par sman/ rgyal pa gtso gtul ba
37a3: rgyal bam mo/ / rgyal ba dam pa/ rgyal bar bces brjod pa don/ bcom ldan 'das nyid lags par yang dag par ngapa yang dag par 'ad // daskad ces smras nas/ 'a me la gnon dang chu pas
37a4: gas su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / dpa' bo rnams na thebs mkhas ste// sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing // lus can yangs su smin mdzad bye/ dpa' bachen po rnam par 'phrul// byebargyad
37a5: brgyad cang rgyal ba nyid/ / sangs rgyas nyid du bstan par kyang // dadung cig pa'i 'du shes brtsal/ byang chub ma chog tu thugs kyang 'phya// stong gsum drun na rtsa gcig gi/ sangs rna
37a6: rnams dag 'ang pa/ / ji ltar thub pa thabs mkhas pa// rgyal ba da ni krin kyis 'al// dadu dang po zugs bskyed par// de de na mangs bstad te// dadrang dum 'dren pa rjod// sangs kyis pa ban
37a7: pa mdzad/ / rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis// gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad// chos kyi dbyings la chags mi mngang// khyed kyis gang yang mkhyen mdzad de// brgya byin tshangs pa'i na byang dang // la lang bdud
37a8: dbyang kyis/ / sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de// 'jig rten rnams kyis rtogs mi nus// bud med cha byad sprod pa mdzad// dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams na gda'// 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te// pad ma

37b1: xxx/ xxx
37b2: la lar bltam pa yongasu bstan/ / la lar mya ngan 'das pa bstan// la lar 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad// la lar spyad pa spyod pa mdzad// sems can 'dul ba'i don slad du// dgyes shing mthur
37b3: lan rol pa mdzad/ / bshums po dag kyang 'byin par mdzad// sems can sras kyang yod me tshal// 'dod chags mi mda'i' chags pa'i tshul// 'jigs pa mi mnga' 'jigs pa ltar// sems
37b4: can rnams par 'dul don du/ / 'dren pa rnams par 'phrul pa mdzad// rmongs med rmongs pa'i tshul bstan te// byis pa ma lags byis tshul gyis// sems can rnam par 'dul skad cu// 'dren pa rnam
37b5: par 'phrul pa mdzad/ / spros pa ma lags spros pa'i tshul// zhab ma lags zha ba'i ltar// rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can rnams ni 'dul bar mdzad// de ltar bsam yas mgon po
37b6: khyod/ / dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab// dpa' chen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// sems can thub chen 'drar gyur cig/ sngon byung ba 'od bsrungs chen po rto zhus pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
37b7: de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs brgyad khri drug stong gis/ lho ma yan gyi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gzhal du med pa'i dang pa bskyes te/
37b8: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir// brtson par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don tu rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa/ shin tu bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ brgyad khri drug stong mngon par

38a1: sbrul to/ / b+haban po che sna bdudun 'dis ste/ gsar dang / dngul dang / baidUr+ya dang / shes dang / thAg dang / muH gdam ba dang // bdang bdun// nga ba brtsigs pa d+mo ga kyang
38a2: bo che sna bzhi'i lan kan gyi dra ba ris bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa rim bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// rin po che sna bzhi ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel lo// gser gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang
38a3: gdung bu rnams ni gser/ shar ba rnams ni dngul/ dngul gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang / gdung bu rnams ni dngul/ dngul gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang / gdung bu rnams ni dngul/ shar ba rnams ni gser/ bai
38a4: dAr+ya'i lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdung bu rnams ni bai dUr+ya/ shar ba rnams ni shel/ shel gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang / gdung bu rnams ni shel/ shar ba rnams ni dngul las byas pa'o// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dril
38a5: bug ler ka'i dra ba bkra ba/ ltan sdug pa/ rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las bya sa ra sha sta gta/ 'di ltar gser dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang
38a6: rdo yi snying po dang / bdun no// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba bkrab/ ltan sdug pa 'di lta ste/ gsir gyi dra ba dang / dngul gyi dra ba dang / bai dUr+ya'i dra ba dang / shel gyi dra dang / mu tig
38a7: dmar po'i dra ba dang / sdug gi dra ba dang / rta'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas bkab par gyur to// gdugs bkra bltan sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang 'di ltar gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi
38a8: rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go/ rgyal mtshan bkra ba lta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul te/ rgyal mtshan de dag kyang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las

38b1: thAthAgaH/ rgyal mtshan ldan pa rnams na nyags pas// rgyal mtshan sa pa rnamasan tag ldan pa can/ rgyal man dmar pa rnamapan/ ga can/ gzhag pa /
38b2: par sprul to// ba dan la dog sna tshogs can/ bkrab bstan sdug pa brgyad khri drug stor yang mngon par sprul par gyur to// thar bathang/ sman sdug pa brgyad khri drug s+ho/ bangon par skal par gyu /
38b3: za re de dag kyang gser gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / dngul gyi skud kyi'i bla ra dang / bai dUr+ya dang / bai dUr+ya'i bla re dang / shel gyi bA ri dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang / smug gau bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla reH/ rin po che sna
38b4: bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go/ / de nas bya'i rgyal po mad ba bzangs de dag gis khang po brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / gdugs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / rgyal mtshan brgyad khri drug stong
38b5: po de dag dang / ba dan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / bla re brgyad khri drug stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul pa dang / de dag thams cad steng gibang skapa la ldang zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
38b6: byas so/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ glang po che'i rgyal pos srung gi bu ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mgo la khyer zhing nam mkha' las songs te/ yongs su 'dus rtol du bzhag go/ de bzhin du khang bu brtsegs
38b7: pa de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag dang / bla re de dag par snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to// de nas 'dab
38b8: bzang brgyad khri drug stong po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// thal mo sbyar nas/ phyag 'tshal zhing tshigs

39a1: sub rad pa dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la yang napar gan// rga dang 'a bas rnam thal khyad la phyag 'tsha la la// dang 'jams rnamatha' byung pa b+hag la la// sas ca dad/
39a2: yas kha lo bsgyur la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa'ang ma mchis so// bdag cag rnams kyang phred me dpal lus ldan shing // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa dang /
39a3: dpe' byang babang pos brgyad bcus shin tu mdzes byas pa'i// sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa khyod 'drar gyur par shog/ bdag cag 'dom gang 'od kyi gzi brjid rab ldan zhing// mngon 'phags gzugs kyi dam
39a4: pas mdzes gyur te/ / spyod lam mchog dang bdag cag ldan gyur cing // 'gro ba rnams spyod mya ngan glo bar shog/ bdag cag tshul khrims tidang 'dzin rab ldan zhing // shes rab ldan gyur mchog tu 'gyur bar shog/
39a5: de ltar rnam par 'dren pa khyod lta bur// skye bo rab 'grol sangs rgyas grub par shog/ 'dren pa 'jig rten mkhas pa khyod lta bur// bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu ldan pa dang // ma 'dres bco brgyad chos kyi
39a6: mthar phyin cing / / 'jig rten mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen du shog/ bdag cag kun kyang 'gri ba dngos med dang // rmi 'drar sgra 'dra gnas pa med dang // brag cha na ma mkha' 'dra bar ston byed cing // ji ltar rnam par
39a7: 'dren khyod ston bzhin du/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po rab bzangs de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
39a8: tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ / rgyal ba rnam 'dren gtso bo sangs rgyas rnams// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum mdzad 'di la rgyu rkyen gang lags pa// 'jig rten pa na mdzad thugs rje

39b1: mnga' pas gsungs/ / 'dab bzangs rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod bgyid de/ bla re nam mkha' rgyas par gang ba bstan// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar skyed// rkang gnyis dam pas de dag
39b2: lung bstan gsol/ / 'gro ba thams cad thal mo rab sbyar cing // dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khod// mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur nyan par 'tshal// rkang gnyis dam pas/
39b3: de dag lung bstan gsol// mi mchog khyod la khod dag mchi ba ni// 'gro ba thams cad the tsom med 'gyur zhing // the tsom med pas 'khor tu 'jigs med 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas mnyes par
39b4: bgyis shes mchi/ / 'khor 'di 'jigs med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// yongs su sbyangs shing shin tu skyon bstsal pas// rgyal ba lung bstan de dag mngon dga' ste// slob ma mchog la thams bstan pa bzhin//
39b5: the tsom 'tshal ba'i the tsom gcad du gsol// rab tu dga' mdzad rjes su sman pa mdzad// dga' ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'di 'dus gyur gyis// rang 'byung mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur gsungs// de nas
39b6: bcom ldan 'das kyis/ / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// thams cad zil gnon stobs bcu brtson 'grus bden// rgyal ba dpa' bo thub pa de bzhin gshegs// 'dren pas
39b7: yan lag brgyad ldan gsung dbyangs kyis/ / 'dab bzangs 'gro bcu thul bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten pan phyir 'dzum gang ngas bstan pa// de'i 'bras bu dga' ba'i yid
39b8: kyis nyon/ / the tsom sel ba rab tu dga' ba bskyed// bla na med pa'i byang chub zhi tshol zhing // stobs dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis// 'dren pa 'jigs med 'gyur ba btsal ba'i phyir// 'dab chags

40a1: dbang pos ngal mchod legs byas/ / ma 'dres bco brgyad chos ni smra ba yi// mthu chen lus ni shin tu 'khrigs pa dang // sum cu gnyis mtshan dpe byad bzang po rnams// yongs su
40a2: btsal phyir ngal mchod pa byas/ / rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal ba dang // gzhan yang sangs rgyas spyod yul shes rab dang // phun sum zhing dang 'gro ba rnam grol ba// 'di dag kun btsal
40a3: don tu mchod pa byas/ / de dag la dga' bas mchod byas pas// dud 'gro'i gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas// lha dang brtul zhugs 'thun par de dag 'dod// 'di ni ngan song srid pa'i tha ma yin//
40a4: bskal pa bye ba gang ga'i bye snyed du// de dag mi'i nang du gnas gyur cing // rnam 'dren khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod byas nas// de dag dbang po thul pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag zhing du ngan sod mi 'byung ste/
40a5: mi lom mi 'byung mtshan dang mi ldan med// rtul ba de dag mtshan ni kun tu mdzes// ri rab rgyal mtshan bskal pa rang 'byung 'gyur// lo ni bye ba brgyad chu bzhi 'grangs par// 'jig rten phan byar
40a6: 'dren pa de dag bzhugs/ / 'jig rten pa na phyir rnam 'dren mnyam bzhag pas// lus can rnams la mnyam pa'i do ni mdzad 'gyur// skyob pa rdul med gyur pa de dag gi/ 'dus pa nga rgyal spangs pa brgyad
40a7: bcur 'gyur/ / de tshe skyob pa rdul dang bral rnams kyi// shin tu sems dul bye ba brgyad na 'byung // 'dren pa de dag 'gro ba'i debasal phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur// mi dag
40a8: ltar 'di rnams nga rgyal che/ / 'dab bzangs lus su gyur nas stobs po che// 'di dag sngon tsha 'das pa'i dus shig na// drang srong dka' thub drag po'i tshigs chen 'gyur// stong phrag brgyad tsartsa

40b1: drug tshang ba ste/ dka' thub spyad pa de rdzu 'phrul phun sum btsal// de dag rdzu 'phrul thob nas pa rgyal gyis// dga' bas dka' thub drag ldan 'gyur// tshul khrims ma zhig de dag nags
40b2: 'dab tu/ / tshe zad shi 'phos gyur te lus kyang zhig/ nga rgyal des ni mkha' lding mkha' 'gror 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul sems kyis rdzu 'phrul ldan par skyes// tshul khrims dag pabaN+Dal ba'i bstan la dang /
40b3: nga rgyal gyis ni byang chub sems kyang bskyed// nam mkha' lding lung bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / bam po bzhi pa/ de nas klu'i
40b4: bu mog bye ba phrag dgu cu rtsa drug gis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas// mchog tu dga' ba chen po yang /
40b5: skyes te// de dag dga' mgu yid rangs nas rab tu dga' ste// dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te// de dag gis rin po che sna bdun
40b6: gyi gdugs bai DUr+ya'i dra ba lnga ldir bkye ba/ mu tig dmar po'i dra bas bskor ba/ gser gyi yub can bai DUr+ya'i thur ma brgya stong bkye ba// rin po che'i tshun po sbyangs pa/ bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul
40b7: to/ / rta sngon po// kha dog sngon po// sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ brgyan sngon pos brgyan pa/ bai DUr+ya'i bsrab kyis bsrabs pa/ bye ba phrag dgu cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// nor bu dz+nyo tir sa'i zla
40b8: re 'khor yug du dpag tshad drug cu yod la/ des 'khor de dag thams cad g.yogs pa gcig kyang steng gi bar snang la mngon par sprul te// de la rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bkra ba/ mig tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa

41a1: bye ba phrag dgrabacun drug bres pa mngon par sprul to/ / tha de'i khar yug du rin po che sna bdun gyi drim brag dka'i dra ba mang napa sgral te rnas pa// ran pa cha sna bdun gyi khrung zug pa/ ya napa shA/
41a2: to/ klu'i rim mos la snyan bye ba phrag dbu brgyacu drug mngon par sprul to// de nas pa'i rol mo de dag rta sngon po de dag la zhon nas/ rin pa tshe lnga bdun gyi gdugs steng gi bar snang la zlos te/ nam mkha
41a3: 'dong zhing rol mo'i sgra bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag len cing / / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed la// lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor// lha'i a ga ru
41a4: dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ut+pa la'i phye ma dang / me tog sna tshogs kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'ther/ me tog ud+g+ha la dang / tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dag kyang 'thor// me tog/
41a5: rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag kyang 'thor 'thong / spos sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang / na bza' dang / brgyan dag kyang 'bul te/ lha ma yin gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du mchod pa rgya cher byas so// de nas
41a6: de dag gis rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag byas pa'i sgras/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can gang dag gis rol mo'i sgra de thos pa
41a7: de dag/ de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// nor bu dz+yo tir sa'i bla re dag dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi de dag dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i
41a8: rba ba de dag dang / khrung khrung rkang de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las 'di lta ste dper na/ rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas dkrol ba de lta bur stan la de lta bur yid du 'od zhing

41b1: mnyan/ bad pa'i sgra 'byung bar gyur te// skangs kyang snang gsum gyi snang chan pa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par thug/ sems can gang gis rgyan gyi skad dag kris par gyung ma dun
41b2: thams cad kyang / blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byang ba ldog par byung // de nas bu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa tshogs kyin dang / thos d+ha rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
41b3: mngon par lab bang gyur te/ me tog gi char de bab pa'i ma spos kyi dri zhim po'i dang byung ste 'gro zhing ldog par gyur te// spos chu char dbab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i khor yug dung pag tshang
41b4: drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur to/ / spos kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to// sems can gang gis spos kyi dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams
41b5: cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu cu rtsa drug dang / rta bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rol mo sel
41b6: stan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas nas/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa de dag par snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo mas
41b7: phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal ma la sbya nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras pa
41b8: glu'i bu mo mkhas pa de dag yid rangs dga' mgu yid kyis su/ / byang chub zhi pa tshol zhing shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa chen po byas// rgyan gyis legs pa rgyanabye ba dgu bcu rtsa drug gi gdugs rnams zingon

42a1: sprul te/ bde bar gshegs la mchod cing bar tu dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral// rgyun gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu rtsa drug gis rta rnams mngon sprul te// kha dag snga zhang rgyan
42a2: kyang sngo ba'i rtal rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan/ / de dag thams cad par snang dong nas thub la rta'i yis mchod pa byas// klu'i bu ma da / da la'i yid kyi thub la mgos phyag 'tshal// mchog la mchod pa
42a3: don du klu'i gnas nasi m+bu'i sil snyan gyis/ / mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa byas// sil snyan de dag bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum grag/ swA
42a4: thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub yang dag zhugs/ / de dag rnams kyis der sbrul mkha' la bla chen po gcig tu gyur// phyogs bcu dpag tshad drug cur brgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khebs
42a5: par 'gyur/ / nor bu rin chen dz+yo tir sa'i gzi brjid phyogs su 'bar zhing gsal// klu'i bu me dga' nas 'gro ba'i mdun du rgyal ba mchod pa byas// gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi pa
42a6: tshol byed cing / / 'jig rten don byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pa grub par shog/ ji ltar stobs bcur mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal 'grel pa ltar// chos kyang bstan te sems can
42a7: nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol/ / chos rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra zhing dbu ba lta bur nyams chud la// char rgyun chul pog pa'i chu bur lta bur 'jigs cing bdag po med// med long nang gi
42a8: gzugs brnyan 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad brtags nas ni/ 'gro ba dag la chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi// sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur ma mchis brdzun pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa// skye bo

42b1: mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung rab bgyid pa/ / byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyed kyis de ltar legs par gzigs// de dag ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin de dag sems can rnams
42b2: la bstan/ / ji ltar sa chen 'di la sprin 'khrigs gyur na ri ltar gda' ba yang // yang dag tu na ji ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis// de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par/
42b3: bgyid// shes pas brtags nas skye bo mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis// yang dag tu na 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod ston pas// des na 'dren pa rgyal rgyal ba khyod la skye bo
42b4: mkhas pa mi byed 'gyur/ / khyod kyi sras rnams chos kyis yongs su tshim nas rdzab la zam pa 'dra// 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul min 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir 'brang // de lta lags pas sdig med yang /
42b5: dag ston pa byis pa'i skye bo'i mgon// skyabs dang dpung gi nyen gnas dang rten dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su mchi// gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la mchod// sangs
42b6: rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyid sdig bral 'jig rten don rnams bgyid par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas
42b7: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad bde gsol pa/ / 'jig rten na ni 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod 'dzum mdzad// dpal sdug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchi/
42b8: pa bdag gis yongs ma mthong // mi'i dbang po yi dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang dag gsungs// de thos lha mi lha min tshogs dang klu'i bu mo gsang ba pa// dri za rnams kyang bskyob pa'i dgongs

43a1: pa thos nas mede dga' bar 'gyur/ / 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyed kyis rgyu rnams thams cad mkhyen// rgyal bas chos gang chu dang rnam pas mkhyen las grang ngas ma mchis// ngas las//
43a2: bde gshegs rgyal bas khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs// de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yid rangs dogs pa chad par 'gyur// thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par
43a3: mchi/ 'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// kun rtogs dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur// bde gshegs khyod kyi 'dzum mdzad don thos
43a4: rang 'byung nges par dga' ba'i 'byung / / 'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tsom 'tshal gyur te/ sdug bsngal dogs bcas yid mi bde zhing chos la som nyi gar 'tshal pa// de dag la ni thub pa
43a5: bston pas dogs bsu la the tsom dgum du gsol/ / drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur tu bka' stsol the tsom khum// rgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom brtul//
43a6: su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis// 'di ni su'i mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol// thos nas bdag cag yid rangs mchog tu dga' ba bskyes nas bde bar
43a7: 'gyur/ khyod kyibs kyi drung du 'dus pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom 'tshal// 'dzum rgyu dga' ba skyed bka' stsol tshom ngas la du gsol// de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom ma mchis gyur// rgyal ba'i gsung sgra
43a8: yang dag thos nas de dag yid dga'ar 'gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la// tshigs su bcad de slar bka'astsal ba/ rta nus gas pa rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris/

43b1: klu'i bu mos mchod tshe 'jig rten phan phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan// de'i 'bras bu bstan gyis yid gnyis tha ba spangs pa'i sems kyis nyon// gang gi don du ngas ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad pa'i mi
43b2: tshig la nyon/ klu'i bu mo 'di dag chags med yod kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rnam pa shig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas// 'don byed med tshar ge gang zag med
43b3: cing skye ba gang yang med/ / chos rnams 'di dag rdzun zhing smig rgyu mtshungs la me long gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo gros yang dag she te// rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang
43b4: ni 'gro ba stong zhing bdag po med mthong legs/ / mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyu ma 'dra// byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong // gang la
43b5: gzhal yas mchod pa de byas 'gro ba stong shes pas/ / klu las shi 'phos nas ni lha gnas brgya byin gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// sum bcu rtsa gsum song ste lha'i nang du dga' bar tshe rdzogs nas// ma
43b6: smad grags dang ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ / 'thab bral lha dang gnas te lha'i gnas su dga' ba spyod// lhar gyur bde ba gshegs sras rnams de na tshe'i tshad du gnas par
43b7: 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas tshe ni zad pa dang // dga' ldan gnas su lha'i grong khyer lha dang brtul zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur// de dag de na lha'i bu mos bskor nas lha'i dga'
43b8: ba spyod/ pad ma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yongs mi 'gyur// skyob pa rnams kyi dran pa

44a1: rdol banom pa bzhin du yong mi nyams/ / de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te dga' baspyad nas na/ che tshad yongs su zad nas de cher rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bde gshegs/
44a2: masmang grags ldan der yang lha mo'i tshogs mchod 'gyur// mi gnas blo gros ldan patsho tshad rab tu gnas na gnas par 'gyur// de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha'i dga' ba spyad nas ni// mkhas pa tshe nga
44a3: thos ldan pa chos kyi mthar ni byin gyur nas/ / 'dren pa pasam pa dag po tshigs med yi spun chos kyi bsam pa can// chos dang ldan rnams gan n+ya phrul gnas sa rtswa ba ni 'phyobar 'gyur// de dag
44a4: gnas de na gnas shing lha'i dga' ba spyod par 'gyur/ / bde gshegs marmongs tho ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das ltar lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs// bsam gtan
44a5: bsam pas tshangs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur/ / tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan 'bras bu spyad gyur nas// der gnas dpe' med gyur cing byang chub yid
44a6: kyis bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ / de dag bskal par tshangs gnas mthun par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs bzang // thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed//
44a7: mkhas thub de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med/ bsam gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi// kun tu grol yi dang sro byang chu byi ni sa nu blo dang ldan
44a8: mya ngan 'das par lta bur bsam gtan blo gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur/ / bde bar gshegs dang bcom ldan sras po byang chub zhi pa yongs tshol ba// tshangs pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs gnas

44b1: de na gnas pa'o/ / kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar byin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir// rang byung dgongs pa khams gsum lam las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston// tshangs pa'i la ni gus
44b2: babaskyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur/ / tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang 'byung bsam pa nges 'byung mthar thug shes nas ni// bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la// ci nas
44b3: chos tshul 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur de ltar chos kyang ston/ / de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir// phan pa byas nas bsrog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bkod
44b4: rgyal ba kun la mchod phyir 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig 'gro bar 'gyur/ / dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra la rgyal bar 'gyur// lha dang mi dang klu dang 'dab bzangs dag dang lha min bcas pa
44b5: dang / / dri za grul bum mi 'am ci tshogs gnod sbyin dgror bcas 'ga' zhing mgu// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs sbyangs chos kyi stobs rnyed pa// de dag thams cad yid rangs thal
44b6: sbyar bde bar gshegs par ma gos phyag 'tshal/ / / klu'i bu mo lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa
44b7: yod thos/ yongs su rdzogs bar yang rig nas// klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang // nye dga' la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu nu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de
44b8: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen cing / bcom ldan 'das de mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am// ma gsan pa 'am/ mngon du ma mdzad pa gang yang med cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs/

45a1: par gsungs pa/ yang dag par mthong ba/ rigs nad med pa/ dus chad pa med pa/ nye bar gtong ba/ 'di mthong ba la don yod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis so so rang gis rig byung
45a2: bste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o// 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa/ rgod pa mi brtan pa/ mi gnas pa rnams kyi kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongs su
45a3: shes pa dang / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma dge 'dun yang legs par zhugs pa/ dang por zhugs pa/ rigs par zhugs pa/ mthun par zhugs pa dang / 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti//
45a4: mug mi zad pa dang ldan par mas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ga bu rab la 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam ste/ ngo mtshar thob pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ 'dzam bu'i gling rgya mtsho'i ri'i mthas gtugs
45a5: ba thams cad spos kyi sprin chen kun nas g.yogs par byas te/ / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di spos kyi ngad kyis khyab par byas so// spos kyi dri'i ngad des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar
45a6: gyur nas/ sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas
45a7: kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang / dpag tshad dag nu tshun chad mu tig dmar po sa bus mo nub tsam du rgyus par gang bar byas so// n+ya dro d+ha'i kun dga' bang yang rin po che rini thang med pa'i nor bu
45a8: rin po che sa cha la bar bkang ngo / / klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang rgyar dpag tshad drug nu yod pa rin po che sna 'dun gyi ka ba dang ldan pa yang mngon par sprul to// klu'i rol mo sali snyam dpag tu med pa dag

45b1: kyang mngon par sprul to/ / sgra phyung ngo // klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang de la yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lnga ldi bya ba zag dgu bcu bres so// rin po che sna bdun gyi ka bde dag kyang pa DUr+ya'i dra bas legs par brgyan to//
45b2: du na khang de'i gzhi yang ran thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches g.yogs par byas par gyur to// 'dun khang de'i gzhi ni 'jam pa bsgyur du rung ba ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo
45b3: leb ar mo nig ltar 'jam pa/ kha dog bai DUr+ya ltar 'dug pa/ ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde ba/ nyams dga' ba/ sems can mthong ba rnams kyi ma gi mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba/ mi dang lha rnams kyi
45b4: yid du 'ong ba lta bu'o/ / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs de dag gi nang nas/ nar bu la la las ni me 'byung / la la las ni chu 'byung ba sha stag ste// de la'ang la la las ni chu kha dog sngon po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog
45b5: ser po 'byung / la la la sa ni chu kha dog dmar po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog dkar po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ngo // nor bu la la las ni bde bar bsil ba'i rlung 'byung / nor bu/
45b6: la la las ni de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan dag bsam pa bzhin du 'byung // la la ni sdum pa'i bya ba byed// la la ni me long gi bya ba byed de 'khor de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de'i nang snang bar gyur to//
45b7: ser skya'i gnas na sems can gang ji snyed cig rgyu ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang du/ sdang bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la rnam par sprul pa'i tshe
45b8: 'phrul de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to/ / 'dun khang gi bzhi de'i 'og nas kyang klu'i mthus gdugs

46a1: rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'thon pa ho/ / rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / bdan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lnga ldi dang / spos kyi lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
46a2: rin po che'i lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mu tig gi phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag sa tog rdzogs mi'i tha rji pa rdzogs dang / me tog brtsegs ma'i lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dril phrug yer
46a3: ka'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang mngon par 'thon par gyur to/ / de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' la stsogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcus rta de rnams sngon tu dmi ste/ rkang gis dong nas bcom ldan
46a4: 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ nor bu rin po che ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// 'dun khang gi gzhi
46a5: de nas rib gang da/ mngon par 'thon pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du bab par gyur to// de nas klu'i rol mo sil bstan dpag tu med
46a6: pa de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to/ / de nas klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
46a7: phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ / cang mi zer bar bcom ldan 'das rnams pas rjesu dran par byed cing mig mi 'dzums par lta la/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas
46a8: byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ / de nas de dag gis cung zad cig tu mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas/ so so nas bla gos srag pa gcig la gzar

46b1: te/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ tshigs su
46b2: bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / mtshan brgya rdzogs pa brtul zhugs legs spyad pa// dka' thub bgyis pa dri med thugs rje can// rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa'i sa spangs te// bde
46b3: gshegs khyod ni grong byer mngon par byung / / lo drug bar du dka' thub dka' mdzad de// rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud rtsi ma brnyes kyang // bde gshegs khyod kyi thugs ni zhum ma gyur// thub pa khyod kyis byang chub
46b4: thugs kyis spyad/ / ji ltar 'dren pa lha mi'i bla ma khyod// 'gro la phan bzhed dka' thub spyad mdzad de// 'jig rten mgon po sdug bsngal btar gyur pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'// thub pa
46b5: dbu' dang spyan ni gtang ba dang / / byang chub sems ni ji ltar bsgrub mdzad pa// bde bar gshegs kyi dka' spyad thos gyur nas// de thos pas kyang bdag cag bde mi 'gyur// gang tshe ka ling rgyal po bzod smra bas//
46b6: zhabs dang phyag dang snyan rnams gtubs gyur te// de bzhin shangs btsang rgyal ba mi 'khrug pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'// phug ron skyabs su mchis pa ma btang ste// gang tshe 'dren
46b7: khyod srang la btsal gyur pa/ / rgyal ba'i de thos pas kyang mi bde ste// bde gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal che// bdag cag mi 'tshal ma lags ci zhe na// bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba gnod bgyis pa// ngan song/
46b8: mun par lhung bas bde gshegs kyi// sdug bsngal spyod pa dran nas mi dga' lags// ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa blo 'phags dang // bde gshegs spyod pa mi 'tshe blor gyur dang // bsgrub pa'i che na de la mi gnod pa//

47a1: 'jig rten 'dren pa spyod pad bka'aphrul gsol// mtha' mas rnam bad gshegs spyad pa la// thub pa gas 'di dag bcubargyan// de lta rjod kyi ka' can/ da 'thung ba// dbyung
47a2: gshegs byang chub lam bstan gsol/ / nag ma mchis go bang 'thob 'tshal zhing // tshogs 'di rnams thab pa sgom par gnas// 'grob 'di dag bad ba 'du 'gyur ba'o// brtul zhugs spyod
47a3: gshegs bka' stsal gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lhag pa'i bsam pas basmon lam btab pa de dag kyang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzod do//
47a4: 'di ni sa chos nyid de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna du ma'i 'od gzer bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi
47a5: bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ brtul zhugs bzang po dge/
47a6: sbyong thub pa'i rnams// rgyu med rgyal ba 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dren pa bde gshegs thugs rje che mnga' ba// mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol// tshogs kyi slob dpon skye bo 'di dag ni//
47a7: 'dzub rgyu nyan 'tshal khyod kyi zhal du lta// yid ni zhum gyur the tsom 'tshal zhing mchis// mkhas pa the tsom rnam par bskul du gsol// 'jig rten mkhas pa ston pa shAkya thub// de ring su zhig yid ni yongs su/
47a8: dga'// gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te// rmongs par bgyis nas yid ni dga' bar bgyis// tshogs kyi slob dpon 'dren pa su zhig gis// bde gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis// bde

47b1: bar gshegs pa mchod pa dam pa bgyis/ / shAkya seng ge bka' stsal the tsom khum// sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba mgor bzhag cing // 'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal dus// tshogs kyi thob pon the tsom sum
47b2: du gsol/ / 'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// de thos skye bo 'di dag dgar 'gyur te// rgyal bas dgongs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rnams tshim bgyis na//
47b3: gzhan du mi sems nan tan gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis// tshangs 'dra
47b4: yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyis/ / rta thul skyon med sems kyis dang byos la// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de mnyan par gyis// klu'i bdag po 'di dag dang gyur te// 'gro ba zil gyis mnan nas mchod pa
47b5: byas/ / skye bo bde bar yongs smin bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yongs su tshol// snying rje chen pos rnam 'dren med pa yi// 'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi rten// 'gro bas byang chub
47b6: rgya chen thob byal/ / 'dren pa dag ni skyo bar yong mi 'gyur// zhi gnas dga' ba ye shes stobs ldan stobs// mtshan med stong pa de bzhin smon pa med// rnamathar sgo gsum yongs su bsgoms nas su// shin tu
47b7: yongs dag yid can bde bar 'gro/ / 'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te// gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas// mnyam pa'i sems dang byams dang snying rje thob// 'grol snying rje chen por bskyed nas//
47b8: snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can// 'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag 'gro ba 'di ni mtshungs bsgral nas// de dag dgra bcom rnam par 'dren par 'gyur// rtag tu bdag med tshig ni nyan byed

48a1: cing / / 'jig rten gtam gyi rgyud la mi 'jug ste// de dag bde bar gshegs kyi mchi med thob// de na bdud med mu stegs tshogs kyang med// 'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa'i// rgyal
48a2: de dag 'gro ba kun mos byed/ / bde gshegs bka' dang tshig rnams thams cad dang // bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la mos byed 'gyur// srid par bde gshegs rnams kyi spyad spyod cing // rab bder 'gro ba yongs
48a3: smin byed par 'gyur/ / mtshungs med thub pa bde bar myur tu yang // yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi med thob par 'gyur// thob nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur// skye bo kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan// 'gro ba
48a4: thams cad bde gshegs de dag gis/ / dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon tu shes par 'gyur// blugs dang bya dang gnod sbyin mi de dag/ rang 'byung dgongs min cung zad byed mi 'gyur// de dag kun tu chos rtogs dran
48a5: dang ldan/ / bde bar gshegs rnams 'chi med thob par 'gyur// de dag tshig thos sems can gang yang ni// bstan pa de la mi dgar 'gyur ba med// bde gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba yi// 'gro ba 'chi med
48a6: yang dag thob par 'gyur/ / de tshe 'gro bas rgyal ba'i dgongs legs rtogs// rga ba dang nin dang 'chi ba dang // mya ngan smre sngags 'don las yongs su 'grol// tshig de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur//
48a7: klu'i rgyal po shAkya seng ge la/ yongs su zhus nas ji ltar de dag rnams// gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams kyis// ye shes 'jug 'gyur de skad lung yang bstan// klu rnams lung bstan
48a8: yid du 'ong ba yi/ / rgyal ba'i gsung thos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste// de la yid ni rab tu yig gyur nas// dge ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyabs su song // // klu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste lud do//

48b1: de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyis/ lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu mo rnams dang / klu rnams kyis mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas chis ni dag su yid
48b2: rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba bskyes nas/ ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi mnga' rgya chen po mnga' zhing / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod
48b3: pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs te/ 'di lta ste dper na// rgya mtsho chen po ni rgya che zhing yongasra ba rgyas pa yin pas/ mtho ba 'am/ dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan
48b4: 'das kyang chos thams cad la the tsom mi mnga' zhing yon gtan thams cad yongs su rdzogs la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa mnga' bas mchod pa 'di lta bu dag bzhes kyang // mtho ba 'am/ dma' bar mi
