48b5: 'gyur zhing / ngo mtshar du mi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar shin tu che'o snyam mo// de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad po de dag gis bdag cag nyid kyis/ mchod pra bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi
48b6: bla res bye ba phrag bcwo brgyad mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / bai DUr+ya'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i tha
48b7: na/ da po 'i thaM de dag la yang matog sa tshogs kyi kyang 'i mngon par sgrul te/ gas kyi snang pa'i ba rnamasu la ni ngas kyim ston ni kyang la khri 9// da ma m+b+hi pa rnams na
48b8: matog ga zang ba'i rnga ldi pa/ then rgya'i ba da rnams la rdegs kyi ma dag gi phreng ba'i rdzildi rtse// shes gyi tha rnams sa ni ba ba don gi phreng 'i lngalnga/ musheg dmang pa'i thar rnams pani su

49a1: tog gi phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkyi/ spug gi bla re rnams la ni/ mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye// rdo'i snying po'i bla rnams la ni/ shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye ba
49a2: sdug mngon par sprul to/ / shing rta bkrab/ ldan sdug pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyang mngon par sprul to// de dag kyang gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar du'o// shing rta de dag gi sdang du rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs zung ma brgya pa/
49a3: gser gyi yub can dang / bai dUr+ya'i yub can dang / shel gyi yu ba can bye ba phrag bcwo brgyad mngon par sprul to// gdugs de dag la yang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lda ldi mngon par sprul te/ 'di ltar ste gser gri me
49a4: dog gi lda ldi dang / dngul gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / bai dUr+ya'i me tog gi lda ldi dang / shel gyi me togo gi lda ldi dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lda ldi dang // klu'i nor bu'i me tog gi lnga pI sha stag go/ mu tig dmar po'i dra ba
49a5: kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag gis gdugs de dag dang / me tog gi phreng ba de dag gi gzungs byas so// grul bum gyi rol mo sil snyan dag kyang mngon par sprul to// shang na de dag re re zhing yang bla re de dag re re rjes su
49a6: 'brang bar gyur to/ / de nas grul bum de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rda de gagal zhon te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / bla ra dang / me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te// mcho/ pa byed cing bcom
49a7: ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to/ / bskor nas shing rta de dag las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
49a8: mngon par bstod pa/ thams cad du yang mi bsnyengs mnga' dbang can// thub pa chen po mi mtho mi dma' ste// ri'i rgal po lhun po'i ri 'dra ba// mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhes su gsol// 'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan

49b1: mdang / / thams cad tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags mi mnga'// 'dren pa byed kyis ting 'dzin zhe bsgrubs pas// shes rab dang ldan dregs pa yongs mi mnga'// rgyal ba khyed kyis 'gro bsku 'drar mkhyen/
49b2: rang bzhin stong ste rmi lam dga' 'dra dang // chu blanam pa kha'i spa/ chu lta bur na// bad bar gshegs pas 'gro ba 'di pa gcis/ dri za'i grong byir ji ltar snang gyur kyang // grong khyer de
49b3: ni phyogs bcu kunan med/ / gzhan du grong khyer de ni mi tsam ste// de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas 'gro 'di gzigs// mchod pa 'di kun brag cha ji bzhin te// shing rta gdugs dang tha re sil snyan dang /
49b4: me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa// brag cha ji bzhin de dag de ltar gda'// 'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang / sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu myur 'gyur shog/ rmi lam 'dra bar 'gro ba
49b5: bdag cag gis/ / rtogs bgyis rgyal ba khyod bzhin bstan par bgyi// nad dang rga shis yongs su gtses gyur pa'i// skye bo mthong nas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang // byang chub myur 'thob rga shi med pa'i gnas//
49b6: gang thos grol 'gyur 'gro la bstan par bgyi// bdag cag byang chub lam mchog sangs rgyas nas// sems can blo stor rnams la bstan par bgyi// thub pa 'khrugs med chos rnams rab ston pa// mya ngan 'das
49b7: mchog sems can bstan par bgyi/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grul bum de dag gi rtag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan parta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
49b8: bcad de gsol ba/ / ston pargyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad de// rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhas la 'tshar mi mnga'// ngo mtshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzud mdzad na// mjam N+Da legs par bka' grol nyan

50a1: bar 'tshal/ / rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas// 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom som nyi 'tshal// the tsom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tsom khum// mi'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang
50a2: gsungs/ / gang gis de ring chos la yid bzhag gyur// de ring bdag gis chos kyi rgyal yang mthong // deng sus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa bgyid// mi'i dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/
50a3: de ring 'dras byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas// gang gis 'dra byed gyur pa'i yid gcig bcom// gang zhig yang dag mtha' la mi g.yo gnas// rnam dag thugs mnga' bdag ni nyan par 'tshal// de ring
50a4: su yis 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom/ / thub pa ston pa ded sus mnyes par bgyis// 'dren pa de ring su zhig gting rnyed 'gyur// the tsom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal// mdzum mdzad de'i don ni
50a5: mnyan slad du/ / 'gro ba kun gyis thal mo sbyar cing gnas// 'dren pa the tsom 'tshal ba'i the tsom sol// rkang gnyis dam pas lung yang bstan tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
50a6: thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsam pa/ / rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'dzum pa'i rgyu 'di yongs su dris pas na// 'gro ba'i don yangs khyod kyis byas par gyur// de don bstan byas rta thal
50a7: mnyan par bgyis/ grul bum tshogs kyis nga la mchod byas te// zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ mtshar med pa mthong nas ni dom gyur te// zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ de dag rnams
50a8: kyis de ring nga mchod de/ / zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par btang // lam gtor skye bo rnams la snying brtse zhing // bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyed// snying rje bas ni nga la mchod pa byas/

50b1: rab tul ma stor rnams la byams par bsams// mkhas pa de dag las dbyas pas na// grul bus ste gnas sha 'a phos brgyal grags bzang // brgya byin lha'i drung du 'dod par 'gyur// thugs/
50b2: rje byams don mdzad skyob drung du 'dong // des ni cung zad yang dang yang bstan te// phyir zhing tshes la the tsom med par 'gyur// de dag bskal pa gang ga'i bye ma snyed// zhing nas zhing du rnam par rgyu byed cing //
50b3: bdag nyid chen po chos la mchod pa byed// go ma chen po rab tu bgos yid kyis// de dag skye ba med par 'jig rten mkhas// khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam par spyod par 'gyur// skye bo mang po'i don byed 'dren
50b4: 'gyur te/ / ngo mtshar med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag zhing rnams gang du 'gro rgyu ba// der ni 'gro bas rgyal ba byung bar shes// de dag thabs kyis ma 'ongs dus dag na// ngo mtshar med par skye bo rnam grol
50b5: byed/ / rgyal ba ngo mtshar med pa zhing sbyong zhing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med zhi ba tshe la// de dag tshol ba la yang mi gnas te// 'di ltar bla med byang chub gnas phyir ro// de ltar 'dzum rgyu rgyal bas lung bstan cing //
50b6: bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten dogs bstsal te// grul bum mchod pa'i 'bras bu des thos nas// 'gro ba the tsom bstsal te dga' bar gyur// / grul bum lung bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//
50b7: de nas de'i tshe dri za bye ba phragasum cu rtsa drug gis lham yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / drus rnams dang / grul bum rnams kyis mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas/
50b8: tshim zhing mgub yid rangs te// rab tu dga' zhing yid dga' ba dang yid bde ba bskyes nas/ ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med pa yang yang dag par bka' stsal pa/

51a1: bya ba rnams kyang yang dag par bstan te// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba yang bstan la/ chos gang la yang lung bstan pa med par yang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad do snyam nas// de dag
51a2: gis chos de lta bu khong du chud de/ / de bzhin gshegs pa la rim 'gro bya ba'i sems rgya chen pos bskyes nas// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos par gyur te// rab tu dga' ba'i yid
51a3: dang ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod kyi'i phyir brtson par byed gyur te/ / glang po che'i rgyal pos srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// glang po ches srung gi bu bye ba de dag re re zhing bye mag re b+he
51a4: baprag sum bcu rtsa drug/ mgo re re zhing so bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/ so re re la yang rdzing bu bdun bdun// rdzing bu re re zhing yang pad ma bdun bdun// pad ma re re zhing 'dab ma bye ba phrag stong stong // 'dab
51a5: ma re re zhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ / lha'i bu mo re re zhing yang 'khor rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lha'i bdug spos dang thogs pa bdun bdun zhing pad ma'i lo ma'i mtha' mtha' na 'khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul
51a6: to/ / glang po ches bsrung gi bu de dag gis mgo re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs nas rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba dag gis gzungs byas pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyis lnga ldi bres pa'i bar dang lnga babye phrag sum cu
51a7: drug drug mngon par sprul to/ / glang po che'i mgo thams cad la yang lha'i spos kyi bla re sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyi lnga ldi bres pa sha stag mngon par sprul to// de nas dri za de dag grang po ches srung gi bu bye ba phra
51a8: sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la non te/ / lha'i rol po sil snyan len cing nam mkha' las rgyu ste// bcom ldan 'das la lan sum cu rtsa drug tu bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i tsan dan gyi phyems bcom ldan 'das la gtor/

51b1: mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// lha'i a ka ru'i phye ma dang / lha'i ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ud pa la'i phye ma dang / lha'i gser phye dang / lha'i me tog pan dar ba dang / man da rab chen
51b2: po dang / man 'dzu sha ka dang / man 'adz+ra sha ka chen po dang / badra sha ka dang / b.ru shag chen po dang / kar kar dang // dkar chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab
51b3: gtor to/ / gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / sdug pa dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po'i me tog rnams kyis dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor/
51b4: mngon par gtor// mngon par rab tu gtor to// spos kyi bla re de dag las spos kyi dad pa 'byung ste/ 'grol zhing ldog go// lha'i spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang las mngon par babago/
51b5: spos kyi chu'i char de mngon par bab pas kyang // ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun tshad spros chus rdzab tu gyur te// spos chu'i rdzab de'i dris stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
51b6: gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri tsher bar gyur pa dang / rol mo gsil snyan de dag gis
51b7: sgra de thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir me ldog par 'gyur to// de ltar na dri za res res kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ glang
51b8: ches bsrung gi bu mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la/ lha mo glu len pa dang / gar byed pa 'khod pa dag gis mchod de/ skye bo thams cad kyang 'dun par byas so// lha'i bu mo de dag las// la la ni lus kyi tshul

52a1: sbyar/ la la ni tsin dan dang / a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phye ma 'thor // la la ni me tog man dar ba dang man
52a2: dar ba chen po nas/ tsitra pa ta la dang / tsi tra pal chen po'i bar gyi me tog dang / sprul ba'i me tog rnams 'thong // la la ni me tog gser gyi me tog nas/ rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang / dbyig
52a3: dang / gser dang / rin po che sgrim pas blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor// la la ni ni bza' dag 'thor/ la la ni zhabs brgyan dang / sku regs dang / gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa'i
52a4: bar dag 'bul lo/ / la la ni gser gyi dra ba dag 'dzin// la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can 'dzin// la la ni lha'i spos
52a5: chu'i char 'bebs te/ lha ma yin gyi bu mos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// de nas dri za de dag glang ngo che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu de dag
52a6: la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed byed pa las/ glang po ches bsrung gi bu de dag las babs te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// zhabs la
52a7: mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ / thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan pade gshegs srid pa mthar 'byin
52a8: pa/ srid pa'i bcings las 'gro ba rnam grol mdzad// khyod 'dra srid gsum gang na'ang ma mchis te// khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mchog mchog mnga'// mi mchog khyod kyis sa tshan 'di

52b1: ma mams ma 'a na dus/ / nga ldan pa 'dun la// 'jigs du ga/ dad
52b2: ma ba ca / ga sus du ltung ga
52b3: dang/ ga
52b4: gang yang bya ba byed ma mchis/ / 'jig rten gtso bo bya ba'ang yongs su bstan// dag nga gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgongs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bgyi ba kun kyang bstan// ga na'i yan panarnam
52b5: pa sna tshogs pa/ / bdag dang gzhan gyis yon tan mi sems kyang // shing rta'i bgyi ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur// de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// chos ni chos la yong
52b6: su bskul mi brjid/ / chos ni chos la dran par bgyid ma mchis// chos rnams chos la nye bar mi rton te// chos rnams gang yang ma skyes 'chi ma mchis// 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gzungs//
52b7: kun rdzob de yang de na ma mchis te// 'gro ba 'di dag ca/ kun rdzob ji bzhin zhes// tshogs kyi slob dpon khyod kyis yongs dag gsungs// ming gis rang bzhin gang na'ang ma mchis la// bde bar gshas
52b8: pas bya ba rnam par bzhag/ chos tshul 'di 'dra yongs su bstan pas na// 'jig rten mkhas pas shin tu ngo mtshar mdzad// de bzhin bdag cag bde gshegs nyid 'drar te// nod pa'i 'gro ba blo gros stor ba

53a1: gros stong pa rnams chos kyis chos kyi tshul la bzung bgyis te/ / zhi ba'i go 'phang 'chi mad thob par bgyi// rnam par 'dzin pa khyod ni ci 'dra bar// 'dren pa bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas pa/
53a2: thugs rje ldan pa ban bzhed 'jig rten mkhas// bsod nams brgya'i mtshan dang ldan par shog/ ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// nga rgyal ba sgrings pa'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba// 'dod
53a3: pa'i yon tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba/ / mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgya ldan yongs su dgrol// de ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod pa myong 'gyur la//
53a4: g.yor ye zhags pas zin cing mu ma mthong // yongs 'thom spre'u ltar rgod pa yongs su dgrol// ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// 'gro ba mi mkhas mig dang bral ba yi// lha tshogs yongs skye
53a5: gnyid kyis log gyur cing / / bdag nyid las kyi 'bras bu chung zon dgrol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/
53a6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dren pa rgyu ma mchis par mi 'dzum na// bde gshegs 'dzam
53a7: pa'i rgyu ni myur tu gsungs/ / nem nur gnod 'gyur rnams kyi the tsom sol// bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'dzum mthong nas// skye bo 'di dag the tsom rnyed par 'gyur// 'dzum pa'i don ni de dag nyan par 'tshal//
53a8: thub chen 'gro ba'i the tsom stsal du gsol// bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la su zhig zhugs// the tsom bral zhing som nyi stsal par gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas// mi'i mchog gis

53b1: 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad/ / su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du// blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin gnas par gyur// gang gis blo gros dran rtogs tho mkhyen nas// bde gshegs 'gro
53b2: ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad/ / 'gro ba 'di dag blo gzhan yongs btang ste// bde gshegs 'dzum don zhal nas thos par dka'// sor bcu thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis shing // dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i
53b3: zhal du bsdu/ / nyon mongs bral zhing myang ngan rab spangs pa// dgyes pa'i thugs mngang thub chen 'jig tan mig/ 'gro ba'i yid gnyis so mnyi bas pa su gsol// rgyal ba thugs rnga ldan pas 'dzum dru gsang
53b4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ / 'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pa ngas mdzad pa// khyod kyis don dris 'thun zhing legs pa ste// 'dzum pa de yi don ni
53b5: lung bstan pas/ / skye bo'i tshogs chen don ni de ring 'phel// 'dzum mdzad rgyu de rta thul nyan par bgyis// rnam par 'dren pas 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// de ni ma log par yang ngas bstan gyis// bstan pa de
53b6: la dga' ba'i sems kyis nyon/ / dri za 'di rnams chos kyi rjes snyegs shing // bde bar gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas// chos nyid byung bar 'gyur ba med pa ste ni// chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba
53b7: med pa yin/ / rgyal ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bur gnas// rtog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur// gang gis chos gang rjes su brjod bya ba// des ni de nyid stong zhes bde gshegs gsung // de dag
53b8: yi tshig deng rtogs gyur nas/ / rta med glang po mchog gis mchod pa byas// byang chub rga med 'chi med tshol byed cing // dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis nga mchod do// nor pa'i 'gro la snying rje bskyed nas ni// tha mas/

54a1: na da // 'ad/ da gas / pa dag daHhA// rna sa r+tha gan // dz+nyAn na
54a2: 'dru/ / de dag sangs rgyas pa par gshegs rnal ma sa// byab khrag zhug mang la mdzod byed 'gyur// da napa da duHsas cing // dadagal rnamakhas bcas ha/ de ga bdan
54a3: yongs su spyod/ / de dag zhing yang rtags par yangs dag 'gyur// rgyal pa gdung 'dzin de dag sems can no// khrag gragasang ba dag la byang chub bston// 'grob 'di dag rang bzhin gang gan/
54a4: bde ga shegs 'gro ba dag la ston par 'gyur// rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa// rdul med bskal pa khrag khrig zhugs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' yas rtogs pa// @
54a5: rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang ba'o/ / bskal pa rnams su rdul med gnas par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ni rjem su ston// rgyal ba thub pa nyon mongs bcom pa yis// de ltar de tshe dri zas mchod
54a6: lung bstan/ / dbul gyis ni 'dzul pa'i don lus pa// dra za lung bstan pa ni bad dam da pa// dri za lung bstan yid ni 'brang bar 'gyur// de mthong nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'// der ni bde bar gshes
54a7: kyis gsung thos nas/ / shAkya thub la thams cad skyabs bu dod// / dri za lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / bam po lnga pa// de nas gnod sbyin bye ba
54a8: phrag brgyad cus/ lha ma yin rnams nas dri za'i bar de dag gis mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos// na tshis zhi mgu yid rangs te// rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba bskyos nas

54b1: bcom ldan 'das byas shes rab turnam pas ma 'graman pa bskrad de/ / ras nyad la 'jug pa la ya byas pas/ ston par 'jugs brgyad pa nang to/ bcom ldan das kyang tha za pa sa ldan nga
54b2: bar gyur to/ / de dag gis bcom ldan 'das blo zad mi shes pa zhes bya bar rig nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos pa bskyes par gyur te// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mas pa skyes par byur nas// bcom ldan rjem
54b3: lamadzad pa'i phyir 'artson par byung ste/ / tshigs su bcad pa dag gas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstong pa/ mngon gos stobs na kun tam lams to// rgyu mngon 'dzun pas ma 'ad dru// de bsam
54b4: med 'jig rten phan mdzad pa/ / mi'i seng ges khyod la 'di ltar bstod// ri rab kha srang la gzhal bar nus kyang gda'// gzi brjid chen po nam mkha' gzhal rung gda'// shes rab mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs//
54b5: tshad bzung dpag par nus pa yod ma mchis// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa thugs su chud/ bskye bo drang rung mi rung gdul min pa// de dag las kyi rnam pa mngon par mkhyen// de bas mtshungs med kun du mtha' yang yas/
54b6: de dag ci 'dra'i khams la rten pa dang // de dag sems rgyud ci 'drar 'byung ba dang // de dag mos pa ci 'dra ma lus mkhyen// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// 'dod chags spyod dang de bzhin zhe sdang spyod// mi'i
54b7: gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen/ / brag dog rnam pa'ang de bzhin mkhyen pa ste// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// 'gro ba 'di dag lam rgyud gar 'khyams pa// de dag mtshungs med khyed kyis rab tu mkhyen/
54b8: de la ye shes rgyun tu rab byung bas// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// bde bar gshegs pas 'gro bkun rab tu gzigs// chung za'i lam brgyad gang du 'khyams gyur cing // byams pa'i stobs las

55a1: rab tu nyams gyur pa/ de dag ma lus khyod kyis rab tu gzigs// 'gro ba rnams ni ji srid dus gnas shing // ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag reg 'gyur dang // lus kyi rnam pa
55a2: 'dra 'chang ba rnams/ / de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis rab tu gzigs// mi'i seng ges lta ba ci 'dra dang // gang gis sdug bsngal rnam par 'thob 'gyur bar// gang la rten cing las rnams
55a3: brjid 'gyur ba/ / de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni gang zhig gis// ci 'dra'i lam la de dag rten
55a4: bgyis shing / / ci 'dra zhi ba 'thab 'gyur khyod kyis mkhyen// byis pa gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la// ra tu byung zhing 'jig rten mkhyed pa yi// bstan pa rab 'tha ji lta
55a5: 'gyur ba/ / de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs// 'jig rten phan pa'i brtan la brnyes babyis pas// dmyal ba chen por ji srid gnas pa dang // tsaM 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag rtsong
55a6: 'gyur ba/ / de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzugs// gang dag rgyal ba rnams la dang / bskyed de// rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing // chos kun stong pa nyid du yongs btagasaH/
55a7: mtshan mthams cad rnam par gzhag bgyis shing // 'gro rlu kun tu sman pa rnam spangs te// lus 'di snyam 'dra bar rab btags nas// phung po phrag cha 'dra bar rtogs gyur te// byang chub sem
55a8: ldan de dag rab tu gzigs/ / mgon po khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang // mtshungs med khyod kyis ji nyir thugs chud pa// de'i yis tha med sangs rgyas grub par shog/ 'thob kun kyang

55b1: rang byung thob gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chung ba nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul
55b2: gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ / mi'i seng ges 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// me'i zla ba rang 'byung gyur pa ni// rgyu ma mchis pa'i 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum pa de'i yi chu
55b3: ni bka' bkrol gsol/ / ston pa'i zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// bcom ldan dus rig rten 'di dag the tsom 'tshal// mgon pos de dag the tsom bsal du gsol// 'jig rten 'di dag dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur/
55b4: de ring su zhig rgyal la dang bskyed// gang gis chos rgya chen po rnam par rtogs// gang gis sems ni mi kul gnas par 'gyur// de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan tu gsol// de ring 'di ni gang gis rnam 'phrul
55b5: lags/ / 'khor rnams 'di dgatho tsam che 'tshal zhing // kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du lta zhing stong // ci nas the tsom ma mchis kun 'gyur ba// de ltar dpa' bos the tsom bsal du gsol// de ring 'di ni gang gis rnam
55b6: 'phrul lags/ / gang gis brtson 'grus bzang po rir bstan lags// gang zhig khyod dang 'dir mjal don mchis 'gyur// de ni legs par 'gro la bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba 'gro ba dag la phan bzhed pa/
55b7: the tsom 'tshal ba'i yid gnyis legs bstsal gsol// de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams// dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su
55b8: bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ / rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// de ring 'gro ba dag gi don cen byas// rang 'byung 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni dris pas na// ston pa'i dgongs pa'ang khyod kyis legs par mthong /

56a1: de dag lung bstan ma lus bstan pa bya// gnod sbyin tshogs kyis yid ni gzigs gyur nas// 'gro la phan pa'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa// dad pa'i yid kyis rta thul mnyan par gyis// rgyal ba'i byang
56a2: chub zhi ba shes gyur nas/ / gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mos pa'i sems bskyed de// 'byung po'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas// byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang // chos rnams stong pa nyid
56a3: du shes bya dang / / mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// 'gro ba kun tu smon pa rnams spangs shing // byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang // rnal 'byor stobs kyi phung po rnams bshig cing /
56a4: kun rdzob tsam du rig nas mi chags te// srid pa kun tu chu la pad ma bzhin// byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang // de dag srid pa gang du chags gyur pa// stod par bshig ste thams cad legs rtogs
56a5: pa/ de nyid rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub ste// byang chub phyir ni dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes// skye dang rga shi yong gis stong pa ste// de ni rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub yin// dngos po'i rang bzhin stong par shes zur
56a6: nas/ zhib bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid// byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong nyid// gang spyod de yang rang bzhin spyod pa ste// ye shes ldan pas shes
56a7: kyi byis pas min/ / ye shes rang bzhin stong par rig gyur ste// shes bya'i rang bzhin stong par rig gyur nas// shes pa po dang 'dra bar rtogs gyur nas// byang chub lam la de dag spyod ces bya// stong pa'i rang
56a8: bzhin stong par shes par bya/ / mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa ste// de ltar spyod na gzhan min spyod pa yin// de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/

56b1: dga' dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan gyur pa/ rang byung chos la de dag yid chas te// zhi ba'i gnas shes byang chub yid ldan gyur/
56b2: gnod sbyin tshogs rnams deng mos yid gyur te// 'di ltar de la mchod par ba byas pas// gnod sbyin rgyud nas shi 'phos blo can rnams/ mtho ris dong zhing
56b3: yun po dga' bar 'gyur/ / de dag ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis/ zhing du dong zhing sa gcig cig la yang / blo chen de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod//
56b4: de dag bzod mkhyen rgyal ba gdams ngag ston/ de dag 'jig rten phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis/ mtshan ma med par spyod cing 'dod 'gyur te/
56b5: 'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas/ 'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod/ de ltar bstan pas rgyal ba rab mchog nas/ byang chub
56b6: tha med de dag tsa 'gyur te/ de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur/ sems can mtha' yas pa dag rnam par 'grol/ sangs rgyas
56b7: khyen mtha' las grags pa can/ de dag ming ni 'jig rten khas shes bya/ zhiba'i tho ldan rgyal ba de dag gi// tshe tshad bskal pa

57a1: ba sa du ga/ na
57a2: xxx/ xxx
57a3: mas pa btsan rgyas pan rtsams/ na kya rgyu ngas ma nag
57a4: gdang sbyin lung ba stan pa'i le bye bcugacig pa/ nas parab ci rgyal po ldan pa/ sogs pa ya mam gyi ba brag rgya byas na
57a5: mdzod pa dag dang / nod sbyin gyis mdzod pa'i bar dag kyang ma/ lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ du ma thob par chug/
57a6: di ltar sems can yang mi dmigs la so dang skye ba dang / gdapas skyes dang / zung / gang gad/ bdag dang / bdaganas ga yang med// rlung sa
57a7: khams dang / skye sa ched gang la sems can nas gdags pa'i phung po dang/ rnams da / skye mched dede/ kyang mi dmigs/ las gang yod pas rnam par smin pa

57b1: gas pa mas yang ba gas/ rgan bkyang ba pa / na pa skams smral yang bdu gas / sa sa rgyapa snang shAs/
57b2: 'das kyi sa/ byung chub sems dpa' yang bstan pa ni mdza pa'ang ngo mtshar med do// bzhig las dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis ma ma sas //
57b3: zhes ma bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhigs dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyin pa nyid dang / sems can sangs su su
57b4: par bya ba dang / zhi dge bkod pa dang / zhing yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing nas zhing dung 'dong ba dang / der de bzhin gshegs pa mchod
57b5: pa dang / mchod pa'i mthu dang / sems can rnam par grol ba'i dgod pa dang / bskal pa 'di bsnyed gcig gis sangs rgyas sa 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / bskal
57b6: pa'adi snyed gcig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa ni 'di snyed cig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba
57b7: dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nA dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'di skad cig tu gnas pa 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig la dgongs te sems can rnams/

58a1: rgyabar lanapa mad pas myang na las 'ad yar 'gyur ranas bcom ldan 'das rgyas dgangs pa mad dgam te/ de nas mi 'am tsha brgyal ba snang ba dag bra ba tsam pagyis nas/ bcom ldan 'ad
58a2: gal ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas de/ bcom ldan 'das la chags su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ rgyal ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas// shes rab che mnga' bdag dgas skyes//
58a3: panyid dang srang bstan pa// bdag shegs bdag gis dam 'tshal// gsung pa'i thab tshas kyi kyis// 'byung ma mchis la stong pa dang // rang bzhin med gsung dzag rba/ mcha pa'ang cig ma/
58a4: sa d+hA rnaH// sems byu ba na Sh+TaT/ ste bram gagis ka' phrul pa'i// rnam po dag bdag ma 'tshal// mi pa pag pa gar ni// bas pamamachis tsha' ba gsang // de ni ya
58a5: lung bstan pas/ / thub pa bdag gis the tsom khram// sgyu ma 'dral lhar skye zhes// gsungs pa de ni ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // shAkya se dge bdag ma 'tshal// gnas pa mchis pa ma lags
58a6: la/ / dge bshes bkan gsungs ji lta bu// ldem pa'i gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // skyes bu thug mchog bdag ma 'tshal// gso ba'ang mamachis kyi ba rnams// gang gnyis mchog gsung ji lta za// ldem
58a7: gsungs pa 'di dag kyang / / dgrabs la bcom ldan padag ma 'tshag// rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang // rtogs shes mgon gsung jis za// btsam rnam pa 'di 'ang skyes// shes rab dpa' med bdag ma 'tshal//
58a8: yod ces bka' stsal pa// chos kun ni gsangs ji lta za// mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i ldem po dag/ bdag la rnam par bstan tu gsol// sku mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rnams// nam mkha' 'drang gsungs ji rtsa/
58a9: chos ni rab tu spang bgyis na// mi mkhas dmyal lhung ji lta bus// brtan pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang // 'gro ba na gzhan yang gsungs pa dang // las de bgyid pa ma mchis la// rang las can gsung ji lta bu//

58b1: bka' bral tshul 'di rnams pa yang // zil gyis mi gnan bdag ma 'tshal// mgon pa de la bdag dogs na// bde ga shegs padag gis tha tsam sol// dag pa'i tshogs 'gyur ma mchis la// byang chub
58b2: dag bsgrung bar gsungs/ / dge sbyong rgyal po'i gsung gi tshul// de bskad bka' stsal bdag ma 'tshal// chos rnams zag pa med gsungs la// spong byed las ni zad bstan pa// tshad med tho mnga' 'di
58b3: la yang / / bdag ni yid gnyis the tshom 'tshal// yang dag mtha' yang bka' stsal la// ma nor sbyin pa bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang rab rib bral ba yi// spyan mnga'i sdig spangs bstan du gsol/
58b4: thams cad gzigs pa ma rtogs par// gzhan gyis bdag gi the tsom 'di// sel nus ma mchis de lta bas// bdag ni rgyal ba mchog la dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdod
58b5: pos the tsom dris pa 'di dag gsan nas/ / de la lan gdab pa'i phyir// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la// tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa// bdag gis ma
58b6: 'tshal ces smras pa/ / gal te 'ga' zhig mi stong na// rgyal bas de lung bstan mi gsung // ci'i phyir zhe na 'di lta bur// rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur na// 'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste// de la 'phel
58b7: med 'grib pa med/ / dper na rang bzhin stong pa yi// me long dkyil 'khor yongs dag la/ ji d+ha rang bzhin med pa'i// gzugs pa dan snang ba de bzhin du/ ljod po chos rnams shes par bgyis// chos kyi dbyings ni 'gyur med na//
58b8: mchod pa'i yan lag 'gyur gang zhes// yan lag rnams la brtag byos la// sdong po mchod pa 'di la dpyod// chos dbyings rnam par thams cad du// 'gyur med skye bo mkhas pas rtogs// byis pa

59a1: rnams ni 'di 'phrul/ / blo sbyangs pas ni med par shes// skye ba ma mchis sems kyang bskyed// de ni ma 'tshal ces smras pa// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po'i ngag/ gzhan du ma sems mnyan
59a2: par gyis/ / byis pa 'khor bar dga' ba rnams// 'khor bar mngon dga' sems zhen pa// log pa'i sems dang 'du shes can// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur// de dag sngon chad ma thos
59a3: pa'i/ / sems med chos ni ngas bshad na// byis pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i rnams// 'di la kun tu rmongs par 'gyur// byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang // byang chub pa na yon thos gyur nas/
59a4: zil gyis ma non rang byung sems// rgya chen de ni thob par 'gyur// 'gag pa ma mchis chi 'pho ba// de yang ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ 'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan gyis// gzhan du ma sems mnyan
59a5: par gyis/ / gang dag rtag 'dzin de dag la// 'di la mi 'gyur ther zug med// dngos po 'di dag mi rtag ces// bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam par ston// sgra sa 'dra la lhar skye ba// ji lta bu zhes
59a6: dogs gyur pa/ / mthar phyin ma gyur slo pa dang // skye bo rnams la mtho ris bshad// gnas pa 'ang yod pa ma yin la// dge ba she sa bsten ces gang smras pa// gnas dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir// gnas
59a7: pa med pa'i dge ba shes bsten/ / g.yo' ba ma mchis bgyi ba rnams// bstan pa ma mtshal zhes smras pa// shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang // shing rta'i bya ba bzhin du rtogs// mi gang bdag yod khas
59a8: len cing / / bya ba bdag gis byas 'dzin pa// de dag la ni bya ba dang // g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad// rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang // rtogs shes nga yis gang smras pa// byis pa log

59b1: pa'i blo can rnams/ / rang bzhin stong par mi shes pa// de dag rnams la bstan pa'i phyir// rang bzhin stong zhes bde gshegs ston// kun kyang rtog pa'i rtog pas bskyed// yang dag ma yin rtog pas
59b2: bcings/ / zhi ba yod cing chos kun kyang // zhi bar mthong zhes smras pa ni// mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams kyis// kun tu d+h+r-i/ las sred ba skye// skom pas ji ltar smig rgyal// kAT+TA d+ha d+ho//
59b3: bas sgom pa skye// mi mkhas des ni rtog pa'i rgyu// yod pa min la log par brtags// chu yini par ni mthong gyur kyang // smig rtu la ni chu med do// de bzhin yongs su rtog pas dkrugs// sdug pa med la
59b4: sdug par rtog/ byis pa'i 'dod chags ldan pa dag/ sdug dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyis// sdug med smin rgyu chu bzhin te// smig rdul pa med do// de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa med// gzugs de sdug pa ma yin
59b5: ni/ byis pa log pa'i 'du shes can// sdug par rtog pas bcings par 'gyur// chos rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang // spong ba dmyal lhung zhes smras pa/ mod la mthong
59b6: bar ma gyur pa/ / mi mkhas rnams ni skrag par 'gyur// rang bzhin ngo bo nyid stong na// bad gzhin dus ni mi shes pa// de dag stong zhes thos gyur na// bdag med 'gyur zhes skrag
59b7: bskye/ / de dag bdag tu mngon zhen te// nam mkha' la ni mdud bor nas// stong pa gya nom spong byed de// mi mkhas sems dmyal chen por ltung // mtho ris 'jig rten ngas bstan dang // skye bo'i /
59b8: rgyud gzhan dag dang // las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te// byed pa po ni rab tu bkag/ yang dag tu ni 'gro ba dag/ rmi 'drar bshad par shes par gyis// rmi lam gang la dngos po med// log pa'i

60a1: blo ldan mngon par zhen/ / ngas ni las kyi rnam pa bstan// byed pa phyogs bcu rnams na med// shing rnams rlung gis ul pa las// me 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhin no// bdag cag ma ni bskyed bya zhes/
60a2: rlung dang shing la sems dpa' med// 'on kyang me ni 'byung ba ltar// las kyi byed pa de bzhin no// bsod nams tshogs ni yod min la// byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa dang // legs spyad yod ces zer ba ni// de tshul yang
60a3: ngag mnyan par byos/ / mi'i tshe tshad lo brgya ste// de srid 'tsho zhes brjod mod kyi// lo la phung por spungs pa med// bsgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs// zad pa med ces gang smras dang // l-is zad ces ni ngas smras pa// stongs
60a4: tshul du zad pa med/ / tha snyad tshul du zad par bstan// yang dag mtha' ni ngas bshad pa// phyin ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'// log pa'i blo can byis pa rnams// yang dag mtha' ni mi shes so// mtshan nyid thams cad
60a5: gcig nyid de/ / mtshan nyid med par shes pa yi// ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi// nges pa sdong po khyod nyon gcig/ yi ge gcig gis 'jug pa yi// byang chub blo ldan rnams la bstan// chos rnams thams cad
60a6: mang byas pa/ / a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan// de ltar spyod pa byed rnams la// mtshan nyid mtha' yas ngas bstan na// 'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa ni// a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan// chos rnams thams cad 'gag
60a7: med pa/ / a yes chos rnams la 'jug par bstan// oM yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa// de yang sdong pos shes par bgyis// chos rnams rnam par rtog med pa// de yang chos la 'jug par gsungs// chos kun 'grus/
60a8: pa med par yang // a ni chos kyi sgo mor bstan// a yi sgo yi gzungs 'di dag/ sdong pos de ltar shes par bgyis// mi zad pa dang zad smras pa// chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste// stobs bcu mnga' ba thams

60b1: cad kyis/ / mi zad sgo'i gzungs su bstan// chos rnams kun la sgo med de// de dag med pas sgo mi 'byung // 'di yang gzungs kyi na yin te// al brten nas 'jug par bya// chos kun pabam gyis pa
60b2: khyab ces/ / yang dag ji bzhin bde gshegs bstan// a oM sgo yi gzungs bstan pa// 'di yang sdang pos shes par bgyis// chos kun lus med byang chub ces// tho ldan rnams sangs bstan pa// 'di yang
60b3: gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ / a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams 'ong ba med pa ste// med pas de dag 'ong ba'ang med// 'di yang gzungs kyi bsgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams gdag
60b4: ba med pa ste/ med pas de dag gdags pa med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa ste// med pas de dag rang bzhin med// 'di yang gzungs kyi
60b5: sgo yin te/ / bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan// gzungs kyi sgo mo nga las nyon// chos kun yid la bya ba med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sa yin te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan// med phyir chos
60b6: kun sgrib med ces/ / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas shes par bya// chos kun thogs pa med pa ste// thogs par bya ba de mi dmigs// 'di yang
60b7: gzungs kyi sgo yin te/ / a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par// mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya// chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa// de dag ming med shes
60b8: par bya/ / chos rnams yang dag ma yin te// de dag ma lus rang bzhin med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas shes par bya// gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba// de dag mthong ba med pastan

61a1: par bya/ / sgrub po ni med pa dang // de dag rnams kyang med phyir ro// chos kun mnyam med de bas na// mtshan nyid gcig cing mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste/
61a2: chos kun yong ba ma yin no// de ltar lhag med chad pa med// mnyam bzhag med cing gnyis su med// gdung med ba sel med tshab med// blta ba'i las min med phyir ro// drang po ma yin yon po man/
61a3: mun pa ma yin snang ba min// mthong ba med cing thos med de// med pas gzungs su shes par bgyis// g.yo med drang po med pa ste// chos rnams gsal med g.yo ba med// 'khrug pa med cing khro ba med//
61a4: ci ba yang mi byed nye zhi med// skyel ba med cing gnas kyang med// 'gro med ldog med 'gro sems med// nyal ba med cing mi nyal med// sad pa mang bar shes par gyis// mig can ma yin long ba min// lta ba
61a5: ma yin mun bsgribs min/ / sbas pa ma yin bzhag pa min// dul ba ma yin ma dul min// rgod pa ma yin zhi ba min// 'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min// bden min rdzun min de lta bur// rgyal ba'i spyod yul
61a6: shes par bgyis/ / 'jig rten 'dul ba'i don gyi phyir// 'di la the tsom gang yang med// gang gang dbya ba'i the tsom de// dam pa'i don du 'byung ba med// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das
61a7: gyis zhus pa lung bstan pa dang / / gzungs nges par bstan pas yongs su tshim par gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te// khang pa brtsegs pa shing la rten pa dang // pad ma la
61a8: rten pa dang / / ri la rten pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can// rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa// gdugs kyi lnga ldis brgyan pa byas pa// rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis brgyan pa// bla res dang lnga

61b1: lngas brgyan pa bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te/ / mi 'am ci'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas// ri spos kyi dang ldang las skyes pa dang / zang las skyes pa dang / chu las
61b2: skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyis kyang / / bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas nas// de mi'am ci'i tshigs dang lhan gcig tu khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das
61b3: la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ / zang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// sa khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las
61b4: babs ste/ rkang pas dong nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing nam
61b5: pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byed cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum
61b6: pa mdzad do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// bde gshegs dri med spyan mnga' ba// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu
61b7: 'dzum mdzad rgyu de bka' stsal gsol/ / thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum dzad pa// 'khor gyis mthong nas the tsam 'tshal// zla ba tshes la mi bzhin du// smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du la// bde bar gsheg pa dang su zhig
61b8: gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes/ / bdag ni the tsom 'chal bar gyur// mi mchog dam pa the tsom gsol// bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la// dad pa thob na bcom ldan 'das// ji ltar

62a1: 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur/ / spra mchog bdag gi the tsom khum// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yis// bcom ldan bstan thos yid dga' zhing // the tsom ma mchis som nyi chad// ji ltar bstan
62a2: bzhin gnas par 'gyur/ / de ltar rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ 'gro la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang // thetsom gcad slad sdong ba dang // me ci rnams kyi lung bstan gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
62a3: dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ / skye bo tshogs chen rnams nang du// sangs rgyas yon tan banyen 'gyung ba// snang ba'i lung bstan gang drI swa pa// rta rdul khyod kyis legs par dris/
62a4: ye shes mthong ba bsgrib med pa// bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can// de khyod dang ba'i yid byos lon// skyo med yid kyis nga la nyon// 'jig rten zan dang bde ba'i phyir// sdong pos the tsom gang dris pa// de'i
62a5: 'bras bu brjod par byas/ / the tsom gcad pa nga la nyon// sdong po la sogs mi 'am ci// bye ba phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa// de dag nga la mchod byas nas// 'di nas shi 'thos mtho ris 'dod// bskal pa bye ba
62a6: dgu bcur der/ / lha mi nang du 'khor bar 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas// sems la dbang sgyur dbang ldan 'gyur// mi yi seng ge de dag gis// sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrag khrig tu// spru
62a7: dkye rang ni lha gnas na/ / bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong // bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang // de dag lha ming 'khor 'khor nas// rang rang zhing rnams sna tshogs su// byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur//
62a8: rtag tu snang ba'i bskal pa la// mi yaM seng ge 'jig rten mgon// chags med ye shes mthong dpag yas// stobs bcu gzi'i brjid mtha' yas 'gyur// de dag zhing du sems can gang / yongs su ma ston 'ga'

62b1: mi bskye/ nyan thos theg pas gang byung ba// kun kyang srid pa tha ma pa// mi yi seng seng ge'i der ni// byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba// de dag tshe gcig thogs pa ste// mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur//
62b2: gang dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams// bdag cag dpag med sangs rgyas zhing // yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes// de 'dra'i bsam par 'du zhugs// sems can rlabs chen de dag ni// sngon lam rgya chen yun ring
62b3: btab/ / de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// bsam pas rang zhing rnam par sbyangs// nyon mongs 'joms pa de dag gis// zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni// dga' ldan gnas kyi longs spyod rnams// ngan song kun
62b4: kyang yongs su dag/ de dag zhing du rnam kun tu// mi khom gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur// zhing rnams yongs sbyangs de dag ni// sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'don// de ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis// mi ci
62b5: rnams kyi lung bstan bshad/ / lung bstan de thos 'khor gyi rnams// kun kyang yid ni rangs par gyur// // mi 'am ci lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// /
62b6: de nas lha 'phreng ldan glang po can brgyad khris lha ma yin rnams nas mi 'am ci'i bar dag gis mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgul ku yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing
62b7: dga' ba dang / / yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos shing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ brtson par gyur te// de dag gi ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams
62b8: cad kyi khor yug tu dpag tshad bcu drug tshun chad me tog man da ra bas pus mo nub tsam du gang bar byas so/ / de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshigs su

63a1: bcad bdag gis ma na par bsna pa/ zhi ba'i dbang po 'dus pa gapa// srog chags sun ma thags bca ba// bad ba dgashegs pathugs rgyun// 'jig rted dag pa mimi stan
63a2: sadas rgyas chos la mos pa yi/ / 'khod 'di rje srid 'dir gnas par// zhabs mchog mdzes shing dga' ldan pa// thugs chen la mgos byug 'jal// ji ltar dgung blag pa'i tshe// mi rnams zlal phyag 'tshal pa/
63a3: debazhin tu tshogs 'di rnams kyang // bcom ldan 'das kyinam duH// dpag tu med pa'i dag slong ga/ dpag yas ye shes phung po ldan// gzi brjid dpagralas zung ba can// tho mchog khyod la mgos zug 'tsha/
63a4: stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal sdug pa// bden bzhi mi bsnyengs de gsum sel// rgyal ba'i bcwa brgyad chos dang ldan// the tsom mi mnga' smra ba'i mchog/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing /
63a5: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan// dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs med thugs// bde gshegs byed la phyag 'tshal lo// tshul khrims stobs kyi mthar phyin pa// ting 'dzin stobs rnams mi
63a6: bstong ba/ / ye shes stobs kyi mtshon cha can// bdud stobs bcom thu ba rgyal b.lags// ye shes stobs mchog tus gyur pa// ser sna mi mnga' nyan thos rdul// zhi ba'i thugs kyis
63a7: spyod mdzad cing / / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul// skyes bu seng ge bde ga shegs thong // gti mug zhi bgyid chos brnyes pa// bdag cag rnams kyang stobs bcu yi// chos rnams 'di dag tsa
63a8: rang shog/ ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi// bsam mkhyen dang mdzad de bzhin du/ 'jig rten snang mdzad bdag gis kyang // lha mi bcas pa'i 'gro dang bgyi// de ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du/

63b1: snyid brtse nye bar bzung nas ni// 'gro ba'i la per ba'i mtshor bying ba// srid pa'i rgyud las bsgral bar bgyi// bdag cag ltar bcas 'jig rten gyi// 'dren dang rab tu 'dren 'gyur cig/ 'gro ba
63b2: sdug bsngal brgyas nyen pa/ / srid pa'i rgyud las dgrol bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha 'breng ldan glang po can rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i cha 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas
63b3: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ / bde gshegs rnam par 'dren pa'o// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum mdzad pa'i// rgyu ga pa
63b4: lags pa bka' stsal gsol/ / rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gro ba dang bgyis byung mthong nas// 'khor kun the tsam 'tshal 'gyur te// 'dzum pa'i don ni nyan par 'tshal// don chen 'dzum pa mdzad
63b5: pa'i don/ / bka' stsol bka' stsol 'dren pa mchog/ dge sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyed// tha tsam chad gyur bka' stsal gsol// gang gis rgyal ba mnyes par bgyis// gang gis der mchod bla med bgyis//
63b6: su zhig de ring gting thob 'gyur// bde gshegs bdag gi the tsom khum// de ring gang gis bdud kyi gnas// dkrugs g.yengs kun tu 'khrugs par bgyis// deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang // rab tu
63b7: dga' ba'i ldan par bgyis/ / rgyal ba thub pa de lung stod// 'gro ba'i the tsom mA ra tra khum// de thos bde gshegs 'khor gyi rnams// kun kyang rab tu yid dga' 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs
63b8: su bcad de/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa// 'phreng ldan glang po can lha'i// lung bstan rta thul khyod dris pas// nges na 'gro ba mang po yi// don chen shin tu der byas 'gyur// stobs bcu

64a1: rgyal ba ma dris par/ / sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston// de ni 'gro ba mang don du// de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus// 'phreng ldan glang po lha tshogs kyis// nga la sems dang mchod pas/
64a2: bskal pa grangs med 'das 'og tu// nyon mongs pham byas rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// 'thun par mi'i nar skyes te// rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la// me tog mchog gis mchod par 'gyur//
64a3: kun du bde bar gshegs kyi sems// skyed par 'gyur zhing 'phel byed 'gyur// rang 'byung mi yi seng ge la// tshigs su bcad pas bstod par 'gyur// ma 'ongs dus na 'di kun gyis// rgyal ba khrag khrig
64a4: dpag yas mang / / me tog gyis mchod tshigs bcad kyis// mi mchog rnams la bstod byas te// de dag bde gshegs rnams mchod cing // mthu bo che'i sku bstod nas// rab tu dga'a'i bskal pa la// rngam
64a5: par 'dren par 'jig rten 'byung / / grags pa ma smad nags rgyu ba// brgyad khri bo rnams de dag kun// bskal pa gcig la bde gshegs 'gyur// me tog rgyal mtshan ldan zhes grags// de na dmyal dang
64a6: dud 'gro dang / / ngan song gshin rje'i 'jig rten med// zhing de na ni lha min med// me khoms cad thams cad rab tu bcom// 'breng ldan glang po can lha'i// longs spyod sum cu rtsa gsum gyi// ci 'dra ba
64a7: ni de 'drar 'gyur/ / 'gro ba'i tshe tshad dpag tu med// de tshe mi dge sgrami skrag/ mi dge byed pa spos ci dgos// de ni rngam 'dren mchog rnams kyi// skye ba rnams kyang chos can 'gyur// srog chags bya ba khrag
64a8: khrig phrag/ gar ga'i bye ma rab mang snyed// grol bar byed 'gyur stobs bcu rnams// gnas pa'i med pa'i chos kyang ston// grags pa ma smad de dag gis// ring brel dag kyang brgyas par 'gyur// de dag rnaMs

64b1: kyi ring bsrel la'ang / / rgyal ba'i skamanga' 'byung bar 'gyur// grags pa mtha' yas ldan pa rnams// ring bsrel cho 'phrul sku mthong nas// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 'gyur//
64b2: 'phrer ldan glang po can rnams kyi// lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa// thos shing shes nas 'khor kun kyang // de tshe sems ni rab tu dga'// 'phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gas ma pa'o//
64b3: de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dgu khris lha ma yin rnams nas 'phreng ldan glang po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gis mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas dga' mgu yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
64b4: yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po bskyed de/ 'di lta ste dper na/ kham pa'i gru la zhon pa'i mi zhig chu'i dbus su byin na gru chag tu 'od zhes tshu rol nas pha rol tu
64b5: 'gro bar bya b.ra'i phyir mos pa drag po bskyes pa/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khri po de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid la dang ba bskyes nas// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par
64b6: bya ba'i byor mos pa drag po skyob par gyur nas/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag rgyal po che po bzhi dang lhan gcig tu rin
64b7: po che'i tha ra bkra ba/ bltan sdug pa dgu khri mngon par sprul to// de dag kyang pal cher mu tig dmar po dang / d+ho ra sa dang / bai dUr+ya dang / gser dang / rdo rje'i rang bzhin ca ga stag go// lha'i rol mo
64b8: sil snyan dgu khri yang mngon par sprul te/ / de dag nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re dgu khri bo de dag thogs nas/ rol mo sil snyan dgu khri de dag byed cing / steng gi bar sdang las dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan

65a1: gsum bskor ba byed bcing / me tog man da rab dang / man dar ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / ba ru sha ka dang / ba ru sha ka chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams
65a2: kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor te/ de dag gis mchod par byas nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te// tshigs su bcad pa
65a3: dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ / rgyal ba'i yon tan mthong ba yi// lha ni dgu khri tham pa dag/ 'dren pa khyod kyi spyan sngan// thal mo rab tu sbyar nas mchis// rgod pa ma mchis zhum mi mnga'// 'dod
65a4: pa ma mchis 'gyod ma mchis/ / me blun ngo mtshar ma mchis par// rkang gnyis mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal// khyod ni srid pa'i rgyud rnams bkum// mi shes pa ni rnam par sbyangs// sred pa'i phur ba rab tu
65a5: phyung / / nga rgyal rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bsnyal// khyod ni zug rngu phyung ba ste// rma la gdug pa khyod kyis spangs// khyod ni mkhyen bzhin spyod pa ste// 'dren pa khyod kyis rma rnams sos// khyod kyis nyon mongs thams/
65a6: cad spangs// 'ching pa dag ni thams cad bcad// sbyor ba kun dang bral ba ste// thub pa chags pa kun las 'das// rgyal po khyod kyi spyod yul ni// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med// bcom ldan
65a7: khyod la ston pa yang / / rnam pa kun tu mi mnga'o// khyod kyis sred pa drangs nas phyung // ma rig pa ni drungs kyang phyung // rnam pa bzhi po'i phyin ci ldog/ rnam pa kun tu yongs su spangs// gang du 'jig rten ma chung de/
65a8: ri dgas rngon pas ji bzhin du// 'jigs shing bsgrag par 'gyur ba yin// yang dag mtha' ni khyod kyis gzigs// sems can 'jigs tshogs ltar ltung ste// stong pa nyid ni ma 'tshal bas// ma rig pa'i mun

65b1: pa gtibs/ / 'khor ba'i btson rar dga' bar bgyid// khyod kyis yang dag ji bzhin du// 'gro nga 'chang bar stong 'drar gzigs// gang gis rnam dag mig 'gyur ba'i// ye shes snang ba rab tu bstan//
65b2: phung po stong par rnam par bshig/ ming dang gzugs kyang gsog 'dra zhing // khams rnams dang ni skye mched dag/ bdag med stong par rnam par bshig/ chos gang dang ni ming gang gis// chos gang mngon
65b3: par brjod par bgyi/ / chos de chos des stong pa ste// thub pa khyod kyis stong par bstan// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos med pa la// skye bo'i tshegs chen mngon sprul na// de la sems can gdugs ma mchis/ srog dang gang zag
65b4: ma mchis ltar/ / de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang // dbang po dag dang skye mched kyang // yang dag ma yin sgyu ma zhes// skyes bu dam pas bstan pa mdzad// ji ltar ri mo mkhan zhig gis// bud med gzugs
65b5: ni rnam bris shing / / mnyam pa dang ni mi mnyam dang // lci dang yang ba bstan bgyis kyang // byis pa'i mig ni bsrubs pa ste// de la mi mnyam ci ma mchis// de bzhin chos dbyings mnyam lags na// de bzhin chos dbyings mnyam
65b6: lags na/ / byis pa rnams ni de la rmongs// gang shes khyod kyi bslab pa la// legs bslabs rmongs pa mi 'gyur pa// lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhin du bzhin// de ni kun mkhyen khyod kyis bstan//
65b7: shes rab chen po khyod kyis ni// ye shes sgron ma rab byas te// chos kyi 'khor lor ba bskor nas// sems can rnams la chos bstan pa// de ltar bdag cag myur tu ni// bla med byang chub zhi thob ste/
65b8: ji ltar 'dren pa khyod bzhin du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi// 'khor ba'i lam log 'di dag tu// 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can la// ji ltar 'dren pas bstan pa bzhin// bdag cag gis

66a1: kyang chos myur bstan/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chungad nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis
66a2: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ / rgyu ma mchis par rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'dren pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 'dzum sbyin// dpa' bo chen pos lung bstan gsol/
66a3: skyes bu dam pa 'khor 'di dag/ bde gshegs deng bshad mthong nas ni// yid gnyis chen po 'tshal gyur te// kun kyang the tsom 'tshal bar 'gyur// de ring su yis bdud pham bgyis// nem nur gang
66a4: gis bcad par 'gyur/ / su zhig de ring chos rtogs gyur// skyes bu mchog gis lung bstan gsol// de ring khyod la su yis mchod// ston pa gang gis bsnyen bkur bgyis// 'gro kun nem nur 'tshal gyur na//
66a5: rnam par 'dren pas lung bstan gsol// ji ltar rkang gnyis mchog khyod kyis// lung bstan 'di dag thos gyur na// 'gro ba the tsom 'chad 'gyur ba// 'dren pas de ltar lung bstan gsol// ci nas rnam pa
66a6: thams cad du/ / kun mkhyen lam la gnas pa'i rnams// myur tu byang chub 'thob 'gyur ba// de ltar 'dren pas bstan tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ta thul la tshig su bcad de slar ba
66a7: sprul pa/ / 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon po la// 'dzum pa'i rgyu rnams dri bya zhes// rta thul khyod kyis dris pa legs// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan pa yid du 'o/
66a8: 'gyur zhing // nyams dga' byed pa de bshad kyis// dran pa mngon byos mnyan par bgyis// dgu khri thim pa'i lha rnams kyis// mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu// de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la// shin tu dad pa'i yid

66b1: kyis byas/ / sangs rgyas mngon par bstod byas pa/ stong pa nyid kyang shes par gyur// chos rnams la ni dris pa rnyed// nga'i bstan la ga tu gnas// ston yang sangs rgyas bye ba'i zag/
66b2: dag la 'di dag mchod// pa 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas ni// bye ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur// 'dren pa de dag ji srid du// sangs rgyas bye ba ma mchod cing / bsnyen bkur byas par ma gyur pa// de srid
66b3: byang chub 'tshang mi brgya/ / de bas shin tu 'phyi ba na// kun kyang gang zag mchog tu 'gyur// mtshan ni 'od gzer 'chang ba ste// 'jig rten kun mkhyen thub par 'gyur// 'jig rten sgron ma de dag gis// nyan thos 'dus
66b4: par 'gyur ba ni/ / blo'i mchog dang ldan pa dag/ 'dus pa brgyad cu 'byung bar 'gyur// sgrib med gzigs pa de dag gi/ mi rnams de'i dus kyi tshe// lo grangs bye ba brgyad bcu tham// srog gis dbang po gnas
66b5: par 'gyur/ / shes rab mtha' yas de dag gi/ nyan thos 'dod chags bral ba rnams// lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa dag/ bye ba tshad med 'byung bar 'gyur// sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i// 'jig rten mgon
66b6: po dpal ldan rnams/ / mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang // shin tu brgya chen 'byung bar 'gyur// mi dbang mya ngan 'das gyur nas// rnam par 'dren pa dpal ldan pa// rgyal ba'i mchod rten rnams kyis
66b7: ni/ / sangs rgyas zhing rnams legs brgyan 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis// mchod rten de dag thams cad la// srog chags brgya dang stong rnams dang // khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod byas
66b8: nas/ / byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur// rang byung mya ngan 'das nas kyang / de dag dam chos gnas par 'gyur// lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ brgyad cu

67a1: 'bang rnas papa/ @# ma pa // gag ga/ gas / sa /
67a2: chen bzhi'i rigs rnams la// 'jig rten sgron mas lung bstan mdzad// de thos nas ni bsgre bo kun// kun tu dga' zhing rab dga' ste// sems mgu yid kyang rangs gyur nas// ston pa la ni mngon par bstod//
67a3: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / bam po drug pa// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin las sogs pa/ sum cu rtsa gang+gAsaris gyi rtswa bye ba phrag brgyad bcus lham
67a4: yin dag dang / nam mkha' ldang dag dang / klu'i bu mo dag dang / klu dag dang / grul bum dag dang / dri za dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / me 'am ci dag dang / phreng ldan glang po can dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag
67a5: gis mchod pa yang mthong / / lung bstan pa yang thos nas// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sathas yid rangs te// rab tu dag nga/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ yid byung ba ched po/ skyes te/
67a6: pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin las stsogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par 'gyur te// de dag gis rin po che'i khang pa bkra ba/ bltan sdug po/ rin po che'i sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ mu tig
67a7: dang po'i ses dang / gyu sa na gag phre rna'ogs dang / nor bu rin po che dz+ya yA ti sa'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ sa gnas rim pa brgyad dang / ba ga ma dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung gis brgyan pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
67a8: dang / ba dan dag gri brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khris brgyan pa/ bla res chen po dang / dril bu'i g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i rol mo sil snyan sgra rab tu 'byung ba

67b1: byeb phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul to/ / rtacang shes kyis drangs pa'i shing u0f7f/ lha rdzas kyi snam bus legs par brgyan pa// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dag gis mdzes par byas pa// bye ba phrag brgyad
67b2: cu yang mngon par sprul to/ / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad dang ldan pa'i khar yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad / me tog man da ra ba dang / lha'i mchod pa de dag gis rgyas par gang bar byas so//
67b3: glang po ches srung gyi bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul te// glang po ches srung gi bu de dag re re zhing yang / mgo bye ba phrag brgyad rtsa brgyad cu/ glang po ches srung gi bu'i mgo de dag re re zhing yang so drug drug/ so de dag re re
67b4: zhing yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ / rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang pad ma stong phrag bdun bdun// badz+ra dag re re zhing yang 'dab ma brgyad khri brgyad khri/ dab ma re re zhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo de dag re re zhing yang 'khor
67b5: bdun bdun yod pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sha stag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i khang pa de dag bdun du byas te/ dbus su glang po ches srung gi bu dag bcud nas/ phyi bzhin shing rta de ltar bshams par de dag brkyen
67b6: bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas so/ / rin po che'i khang pa de dag las kyang lha'i tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / ud pa la dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / gser phye'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i me teg man
67b7: darab dang / mnang ra ba chen po dang / man 'dzu sha ka dang / man 'dzug ka chen po dang / ba ru sha ka dang / ba ru sha ka chen po dang / ka ra ka ra dang / kar kar chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog dag gi char yang mngon par sprul te/
67b8: bar bab par gyur to// gser dang dngul dang / baiDUr+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i

68a1: bu med dag las/ la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sbyar zhing / lha ma yin gyi mchod pa lta bu dang / glang ces srung gi bu de dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa
68a2: rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/ / de'i 'og tu ha cang shes kyi drang ba'i shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad bcul zho/ te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// lha'i ye byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po yang phul bar gyur to//
68a3: lha'i rol mo sele sAn bye ba phrag brgyad bcu yang bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// shing dbye ba phrag brgyad bcu po de dag la yang lha'i bu mo gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad chubargyad nu mngon par sprul te/ lha'i drim de dag kyang la la ni
68a4: glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing / lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas so// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad bcu po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/
68a5: ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i bu mo 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod byed pa pabs na// chos thams cad kyang sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nges so snyam nas/ de dag 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas
68a6: bstan pa de bzhin te/ sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin no snyam du sems par gyur cing / de dag chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar shes nas/ chos la the tsom med par gyur to// de ltar de dag the tsom med cing nem nur med par
68a7: gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de dag chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtogs cing / bdag
68a8: cag kyang sbrul dang 'dra bar mthong / / mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong // bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de dag sprul pa dang 'dra ba yang dag par

68b1: shes nas/ de dag chos thams cad la sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bya bar shes nas// the tsom med cing nem nur med par gyur te// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/
68b2: 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyi sa dang // sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyis dang // lha rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa// ji ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid// 'dren pas chos kun gsungs
68b3: ba gang lags dang / / de bzhin gshegs pa sa lungs bstan mtha' dag dang // 'di dag thams cad sprul pa 'dra'o zhes// de ltar lha tshogs de dag blo gros skyes// bcom ldan sprul pa 'di dag ci bzhin du
68b4: ston pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste/ / rgyal bas lung bstan bdag cag 'tshal rgyur pas// 'di la bdag cag the tsom ma mchis so// rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams mkhyen nas// byis pa'i sa thob tha snyad gang
68b5: btags pa/ / de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin du// bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhin no// slob pa rnams dang gang dag mi slob dang // bcom ldan nyan thos 'dul ba'i sa thob pa// de dag kun kyang bcom
68b6: ldan sprul dang 'dra/ / bcom ldan bstan la the tsom ma mchis so// bcom ldan gang rnams mi spa lhur len cing // bse ru lta bur gnyis med nyon mongs spangs// de dag rnams kyang sbrul 'dra bcom ldan 'das//
68b7: bde gshegs bstan la the tsom ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das/ gang rnams 'gro ba kun la bde phan phyir// rgyal ba'i byang chub spyod pa'i bag yod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras dag
68b8: kyang / khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dnga'ang // bde gshegs rang 'byung rnam par 'dren pa mchog/ stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rje can/ ye shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag

69a1: sprul pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin mtshungs/ / 'dren pas 'di la chos rnams gang gsungs pa// gnas med zhi bsil nyon mongs med gyur cing // sdug bsngal zhi byed mthar thug grangs med pa// de
69a2: yang sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin no/ / bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag kyang // sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis// gang tshe go'u ta ma'i bstan pa 'di// bdag cag rtogs nas the tsom thams cad
69a3: spangs/ / sprul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas// bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// bde gshegs spyod yul 'di la spyod pa'i rnams// the tsom ma mchis rang 'byung 'dren par 'gyur//
69a4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das
69a5: la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ / gzhal yas grags mnga' mtha' yas gzi'i brjid can// bde gshegs rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi mdzad// rnam par 'dren pas 'dir ni 'dzum mdzad na// rgyal bas 'dzum
69a6: papa'i tshig gsungs the tsom khum/ / rang 'byung bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa 'di// byung bar rig nas 'jig rten the tsom 'tshal// 'gro ba'i the tsom thub pas bsal tu gsol// 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom ma mchis mdzad//
69a7: lha tshogs 'di rnams rab tu yid dga' bas/ rgyal ba/ stong de lha brdzas rnams kyis mchod// bde gshegs de dag mngon du 'dzum pa badzad// rgyal ba 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bka' stsal gsol/ zla ltar dri med 'od mnga' mtha'
69a8: yas gzigs/ / ji nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di thos pas// mgon po 'gro ba thams cad dgar 'gyur bar// rgyal ba lha tshogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal gsol// bde gshegs lha tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun//

69b1: sprul pa lta bur rnam par rtogs gyur nas// stobs bcu mnga' bas don ni bka' stsal gsol// ra ba rib bral bas lha'i bslab pa bsrungs// skye bo 'di dag the tsom bral gyur nas// thub pa de ltar byang chub spyod rtsom 'gyur//
69b2: rab tu dga' ba 'khor 'di thos gyur te// dgongs pa rig nas rgya chen rtsom gyur pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul lo tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu dga'
69b3: nas/ / rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig/ smras pa de ni rus la bab pa ste// 'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to// lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa de dris pa// des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don byas kyi/ 'dzum pa
69b4: mdzad pa'i rgyu de ngas bstan gyis/ / dga' zhing dang ba'i sems kyis nga la nyon// lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di dag ni// ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas// chags med ye shes mthong ba dpag med cing //
69b5: rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// srid pa'i rgyud na sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe// mi g.yogatso bo gang ga'i bye snyed mchod// srid rgyu na 'di dag thub pa las// mos rnams sprul pa lta bur ma mthong ngo // 'di dag
69b6: nga la mchod mchog 'dir byas pas/ / chos rnams sprul pa 'dra bar mngon tu mthong // bde gshegs bstan pa 'di la byas pa ni// chud zos mi 'gyur bar chad yod mi 'gyur// lha tshogs 'di yis nga la mchod byas te/
69b7: chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar shes pas// bskal pa pad ma zhes bya byung ba'i tshe// smra ba'i zla ba mi yi mchog tu 'gyur// khyu mchog ldan pa'i mi mchog 'gyur ba ni// bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog
69b8: rgyal po/ / chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drang ston cing // 'gro ba khrag khrig dpag med 'grol bar 'gyur// bde gshegs de dag bstan la bag yod pa// chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'dra bar sems// zhi

70a1: zhi gnas de la su bsten bag yod pa/ / myur tu bla med byang chub zhi pa 'thog// sum cub rtsa gsum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe 'thab bral gyi lta bye
70a2: phrag bzhi bcus/ lha ma yin rnams nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gis mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshem zhing mgul yid rang ste// rab tu dga' zhing / dga' ba dang /
70a3: yid bde ba bskyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa la thogs pa mi mnga' bar shes shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni nyams dga' ba ste/ de dag thob napa shes pa 'am/ ma mthong ba 'am/
70a4: ma rtogs pa 'am/ mngon tu ma byas pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa lam/ las sam/ las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos pa bskyed de// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs
70a5: pas/ kun rdzob dang / don dam pa gnyis thugs su chud de/ shes par bya ba yang kun rdzob dang don dam 'dir zad do// de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ stong pa nyid du rab tu gzigs rab tu mkhyen/ legs par
70a6: mngon du mdzad pas/ / de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// de la kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so// don dam par gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa ste/ shes par bya ba
70a7: ma yin pa/ rnam par shes bya ba ma yin pa/ yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa// ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ ma thos pa// thos par ma byas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ ma bstan pa/ ma mthong ba/
70a8: ma brtags pa/ 'dzin du ma bcug pa/ rtogs par ma byas pa/ thob par ma byas pa/ mthe tho pa nye bar ma snyan pa/ ma por za/ ma bzhag pa/ ma spangs pa/ bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rab tu zhi ba med pa/ ma snad pa/

70b1: ma bstod pa/ thob pa ma yin pa/ ma thob pa ma yin pa/ bde ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa/ snyan pa ma yin/ mi bstan pa ma yin pa/ gzugs ma yin pa/ gzugs med pa ma yin pa/ grangs med pa/ bgrang ba med
70b2: pa/ 'jig rten med pa/ 'jig rten dang bral ba med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rnam par byang ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ ldog pa med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma g.yos pa/ ma bsams pa/ ma bskyod
70b3: ba/ mngon par 'du ma byas pa/ ma spros pa/ spros pa dang bral ba ste/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig dang / rna ba
70b4: dang / sna dang / s+ye dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
70b5: dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
70b6: tshor ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/
70b7: gzugs su sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar kye sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i
70b8: khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ltar chos gang dang / gang brjod

71a1: pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod pa'i chos de dang de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi brjod pa ste/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de ltar nyams dga' ba yin no// de byis pa so so'i skye bo thos
71a2: dang mi ldan pa/ mi shes pa rnams kyis thos nas// 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag par 'gyur te// des 'jigs par gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par 'gyur te/ de dag ni lha dang
71a3: bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba ste/ / 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to zhes te// de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos pa bskyed nas// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don du/
71a4: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las khyad par tu 'phags pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod de// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
71a5: 'tshal nas/ / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ 'thab bral gyi lha de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
71a6: cad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ / rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs// khams dang bskye mched rnams kyang de bzhin te// dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben pa dag/ kun kyang thub pa khyod
71a7: gyis ji bzhin gzigs/ / 'jig rten mkhas pa'i bden pa gnyis yin te// khyod kyis gzhan las ma gson rang gis gzigs// de ni kun brdzob bden dang don dam ste// bden pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so// gang
71a8: gis bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba rnams/ / bde ba'i don du dang ba bskyed 'gyur ba// rgyal bas 'gro tha rnams kyi don slad du// 'jig rten phan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to// sems can tshogs kyi 'gro drug gang bstan pa//

71b1: sems can dmyal dang drang 'gro yi dgas dang // lA ma nA ris dang mi dang lha'i rnams// ma yi seng gis kun rdzob brtags pa mdzad// rigs dam 'de bzhin mthapar rigs rnams dang // thug pa'i khyim da /
71b2: dbul po'i khyim rnams dang // bran gyi tshogs dang de bzhin g.yog ga chags// bud med tshogs dang skyes pa'i mnad dang // 'gro ba'i khyad par ji snyed gang yang rung // mtshus son gyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa/ na
71b3: bden par mkhas pas thugs chud nas/ / 'jig rten pan pas mil de bstan to// de la dga' bong 'gro ba 'khor ba na// 'gro ba'i chos brgyad dal mi 'byung sa// thab dang mthob bsan dang mi bstan dang /
71b4: bstong dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal lo// thob pa rnyed nas de la chags pa bskyed// ma thob gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur// gang gzhan ma bstan tshul 'dis shes par bya// nad rnams brgyud kyis de rmad gcod
71b5: gnod par 'gyur/ / kun rdzob de la don dam su smra ba// de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes par bya// mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang // bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu smra ba dang // mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid
71b6: cing / de lar dga' ste mtshan mar gang gnas pa// de dag bde gshegs gsung ni thos gyur nas// 'jigs shing ji bzhin mi rtogs spong bar bgyid// de dag bde gshegs gsung rnaMs spongs gyur pas// sems can
71b7: dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzod myong / / de dag tshul min bde bar tshol bgyid kyang // sdug bsngal brgya dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur// 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis// ma log thos ni rnam par rtoH
71b8: gyur na/ / sbrul gyi pags pa ring ltar rab spangs te// srid pa kun las 'das nas zhi bar 'gyur// chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste// stong pa mtshan ma med pa don dam zhes/ gang gis

72a1: thos nas dga' ba bskyed 'gyur ba/ / de dag bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// ji ltar bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos// de la lha rnams the tsom ma mchis te// 'gro ba thams cad yongs
72a2: su dgrol ba'i phyir/ / de dag bla na mod pa'i byang chub tshol// byang chub blo can rnam dag blo can rnams// skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba bskyed du gsol// de thos 'gro ba kun la sman skad du// bla na med
72a3: pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thab bral ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad
72a4: do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten phanapas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des// khyod kyi 'khor ni the tsom 'tshal bar 'gyur// mi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka'
72a5: bskul gsol/ / des ni 'khor 'di rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha rnams lung bstan de ni thos gyur na// 'khor 'di shin tu dga' zhing mthu bar 'gyur// rigs dang ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la// bde bar nan tan bgyid ci
72a6: brtsom par 'gyur/ / rgyal ba khyod long 'di ni mchod ldan te// drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan sdod// 'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu bar mdzad skad du// snyan pa'i gsung ni legs par brjod du gsol// sangs rgyas yon
72a7: tan mthu dag thos gyur nas/ / skye dgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos na// mkhas pa rnams ni tshul bzhin rtsom par 'gyur// mi'i dam pa smra ba'i mchog gis 'dir// the tsom
72a8: 'tshal ba'i nem nur legs par gsol/ / 'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing sdong // lha rnams lung bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol// kun kyang rim 'gro dgus par na thags te/ khyod kyis lung bstan rab tu

72b1: dga' ba la/ / sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan// 'jig rten phan phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan ga/ zus tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten phan
72b2: phyir mkhas pas 'dzum pa mdzad/ / rta thul khyod kyis dris pa'i dus dang ldan// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na// bskye bo tshogs chen rnams kyi don tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs la blo zhan cing /
72b3: 'dod chags tho dang zhe sdang bro ldan dang // tsha rabs brgyad ni rtsod pa'i blo can dang // gti mug blo can dga' ba skyer mi 'gyur// gang rnams rgyal ba'i bstan la dga' ba dang // gang gis rgyal mas sa sngon ris dang // gang rnams
72b4: snying rje che dang ldan pa dag/ de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur// gang gis 'gro ba gnod zin mthong gyur te// mi'i seng ge snying rje bskyed byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di zos nas// ud dpal phreng
72b5: bzhin mgo la khyer bar 'gyur/ / de'i 'khor 'di rab tu dag 'gyur pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba bsnyen bkur byas pa te// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yid 'od 'di// me tog phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta// 'thab bral lha rnams sngon
72b6: gyi rgyal kun la/ / bsnyen bkur byas shing chags pa spangs pa ste// nyon mongs smad bcing sangs rgyas blo ldan gyur// snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan// rgyal ba mi yi seng ge gang gA yi// bye snyed kun la chags med bsnyen bkur
72b7: byas/ byang chub bla na med par smon byed cing // dge ba mtha' yas 'di dag kun gyis byas// sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur nas// sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams la snying rje bskyed// de dag mi mchog sems can phan mdzad
72b8: ba/ / chos tshul mtha' yas yongs su dris par 'gyur// gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren gyur pa// rnam 'dren tshes la 'jug pa 'chad par 'gyur// mi'i nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyen nas// de dag rnams la rgya chen tshes

73a1: kyang 'chang / / rnam 'dran skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag/ rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chad// de dag rgyal ba'i gsung de thos gyur nas// 'gre ba thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs// ces stong zhan
73a2: mtshan ma'i rnam pas stong / / rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med pa smra// rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas// kun kyang sangs rgyas yon gtan rnams la gnas// de dag nga la mchod pa brgya chen byas// bdag gi chom
73a3: bzhin du ni lung bstan nas/ / skang tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal pa dam pa la// blan med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// bde gshegs mnyam pa med pa bye ba'i phrag/ nyi shu nyi shus yongs su gang bar 'gyur// thos pa
73a4: bya ba'i grangs su 'gro/ / sems can bsam yas yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur// 'thab bral 'khod pa'i lha'i bsam pa rnams// rta thul gyis ni yongs su zhus byas pa// rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yis// lung bstan lha dang
73a5: bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga'/ / 'thab bral ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu drug pa'o// / de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus/ lha ma yin rnams nas/ 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod
73a6: pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos/ 'di snyam du sems te// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig/ ci gzugs sam/ 'on te tshor ba 'am/
73a7: 'on te 'du shes sam/ 'on te 'du byed dam/ 'on te rnam par shes pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan snyam nas// de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzugs
73a8: 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par
