73b1: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ ji ltar byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya// tshor ba dang / 'dra
73b2: shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ de la ji ltar ma skyes pasam skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya// gzugs kyang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub
73b3: kyang 'gag pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ gzugs kyang 'gago pa spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med/
73b4: pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ gzugs kyang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ rnam par shes pa bar yang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang
73b5: g.yo ba med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmigs su med pa/
73b6: byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa na/ ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pas 'gag pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa'i bar du mngon par rdzogs
73b7: par 'tshang brgya par bya/ / de ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs na/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni gang / byang chub sems dpa' ni gang / byang chub ni gang / lung bstan pa ni gang / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshe rab dang / 'du
73b8: shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes pas stong // sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong // byang chub ni byang chub kyi

74a1: ngo bo nyid kyis stong / lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ de ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa la/ gzugs shes bya ba
74a2: dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas shes bya ba dang / yung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni tha snyad tsam/ ming la/ brda tsam// kun rdzob tsam/ brjod ma tsam/ gdags pa tsam ste/
74a3: de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i mi mchi'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi la man 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan ning rdo rtse ba las/ de zhal ba las sa nas
74a4: 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong te/ rjes su dran yang mi rnyed cing / de ltar mi rnyed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang
74a5: byang chub tshe la na de dag byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub ma rnyed cing rom myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu nor ba ste/
74a6: ches de dag gi don ni rnam pa gzhan la/ so so'i skye bo de dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhen to// chos de dag ni de ltar shes par bya ba yin no// de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig
74a7: byang chub sems dpa' yin/ gang zhig byang chub yin/ gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/ de ltar chos thams cad dmigs su med de/ so so'i skye bo yang dmigs su med
74a8: so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med de/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos

74b1: kya dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyang dmigs su med yang rgyas kyad dgas su sa sa byas pad dmigs su med/ byang chu
74b2: dmigs su med/ sdu rnalas 'das pa yang migs su med do// bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag cag zig pom ma mchis/ yid gnyis mas ches so zhes gsol nas dga' ldan po
74b3: khye 'i bu dag cis dag la theg tsam pad ci nam du med pa nga/ bcomalda das la mchod pa rgyaba'i ban pa gas dadag tha mtshan pa
74b4: da pang du 'phags pasabacom ldan 'das mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mag ces phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan
74b5: 'das la lan gsul bskor ba byas tephyogs gcig rngu 'khod/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gi
74b6: pa bad pa/ gangadag sangs rgyasayi na ciganas pa/ de dag 'drig pa dbani/ gshegs pas gzungs/ rnam pa bar gsum sa
74b7: byams/ mtshungs pa med sngon sul sbyid pa byung / gzugs dang tshara'adu shes ma mchis te/ sems dang bsam pa pa'i
74b8: chags med ngom rnam kyi srid du la legs/ mi yi sa ge pung po dben la dgyes/ skye bungs pamakhas pa de dag gi bya

74'a1: sems kyang ma ma / bram dam pa can myo nas/ sangs rgyas dgangs ma thas
74'a2: dedag rgya / pal mchis shing/ byung chub sems padu da/ da
74'a3: mamachis par/ bde gshegs sas rnams sbyang ba spyod pa pagyid/ bdegashegs rnams kyis chos rnams mnyam par gzigs
74'a4: del rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams/ yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing / mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'dan
74'a5: spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma rnam par gzhig bgyis shing / mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad rab spangs// srid pa gsum la dadag/
74'a6: yid ma smin/ dngos po stong par smon lam de dag bgyid/ phung po 'di dag ma skyes rtogs bur cing / lung bstan pad gshegs nyid kyang ma smras pa
74'a7: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes/ de ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis/ skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams/ de dag kun dang bde gshegs ma skyes te/ mi yi seng ge de ltar gang 'tshal
74'a8: ba/ deni khyodasas khyod ni de yi yab/ gang zhig phung po 'gag pa ma mchis shing / khams dang skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos/ byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'di kun 'gag med

74'b1: 'tshal ba dang / gang rnams byang chub 'tshal zhing spyod bgyid pa// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag 'gag ma mchis// 'gro ba thams cad 'gag med thor gyur nA// de 'dra'i blo ldan byang chub rnyed mi dga'/
74'b2: phung po skye mched dag dang khams rnams dang // byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras mi g.yo bar// gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal sras te// de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa lags// phung po sems med de bzhin skye
74'b3: mched dang / / khams dang byang chub rgyal brgyal sras dang // lung bstan de bzhin sems pa ma mchis par/ gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rang 'byung phung po dngos nyid stong pa ste// khams dang skye mched dag/
74'b4: dang rgyal ba dang // byang chub dang ni lung bstan rgyal sras rnams// ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gang spyod dang // phung po spros 'dra de bzhin khams rnams dang // skye mched rkang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang // lung bstan spros
74'b5: pa med par gang spyod tsang / / de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras// gnas pa ma mchis mi gnas ma lags te// mchis pa ma lags ma mchis yod ma logs// 'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags//
74'b6: de ltar gang 'tshalo de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rgyal dang 'gro 'di de ltar yongs mthong zhing // ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal gyur la// de ltar bgyis na gang zag mchog mchod cing // 'dren pa 'khor bcas la ni bsnyen bkur
74'b7: lags/ / rnam par 'dren la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang // de snyed 'jig rten pan mdzad mkhyen pa yi// dge ba de yis 'gro ba rang byung ba// rgyal ba'i mtshan mchog ldan par grub par shog// de nas bcom ldan
74'b8: 'das kyis dga' ldan ras kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la chags su bcad de gsol pa// badren pa rgyu'i stobs ni

75a1: gang zhig gis/ / stobs bcu rnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal gsol/ des ni 'jig rten 'di ni dga' bar 'gyur/ shAkya thub pa'i nal nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gro ba 'dzi/
75a2: mthong the tsom 'tshal gyur te// nyan par 'tshal zhing gzhan du mi sems par// kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i zhal du lta// 'di ltar dper na nang pa nang skyob// sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa// de bzhin 'khor 'di lung bstan rdzo/
75a3: 'tshal zhing // rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhal du lta// 'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen lnga rang ste/ sangs rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan// rgyal bas lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te// kun kyang bde gshegs zhal tu lta zhing
75a4: sdod/ / de la rgyal bas thugs rje che skyed cing // ci nas 'khor 'di rab tu dgar 'gyur dang // sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa bzhog 'gyur bar/ ye shes stobs kyis the rtsom gcad du gsol// mi'i khyu mchog lung bstan dus la bab// the rtsom
75a5: 'tshal ba'i the tsom bskul du gsol/ / sangs rgyas slar sngo'i dgra ni mi mnga' na// rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde ni bzhig du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul
75a6: khyod kyis 'jig rten sgron mdzad la/ / mdzum pa'i don drim de ni dus dang ldan// de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la bris pas na// de ring 'gro ba 'di yi don chen byas// 'jig rten pan phyir 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// gang gis chos rab 'di
75a7: dag shes gyur te/ / ngal mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i// dga' ldan lha'i bsam pa mkhyen nas mdzad// 'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthong // rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid brnyes par 'gyur// gang la 'gro ba thams cad rmongs
75a8: zur ba'i/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgogasum rab tu rtog sa// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag bya byas// bsam pa gcig gis zhu ba legs par zhus// de nyid du ni stong nyid legs par bsgoms// sngon chad byas pa de ni 'dir yang bstan/ de dag de shinag shigs

75b1: deng zang cing / / skyes pa mchog dang 'grogs pa thob gyur nas// stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod byas pas/ de ring 'gro ba'i don chen shin tu byas// 'gro ba thams cad skye med ji bzhin du// byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin
75b2: lung bstan dang / / gang dag zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang // byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med// 'gro ba kun gyi chos nyid 'di 'dra ba// de zhes byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes// lha rnams gang yang de la the tsom med// byang chub
75b3: sems kyis rtag par de ltar spyod/ / de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag med ji bzhin du// lha tshogs 'di rnams rtogs pa'i blo ldan te// mkhas pa 'di dag nem nur med pas na// de phyir 'di dag rgyal ba rang 'byung 'gyur// gnas
75b4: pa med pa la ni nges gyur nas/ / g.yo ba med pa de la nem nur med// 'gro ba kun la sems pa yod min pa// de la'ang lha rnams the tsom yod med do// chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med// byang chub sems
75b5: dang de bzhin byang chub kyang / / thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin mad// de la'ang lha rnams the tsom rnam par dag/ blo mchog ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha 'di rnams// kun kyang gnas med de la rab gnas te// de'i phyir
75b6: ni lha rnams rnyed mi dka'/ / rang 'byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dren pa skar ma 'dra ba'i bskal pa la// 'gro ba mtha' yas rnam par 'grel par 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag mtshan tu gyur pa ni// rang 'byung chos la rnam nges
75b7: rgyal ba'o/ / de ltar rgyal bas dga' ldan lha rnams kyi// bsam pa mkhyen te 'gro la bstan mdzad pa// de thos nas ni lhar bcas 'jig rten yang // yid rangs gyur cing stobs kyang thob par zur//
75b8: dga' ldan pa lang bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu badran pa'o// / de nas de'i tsher rab 'phrul las stsogs pa/ 'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun bcus lha ma yin rnams nas// dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag

76a1: gis mchod pa yang mthong / / lung bstan pa yang thos na tshi shing mgul yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas shing // de bzhin nyid sa the tsom med par
76a2: gyur nas/ / bstan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga'a' der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
76a3: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gas 'tshal ga / chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang / mtha' yas pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnas pa'i mtha' dang / mi zad pa'i
76a4: mtha' dang / mi gnyis pa'i mtha' ste/ mtha' ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de la ma nor pa'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ mtha' yas pa'i mtha'
76a5: zhes bgyi'o/ / chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/ mi gnas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ mi zad pa'i mtha'
76a6: zhes bgyi'o/ / ro gcig pa'i slad du// mi gnyis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ma mchis pa'i slad du/ mtha' ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di na/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba lags
76a7: chos gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste// byang chub gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin ma
76a8: mchis pa ni byang chub lags par rig par bgyi'o/ / than mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste// mtshams med rnams

76b1: kyang rang bzhan ma mchis pa lags pas nga'i spyad du mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub ces brgya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das phung po sa lus mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangs ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa de/ mtshams
76b2: med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni phung po ma lus pa'i kyang na las 'das pa'i dbyings ste/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das gang
76b3: bradag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal ba de dag ni gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te 'khor bar thags pa zhig mchis na ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang btsal bar 'gyur na/
76b4: yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'khor bar zhugs pa gang yang ma mchis ni// de mya ngan las 'das pa ci zhig tshol bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la
76b5: bdag cag som nyi ma mchis/ the tsom ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig chos 'di la nem nur dang // the tsom ma mchis na/ de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
76b6: rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal bar bgyi ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i ris
76b7: kyai g+ha b+ha ba phrag bdun ma ga gi 'ang 'ang bstan pagasan nas/ 'gro ba thams cad la gas ma// de'i tshe 'dzi pas da do// danas pa dang ldan pa tazlab kyig/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs sub
76b8: gsal ba/ / 'jig rten pan par bzhed pas 'dzum pa mdzad// 'tshal pa'i rgyu ni khyod kyis ma bstan te// rang 'brud skyes bladas pa gang dag kyang // rgyus mchis par mdzul pa mi 'dzad pas// khyod kyis zhal

77a1: nas 'dzum pa de mdzad pa/ / mamang nas lhar bcas 'jig rten bcom 'tshal// 'dzum pa'i rgyu de gang lags rang 'byung gsungag/ the tsom 'tshal bar ba com pasngal dru gsal// khyad kyis 'dzum pa mang
77a2: b+hu rdzas zur nas/ / la ladi 'di thams cad dam 'thab par 'gyur// byang chub mtshag na yangs su bsgrubs sra // de dag lam mchog shin tu rnam dag 'gyur// ji tsam 'tshal bdag rten ma du yang//
77a3: byed drub med bzhin pa de bar ma 'grub ste// bcom sam nyaM ba sul nas mkhas pa rnams// byang chub mchog ga d+ha dang ldan 'gyur// rkang gnyis dbang brjid ky-i' bar 'di dag/ sdug pa meng pa
77a4: byang chub sems dang ldan/ / lha rnams lung bstan de dag thos zur nas// rgyal ba'i go 'bar rgya chen thob par 'gyur// debs rgyal bas thugs rje cha bskyed cing // the tsom 'tshal ba rnams la thugs bcu bas/
77a5: tshogs 'di dag thams cad lung bstan cing // 'greb 'di dag thams cad dga' bar badzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang 'anub tu thal latshigs su bcad dasar bga' phrul pa// ngas ni 'dzis
77a6: rten pan phyir 'dzum pa mdzad/ / rta thul khyod kyis zhu ba de zhus pa// lung bstan de ni khyod la ma lus par// bstan par nges byas dang pasakun kyang nyon// 'phrul dga'i ris kyis lha tshogs 'di rnams kyis/
77a7: ma sadas gyun pa ba cag na// gas ga sa pa ldan dag/ da na de pa ga/ yangs pa
77a8: babar mi 'gyur te/ dpa gcos sa pa'i chul thab pa// bdag cag nyid da ga 'byung ba gas// nyi ma du thur nam sras gyur ba ma// sa rnamasas bsrung du 'cha rabar shes/

77b1: rgyal ba'i sras pa'i tshul thob dag/ bdag cag nyid na stabs bcur 'gyur bar shes// skar tshogs dbus na thab gnas pa ni// sems can mtshungs par 'di la the tsom med/
77b2: de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag/ bdag cag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar shes// ji ltar nyi ma nub par gyur pa'i tshe// nyi ma mi mthong sems can de dag shes// de bzhin gshegs pa
77b3: sras po tshul shes pa/ / ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur du shes// chu rlung ji ltar bzhol par bab 'gyur zhing // rgya mtshor 'bab par mkhas pa rnams kyis shes// de bzhin gshegs pa sras po tshul shes pa/
77b4: byang chub brgya chen thos par 'gyur bar shes// ji ltar gnam du bong ba 'phangs pa ni// sa la ltung bar 'gyur du the tsom med// de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang // 'dzag rten mkhas par myur 'gyur la
77b5: shes 'jug/ gang thos nas ni the tsom med 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas yon tan gnas par bdag shes la// bgis sang nye lag stong pam na par// mkhas pa rnams kyi mchos nyid rab tu mthong // gal te bdud
77b6: kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag/ sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur bar chad spras byas kyang // chos la mkhas pa chos nyid rab mthong ba// de dag byang chub las ni bzlog mi nus// de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing /
77b7: bdag gis bdag nyid lung bstan brjod byed pa// de la 'dren pa cho ga tshul mkhyen pa// mi dbang lung bstan de la yi rang mdzad// de ltar lha tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la// gzhan gyi dring la mi mdzeg mngon shes shing /
77b8: de dag bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang sprul// 'jig rten mkhas pa rjes su yi rang mdzad// rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang gis rnams// bla med byang chub thob par byang sems pa// de dag tshul 'di shes par gang gyur pa'i//

78a1: 'phags pa'i skye ba mkhas bsnyen par bya// gang dag tshul la 'jug par dbu mthong shing // mkhas pa gang dag dge ba shes bsnyen bkur ba// de dag byang chub lag mthil 'ang ba bas la// tshul shes
78a2: dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur/ / gdags bskal pa stong du dka' thub spyad// sha brag bags la mi lta byas pa bas// gang gis tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na// de ni byad 'phags dka' thub de ltar min// 'das pa'i rang 'byung /
78a3: gang rnams 'byung ba dang // ma 'ongs sems can phan bzhed gang byung dang // da ltar dus na 'drin pa gang bzhugs dang // kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa thob// rab thul lha tshogs thub pa'i tshul shes pa// 'di dag ngal
78a4: mchod pa mchog byas shing / / 'drin pa thams cad bsnyen bkur rab byas nas// tshul gyis su ni rang 'byung zab par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin gang yin pa// de yid rgyal b.rang 'byung gnas pa'i
78a5: rnams/ / de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul po// tshul thob rnams kyi sngon bsten myur du mthob// de la rta thul sangs rgyas sras rnams ni// sangs rgyas gnas pa'i sa la ni ma nur med/
78a6: sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnams brtseg/ tshul shes pa dag ston pa'i lam la spyod// de ltas tshul la dad pa'i yid byas te// brtsam par bya yi sdug bsngal spyod ma min// rtag tu dge
78a7: bshes mkhas pa brten byas nas/ / me byang chub skar dul papa ltang// bdang ga shegs pa'i gsung mchog ces nas ni// kun rgyal pa'i byang chub mi rangs te// rjes su mi
78a8: me gyur nas/ mthar byin tho gas la ni zhugs par gyur/ 'phrul dga' ba lung snyan pa'i le'u ste badro brgyad pa'o// bam po bdun pa/ denas da m+b+hi'i rgyal pod bangar sgyur la sogs pa/ gnan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi

78b1: thag / zag kyang sa rnam narnamasan/ 'a dga' ya dgags tsud pa yang mdzang // 'du na sa gas dang/ nga sa// / ga
78b2: pa dang yid pade bskyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas pa to// com ldan 'das 'phrul dga'i rnams kyis yang dag pa'i mtha zhes gang smras pa/ de la bad gags ni yang dag yang mid migs na/ dam ma
78b3: 'thos u0f7fda kya'atshal/ / de ci'i mang pa zhe na/ mam ldan 'das gdal la zhig gis yang dag par dmigs na ni mtha' yang dmigs par gyur te/ de ni nyis kyis spyod pa'o// des bran cig pa la yang dag par zhugs
78b4: pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi spyod pa ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la chos rnams ni gnyis su med do zhes mi spyod pa mos na de 'di snyam du bdag
78b5: gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems su lags kyang de ni lam log par zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi ba'o/ / de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub tu smon pa de ni lam log
78b6: par zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang zhig dmigs par gyur na// byang chub
78b7: mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar mi nus so/ / bcom ldan 'das chos ni 'das pa ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags/ 'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags/ dngas ma
78b8: ma lags/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags// mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba yang ma lags la/ chos gang yang spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/

79a1: mngon ba ba ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba da yang chos gang gi gnyen po yang ma lags so// chos gang yang da gnyen po ma lags pa// de tsa'i skad dran na/ ma sa da ni kun nas nyon
79a2: mongs pa ma lags/ rnam par byed pa ma lags te/ gang gis chos gzhan gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i chos de yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs la gang chos de'i gnyen par 'gyur ba'i tshas gzhan de gang yang rang bzhin
79a3: gyis mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/
79a4: bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes zhinam par shes pa'i mtshan ma
79a5: dang bral ba'o/ / gzugs kyi skye ba'i mtshan ma nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba gang lags pa de yang / skye ba'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi 'gag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang lags
79a6: pa de yang 'gag pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma
79a7: dang bral ba'o/ / 'dras ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar tsa tsam du phung pos bzung ba'am/ skye ba dang 'gag pas bzung ba'am/ 'das pas bzung ba 'am/ ma 'ongs
79a8: bas bzung ba'am/ da ltar blang bas bzung ba'am/ 'dus byas kyis bzung ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyis bzung ba de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs te/ de ltar me dmigs pa de ni/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags

79b1: / du / ga ga ga
79b2: prA dang / byung chubams pa dang thag pa la yang dag par 'gas pas / gags la pa byed / dgags ga sa shA
79b3: tshigs su bcad padag gis mngon par bstod pa/ / bcom ldan srid pa mthar 'byin leg par gsungs// 'dren pas sred pa'i snying po sa brnyes nas// skye bo ma mkhas de dag 'jigs pa yis// 'khar po'i
79b4: pha rol bgrod byer rab tu zhugs/ / phung po rnams ni kun tu mi dmigs ste// phung po'i mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid// chos gang gang gis gnyen por 'gyur ba ni// mtshan mas stong te gang yang ma mchis so// dam
79b5: nyid kyis stong byer dngas po gang / / yongs shes bya dang spangs bsgoms mngon byag// gang yang mamachis gang du'ang mi dmigs te// dngas po rnams ni dngas med dang 'byung gsung // byang chub gang yang mtshan ma med dmigs
79b6: te/ / byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams de bzhin no// sangs rgyas gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mas rtogs mi 'gyur// ma mkhas gang dag mtshan mar mngon zhen pa// de dag byang chub
79b7: 'tshang brgyar sems bskyed kyang / mtshan mar spyod cing spyod yul log pa ste// tha gros ngan pa byang chub las mi spyad/ mtshan ma sus spangs sangs rgyas spyod yul la// spyad pa de dgas sargyas
79b8: ban la mkhas/ / mtshan ma de bzhin mtshan ma med spangs te// stong dang mi stong de bzhin dmigs med// mkhas pa de dag byang chub lam la spyod// de dag byang chub dam pa zhi pa thob// pas kyis rgol ba kun gyi spyod yul men// gnam de nyan thos rnams

80a1: 5 da/ sa du ga // 'dun sad/
80a2: de la spyod rdzam med// ga 'bangs de ni mtshan ma stong pa dang / nyi tse stong pa nyid la bskams pa dang // gang rnams snang pa stegapa stong sna dang // chos pan rang bzhin yod smras 'thab rnas// sa saN+Das ma da rnam
80a3: gyi bslab pa la/ / slob dang rnam thal slob pa sgrub pa'i rnams// mkhas dartogs pa med pas byang chub rtogs// sten pas bstan pa bzhin dud gyes pa lags// sangs kyis gang gnyis gcis dang stong dban// 8
80a4: chag bsod nams mi chung gang thob des/ / 'gro ba byang chub dam pa 'tshang brgya zhing // mi shes sbyin mdzad sangs rgyas grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur las
80a5: stsogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcu po de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chung nas/ / skye bo phal po che de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//
80a6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i bsam mkhyen nas// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad pa// thub pas 'dzum pa'i
80a7: d+hU ni ma gsungs na/ / rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol// 'dren pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad ces// rgyal ba khrug mchog dam pas de skad gsungs// 'jig rten don mdzad 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgya//
80a8: 'dren pas bka' stem the tsom bsal du gsol// drang srong chen po'i zhal nas 'dzum rig nas// thub chen khyed kyi 'khor rnams the tsom 'tshal// go'u tam rgyal ba 'dren pas de dag la// 'jig

80b1: rten sman skad 'dzum rgyu lung bstun du gsol/ / 'di dag 'khor ba'i rgyud la rgyab phyogs te// mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis thal sbyar sdod// 'khor 'di yangs pa'i sems
80b2: ldan the tsom 'tshal/ / don yod grangs mnga' som nyi bsal du gsol// bde gshegs bstan la the tsom ma mchis te// phyir zhing dang bskyed rim gro cher bgyid de// the tsom mi 'tshal sems ni grol
80b3: 'gyur bar/ / rgyal bas skye bo'i the tsom legs par khum// bde gshegs bstan la 'di dag pa der gnas shing // gang lam rang 'byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa// lam de nas ni the tsom ma mchis mchi//
80b4: de bas skye bo'i the tsom bcad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ skye bo'i tshogs chen don dbang brten byas nas// tshigs su bcad de dus su
80b5: gang spras shing / / 'dzum pa'i don gyi rgyun yongs zhus pa// khyod kyi tshig ni dus dang ldan pa yin// rta thul dra ba de'i don dris pas// skye bo tshogs chen 'di yi don byas 'gyur// khyod kyis de dris skye bo tshogs chen
80b6: dag/ byang chub mcho ga tu yang dag zhugs par 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pa ngas mkhyen te// rta thul 'dzum pa 'di ni ngas bstan to// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i bstan pa'i lam de nas// don tu gnyer
80b7: ba 'di dag de bzhin 'dod/ / gang gis 'gro ba 'di dag mtshan med par// sdig rgyu la ni ji ltar chu bzhin mthong // byis pa'i rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te// de dag rjes su byang chub 'dod pas bslab/
80b8: mtshan ma'i 'du shes spang daphyir mi rnams gang // rtag tu mtshan ma mngon dga' 'jigs 'gyur zhing // mtshan ma'i 'du shes log pa'i lam du 'dod// mtshan ma med pas byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// med pa'i

81a1: rtog ldan mtshan mar rnam brtags nas/ / ji ltar brtags pa de ltar 'ching ba yin// mtshan ma ba stang par rnam mthos mkhas pa yi// zhi ba dag ni grags dang ldan pa 'thob// 'du shes
81a2: mtshan can mi mnyam sems rgyud kyis/ / sdig pa brgya dag mi mkhas de dag byed// 'gro ba kun la sdug bsngal mi chung myong // de lngar mi mkhas mtshan mar brtag pa byas// mtshan mar 'du shes pa ni phun po dang /
81a3: sangs rgyas byang chub byang chub sems dpa' mthong // de ltar mtshan ma med cing stong mthong na// byang chub gnal med bla na med pa thob// 'du shes mtshan ma can la nyon mongs 'phel// mtshan ma med pa kun tu sbyor ba
81a4: spong / / ma tshan ma las ni kun tu sbyor gzhan med// kun tu sbyor ba de nyid mtshan ma yin// gang rnams byang chub thob par bya rtog pa// rtog pa de nyid mi mkhas par chad yin// mkhas pa'i longs spyod rnam par thob byed na// longs
81a5: snyad de nyid dmatshan ma med par 'gyur/ / chos rnams gang yang rang bzhin nyid kyis med// rnams par rtog pas chos 'byung kun kyang stong // rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur// de nyid byang chub gzhan du ma khas mi/
81a6: sl-i// rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag zos gyur nas// mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khod na btsom pasal// dper na tsam pa'i phreng ba'adzin pa ltar// mkhas rnams thub pas gsum la legs shes 'dzin// 'jigs pa med pa gyu/
81a7: 'di dgagis// mchod pa 'phags pa blan med byas shing // rgyal ba'i spyod yul chos kyang rnam shes nas// 'gro ba rnam par 'dren pa kun pabyen 'gyur// gzhan 'bral dbang byed pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste
81a8: bdu dgu pa'o/ / / de nas tshangs ris kyi lha byed pa phrag drug bcus// lha ma yin rnams nas/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha'i bar dag gis po tshod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang /

81b1: thos nas/ dga' mgu yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas// sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i
81b2: bsam gtan la mi 'dod pa skyes shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di lan snang ba theb ste/ chos zab mo la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa ma yin pa/ ma byas pa yang ma yin
81b3: pa zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/ / de bzhin du ma skyes pa yang ma yin ma skyes pa yang ma yin/ byung ba yang ma yin/ ma byung ba yang ma yin/ grub pa yang ma yin/ ma grub pa yang ma yin/ 'gag pa yang ma yin/ ma 'gags
81b4: pa yang ma yin/ gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin/ rnam par byed pa yang ma yin/ rjes su chags pa yang ma yin/ khong khro ba yang ma yin/ rmongs pa yang ma yin/ ma rmongs
81b5: pa yang ma yin/ shes pa po yang ma yin/ shes pa po med pa yang ma yin/ mthong ba po yang ma yin/ mthong ba po med pa yang ma yin/ tshor ba po yang ma yin/ tshor ba po med pa yang ma yin/ ston pa po yang ma yin/ ston pa po med pa
81b6: yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ dngos po yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa yang ma yin/ dmigs pa yang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa yang ma yin/ 'gro ba yang ma yin/ 'ong ba yang ma yin/ sod meng mi yi/
81b7: 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ stong pa yang ma yin/ mi stong pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa yang ma yin pa/ mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin/ smon pa yod pa yang ma yin/ smon pa med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de dag de ltar
81b8: chos thams cad la yod mi gnas pa'i yid kyis/ de dag mid la yang mi gnas/ tha snyad la yang mi gnas/ brjod pa la yang mi gnas te/ de dag ni brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ brjod du med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/

82a1: bya ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin//
82a2: so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i chos
82a3: kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes
82a4: can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos
82a5: kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin// mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin
82a6: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te/ de ltar thams cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can nam mkha' bzhin
82a7: du dag ci dgos pa med par gyur nas/ / de rnams par dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir de'i tshe de dag zhi bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad bdag gis mngon par god ga// zhi la zhi ba'i thugs mnga' zhi ba spyad cing ni
82a8: pha rol tu byon/ / zhib bsten par mdzad cing 'gro lazhi ba bskon pa rjes su ston// zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub zhil dri bral 'khrugs ma mchis// khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur tu ba rnyo ya// zhi ba

82b1: thob pa gyid pa zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag bsten/ / yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs glong rnams zhi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad bton// sngon gyi rgyal bas bsten pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god// de bsten
82b2: sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar dang zhes gsung / / 'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bstan// gal te bslab pa de bslob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas 'thob/
82b3: bslabs nas zhi zhing yid zhi zhi ba'i lam dod dbang po zhi ba dag/ 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro bzhi byed mtha' chen zhi ba shes par 'gyur// 'dren pa khyed kyi sras mchog zhi ba 'gro bzhi bgyid gang dag gis/ 'chi med zhi ba
82b4: mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa/ / de dag 'dren pa tshul la mkhas pa mchod pa mchog gis mchod 'gyur ba'i// nyon mongs zhi zhing mtshan ma kun spangs zhi ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad zhi
82b5: zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das/ / thub pa gang dag zha la zhi 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab// thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rgal ba de la
82b6: bdag cag dogs ma mchis/ / gang dag phung po bor te byang chub zhi pa tshol de la zhi bar rtogs// phung pos 'jigs pa de dag shAka kya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags// de dpon blo gros ldan pa bzhi tshol de dag blo 'khrug
82b7: gyur pa ste/ / chos kyi mtshan ma spyod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsungs// thams cad mkhyen pasazhi dang mtshan me'i 'ching ba 'di dag gsungs// thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam pa kun tu mtshan/
82b8: me ba rnyed// de dag shaka kya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag mtshan med dga'// de dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par 'gyur// bdud kyis rtsod las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba'i thams

83a1: cad mkhyen pa 'thob/ / rnam 'dren zhib mdzad la bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa// chags med thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur pa// des ni 'gro ba
83a2: thams cad lam mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa/ / zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pas mchod pa'i rang 'byung sdig med shog/ de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa rnams dang / lha rnams
83a3: kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas/ bdag nyid kyis/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod ga mi dbang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni/
83a4: log pas rmongs byed chad pa stong 'dra zhing // ston gyi sprin 'dra mig 'phrul 'dra bar mkhyen// rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen// ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas// kha zas ro brgya zos
83a5: kyang ma 'drangs pa/ / de la kres med zas med sems can med// rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs// skom pa'i mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na// chu bsil dang zhing rnyog pa med 'thungs gyur//
83a6: do mas med tsha bzhi par mi 'gyur te// de bzhin khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs// 'di la byed med tshor med sems can med// byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med// 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ba de med
83a7: ces/ 'di 'dra'i chos nyid the tsom yongs mi mnga'// mi zhig yid du 'ongs pa'i tshig smra na// dga' bar gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med// tshig nyid med cing dgar 'gyur dngos kyang med// de mkhyen de la the tsom
83a8: yod mi mnga'/ / pi wang sgra snyan mnanan snyan te// sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod pa min// de ltar mkhas pas phung po 'di gzigs na// phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'// nor bu rin chen

83b1: rang bzhin gsal dag pa/ gos kyi drung bzhag sa tshogs tshon du 'gyur// de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang // log pa'i rnam par rtog/
83b2: pas de ltar gyur/ tsanA dan dri med skyon dang thAlA ba yadad+ma/ rkyen dung spya na cinim gzhan du 'gyur/ des rang bzhin stongs dag rjes rnams kyang /
83b3: so sor rang gis brtags pa'i rnam pa bzhin/ ji ltar mi yis dung gi sgra thos te// sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtags byas kyang // rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i dngos po de mi dmigs
83b4: pa/ mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ ji ltar mi zhig bsod pa'i 'azlas la/ yan lag sog pa ning kar 'gyur brtags na// dngos med pan
83b5: lag srog kyang de bzhin te/ drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ ji ltar mi zhig nam mkha'i 'anga' mthong na/ yan lag gzhigs brtags
83b6: rang bzhin med cing song / nam mkha'i 'ja' na/ khyod kyi yan la gastong/ dang srong chen po de bzhin chos kun gcigs/
83b7: mchog kyang yan pa ga rnam gzhigs na/ thong bye nga bzhini de bzhin ming mi dmigs/ thong ze bzhini de gang yan lag nga/ ming

84a1: khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ bskyes bu dga' ba rnga zhig bzungs bgyis na// dag kyang sna'i rang bzhin sang //
84a2: smra bzhin de ltar yan lag stong / mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ skyes bus ji ltar dzad brdungs pa'i tshe/ sgrani phyogs su mi gro lu
84a3: phyogs su de bzhin 'gag par mi 'gyur te/ mi dbang la ni khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ skyes bu de de bzhin ji ltar rnga brdungs pa
84a4: thogs pa med pa'i cing snyan pa'i rang bzhin/ / khyod kyis yan lag dza de dang 'dra/ da kyi yan lagang skad dang ma dang
84a5: khyod kyi sa de bzhin mos kun gzigs/ sbrus zas ji ltar rje brdungs paska des 'jig rten dga' byang rtog pa med/ de ma bzhin
84a6: dza~M ska bzhin khyod kyi yan lag snang / / mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs// skyes zas ji ltar rje brdungs @/ g.yo ba med cing ni ba'i da
84a7: kyang med/ / ji ltar nga bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rjed brdung ba'i tshe// gso ba med cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang med// jigapa

84b1: sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong / / mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe// sgra de yan lag ma byung rang
84b2: dbang mini/ / ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs ris kyis lha de dag dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
84b3: de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud cing zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i stong pa des de ltar bstod pas 'khor de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsegs par gyur par gzigs nas/ / de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de
84b4: nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ / shAH thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad de med dag mthong nas// lhar bcas mi bcas kyu dang gnod sbyin bcas pa'i
84b5: 'jig rten kun/ / skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'gro ba the tsom 'tshal// bde gshegs zhal bzangs de la lta zhing thos par dga' ste stod// rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad legs par bka' stsal
84b6: bcom dgum du gsol/ / rnam par 'dren pa thub mchog kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams// rgyu ma mchis par 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad ma mthong na// bde gshegs khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum mdzad the tsam rgya
84b7: de gsungs/ / rgyal ba'i 'dzum mdzad cu thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di the tsom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te khyod la sems// bde gshegs thub pa'i gsung mchog tho tsom gcod pa nyan 'tshal na// rnam 'dren thub pas

85a1: 'dzum mdzad rgyud de de dag rnams la gsungs/ / thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tsom ma mchis par ye ra 'gyur// 'khor 'di snying po ldan zhing rnyog med sangs rgyas yon gtan 'tshal// ston pa
85a2: khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes pa 'dra la lta/ / 'dren pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra ba'i gsung bsgrags gsel// de thos 'khor rnams the tsom chad cing chos la gnas par 'gyur// khyod kyis tshangs pa'i
85a3: gsungs mchog don ldan 'jig rten 'das rig nas/ / skye bo dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid ldan thams cad mkhyen pas tshim// de dag dogs bsngal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen tu sgrub// brtson 'grus stobs ce na/
85a4: bskyed nas mos pa stobs ldan rtsom par bgyid// de lta lags pas 'jig rten dren pa pan mdzad gsung bsgrags gsol// rkang gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mi g.yo thos nas de yis ni// dge ba thob pa'i 'khor 'di thams
85a5: cad mkhyen tu sems 'gyur bar/ / stobs bcu mda' ba 'gro ba kun la phan pa lags par dgongs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/
85a6: thul nga yis pa na byed 'dzum pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa// rtse gcig yid kyis snyan cing bsdigs pa mdzes par de ni mnyan par byos// de thos 'gro ba yon tan bsags pas myur tu 'jig rten don byed pa// phan dang
85a7: ldan pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas bka' stsol de la brtson 'grus tshom/ / tshangs pa kun 'khor 'di dag dga' zhing chos rnams la ni the rtsom med// bskal pa khrag khrig gang ga'i bye snyed dge ba legs par spyad// kun tu rnam par
85a8: dag la ma chags yid gyur 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste/ / de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang brgya sems ma bskyed// 'di dag ma 'ongs dus na bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya gzhal yis pa// gang ga'i bye

85b1: skyed na dul pas la thams cad mkhyen pa'i skabs la gnas/ / de dag phyi nas pade bar gshags pa che ldan sangs rgyas 'dun cig/ sred pasal cad 'gro bstong par stan pa'i bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur/
85b2: ston pa de dag ji ltar spyod pa su tshe tshad kyang de ltar 'gyur// bde ga shegs mtha' yas grags ldan 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'grol cing gnas par 'gyur// de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhing ni zhing gis 'gyur
85b3: gzha' yas te/ / 'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal pa khrag khrig rnam pa du mar ni// sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnams kyis gsungs kyang de dag bkod par zad ma nus// de tshad dag ye shes stabs ldan zhes bya'i rgyal
85b4: bar mthun par 'gyur/ / g.yo ba med cing sems med mi gnas chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur// de dag zhing mchog rnams sa skyob pa'i thams cad mkhyen lam sbyangs pa'i// sems can gcig kyang mi 'byung srid
85b5: pa de la phal cher mya ngan 'da'/ / de dag na ni de tshe 'gro ba de dag/ sdug bsngal gcig shes te// mi rtag 'dra byed sdug bsngal rab tu 'jigs pas sems can yid 'byung ba'o// de na 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang sdug
85b6: ni sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yod mi 'gyur/ / de dag thams cad blo 'thun 'gyur zhing sla pa'i lam la myur bar 'gyur// de nas mi rnams dag gi sgra skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur// mi sdug mi rtag de
85b7: bzhin nyid dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang / / zhi ba stong nyid mtshan med 'chi med mya ngan 'das dang byang chub zhi// sgra skad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag rna la gnas par 'gyur// sgra gang thos
85b8: nas de dag 'khor bar grol gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba/ de 'dra'i sgra de shing dam cig pa dag dang gang na'ang yod mi 'gyur// tha gab med dang mkha' dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang rnams na med//

86a1: sangs rgyas mtha' yis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'thung // de tshe 'dres pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams kyi nar ni dag par
86a2: sgra grags 'gyur/ 'gro ba thams cad 'khor bar las ni 'byung zhing mya ngan 'das 'gror 'gyur// de tshe zhing mchog stong pa thams cad dga' ba'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal pa khrag
86a3: khrig byang chub brtson byas nas/ / drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di brtsams te/ zhing mchog de na sems can tshogs gang yod pa de kun bde gshegs 'gyur// tshangs pa'i smon lam yangs
86a4: pargya chen zhib 'gro bas mthong gyur na/ / ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis bsnyen gyur pa// de la bslabs nas 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa med pa'i 'dren par 'gyur// de dag rgyal
86a5: thob nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ston/ / de lta bas na tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spyod pa bsten par bgyis// / tshangs pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas
86a6: 'od gsal gyi lha bye ba phrag lnga bcu brtsa brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams nas tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha de dag gis mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ chom zhing mgus yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
86a7: yid bde bas skyes nas/ bstan las langs te/ thagos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das
86a8: la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang la bslabs pa'i sa chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis

86b1: te/ des nas chos thams cad kyi tshugapa 'jug pa brtogs par bgyid do// de rtogs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa
86b2: dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / dge ba'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / nye bar gyur pa'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / thun
86b3: mongs ma yin pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa de yang thob par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
86b4: sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du/ rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa thams cad yid la mi bgyid de// de 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa med de rnam par rtog pa
86b5: yongs su chad pa'o/ / gang rnam par rtog mi rtog pa de ni thams cad du song ba ste/ chos gang yang rnam par rtog par nus pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ chos gang rang bzhin
86b6: ma mchis pa ste de la ji ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog par a la 'jug pa'i spobs pa rab tu 'thob cing de dag a'i sgo la zhugs pas spobs pa mtha' yas par gyur te/ a zhes
86b7: bgyi ba'i ni mtha' yas pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ ma bgyis pa/ mngon par 'dra ma bgyis pa/ yongs su ma gyur pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi g.yo' ba/ 'du ba ma mchis pa/ 'phro ba ma mchis pa/ rtog pa ma
86b8: mchis pa/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ ma bsgrubs pa/ yongs su thug pa ma mchi smra/ ma rtags pa/ gzugs ma mchis pa/ bstan tu ma mchis pa/ bltar ma mchis pa/ ma mthong ba/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ rnam par

87a1: mi gnas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ ma smos pa/ ma bstan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ song ba ma mchis pa/ 'ongs pa ma mchis pa/ nye ba ma lags gding ba ma lags pa/
87a2: pa/ gdags pa ma mchis pa'i chos can/ ming ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa/ gnyen po ma mchis pa/ sgrib pa ma mchis pa/ 'pho ba ma mchis pa/ 'khrug pa ma mchis pa/ brtag tu ma mchis pa/ mi zad pa/ gnyis su ma mchis
87a3: ba/ ma byung ba/ brdzun ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ sho bi ma lags pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ sbyangs pa ma lags pa/ spyad par 'os pa ma lags pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa/ mtshan mas ma baspyod pa// ma bzung
87a4: ba/ ma bor rab/ 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ gtad du ma mchis pa/ yongs su btang du ma mchis pa/ ma btang ba/ yongs su ma btang ba ste/ a zhes bgyi ba ni sus kyang ma bgyis pa/ chos gang gi
87a5: gnyen po yang ma lags so/ / a ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang yang skye bar bgyid pa ma lags so// a ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang gis skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so// a ni ma 'gags pa ste/ chos gang gis
87a6: 'gag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba 'ang ma lags so/ / a ni ma 'gag pa yang ma lags pa ste/ chos gang gi mi 'gag pa'i rkyen tu gyur pa ma lags so// a ni gnas pa yang ma lags/ mi gnas pa yang ma lags/ a ni brtags
87a7: pa yang ma lags/ ma brtags pa yang ma lags/ a ni spangs pa yang ma lags/ mablangs pa yang ma lags/ a ni shes pa yang ma lags/ ma shes pa yang ma lags/ a ni dmigs pa yang ma lags/ mi dmigs
87a8: pa yang ma lags/ a ni stong pa yang ma lags/ mi stong pa yang ma lags/ a ni dmigs su mchis pa yang ma lags/ dmigs su ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ a ni mtshan ma yang ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang

87b1: ma lags/ a ni smon pa yang ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni a'i tshul lo// chos thams cad ni tshul gcig pa ste a'i tshul lo//
87b2: chos thams cad ni 'gro ba gcig pa ste a ni 'gro ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'jug pa gcig pa ste a la 'jug pa'o// chos thams cad ni gdags pa gcig te as gdags pa'o// chos thams cad ni tha snyad gcig pa
87b3: ste a'i tha snyad do/ / chos thams cad ni brjod pa gcig ste as brjod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang yang ma skyes pa de dag rtogs par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang yang ma
87b4: byung ba de dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o/ / chos gang ma grub pa de dag ni mthub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma 'gags pa de dag ni 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o//
87b5: bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'dum bgyis pa de dag ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi ste de ni chos thams cad kyi tshul lo// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag gi tha snyad ji ltar
87b6: rtogs par bgyi zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam na bya ba sna tshogs 'byung ba de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi bya ba ni ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ dngos po ma mchi
87b7: pa ste/ / 'on kyang de dag la gdags par gsungs so// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi byed pa yang 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ khrag cha la tha snyad mis pa/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyitha
87b8: snyad kyang lta bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gdags par lta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ smig rgyu la chab

88a1: du gdags pa'i tha skad ma mchis pa de bzhin du ches thams cad kyi sa spyad blta bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'dis skye dper na me 'dzag dkyil 'khor la zud med kyi gzugs pa skyes pa'i gzug
88a2: kyi tha skad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i srad rmi lam byatha ba ba stang du bgyi'o// rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag na ma mchis so//
88a3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du mig yor dang smig rgyu dang brag cha'i bya ba dag kyang tha snyad du bgyi ste brag cha la bya ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag gis bcom
88a4: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de skad ces gsol nas 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
88a5: la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par btod pa/ / bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan tu gsungs/ thub pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras nams rnam par rol pa'ang de
88a6: bzhin no/ / de la 'jig rten blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis khod mi chud// bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong // sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis la chab kyi 'du shes can
88a7: khyim pa de dag tho log de bzhin 'phrul te bdag tu sbyor babagyid/ / de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos la ten kyang 'tshal// de bzhin byis pa'i skye bo sprin nu 'dra ba'i phung po yod ma 'tshal// 'khor
88a8: bar dga' bas zug rngus thug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang po 'das/ / gang la ma mkhas nges par sdug bsngal myong ba de la dngos ma mchis// tho stong yid nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor ba la/

88b1: nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang drug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'brang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug drug chen nyon mongs mtshungs med rjes su 'thung / da ba ga shi gas tha/
88b2: sdug bsngal ba// de rnams de dag rjes su 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa'i khur yang khyer// de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar bar bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos na// skyes bu ngan pa zlo zhan de dag bstan
88b3: dag bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs/ / bde gshegs khyod kyis a'i yi ge'i tshul chen te sgo gcig de ltar bstan// de la yang dag blo can sa las shing skyes bzhin du yid bskyed cing // bdud rnams bye ba dpung dang
88b4: bcas btul byang chub zhi mngon par 'tshang rgya/ / yan lag brgyad pa'i gru bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol// bde bar gshegs pa cad mkhyen nges pa rnams ni gyis tshul gyi dam pa des// myur du nyon mongs
88b5: ga pa sa la byang chub dpag yas zhi ba 'thob gyur cing / / grol nas dug med gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes nas// pha rol myur phyani dug med pade zhing gdug pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad//
88b6: bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtogs rnams tshul dang tshul min rtogs// 'gro ba kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa dang tshul dang tshul min pa slabs pa dag/ grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo
88b7: nyid kyi chos/ / de'i tshul mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur// 'ching dang bcings pa med cing bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med// de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin ma nor de bzhin nyid
88b8: zhi mi 'dag nyon mi mongs/ nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi mdzad byed med la nyon mongs rnams kyang med// gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad mkhyen tu 'gyur// 'grol zhing 'grol mdzad zhi ba'i//
88b9: chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'// bcom ldan lhar bcas 'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul pa ste// kun rtogs bdag nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtogs// 'gro ba

89a1: ma ga las byams pas da/ las dang yus pa med rlog rgyu byung pa// man
89a2: ga sa na dus / da la
89a3: btod pas bsod nams gang byung ba/ de rnyed dpa sdug rka gnyis gas pas na pa phyin mongasasu mnyan pa byung ba // bdag cag ga mas kri ba 'di ban pan mnyin nyid na /
89a4: rnams 'dis na 'gro ba kun gyi don pa sngoldan kyang rgyal bar shog// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyi lci bye ba de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / rgyam kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spos pa zan
89a5: sum tshogs pa yang thugs su chud 'a 'o de gis kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta bral gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
89a6: bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad mkhyen zil gnon pa/ bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// rgyal ba dpa' stug rkang gnyis
89a7: mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol/ / 'jig rten 'das khyod ci srid 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs// gtso ba de thos 'gro ba de sa dag yidi na rab tu dang 'brur shing // rnam na
89a8: rnam par 'dren pa des 'thung las dang 'bras bu gzhal yas bgyid par 'gyur/ / deng ni lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyams thag 'di// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad bstan sred par

89b1: rgyamatsho'adi sas sabar 'gyur/ / drang srong chen po gsung mcheg yan lag brgyad ldan cad ze 'dathas nas// 'greb thams cad mkhyen rgyas nyid 'tsham dan brtson dang dga' bar 'gyu/
89b2: the tsom bral gyur rnam dag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i stobs skyed cing / bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang mthun 'byung sras su 'gyur// 'khor rnams 'di dag brten pazhanam mchis
89b3: 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal tu skye/ / 'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bskul zhing lung bstan bka' stsal gsol// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi na ring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal// gsung rab lem
89b4: brjod bdud rtsi'i char phob gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar 'gyur/ / 'dren pa chen po khyod kyis 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal// ring du song ba'i ma la la bu lta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du lta// bde gshegs
89b5: lha rnams lung bstan bka' stsol bzhad pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol/ / skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos nas 'jig rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur// thub pa de ring su zhig dge ba 'phel cing grags pa don du gnyer/
89b6: su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur ba bdag cag de na pa 'am la/ rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos zhing dgar gyur nas// tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang
89b7: bsgom par 'gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta rdul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyi spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu legs// bdag shes/
89b8: rnam par rdzu bad nga kyang bya sa khris srung chur shig/ rjel pa chung kying gang dang ga da/ tsad kyis dus gyur ba// dadag nga ga nangs pa ga can ci dang brnams pa na ma /

90a1: 'od gsal ba'i lha rnams blo dge sngon gyi rgyal bas mthong ba ste// 'jig rten mgon med yid can 'di dag mthong nas byang chub yang dag zhugs// byang chub nges 'byung la ma mchog yang
90a2: dag rgyal bas spyang spyod pa/ / byang chub 'gro 'dod gang tshe ston med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur// tshul gyi dam pa shin tu gsal sgra thun mongs ma yin 'di thos na// sangs rgyas yon tan dan
90a3: blo sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi thob 'gyur/ / de dag stobs skyes tshul dang tshul myin mkhas shing byang chub yid nges gyur// bu skyes ma bzhin dga' bas byang chub tu mchog tu dka' de dag smon lam btab// 'od gsal
90a4: lha rnams 'di dag byang chub 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan te/ / bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan byas nas// sems can skar ma'i grangs pas ches mang ba dag byang chub dga' byas ste/
90a5: de'i 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang 'byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur// de dag zhing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya bgrangs par// yangs shing shin tu dga' ba mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis
90a6: brgyan pa ste/ / kun kye zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin mi khom yongs mi 'byung // bde bar gshegs rnams thugs brtses sems can thams cad rang 'byung mdzad par 'gyur// zhing rnams de dag gang 'ang nyan thos
90a7: theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te/ / sems can thams cad rang 'byung nyid du ngon phyogs phyogs pa med par 'gyur// den rang 'byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyis// sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa
90a8: byeb brgya grangs gang ga'i bya snyed 'gyur/ / rta thul 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan pos mya ngan bzlas pa bas// gang yang skyes pa 'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas ni// bsod nams

90b1: dal sngamam grangs sam dper gya bya bar mi nus so/ / de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes budam pa byang chub dga' bar bgyis// rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba snyed sde min// de ni u dum pa ra'i me tog
90b2: 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mangs gsungs/ / de phyir bla na med pa'o zhi ba de byang chub mi gar 'dod pa yis// shin tu blo phra bsten bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'drin la bsten par bya// de bzhin shes
90b3: kyi zhal nas don byed gsungs dag de 'dra thos gyur nas/ / 'khor rnams thams cad yid rangs mchog tu dag 'a zhing yang dag dga' bar 'gyur// zag khrig lha rnams rnam mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi ga yab mo 'ang
90b4: bar byed/ / dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung // zhi ba thugs zhe skye bo nyon mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi bar mdzad// bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can
90b5: dug ni skrag du gsol/ / khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skye dgu drug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur// sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'drin las tshul thos mi bzang srid pa'i rgyud las grol// 'od gsal ba lung bstan
90b6: ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o/ / / bam po brgyad pa// / de nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis/ lha ma yin rnams nas 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gis
90b7: mchod pa yang mthong / / lung bstan pa yang thos nas/ tshim ning mgul yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas// bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur ba yang brjod/
90b8: cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa'

91a1: sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshe rab mi myong la sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang mi myong ste/
91a2: sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / lag pa bcad dam/ rkang pa bcad dam/ rkang lag
91a3: cad dam/ rna ba'am sna'am rna ba dang sngag pas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sba lcag gis zhus sam/ swa cag byed tshal lam lpagra gis bzhus kyang bde ba'i 'dra shas nya bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / btson
91a4: rarabacug pa 'am lcag sgrog dang / shing sgrog du bcug gam/ rtson chas dam po la rgyas btab 'am byis pa'i bcug phud ltar bcings sam/ dug gi snod ltar gdu gras ma/ bu ram gyi shing ltar zhungs pa ltar brdungs sam/ 'dam bu gzhom pa ltar
91a5: bcom 'am 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam/ mar gyi mar me dang zhe skol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde bI 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / me'i nang du bor ba'am/ se dge'i khar stabs sam/ stag/ ge khar stab sa ma skam ri la bya ba ltar
91a6: dril tam khyi bo'i chad pa gabus bcad dam/ nyes byung bsgrag pa ltar sgra ga sa ma/ kar sha pa na tsam tu btubs sam/ 'bras phye btso ba ltar btses sam/ glang po che nam kyi bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / mig byung dmagasal
91a7: shing gi rtse mo la bzhag gam/ / gsad pa'i gnas su khrod de rnam pa thams cad du mgo bcod kyang / bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yang ma lags/
91a8: bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring por nas spyad pa/

91b1: smad par ma sman lam 'ad skar btab sa gdags bdag la khabs byin par dag nye bar naba' ba 'arlab par gyur ga/ gangags bdag la stemathung pa de dag dang / gang gas bdag par ma 'gro byas pa
91b2: bkur ba stir byas pa dang / bsti star byas pa dang / mchod pa zlas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar na pa'i bad ba ze bgyur gyi// gang yang bdag lags pa dang / mi bdab byed pa dang / rdeg pa dang / mchon kyi
91b3: pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur gcig ces
91b4: smon lam btab ste/ / de yid la bya ba de dag dang ldan zhing de lta bu'i las dang / de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bde ba'i 'du shes la rten cing bsnyen la sgom zhing mang du
91b5: byed de/ de la de'i rnam par smin pas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob po// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'as chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe
91b6: bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi 'phrog shing mi 'khrug par gyur to/ / de'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba ste/ dbang lnga thob
91b7: par rig par bya'o/ / de 'tshal na tshe rjes ma thag tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de 'tshal na bskal pa grangs ma mchis par gnas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
91b8: chen po de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu bsal pa dang // 'gro ba drug po kun

92a1: tu skyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la bslabs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pas dang ldan pa dang / bdud kyi las las rnam
92a2: par rgyal ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chud par bgyi ba'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la nges pa'i rtogs pa thob par 'gyur ba thams cad ni de bzhin
92a3: gshegs pa'i mthu'o/ / de nas dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di brjod nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos la
92a4: mthar thug gyur pa ste/ / ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi ba mkhyen la mgo bos skyabs su mchi// de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i sangs rgyas don mkhyen 'khor brgal gyur pa// thub pa mi'i 'dren pa tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren
92a5: pa 'dren la ston/ / 'di na rang bzhin nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa na'ang ma mchis te// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu mji bzhin khyod kyis thub pa legs par mkhyen// yan lag sna tshogs smra ba rnyan ri khrod 'byung ba mkhas
92a6: ngar rtogs pa ltar/ / de bzhin bde gshegs drang srong khyod kyis lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzigs// 'di na sems can srog dang shed bu gso ba gang zag ma mchis te// mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par
92a7: bshig cing stong pa rnam gzhag la/ / rkang gnyis dam pa sems can gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzad// rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'// byams pa dge bsgom
92a8: sems can dmigs pa yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal pa/ / sems can rnams par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen// de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga' the tsom bral thugs ldan//

92b1: des na bde gshegs nam sags tha mnga' mched las khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun kyang mi dmigs kyang // lha'i lga gyur khyod kyis sems can
92b2: rnams la snying rje bgyi ba gsungs/ / de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i da ga // nges ni gang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang
92b3: bas la'i sdug bsngal me gzigs la/ / dgyes bskye nas rab tud rtses pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par gsal// de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal// des na mi mchog byed
92b4: la mchod nas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi/ / skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das mi dmigs// 'on kyang 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa byed//
92b5: sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis// sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal// 'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing
92b6: de yang gnyis su med par bstan/ / gang zhig der dul ma gzigs pa yang tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs// thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs bag yod mi yang ma gzigs te// sangs rgyas tshul
92b7: 'di 'tshal nas thub pa ston pa khyod la mchod par bgyis/ / thub pa'i sku ni rnam par spangs par sku rtsal mdzad nas ma brnyes kyang // de ltar 'dren pa dran pa ma gsungs ma lags bsnyel ba yod mi mnga'// bde bar
92b8: gshegs pa ya la song ba'i bsgom pa sgom par bgyis zhes gsungs/ / sangs rgyas tshul 'di ga nas bde bar gshegs pa skyob la mchod pa bgyis// 'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad darnyes par

93a1: man+dA sa/ rag bang brnyed pa thub pas yangs rba N+Dal nam / !// Sh+Tha/ gang gag dun bskam nasangs rgyas kyis kyang yongs pa gags// sa sa d+ha sa nal 'dal
93a2: nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis/ / thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal nam pa rnyes la// gang gis nye bar bzhag pa de yang dran pa med par rab mkhyen kyang // thar pa
93a3: 'dod pa rnams kyis sems 'dus dran pa sgoms par gyis zhes gsungs/ / bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di 'tshal nas ni stan la mchod par gyis// 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas chos
93a4: dang chos la gang spyod de ma gzigs/ / bsgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang 'di na rang bzhin ma mchis la// thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa bsgom par bgyis shes gsungs// sangs rgyas
93a5: tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyob la mchod par bgyis/ / gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum 'am bzhi lta ga la mchis// gang gi gnas su brjod pa'i dran pa gang na'ang ma mchis te/
93a6: des gang bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba yang dag gang na'ang de ma mchis// ston pa'i tshul 'dis 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// ston pa'i tshul mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong
93a7: gang dag 'dzin bgyid na/ / 'di dag thar pa nyid kyi lam star 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcings ma grol byang chub 'dren pa man// bcom ldan 'das kyis brtags
93a8: gnodas na byad la ma dzad par 'chas/ / tha mdzad srid du bcom ldan 'das kyis la pa'i la nang pa gsungs// 'di dag pag mas na ma rnams dpang ba dul shing mya na 'da' bar 'gyur/

93b1: yang dag dran rdzu 'phrul dang na rkang dang brnams pas dmigs te// dad par ma 'gyur byaba'ang nan cing byed pa pa yang ma gas pa/ thams cad mabyan tu brtan 'das gachogs can da nga /
93b2: 'dam mchis te// de dag de la nam rung ba mchis de bzhin mam nyi ma mchis zur// 'di ni mchod pa bzang po mchog ces mchod 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ des na bde gshegs dpa' mang
93b3: spyod mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ / thar bar mdzad skad 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang po lnga yang gsungs// rtag tu bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lam 'di sgo mos shes stan/
93b4: thub pa dbang po dang ni sgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te// 'di la lha 'khor the tsom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod par 'tshal// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po//
93b5: de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid thar par bgyid ces ston pathub pas gsungs// de dag rang bzhin ma mchis nyon mongs ma mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te// thu bdag cag gang la'ang the tsom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod/
93b6: byang chub yan lag bdun po 'di dag dge ba lam gyi dam pa ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drang lam mchog ces thub pas gsungs// 'ching ba mchis pa ma lags grol ba ma mchis bcings pa'ang /
93b7: ma mchis te// sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tsom ma mchis khyod la mchod// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis bzhi phrag gnyis lam sems can rnams la bstan// brtson 'grus ldan pa 'phags
93b8: lam sdug bsngal mtha' mar 'byin pa bsgom shes gsungs/ / mi mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis g.yo ba ma mchis te// 'di la lha tshegs the tsom ma mchis thub pa mchod 'os khyod la mchod//

94a1: 'dod chags gnyen mo ni gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs// gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems can rnams la bstan// 'di dag thams cadags
94a2: ba ma mchis pa skad cig dag min nyon mongs min/ / 'di la lha tshogs the tsom ma mchis thub pa mchod slad rtag tu brtson// sdug bsngal zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong lam yang sgoms shes gsungs/ bcom ldan gang
94a3: gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas dri de dag zhi/ / thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong bde ni dri ma thams cad stong pa ste// 'di la lha tshogs gang du'ang the tsom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod// stobs bcu'i sems can
94a4: rnams la dge babacu yi las la lam 'di bstan mdzad de/ bsod dang 'khrig dang ma byin phra ma brdzun dang zhe gcod kyal tshig dang // gnod sems dang ni mi rigs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtogs pa rnams// mi dge
94a5: las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la bstan/ / sems can mi dmigs gas pa lta ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra// gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/
94a6: bde gshegs thub pa zag pa mi mnga' rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong // rnam 'dren the tsom som nyi ma mchis de slang khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// sangs rgyas sras po dge ba'i blo can gang zhig spong ba 'di bsten pa//
94a7: mkhas pa kun tu dge ba nyid myong sdug bsngal myong bar yod mi 'gyur// bcom ldan pade gshegs ye shes des ni tshul 'di bde bar thob par bgyis/ 'di la lha tshogs the tsom ma mchis mchod ngos khyod la mchod par
94a8: 'tshal/ / de ltar dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ cad mi zer bar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge rgyas kyi lha rnams cad mi zer bar 'khod pa yang mkhyen/

94b1: de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa yang thugs su chung nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ta thal gyis bcom ldan 'das latshigs su ba cad de gsol pa// rtswab 'ad ban patsa
94b2: ldan khyod kyis mkhyen pa'i zis gyis zil gnan nas/ bde gshegs rgyal ba mchog khyod kyis ni 'dzum pa pase gtan ldan// rgyum mchis par chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzugs mi dun/
94b3: 'dzum rgyu don gnyer rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas da bka' stsal gsol// ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod// dpal sbugs khyod la lhod par bgyid
94b4: cing nyan par 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas/ / sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos nas yid ni rab tu rangs gyur te// chos rnams kun la nges pa'i blo dge ldan pa'i ston par skye bar 'gyur// bde gshegs mi mchog
94b5: dge ba'i thugs can de ring su zhig blo gros bskyed/ / de ring gang gis 'chi med zhi ba rtogs shing phyogs rnams snang bar bgyis// su zhig 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal bas 'dren pa dpag med 'gyur ba ni/ de dag bka'
94b6: bstsol drang srong 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pas tshim par mchod/ / rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa deng sung cun la dad pa bskyed// bdud kyis mi 'phrogs blo ldan gang zhig chos la yang dag yongs su gnas
94b7: sangs rgyas sras po tshul mkhas gang zhig de ring nges par thob par 'gyur/ / rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol 'gro 'di the tsom ma mchis mdzod// bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dang bskyed skye dgu rnams la byams
94b8: g+hur gcing / / byang chub mthar byin blo gros brtan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas// gang la 'dzum pa der bstan bde gshegs bstan pa 'dzin pa de gang lags// bsod nams brgya yi mtshan

95a1: mnga' de dag bka' stsom pa dag bcom khram/ / 'dren pa khyod gsung yan lag brgyad ldan 'gas pa bka' stsal thos gyur na// bde gshegs gsung gathog mar bdag cag/ de dag
95a2: 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren/ / de ltar gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni sras la gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dag yid ni myur tu bde gshegs rnams la gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom
95a3: ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ / nga yis 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad rta thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing // skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rus su dris te
95a4: 'gro ba'i don byas pa/ / khyod kyi bsod nams 'phel bar brjod du med de de ni zad mi 'gyur// de ni khyod la bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' bas nyon// dge rgyas lha tshegs 'di dag nga yis chos nyid la ni
95a5: the tsom med/ / kun kyang yid rangs rab zhi yid kyis tshigs cad dag gis ngal bsngags/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong grangs mchod 'os mchod byas te// the tsom med pa'i yid kyis tshul dris kun tu som nyi
95a6: med par 'gyur/ / de ltar sngon gyi rgyu des 'dir yang tshigs su bcad pas nga la bstod// bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag bstod par 'gyur// 'di dag bskal pa uta pa la la
95a7: rgyal ba dgra rgyal mthu chen 'gyur/ / 'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yas yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar byed// sangs rgyas drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur ba// de yang bstan gyis dang
95a8: pa'i yid kyis sems kyis tha ba spongs te nyon/ / rgyal ba de kun chos kyi tog ces bya ba'i 'dren pa gzhal yas 'gyur// 'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam yas mya ngan bzla bar 'gyur// de'i tshe na bde gshegs

95b1: kun gyi ring srel shin tu rgyas gyur te gang tshe shid rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rgyas par 'gyur/ / thub pa grangs chen de dag yongs su mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na/ thub ba skyob pa de dag kun gyi ri ba srel d+haH
95b2: bas don chen 'gyur/ / sems can khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyis de tshe ring srel mchod byas te// ringadi srel de dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa mchi med 'thob// thub pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te/
95b3: slob pa khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyang de tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'dra// ji ltar bye ba brgya grangs gang la legs pa'i spyad pa spyod nas su// byams pa blta phyir rgya chen yid kyis byams pa'i 'khor du 'dong 'gyur ba// de ltar rgyal
95b4: ba'i nyan thos slob tshogs de dag rgya nas rgyal 'or/ / rkang gnyis gtso ba de dag kun gyi nga spel bu mchod pa phyir 'dod// bde gshegs dasung na 'gro ba thams cad ngo mtshar gyur pa de thos shing // dge rgyas ris kyi lha'i bdag nyid chen//
95b5: po de tshe// thos zur nas// 'khor rnams thams cad rab tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub sems kyang skyed// bdag nyid chen po shes nas thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos rab tu gtugs// // dge rgyas ris pung stan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu
95b6: gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas de'i tshe 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lha bye ba thag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas/ dge rgyas ris kyi lha'i bar dag gis mchod pa lnga mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas// dga' mgu yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba//
95b7: rang yid bde ba skyes nas tshul gcig la zhug pa dang / mtha' yas par 'byung bar yang dag par mthong zhing tshul la 'jug pa thams cad las kyi mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang / mchod pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i
95b8: spobs pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / nye ba'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / snga tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa

96a1: dag 'byung bar shes nas/ / bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes te// chos nyid brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa zhes
96a2: bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ de la brtson par bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa 'thob zhing mchod pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / dmigs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa
96a3: thams cad la rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ / de la dmigs pa gang yang gzugs lags par 'tshal ba'i tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i
96a4: gzungs thob par 'gyur/ khams la 'jug pa dang / skye mched la 'jug pa dang / dbang po la 'jug pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can la
96a5: 'jug pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dngos po la 'jug pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang bdag la
96a6: 'jug pa dang / stong pa la 'jug pa dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / gnas la 'jug pa dang / gnas ma
96a7: mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa
96a8: dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang 'di lta ste phung po zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ni yongs su ma grub pa'o zhes gzungs rab tu 'thob bo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs ni gang

96b1: la sa/ sa nga sa rdzus ga// da na na dang d+ha na rlung rnams sum / ma /
96b2: nga ba na pa pa / chos gangs bzhirnam mchis pade yangs sa / me rnang sbyin ma mchis pa gas
96b3: rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yangs tham grub pa'o/ / de sar yongs sum thub pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa zhes gdags par ma bgyi/ ma 'ongs pa'i sa ga gas pa
96b4: dkar thung bzhes gdags par ma ba gyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhin/ 'di sar gzugs ni dngos pa ma mchis pa ste/ dngob pa ma mchis pa'i spyangs
96b5: pa mchis sa/ / gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'jug pa ma mchis te/ gnas skyes pa ma lags pa de ni gdags sum mchis so//
96b6: bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gang ci yang rung ste de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas gzugs
96b7: kyi phung po'o zhes bka' stsal to/ / gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dmigs su ma mchis na/ 'das par la gal 'gyur/ ma 'ongs yang gag
96b8: la 'gyur/ daltar byung bar lta ga la 'gyurate/ da lta bas na gzugs kyi phung po ni gdags su ma mchis so/ tshor ba dang /

97a1: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung ba rnams she bsred de bzhinate/ daci'i slang du bung pa rnams ni dmigs su ma mchis so//
97a2: phung po dmigs su ma mchis pas gzugs dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ltar bung ba la 'jug pas gzungs la 'jug par 'gyur ro// gzugs de yang
97a3: ming tsam dang / / tha snyad tsam dang brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam ma gtogs par gzungs la 'jug pa ma
97a4: dmigs/ 'di la phung po yang me dmigs/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs/ 'jug pa yang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so//
97a5: deci'i mid du shen/ gang 'debang po zhes pa bden ma bgyis pa'i chas te/ tshas gang ma bgyis pa la smras pa sang ga la mchis te/ brang ba na spangs pa'i med du blang ba nas
97a6: brtsi'o/ / dper na khyim dang / khang bzangs dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / gang zung dang / bag ma dang / dra ba dang / stegs bu dang / kha khyer dang / mthong khung dang /
