97a7: ba dang / shing thag dang / 'obs dang / chos mang po la bsogs pa la kha grong khyer zhes bgyi ba bzhin du rung ba zhes bgyi ba'ang de bzhin te/ gzugs depa bo nyid kyis mi
97a8: dmigs na de la spangs pa lta ga la mchis/ spangs pa ma mchis pas na/ gzugs kyang ma mchis/ gzugs kyi phung po yang ma mchis so//

97b1: deban / 'du shes da/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa shes pa na kyis dmigs sums pan/ ma sa bzhags/
97b2: ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam pa shes pa yi ma mchis/ rnam pa shes pa'i drung po pa ma mchis pa// des pung po la 'dug pas gang mig pa zla/ pa mas
97b3: xxx/ xxx
97b4: de la mig gang zhe na/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ste/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / mo'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang po'o//
97b5: de la sa'i 'ams dang pa ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa te/ chos gang ge nga bzhin me migs pa den yongs su mgrub pol/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang pa dang / me kham sa dang ba dang rlung ga
97b6: dang ba ni nga bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa den yongs su mthub pa'o// de ltar yongs su mgrub pa'i mig gi skyem /
97b7: 'das bzhes gdags par bgyi ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / dag byung
97b8: zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi skye mched ni dngos po ma mchis pa

98a1: dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du bskye ba ma mchis pa'o/ / gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis te/ da ltar mig kyang ma skyes ma 'gags/ skye mched dang sdug bsngal yang
98a2: ma bskyes ma 'gags pa'o/ / gang ma skyes ma 'gogs pa de ni/ ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam mo gtogs par gdagos su ma mchis pa ste/ ming
98a3: de yang ming gis ma mchis pa'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang la mig ces 'am/ skye mched ces 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes gdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ ming dang ming
98a4: du brjod du ma mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs 'a
98a5: gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob bo/ / de la khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob pa ni/ mig ni mig gis ma mchis pa/ khams ni khams kyis ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni mig gi rang
98a6: bzhin dang bral ba/ khams ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i slad du ste/ chos gang la yang rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o//
98a7: gang yongs su ma grub pa de la ni skye ba ma mchis so// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so// gang ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda' tsam dang / kun rdzob
98a8: tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par 'das pa zhes bgyi bar gdags babad kyi bas lags so ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// ming de yang ming gis ma mchis/ brjod pa'i bar de

98b1: brjod pas ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang pa dngas po ma mchis pa de na yangs su mgrub pa ste/ yongs su ma grub pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o//
98b2: gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so// gangam skyes ma 'gags pa de ni sA la zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'angs pa dang da lta byung ba zhes gdags pa bgyi ba ma lags pa/
98b3: gang dus gsum du gdags par bgyi ba ma lags par de ni/ ming ma mchis pa mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mjarnam ma mchis pa tha snyad ma mchis pa/ brda' ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ 'dris pa ma
98b4: mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ mngon par shes pa bgyi ba ma lags g.yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa// dkar po ma lags/
98b5: nag po ma lags/ gnas ma lags pa rten pa ma lags pa/ thob pa ma lags pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rtogs pa ma lags pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyis pa ma lags pa/ mngon
98b6: tu bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so'i skye bo'i sa ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyis ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyis ma lags pa ste/ sa yang ma lags
98b7: pa yang ma lags so/ / sa ma lags pa yang ma lags so// de ni de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid dang / zhi ba dang mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ste/ tha snyad tsam du btags pa'o// nges
98b8: tha snyad du de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ste/ don dam par ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de mi dmigs so// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi

99a1: rnam par shes pa zhes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du brgya cher khams thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o//
99a2: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni phung por btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor/ khams dang / skye mched dang / dbang po dang / bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid pa 'dar
99a3: te/ chos kyi dbyings de ming gang dang gang gis btags kyang / de dang der chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na sa'i khams ni/ ming ga dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyis kyang / de dang des sa'i
99a4: khams nyid mi mdor ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ chu'i khams dang
99a5: me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba/ de dang der chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings/
99a6: kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des/ chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar na khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das de la dbang
99a7: po la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni dbang po nyi shu gnyis te/ 'di lta ste mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang
99a8: dang / po'i dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bdeba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / dang ba'i dbang

99b1: po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang
99b2: ldan pa'i dbang po ste/ de la mig ni mig gis ma mchis/ dbang po ni dbang pos ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig na mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma
99b3: dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ / gang la dngos po ma mchis pa den yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma thub pa deni mi skye ba/ gang mi bskye ba den ma 'gag pa/ gang ma skyes pa 'gags/
99b4: pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs de ni mis gas/ dang pom 'gas so// gang mog ma lags
99b5: shing dbang po ma lags pa de'i tha snyad ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ 'di lta ste dper na chad pa stong pa ni brdzun pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa ma mchis pa ste/ ji tsam du ming du gdags par bas gyi/ don dam par ni stong pa yang
99b6: mi dmigs/ chad pa yang mi dmigs so// de bzhin du mig dang dbang po yang chad pa stong pa ltar brdzun zhing stong pa ma mchis la/ yang dag ma lags pa ste/ gsob gsog/ log pa/ slu ba'i chos can/ byis pa
99b7: 'dring ba/ glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ ji tsam du mig du gdags par rabs kyi/ don dam par ni mig kyang mi dmigs dbang po yang mi dmigs// de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
99b8: brnyes nas/ ji tsam du phyin ci ldog la gnas pa'i sems can rnams bzung pa'i slad du dbang po zhes btags par bas kyi don dam par ni ma lags so// dbang po ni rang bzhin dang bral zhing dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong

100a1: 9/ sa ga ces gang gas/ ba la/ dam tha snyad brtsa ba na// brdzun gas mchis pa/ gsapa/ gsapa/ lag pa/ swAb sa can/ byas pa 'ang ga/ sman pa tshangs par bkyang /
100a2: rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ don mi skye mo 'gag go// gang ma skyes ma 'gags de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags// ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/
100a3: gang dum gsum du ma mchis pa don mong ma mchis pa// mtshan mam che sa/ bajug sagashi mam mgag yulal mes// gdags pa ma lags pa pa shes pa/ shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa rnam par ma shes
100a4: rnam par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa// thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma rig pa/ rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags pa// ma rtogs pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/
100a5: ma thob pa// thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma brnyed pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ma mchis shing mchis pa ma lags pa'i
100a6: slad du'o/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig rmi lam na dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang rtses pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dag nyal nyal ba las sad de/ rjes su dran la// de dran yang brnyed par mi 'gyur thob par mi
100a7: 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rmi lam na yang des dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / yongs su spyad pa de ma thob ma rnyed na/ nyal ba las sad pa'i tshe lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ thob pa dang /
100a8: rnyed par bgyi ba de'i gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dbang po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ ji ltar rmi lam na dgod pa dang dga' ba dang brtses pa dang / dga' mgur spyad pa de dag dmigs

100b1: su ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ de dag ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags
100b2: par bgyi ba ma lags so/ / gang dus gsum du dmigs su ma mchis pa de dag ni brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ dbang po thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi 'o// de ltar ni chos kyi dbyings la
100b3: 'jug pas chos thams cad la 'jug par bgyi/ / chos thams cad la 'jug pas kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// de la ji ltar na bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi zhe na/
100b4: bzhi po 'di dag ni bden pa ste sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang lam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/
100b5: mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bka' stsal te// des bdag cag the tsom ma mchis// som nyi ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de la sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du// sdug bsngal ma
100b6: mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la sems can ma mchis pa de la sdug bsngal kyang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i slad du kun 'byung ba'ang ma mchis pa
100b7: rig par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang 'bras bu ma mchis pa de ni rgyu ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'gog pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i
100b8: srad du zhe na/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa la spang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du lam ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang spong bar mi bgyid pa

101a1: de ni lam ma lags te/ lam gyi 'bras thuni 'ashog gas la/ nga med pa'i 'gog pa nyan mongs pa de ni mi dmigs te/ dog pa rigs sum mchis na/ 'amadu mthong ba ma lags te/ 'bras tham sa
101a2: pa'i las yang ma mchis pas/ de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa pani po de dag ni/ btags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa ste// gang brtags shing rnam par bsgrubs pa de ni ma mchis pa'o// gang ma mchis pa de la 'das ba nas
101a3: skad du bgyi ba ma mchis so/ / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni ma bskyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma sa
101a4: ma brtags pa/ gdags par mi bgyid pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rab tu bstan par bgyi bo ma lags pa/ ma brjod pa/ brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon
101a5: par ma brjod pa/ mngon par brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa// chos ma ga sa na pags ma / na// bod du chud par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ matogs pa/ rtogs par bgyi bam
101a6: lags pa/ ma rnyed pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mthos pa/ thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/
101a7: ma bsgrubs pa// bsgrub par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon dum bgyis pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dka po ma lag gnag po ma lags pa/ snang ba ma la sa/ mun pa ma lags pa/ 'gro ba ma lags pa
101a8: 'ong bo ma lags pa/ gsal pa ma lags pa/ zab pa ma lags pa/ 'khrugs pa ma lags pa/ dad pa ma lags pa/ 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ bde ba ma lags pa/ 'tshed pa ma lags pa/ grol ba ma lags pa/

101b1: rjes su chags pa ma lags pa/ khong khro ba ma lags pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags pa/ rnam par byang ba ma lags pa/ ye shes ma lags pa/ rnamapa shes pa ma gas gal lam lags pa/ la mgol ba ma lags ga/
101b2: 'jig pa ma lags pa/ rnam par 'jig pa ma lags pa/ bzung ba ma lags pa/ mi bzung ba ma lags pa/ dor ba ma lags pa/ rab tu dor ba ma lags pa/ dmigs pa ma lags pa/ dmigs
101b3: su ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ sems can ma lags pa/ sems can ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ srog ma lags pa/ srog ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gang zag ma lags pa/ gang zag ma mchis pa ma
101b4: lags pa/ bdag ma lags pa/ bdag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ dngos po ma lags pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ stong pa ma lags pa/ mi stong pa ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma lags pa/
101b5: mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa// gnas ma lags pa/ gnas ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ 'dus byas ma lags pa/
101b6: 'dus ma byas ma lags pa/ chad pa ma lags pa/ rtag pa ma lags pa/ log pa ma lags pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ rdzun pa me lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma lags pa/
101b7: mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ rten pa ma lags pa/ rten ma mchis pa ma lags pa// zhi ba ma lags pa zhi ba ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs
101b8: su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ spang ba ma lags pa bsgom pa ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnyed pa yang ma lags pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba snga ma lags pa/ 'khor ba ma lags pa/ mya ngan las

102a1: 'das pa ma lags pa/ / sangs rgyas ma lags pa/ 'tshang rgyab ma lags pa/ 'tshud rgya bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so skye bo'i yul ma lags pa// 'phags pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ nyan thos rgya
102a2: spyod yul ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags pa// sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ spyod yul ma lags pa/ spyod yul ma lags pa yang
102a3: ma lags pa/ bgyis pa ma lags pa/ ma bgyis pa ma lags pa/ dag pa ma lags pa/ ma dag pa ma lags pa/ dag par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/ de ltar bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur/
102a4: chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur// gzungs thob pas spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na nyan cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug ce na/
102a5: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams 'du byed kyis rkyen gyis rnam par shes nas/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di/ 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung/
102a6: ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de la ma rig pa ni ma rig pas ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar ma rig pa ni/ rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o//
102a7: la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni mi skye ba'o// gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag pa'o// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni/ 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags
102a8: ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/ / gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni mid ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa ste/ gzhan

102b1: du ni ming tsam dang / brda' tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / kun brjob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam du sems can rnams gzung ba'i don tu bgyib ma gtogs par ma rig pa de ni don dam par dmigs sa/
102b2: ma mchis so// chos gang don dam par dmigs su ma mchis pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa/ tha snyad du bgyi ma mchis/ brjod dra ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas/ gdags pa
102b3: tsam gyi bar de dag kyang yang dag pa ma lags pa/ brdzun pa/ log pa/ brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ yongs su brtags pa/ rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par dpyod pa/ ma zhi ba/ rab tu spros pa// ma rig pa'i rkyen
102b4: kyis 'angadra byed rnams shes par bgyi yang / chos gang ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis pa de 'dra byed skyed par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ de bas na ma rig pa ni ma mchis pa'o// de ltar ma rig pa ma mchis pas 'du byed rnams kyang ma
102b5: bskyes pa'o/ / gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rga bar mi 'gyur/ na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur// skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de la rga ba ga la mchis
102b6: ste/ gang la rga ba ma mchis pa de ni na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ bskye bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
102b7: byang chub ste/ ming tsam dubs kyi/ don dam par ma lags so// ma rig pa gang lags pa de nyid byang chub po// de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par bgyi ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar
102b8: 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa'o// de bas na chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs

103a1: pa'o/ / bcog ldan 'dus de bzhin gshegs pa na pa 'gags pa ste/ chos thams cad byung sa 'gags par// bcom ldan 'das debazhin du bzhin gshegs pa rna
103a2: nyid ma mchis pa ste/ / mtshan ma mchis pa/ dmigs su ma mchis pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par byung ba ma mdzes pa/ rjes su chags pa ma mchis pa/ 'od thob ma mchis
103a3: pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de'i slang du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
103a4: de ltar na chos gang dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dang de dag gis chos thams cad ma mchis te/ / de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bcom
103a5: ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes mchin/ de dag thams
103a6: cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste// byang chub kyang gnyis su ma mchis pa lags pas/ gnyis su ma
103a7: mchis pas ni gnyis su ma mchis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/
103a8: zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni zlog pa 'am bskor bar mdzad pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das

103b1: gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa/ de ci'i slad du na
103b2: na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du//
103b3: bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
103b4: ni chos thams cad gang la yang phan pa 'am gnod pa'i rnam par nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas tshe 'du byed bor ro zhes mchi na/
103b5: de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni ci'ang 'dor ba 'am len pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig
103b6: 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po'i b+hag ma med par mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam
103b7: pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni/ 'khor ba 'am yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma lags so// bcom ldan
103b8: 'das gang la la zhig 'di blta bu'i chos la nges par 'gyur na/ de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ bcom ldan

104a1: 'das chos kyi dbyings la ni 'gyur ba ma mchis kyang gda'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mode dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
104a2: rmya bar mi 'gyur ba mi gang / / / bam po dgu pa// / de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
104a3: chos nyid la nges par 'gro ba brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal
104a4: mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// // bde gshegs
104a5: mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul min mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'gro ba kun la thugs brtse thub pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa// 'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyis tshul ni yang dag nyid
104a6: du yang dag bstan/ / mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal// khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu bgrod pa bstan//
104a7: khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi ba shes pa mi g.yo brnyes// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag grol mdzad pa// mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing
104a8: ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal/ / phung po rnams ni ngo bo nyid stong shin tu phung po rnams dang bral// byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yongs su

104b1: btags/ shes pa mi ldan paskye bo ba la chen 'dir bcings rnyeng la sde thog la bzhin/ thal ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 'dang // mkhas pa rnams kyis/
104b2: rnam par kun tu stong par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// dper na brag cha rnam pa kun tu sgra dang bral ba badra// des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin mi shes mang po bcings/
104b3: grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma mchis// skye bo ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams cad mkhyen pas bstan// yang dag ma lags brdzun zhing
104b4: byis pa slu ba chad pa stong pa 'dra/ / mi mkhas skye bo lam la la gcig tu ma des mang po de la chags// dper na 'dron pa rgya mtsho chen por 'khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar lhung / 'dren pa dbang
104b5: po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin tu stong pa ste/ thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin tu stong / mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de la chags// bya dang
104b6: rgya mtsho'i nya dang srogs chags dag ni rgyal thogs pa bzhin/ / sems can sems can nyid stong sems can bral zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong // thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris
104b7: bzhin tu ma mchis na/ / mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang po de la chags// mkhas pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgo nga'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin krol// rten
104b8: 'byung chos rnams de dag skad gcig pa ste stong zhing dmigs ma mchis/ / rmi lam dga' ba bzhin du bzung du ma mchis byis pa rmongs bgyid pa/ mi shes rtogs pa'i slad du des kyang mi

105a1: mkhas skye bo mang po bcings/ / mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnams gseb nas thar pa'i bya bzhin grol// thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos rnams
105a2: thams cad bsam mi khyab/ / thub pa zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral/ thub pa khams gsum mi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te/
105a3: de slad tshul gcig 'di skad gyur na 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med// thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin
105a4: chos kun bsam mi khya/ / thub pa byis pa'i spyod yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun btags ma lags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul de ni de bzhin shes par bgyis/ mi mkhas
105a5: gang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal sa 'gas smra ba dang / gang dag rtsal bas 'khor lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor sgrub dang // gang dag bde gshegs skyob pas srog chags
105a6: khrag khrig mya ngan bzlas smra ba/ de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba thibs bor yongs su dkris/ gang dag bde bar gshegs pas tshe'i 'du byed pakang bzung smra ba dang // gA
105a7: dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya ngan 'das smag/ de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud kyi lag tu mchis// chos kyis de bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin
105a8: 'tshal bar bgyi/ / gang dag tshul dang tshul min 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren par 'tshal// de ltar rkang gnyis gtso bo dpal sdug 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyid

105b1: 'dir 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan tan nya rgyas nyid lags/ dgar 'di tshul gyur nas tshul las sas ma ya mchog kA 'ardu/ de kar 'bras thun pa'i la chogs
105b2: chos rnams nges par btogs gyur pa/ / ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bsam pad la brtan bya nas// kha gcig yid rangs dogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du bdag mthong nas/
105b3: 'dren sras de dag tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung bstan par gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang // chos rnams
105b4: nges par rtogs pa thugs su chud nas/ / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad
105b5: de gsol pa/ / dpal skugs 'dren pa rnams ni rgyu zhig sa gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te// rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum de skad thos//
105b6: 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhi ba bde ba'i bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na// rgyal ba lha mi lha min bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de gsungs// de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhal nas 'dzum mdzad
105b7: bsal mthong nas/ / 'gro ba 'di kun the tsom 'tshal de bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal du lta// mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgyu de ni myur tu gsungs// de thos gyur nas 'gro ba rgyal mchog
105b8: 'di dag the tsom ma mchis 'gyur/ / 'dren pa dam pa lnga tshogs gang dag rang gis rang la lung bstan pa// de dag su zhig gang gis ci 'am pa mtha' bcas rnam par 'phrul pa gsungs// mi

106a1: mchog tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs stsogs te ba tsom kun tu stsal tu gsol/ / de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing mchogatudaga' ba 'thob// bde gshegs rgyal mtshan mthon po 'di dag thams
106a2: cad gzhan du mi sems pa/ / 'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba dam pa sems shing mchis// thub pa 'dren mchog the tsom 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tsom bum// da ni ye shes stobs ldan
106a3: tshul dang tshul min mkhas kun rgyal bar 'gyur/ / rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab dga' ste// bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du bgyid mi gsungs pa'i rjes su 'jug mkhas par 'gyur// de dag don gyi dbang
106a4: la rten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol/ / des ni yid rangs gyur 'gro chos kyi mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur// 'dren pa chen po lha de dag gis sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cing // rgyal ba'i gsung thos gyur nas rnam pa yongs su
106a5: rdzogs zhing rab dga' ste/ / tshul la zhugs shing tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur// 'gro ba rab tu grol mdzad ji bzhin yang dag ston par mdzad par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la
106a6: tshi grasra ba cad de spang bag 'phrus pa/ / sgra mo sra rnams kyis ched du nga yis 'dzum pa'i 'jig rten 'den mdad pa// rta thul khyod kyis dus dang tshang shes ngal dris pa shin tu legs/ gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'de ga tshul dang mthun byed pa do khyod
106a7: stan gyis khyod dang 'gro brtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ / thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rtswa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing // rgyu las gzig nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal sdug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad// kha cig blo zhal bdag cag
106a8: rten nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang / / kha cig kha rog 'dug la dga' zhing rab dga' rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang kha cig bdag cag 'jig rten 'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur bya/ skye sdug bsngal thung ba dgrol zhes nugs

106b1: 'i ma na ma cang dzu kyang nyanas pa dan pa gas pa / / d+ham pa sa dgang byung ba rgyal gan sa ba ga pa// sa/ na dod
106b2: don tu shes par bya/ / rab 'bring tha ma rnams pa 'di gsum 'dzum mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te// kha cig zang ba'i don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas// des na 'jig rten mkhas pa rnams
106b3: par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad/ / rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhabs 'ag nub par 'gyur// rang rgyal don tu 'dzum pa gang mdzad sku yi dbus su nub par 'gyur// 'dren pa stobs bcu'i don tu 'dzum
106b4: pa mdzad pa btsug tu nub par 'gyur/ / de ltar rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par bgyis// rgyal ba mchog rnams don tu gang 'dzum de kun nga'i gtsug tu nub// sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar
106b5: 'dzum pa ngas bstan shes par gyis/ / 'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang yin de rgyu rnam gsum yang bshad kyis// kun kyang ci gcig yid byos de ni nga las legs par nyan par bgyis// dang po'i don tu 'dren pa 'dzum pa
106b6: ngas mdzad myur tu thog mar nub/ / 'bring gi don du dus tshod cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur// blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin tu ring tu gnas/ rta thul
106b7: nyan thos don tu gang gnas 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzad/ gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnams gsum bshad kyis rta thul khyod kyi/
106b8: par bgyis/ gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la bskor ba byed pa ni/ de dgang la skyen par bskor nas myur tu shin tu bskor bar mkhas par 'gyur/

107a1: mam me kyis rgo byed pa 'gyur// dal gyis g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyur ba shA/ ma / steng bzhag 'dra ba'i bde gshegs mthang
107a2: 'gyur na/ / de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya// gang tshe gdugs 'dra mtha' yas
107a3: mog ldan pas ni 'dren de 'gebs pa dang / / gang che me tog 'dral 'dren pa'i steng gi mkha' la lding pa dang // gang chen mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum skor byed pa// de ni 'jig
107a4: rten 'das pa tshe las dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes par bya/ / bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyun ni rnam gsum de tsam bstan// rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnam gsum pa
107a5: de dag shes par gyis/ / des na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa mdzad// de thos gyur nas thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan la the tsom med par gyis// 'bras du che des
107a6: lha tshogs bye ba brgyad cu tham pa 'di dag ni/ / zhing rnams dag tu chos tshul shin tu rgya chen smra ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// mkhas pa de dag dpag med tshe ldan bskal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur/
107a7: de'i phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bstan// de dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong // bskal pa sum cu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang
107a8: mthong / / bskal pa sum cu drug du thams cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyod// da dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal pa grangs med sum cu rtsa drug tu// gang zag chen po 'di dag rgyal ba kyu mchog mchod pa

107b1: byed cing gnas/ / thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtogs rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed// rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod de byang chub zhi pa yongs su btsal byas nas// de dag de'i 'og tu dpal sdug rkang gnyis dam
107b2: ba skyes bu mchog/ 'dren pa mthu chen yon tan ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung // rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rang zhing snangs te// sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal
107b3: zhes bya/ / de tshe yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs med de// de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni// gal te bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs bcus nyan thos de bgrangs kyang //
107b4: legs mdzad rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa dag ni mthar byin pa grangs mi 'gyur// 'dus pa de dag thams cad 'dus pa grangs med de ni ci 'dra ba// de las nyis gyur de tshe byang chub du ni yang dgazhugs par 'gyur// de tshe rgyal
107b5: par zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/ / de dag thams cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal par 'gyur// bde gshegs de dag spyod pa gang yin de dag rnams kyi 'ang de nyid 'gyur// 'jig rten
107b6: mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos/ / de tshe sras kyis bzung zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyad bcur gnas par 'gyur// de dag 'das nas ston pa'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems
107b7: bskyed pa/ / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang shin tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de dag 'das nas ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni// nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya
107b8: ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ / de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang 'byung de dag thams cad kyi// bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongs su legs par ldan gyur cing // yang dag shad par

108a1: 'gyu ted ni bstan rnams kyi chos nyid yin/ mi mchog de'i gsung ba bos 'thobam lus dang gyur nas/ gang gnis dam bganal pas 'jig rten byed bdagaca 'gyu sa
108a2: te/ / thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'/ bde bdag gegs la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen bkur byas// de lta bas na dga' bar byas la
108a3: mamagol 'bang bzhin su skyed de/ / rtag tu shes rab pa la byin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du snyen thos pa/ yang dag mthong ba'i spyad pa dge ba 'di la kun du bzhin thos te// dge slong byed cagan
108a4: gnyis gtso ba 'jig rten thugs brtser 'gyur bar gyis/ 'bras bu che ba lung bstan pa'i le'u kye 'i lug sum pa'o// / de gnas gtsang ma'i dris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe/
108a5: sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par rig cing // sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tsom med par gyur bar rig nas/ tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba
108a6: dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ / bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis so so nas mngon par bstod de/ de la lha'i bu sbyin bal mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis
108a7: sdug pa'i sras rnams dang / / btsun mo dang ni srog pangs btang // rgyal srid btang bar ci smos te/ sbyin mthar phyan la phyag kyang 'tshal/ lha'i bu tshul khrims
108a8: la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis tshul khrims rnam sbyangs pa/ rnam pa kun tu bsnyengs mi mnga'// shin tu bslabs pas mthar phyin pa/ khrims mthar byin la phyag

108b1: das pa panas sa/ shA pa da pa na// ga
108b2: te/ cod ma thar byin la phyag kyang 'tshal// spyi'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol pa// btsun pa mag rtson 'grus te/ stobs chen brtson 'das ldan gyur bas// rdzogs pa
108b3: byang chub mchog pa rnas pa/ / btsan mtha byin la phyag kyang 'tshas// kwa'i thabasam gtan la mos pa gsol du// khyod kyis bsam gtan bsnyen mdzang pa// dpa'ajig rten
108b4: mirnyed/ / dras gsum mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa// bsam gtan mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal// kwa'i bra gzing brjid dang ldan pas gsol pa// dpa' bos shes rab par ba byar/
108b5: yang dang yang ni bsgoms pas na// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa// shes rab mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu khams kyi bla gros kyis gsol pa// sbyin pa dag da
108b6: ngag stan dang / / don spyad 'thun pa'i don dag gis// 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyis btal// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dge ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// byams
108b7: chen thugs rje chen po da/ / mAn ring dus nas bsgom mdzad de// sems can dpag yas yongs su bsgral// gdos 'dzin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis
108b8: gsol pa/ / nyon mongs med pa'i mthar phyin cing // thub cen dul ba'i sems mnga' bas// ma dul thams cad dul mdzad pa/ kha lo sgyur la phyag kyang 'tshal/

109a1: lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med kyis gsol pa// sems dag mnyen pa'i sems mnga' ba// sems dul dbang po zhi mnga' ba// sems can kun gyi sems mkhyen pa// sems
109a2: mkhyen byed la phyag kyang 'tshal/ / lha'i butho go rnam par dag pas gsol pa// shes rab ldan pa'i blo gros can// blo gros mchog la rab tu zhugs// thugs gsal phun sum tshogs pa'i blo//
109a3: mi mkhas rtogs mad phyag kyang 'tshal// lha bu sems brgyan gyis gsol pa// khyod kyis sems ni rnam par sbyangs// sangs rgyas zhing yad rnam dag mdzad// sems can tho yang rnam sbya
109a4: kun gar khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ / lha'i bu bum pa med byas gsol pa// dgongs pa pham pa mi mnga' ba// khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung yang bcom// khyod kyis lha tshogs thams cad kyang/
109a5: rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur// lha'i bu myur tu byed pas gsol pa// khyod kyis chos rnams myur bar mkhyen// sems can myur bar rnam par sbyangs// zab cing blta dka'i chos dag la// myur
109a6: du mdzad la phyag kyang 'tshal/ / lha'i bu brtson 'grus bstan pas gsopa// bral gyur yongs su bral gyur pa// chu bo rgal te zag pa spangs// pha rol phyin cing thang la bzhugs// brtson 'grus brtan
109a7: la phyag kyang 'tshal lha'i bu spyod lam dang ldan pas gsol ba/ / 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang spangs// gti mug spangs pa zag med pa// byin gnas bsod nams zhing thur pa// 'jig rten mchod 'o/
109a8: phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu shin tu brtan pas gsol pa// khyod kyi dam chos shin tu bstan// 'jig rten gsum du rab tu mchod// gcig pu bgrod pas bde ba brnyes// de phyir khyod la phyag kyang 'chal

109b1: lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pas gsol pa/ / lhun stug gcig tu gyur pa'i ri// drung gis bskyod par mi nus te// de bzhin bstod dang sprad pa yis// bde gshegs bskyod par mi nus so// lha'i bu
109b2: mnyam pa nyid thob pas gsol pa/ / dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can// shes rab zab mo blo ldan pa// rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zang
109b3: pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ / sku chen khyod la sku mi mnga'// de bzhin nyid la rab tu zhugs// yang dag mtha' yas rab tu ston// khyod mtshungs gang zag yod ma mchis// lha'i bu blo gros
109b4: dang bas gsol pa/ / gnyis su med pa yang dag ston// dpa' bo dpa' bas rnam par gnon// gang dag zab la zhum ma mchis// de dag khyod chos pha rol phyin// lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas
109b5: gsol pa/ / mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag/ khyod kyi slob la bslabs pa'i rnams// sbrul rnams pags pa rnying 'dor bzhin// srid pa gsum po 'di dag 'dor// lha'i bu zhi ba'i yid
109b6: kyis gsol pa/ / ji ltar mar me mar zad cing // snying po zad pas zhir 'gyur bzhin// khyod kyi bstan pa myur thos na// shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'// lha'i bu zhi gnas pas gsol
109b7: pa/ / gang gis kun mkhyen khyod mthong ba'i// mi rnams 'dod chags bcings pa yang // shes rab mtshon gyis mkhas pa dag/ 'dod chags zhags pa gcod par 'gyur// lha'i bu gnas
109b8: ma gas gsol pa/ / zhi ba'i sems mnga' zhil spyod// cho ga spyod yul rab tu zhi// nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur pa// dgra rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu'i

110a1: gnas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ / khyod kyi zhi gnas bslabs pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' grangs chen dag/ zhi gnas nyid kyis 'byung 'gyur zhing // sems zhi
110a2: bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ / lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa// chos rnams kun gyi zhi ba ni// dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu bstan// shes rab chen po de 'tshal na// de dag
110a3: de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ / lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par lta bas gsol pa// khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs// mkhas pa khyod ltar slob pa rnams// ye shes mchog gas
110a4: mnyam bzhag cing / / byang chub mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis gsol pa// shes rab pha rol phyin gyur pa// thub chen khyod las gang slob pa// de dag 'jig rten
110a5: snang 'dzin cing / / sgrub pa med par gzigs par 'gyur// lha'i bu'ang byed kyis gsol pa// 'jig rten smon ma khyod kyi gsung // ye shes rgya mtsho de thos nas// de dag dri med bde ba 'thob/
110a6: bsam gyis mi khyab 'od kyang 'byung // lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad rnam mi rtog/ thabs la mkhas pas de dag gsungs// de 'dra'i ye shes ston bgyid pa//
110a7: de dag gang zag mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu rab tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa// gnas ma mchis shing blang ma mchis// chos rnams thams cad sems ma mchis// bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur ba// de
110a8: dag khyod kyis de bzhin mkhyen/ / lha'i bu gnas med blo gros kyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad gzhi med par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// de dag khyod kyis lugs zlog ste// sems
110a9: can rnams la bstan pa mdzad/ / lha'i bu mi rten blo gros kyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad rten ma mchis// sems can ma mchis phan tshun min// lag mthil skyu rur bzhag bzhin// yang

110b1: dgra ji bzhin khyod kyis bstan/ / lha'i bra bar snang chubs gsol pa// bad gshegs khyod kyis chos kyi rnams// bar snang d+habAr snang ba ste// skye dang 'gog pa med par gzigs// de spyad
110b2: 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/ / lha'i bu ngar 'dzin pa med pas gsol pa// khyod kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni// g.yo ba med cing ngar 'dzin med// spyod med rtsol/
110b3: ba med par gzigs// lha'i bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol pa// sgyu ma sna tshogs legs bgyis pa// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan gyur na// de bzhin ma lags de bzhin gda'// /
110b4: thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis// lha'i bu rab tu sred pa'i ngang tshul gyis gsol pa// gzugs brnyan ji ltar me long la// gda' yang de ltar ma mchis pa// de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs
110b5: de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'/ / lha'i bu yid gnyis rnams par 'jig gis gsol pa// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams// de bzhin khyod kyis
110b6: bstan pa mdzad/ / de ltar 'gro ba kun kyang mkhyen// lha'i bu spobs pa thogs med kyis gsol pa// chos nyid la ni khor zug tu// spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing //
110b7: chos nyid de ni brnyes pas na// de skad khyod ni spobs pa ldan// lha'i tha chags med blo gros kyis gsol pa// khyod kyi chos 'di thams cad ni// rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par//
110b8: yang dag ji bzhin rab tu mkhyen// de bas thub pas pa rib bsal// lha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis gsol pa// mya ngan med cing nyer len med// spros pa med cing rnyog pa med// chos rnams

111a1: kya / deg rang bzhan kyad byas san// rtags pa nas sa byas sa pa// ma nab ya lags// / rgyu nga
111a2: ma mchis pa/ / de dag khyod kyis yang dag ma khyen// de bzhin rab tu bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu blo thos mchog gis gsol bya// spun gyis thub cing thang med pa// tshangs pa cad
111a3: ci shes pa med/ / chos rnams ci yang me bgyid pa// khyod kyis rang ba thugs su chud// k+ta'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa// sdang ba ma mchis sran ma mchis// gzugs
111a4: med ma lags gzugs can min/ / gzung ba ma mchis grol ma mchis// khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chung // lha'i bu mig mi 'dam pas gsol pa// yul dang phyogs na mi gnas pa// yod dang
111a5: med pa ma lags par/ / mi lam 'dod pa ci bzhin du// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// sna'i bu mog mi 'dzums kyis gsol pa// byis pa rnams kyi blo mongs pa// ma skyes pa dang tha
111a6: 'gags pa/ / par na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol pa// gang zag sems can ma mchis pa// ma mchis tha snyad
111a7: mamachis pa/ / bstan pa'i slad du brjod bgyi ba// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa// gang gis tha snyad gdags pa yi// mtshanam
111a8: de dag ma mchis te/ / chos kun mtshan ma mchis par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu smon pa med pa la gnas pas gsol pa// ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing // smon

111b1: pa dmigs su ma mchis dang / / sul sman lam mchis thar pa// de yang deH/ 'tshul du mkhyen// snyam bu ting nge 'dzin la gzham pas gsal pa/
111b2: rnam thar sgo la bstan bgyis shing // gang zhig 'grol 'gyur de ma mchis// de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i tha
111b3: ma smad pas gsol pa/ / khyod ni sdig pa kun spangs shing // bsod nams thams cad bsal gyur te// bde gshegs khyod la sdad mi mnga'// sra rjod de dag mkhas
111b4: lags/ / lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa// ji ltar glog bcas sbyin gyi tshogs// char gyis sa chen ngoms par bgyid// de bzhin 'dren
111b5: pas chos char gyis/ / 'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad// lha'i bu bsam pa don yod kyis gsol pa// thub khyod gsungs ni don mchis te// chos kyi 'khor
111b6: lo rab tu skor/ / shin tu brtag te mdzad pas na// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan// lha'i bu blo glos phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa// chos rnams thams
111b7: cad dngos nyid kyis/ / ma skyes 'gags pa ma lags te// de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen// gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par mdzad// lha'i bu seng ge'i nga ros gsol pa//

112a1: khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstan te// seng ge'i nga ro skrag mdzad pas// mu stegs can kun rab 'jigs pa// seng ges ri dgas 'phra mo bzhin/
112a2: lha'i bu bag yod las kyis gsol pa// bag yod sngon tu btang mdzad de// khyod kyis spyod pa spyad bgyis pas// sangs rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod// bag yod
112a3: ba ni nges par 'byung / lha'i bu bag yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa// bag yod pa la rab gnas to// khyod kyis nyid kyi chos kyang spel// stobs bcu gzhan yang
112a4: sangs rgyas chos/ / bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu spel// lha'i bu bag yod skyes kyis gsol pa// bag yod pa la brtson pas na// byang chub phyogs
112a5: rnams yongs dag skyes/ / thub chen rang yang grol gyur nas// de dag rnams ni 'jig rten 'grel// lha'i bu bag yod nges par byung gis gsol pa/
112a6: byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag/ ji snyed thar la rten pa'i rnams// kun kyang khyod la bslabs pa ste// bag yod pas ni nges par 'byung // lha'i bu bag yod gnas
112a7: bas gsol pa/ / bag yod yongs su ma btang bas// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba 'di la ma chags dang // thams cad mkhyen tu nges par 'byung //

112b1: lha'i zabag yod bsrungs kyis gsol pa// byang chub lam stan mdzad ci// khyod ni bag gis bzungs pas na// thugs rjechen po mkhas pa oM/
112b2: byang chub dam pa bzlas par gyur// lha'i bag yod brtson gyis gsol pa// bag yod pa la rab brtson rnying // mtshan nyid gcig pa rtogs bgyis /
112b3: dba' bo chen po khyod kyims// yab kyi dko yang thob par gyur// lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga'as gsol ba// ngag yod dga' ba'i brtan pa rnams/
112b4: de dag sangs rgyas ye shes kyis// dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jig pas// nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin d+hI la/ lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/
112b5: sangs rgyas ye shes tshol mdzad tshe// khyod ni bag gis bzung bas na// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// khyod kyis
112b6: thugs ni skyo ma gyur/ / lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa// chos rnams de dag rang bzhin ni//
112b7: sangs rgyas spyod yul lags// byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang // thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs// lha'i bu

113a1: zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas gsol pa/ / sangs rgyas zhi gnas zhugs pa ste// 'on kyang de la chags mi mnga'// sems can nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad// rdul 'thul ba la
113a2: char ba bzhin/ / lha'i bu zhi gnas la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas zhing la rab tu zhugs// sras kyang mi bskyod ri bo bzhin// khyod la gnod pagyir mi nus te// sems ce zhi khyod
113a3: phyag kyang 'tshal/ / lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis gsol pa// khyod kyi zas rnams ma snang ba// zhi gnas kyis ni yongs su dul// bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs te// 'dod chags kyis ni gnod
113a4: mi 'gyur/ / lha'i buzhi gnas nges par blang gis gsol ba// zhi ba'i yid mang 'a zhi gnas la// dpa' bo chen po sdom mdzad pas// tsi la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad// sus kyang myod kyi/
113a5: tshul ma 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon tu 'gros gsol pa// ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi// sngon tu zhi gnas 'gro zhes gsung // gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i// chos
113a6: gzhan de'i rjes su bzang / / lha'i bu zhi gnas rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron ma zhi gnas ni// sems kyi rtog pa 'dod par bgyid// zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi 'ching // de khyod man+ta/
113a7: las dbang du mdzad// ka'i bzhi gnas spyod yul gyis gsol pa// chos rnams kun gyi snod yul ni// zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas gsungs// dal chags med spyod pas ni// rnam par 'dren/
113a8: pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas bslab kyis gsol pa// bsam gtan gyis ni mngon pa can te// shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pas// de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes de bzhin sku

113b1: rnams kyang 'drin/ / lha'i bzhi gnas lhur lan gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang // lam gzhan bdag gis ma mthong ste// zhi ga nas ye shes che thob na// rang 'byung nyid du nges par 'byung//
113b2: lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po lhag mthong te// chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste// de la khyod kyis sas spyod cing // rang 'byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong
113b3: byung gis gis gsol pa/ / shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing // rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sman pa'i rgyal po ston pa ste// de pas lhag mthong dag pa lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong rab gnas
113b4: kyis gsol pa/ / chos rnams thams cad btsal bgyis ste// yang dag ji bzhin mthong gyur na// brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob// byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dod// lha'i bu lhag mthong nges 'byung
113b5: gas gsol pa/ / gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis// byang chub mchog tu nges par 'byung / rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis// brnyes pa'i 'dren pa skye mi 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol pa//
113b6: yang dag ji bzhin yang dag tu// chos rnams rnam par gzigs pas na// byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te// de bas rnams 'dren sangs rgyas lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pas gsol pa//
113b7: mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing // dka' ba mang po spyod bgyid pa// de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis// pham par bgyis par yong mi nus// lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa// chos rnams rnam
113b8: mthong bgyi slad du/ / rgyal sras gang dag bzhugs pa'i rnams// chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal cing // rang 'byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong sa bsten pas gsol pa// rnam 'dren khyod kyis

114a1: sun ring sa/ / mishes la ni bsnyen mdzad pas// m+b+has nA mkhyen pa rnyes stasan// srog nags zlol par mdzad/ 'i baHda bya da kyi mA ga T+TA / sangs bad /
114a2: mas can mkhyen// 'dren pa dam pa mngon par 'phags// sring pa'i rgya chos ba // 'dig rten du yis sgrol bas dag/ rtswa'i hU~M ga ma thong gdas kyis gsol ba// ga pa sa ng+ge gas
114a3: mdzad cing / / chos kun rnam par gzigs pas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te// sa bzung rgya grod skyes 'dra// lha'i bu lhag mthong dang ma bral bas gsol pa// rnam par 'dren pa khyod
114a4: sras/ / ye shes kyis ni yongs bzung ste// byang chub mchog ni thob bgyis shing // skye bo mang po 'grel par bgyid// lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa// sangs rgyas mkhyen la rnam par rol//
114a5: chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// zhum pa ma mchis dang mi mnga'// thub pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu lhag mthong la yang dag par 'jug gis gsol ba// dpa' bo chen po
114a6: chos kun ni/ / lhag mthong nyid du yang dag 'du// rang bzhin med par rnam mthong na// de ni rang byung byang chub lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong snying pos gsol pa// sangs rgyas lhag mthong snying po ste//
114a7: chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'di gzigs shing // thugs rje chen po shin tu skyed// lha'i bu lhag mthong 'gros kyis gsol pa// byang chub phyir ni shes 'gro ba'i// 'jig rten
114a8: mkhas pa nges par 'byung / / de dag byang chub mchog kyang 'thob// grol nas skye dgu 'di dag 'grel// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la bsnyen gyis gsol pa// stong pa nyid kyi chos bsten pa'i// mkhas

114b1: pa byang chub 'tshang cu ste/ / sems can bcings las 'grol bgyid cing // bcas pa thams cad rnam par ga/ wa'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis gsol ba// stong pa nyid la mas gyu bas
114b2: 'gro ba 'di dag srog med gzigs/ / dmigs med ngo bo nyid med pa// de ltar srog chags rnams la ston// lha'i bu stong na kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi snod yum ni/
114b3: nams rang bzhin stong pa ste// srog chags rnams la thugs brtse bas// dpa' bos de la spyad par mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis bsam pas gsol pa// skyon dang bral zhing bcings med la/
114b4: 'jigs skrag thams cad rab tu spangs// chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing // nam mkha'i rlung bzhin spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa// stong pa nyid chos la
114b5: bsten bgyid cing / / sangs rgyas spyod yul gang mos pa// de dag ston pa mchod pa ste// mchod pa de ni bla na med// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa// gang gis 'dren pa
114b6: 'phags gyur pa/ / de ni yang dag 'phags shes gsungs// stong nyid chos la sten bgyid pa// ma smad de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis 'dren gyis gsol pa// dpa' bo chen po chos
114b7: rnams gang / / mya ngan 'das min ston ma mchis// kun kyang mya ngan 'das par 'dren// drang srod chen po'i byang chub lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par shar gyis gsol pa//
114b8: song nyid ni la bsten nas ni// khyod kyi slob ma yang dag shar// stong pa nyid la gang ston pa// de dag rim mgro bgyid pa lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la rten gyis gsol pa// gang rnams

115a1: stong pa nyid rten pa/ / mkhas pa de dag rmongs mi 'gyur// nyan mongs med cing la med rnams// byang chub rdul mad thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid phun sum chags pas gsal ga/
115a2: gang rnams stong nyid sten bgyid pa// sangs rgyas chos rnams phun sum tshogs// rang blud pham pa med par 'gyur// 'jig rten don kyang bgyid par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la yang dag par
115a3: zhugs pas gsol pa/ / sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur te// stong pa nyid la gang sten pa// de la bdud rnams bye ba phrag/ stong gis dkrug par mi nus so// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la dga'
115a4: bos gsol pa/ / mtshan ma med la mngon dgyes te// dngos po thams cad rnam bshig nas// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams nas byung // mtshan ma rnams la chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu mtshan ma
115a5: med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ / mtshan ma med la spyod gyur cing // zhi bzhi la spyod pa rnams// mtshan ma rnam par bshig rnams kyi// tshul ni bdud kyis shes me nus// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa'i
115a6: spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul la// 'dren pa khyod ni spyod mdzad de// mtshan ma mi mnga' rtogs dka' zhing // zhi spyong khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas skom gyis
115a7: gsol pa/ / thub pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad ni// mtshan ma med pas skem gyur te// yab kyi dkor ni 'tshal gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs la bkur bstibagyid// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la spyod pas gsol pa//
115a8: mtshan ma med la nyin mtshan tu// gang zag mchog gi spyod mdzad pas// lha dang dri za me dag kyang // khyod kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal te// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas rnam par grol gyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams

115b1: cad rnam bshig cing / / dpa' chen 'jig rten sgron ma khyod// mtshan ma med la gnas par mdzad// de bas khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rnam par rtsi bas gsol pa// thub chen dpa' bo chen po khyod//
115b2: tshan ma med la rnam par rol// mi rnams yongs su smin mdzad cing // sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la zhugs// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas yongs su grub kyis gsol pa// gang gis mtshan ma spangs gyur pa/
115b3: de dag byang chub sgrub pa ste// yab kyi chos kyis brtul zhugs can// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// lha'i bu mtshan ma med par dga' bas gsol pa// gang gis mtshan ma rnam bshig pa// de dag
115b4: sangs rgyas tshes la dga'/ / bla ma'i gnas la gnas pa ste// sems can kun gyi mchod rten lags// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rten pas gsol pa// zhi la spyod cing rnam grol ba// sangs
115b5: rgyas 'jig rten bla na med/ / 'byung po kun gyi skyabs dang rten// dpung gnyen de bzhin gnas kyang lags// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la mos pas gsol pa// mtshan ma med la mos gyur cing //
115b6: zhi ba dgralas rgyal gyur pa// sangs rgyas rgol ba 'gro sgrol ba/ de dag tshad na gal mchis// lha'i bu smon pa med pa rtogs kyis gsol pa// mgon po gang dag smon lam ni// rnam pa
115b7: kun tu mi dmigs pa/ / de dag 'jig rten bral ba ste// sangs rgyas 'jig rten nang nas byung // lha'i bu smin pa med pa la sten pas gsol pa// zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod// srid pa
115b8: rnams su smon pa mdzad/ / sred pa yongs su chad pas na// sangs rgyas 'jig rten yongs mi gos// lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol pa// gang gis sred pa yongs bcom pa/

116a1: de dag gzi mchog skyes pa ste// de dag 'jig rten mgon po'i sras// rang gis yab la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med ya byed mi ba// khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa// srid pa
116a2: yongs su bcad pas na/ / srid pa 'jig bgyid srid pa la// de dag smon pa mi bgyid do// lha'i bu smon pa med pas yongs su grol bas gsol pa// gang dag smon pa mi bgyid pa/ gzi ldan khyod
116a3: kyi sras kyi rnams/ / re ba btang zhing bcings grol ba// de dag yongs su grol bar 'gyur// lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa// gang gis sred pa rab bcom pa// de dag mya ngan dgon pa rgal//
116a4: de dag mi skom zang zing med// dpa' chen khyod la de phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pamed la nges pas gsol pa// gang gis srid dang sdug bsngal dang // bde ba dngos po med bsgoms pa// mgon khyod de dag
116a5: rnams kyi yab/ / de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags// lha'i bu smon pa med pa'i 'khor gyis gsol pa// srid pa sdug bsngal sus mthong ba// de dag khyod kyi bstan la dul// kha lo sgyur zhing srid sel ba/
116a6: sems dul khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa// srid pa'i dgon las byung ba rnams// bde ba thob cing zhig nas te// nyon mongs dgra rnams pham mdzad pa// 'jig
116a7: rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal/ / lha'i bu smon pa med pas ya mtshan du gyur pas// gsol pa// g.yul las rgyal bar gyur pa ste// khyod ni rnam rgyal pham mi mnga'// bdud kyi dpung rnams pham mdzad
116a8: ci / / srid pa kun tu smon mi mdzad// lha'i bu smon pa med pa stobs ldan gyis gsol pa// thar pa'i chos la stobs ldan pas// bdud kyi zhags pa yongs bcad cing // khyod kyi sras rnams bdud dag la//

116b1: bal jugs mi babyed da// 1'bralas rnam par brtags kyis gsapa ga// sa ma ba med rgyu ra// sras 'dag gas ma pang thang pa// dgasangs rgyas myod su dag// dad
116b2: byad kyi rjes su zhugs/ / se par sems kyi sa gsol pa// mi ga cung dral pa nagazag pa// lum 'di mi bzad das bsams te// yang dag ji bzhin 'acwa gyu nas// rtam 'dren spyod la byug kya
116b3: 6/ / lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsol pa// lum lo me gtsang brtags kyi te// lus la dran pa rnam dpyad cing // lus kyi sdug bsngal na mgrol nas// nges pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// dz+ha'i bu lus
116b4: yongs su gtong gis gsol pa/ / sprul gyi khrigs pa rnying bzhin du// rnag can lus 'di sbyangs nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa sru bo che// sru mi mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus la smod pas
116b5: gsol pa/ / mi gtsang dri dang rnag zag cing // rul pa'i lus la rtag smad de// mi gtsang gang ba rnam spangs nas// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyis yongs su skyobs gsol pa// gang dag rul
116b6: pa'i lus skyo zhing / / rgyal sras gtsang ba 'tshal ba rnams// chos kyis rab tu bskyed pa'i sras// de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur// lha'i bu lus kyis skrag pas gsol pa// 'byung ba chen po sprul gdug 'drar// gang
116b7: gis shin tu rtogs gyur pa/ / de dag lus las 'das pa ste// rkang gnyis gtso la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi skyon mthong bas gsol pa// lus kyi skyon la mngon sum ste// ye shes gzigs pa'i spyan mnga'
116b8: pas/ sangs rgyas mkhyen pas mkhas pa dag/ srid gsum thams cad yongs su gzigs// lha'i bu lus la 'dod chags dang bral bas gsol pa// lus kyi 'du shes 'dod chags bral// chos kyi 'du shes mi

117a1: gnas pas/ / kun sbyor kun las 'das pa ste// rnam 'dren sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa'i dgra'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// srid par srid pa 'joms sa dag// khyod kyis dgra'i 'du shes babyed//
117a2: khyod kyis sras rnams bsgom babyed cing // mkhas pa byang chub mngon 'tshang rtsa// lha'i bu sred pa sel bas gsol pa// srid pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs mthong // mya ngan 'das la 'jigs med mthong // khyod kyi sras//
117a3: rnams 'gro phan phyir// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa bgyid// lha'i bu srid pa rnam par spangs kyis gsol pa// gang gis srid pa rnam spangs shing // 'jig la mngon par mi dka' ba// bral bar gyur cing sems dag
117a4: pa/ / mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa bstsal gyis gsol pa// mi yi dam pa khyed kyi sras// srid par khrid pa rab bstsal te// khyod kyi bslab la bslabs pa dag/ stong gsum
117a5: 'di na rnam par mdzes/ / lha'i bu srid pa las rgal bas gsol pa// srid pa'i mtsho las rgal ba'i// 'jig rten mgon mchog skyob rnams la/ grang kyis rgyun tu bgrang ba yi// grangs ni 'jig rten 'di na mad/
117a6: lha'i bu srid pa 'joms kyis gsol pa// srid pa thams cad yongs bcom ste// gang dag rtag tu dran spyod pa// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston// lha'i bu srid pa
117a7: las rab tu grol bas gsol ba srid pa'i rgyun las rab tu grol/ / rnam par 'dren pa srid pa rgal// srid pa mthar 'byin sangs rgyas ste// srid pa sel la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa rab tu ni byed
117a8: kyis gsol pa/ / srid par khrid pa rabazhi zhing // srid pa pham par mdzad nas gshegs// brten pa srid pa mthar 'byin na// khyod la do zla ma mchis so// lha'i bu srid pa'i mthar 'gro bas gsol ba//

117b1: srid pa'i mthar byin rab zhig/ mgon po khyod kyi srid pa'i mtha'// srid pa phyir log thams cad mkhyen// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad// lha'i bu srid pa'i tha ma'i lus 'dzin gyis gsol pa//
117b2: srid pa'i rgyu ni rnam spangs nas// srid pa tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa// gang gis srid pa len 'gyur ba'i// khyod kyi kun tu sbyor ba mtho ba// lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi ba thob kyis gsol pa// khyod kyis srid pa stong mkhyen
117b3: te/ srid pa'i rgyu yang de bzhin no// blam dang rab tu zhum mi mnga'// mnyam nyid gyur la phyag kyang 'tshal// sgra'i bu srid pa'i pha rol tu 'gro bas gsol pa// srid pa'i pha rol rgal ba ste/
117b4: srid par khrid pa yang dag bsngal// rnam par 'dren pa thugs brtse bas// skye bo gzhan ni sgrol ba mdzad//
117b5: bam po bcu pa// lha'i butshor bas mthar gyis gsol pa// tshor ba bdag tu bgyi sa mchis// sems pa ma mchis rtsol ma mchis// bsam gtan mdzad pa che khyod kyis/
117b6: brgya bur lta bur mkhyen// lha'i bu tsher ba ston pas gsol pa// ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med par// tsher ba khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// rmi lam sdug gu'i dga' 'dra ba// de la so so'i skye bo chags/
117b7: lha'i butsher ba la yongs su rtogs pas gsol pa// shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags nas// tshor ba 'gro bar ma song zhing // 'ong ba med pa dngos med par// de ni thub chen khyod kyis gzigs// 'i/
117b8: butshor ba dang bral bas gsol pa// tshong ba dang ni tshor ba po// rang bzhin med par khyod kyis gzigs// zab mo blta da / de yang // khyod kyis sems can rnams la bstan// lha'iH

118a1: tshor ba'i rgyud la des pas gsol pa/ / tsher ba de ni kun rdzob tsam// don dam nyid du mi dmigs te// khyod kyis sems can der btul bas// 'gro ba the tsom ma mchis gyur// lha'i bu tshor ba
118a2: la mkhas pas gsol pa/ zer ba'i bu yo sa ga/ mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin// byis pa'i b+h+yo can rmongs bgyid pa// de ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba mngon par shes pas
118a3: gsol pa/ / tshor ba'i phung po mngon mkhyen pa// rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa'i// mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog khyod kyis// tshor ba bdag med rab tu gzigs// lci'i bu tshor ba las rgal pas gosal
118a4: pa/ / rkang gnyis gtso bo dam pa khyod// brgal dka' tshor ba'i mtsho las rgal// 'dam las rgal cing sdig med pa// byang chub mchog 'di sangs rgyas gyur// lha'i bu tshor ba las byung gis gsol pa//
118a5: rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten du// tshor ba rnams ni 'byung mkhyen nas// tshor ba'i phung po rab rgal te// sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags mi mda'// lha'i bu tshor ba rig pas gsol pa// mi
118a6: rnams dag la gang 'ching ba'i/ / tshor ba thams cad khyed kyis mkhyen// nyon mongs zhags pa 'ching 'gyur ba// de'i rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsol pa//
118a7: khyod kyis sems kyis nyon mongs pham// bdud rnams kyang ni spa bkod ste// sems de rang bzhin ma mchis par// thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems yongs su shes pas gsol pa/
118a8: ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis// sgyu ma sna tshogs sprul pa bzhin// sems ni bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen// de pyir khyod la 'jig rten mchod// lha'i bu sems la yang dag par rtogs pas gsol

118b1: pa/ / sgyu ma'i mkhan nam slob ma bzhin// gang gis 'gro ba 'di bcings pa'i// sems de khyod kyis yang dag brtags// de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen// lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul la spyod pas gsol pa/
118b2: sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen// rnam par 'dren pa rmi lam na// de ltar tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du// byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid par gzigs// lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug gis gsol pa/
118b3: dul gyur las su rung ba'i// sems kyi rang bzhin rtogs med pa// gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed// mtshan nyid brtan pakhyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsol pa// gang gis sems
118b4: la sems med shes/ / mkhas pa sgyid lug mi 'gyur zhing // bdud sde rab tu btul bgyid pa// de dag 'dir ni dpa' zhes bgyi// lha'i bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa// gang dag sems la
118b5: sems med shes/ / de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te// dpa' chen sangs rgyas chos rnams la// skyes bu de dag yang dag 'phags// lha'i bu ni ba'i sems kyis gsol pa// gang gis sems la dbang bgyis pa/
118b6: sems can de dag zhi ba zhi// bdud kyi zhags las rab grol bas// de dag bdud kyi dbang mi mchi// lha'i bu sems mnyen pas gsol pa// mi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing // bsnyen par dka' dang dpa' ba dang /
118b7: khyod kyi bstan la gang mos pa// de dag 'dod par zhum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa// sems dag las rnams gtsang gyur cing // yang dag rtogs pas spyod bgyid pa// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos
118b8: na/ zab mo rnams la zhum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu chos nyid la gnas pas gsol pa// gang gis yid ni chos nyid la// rab tu dga' zhing thogs med pa// de dag mi dbang sras po ste// zhi ba'i sar ni phyin pa lags// lha'i

119a1: bu chos la sems pas gsol pa/ / chos rnams thams cad chos dbyings su// 'dren pa de la bslabs pa rnams// chos nyid la ni gang sems pa// de dag spyod yul mi 'brur med// lha'i bu chos bya
119a2: dbyings la nges par byung gis gsol pa/ / mi mchog khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// chos kyi dbyings la nges byung ste// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras de dag/ mtshan nyid gcig gis nges byung lags// g+ha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod
119a3: yul gyis gsol pa/ / chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni// chos kyi dbyings shes rgyal bas gsungs// dpa' bo khyod ni gang spyod pa'i// ye shes de ni bsam mi khyab// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol pa/
119a4: chos kyi dbyings la gang zhugs pa// de dag ye shes bsam yas te// sangs rgyas chos la the tsom med// sems can bsam la de dag mkhas// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la bab kyis gsol pa// gang dag chos kyi mtshan
119a5: nyid gcig/ chos kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams// de dag spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa// bsam gyis mi khyab thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa// gang la de dag gnas
119a6: pa yi/ / 'jigs pa med pas dpa' bo bzhin/ de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs/ de la mtshungs pa med pa 'byung // lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pas gsol pa// khyod ni chos dbyi sa na 'dab ste// chos rnams kun la shin rnams// lag
119a7: mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ / chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par ston// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas gsol pa// chos rnams rang bzhin med gzigs pas// khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la
119a8: zhugs/ / oM ga nas zhum pa ma mchis te// gzung ba ma mchis gtad ma mchis/ lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsol pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i// chos kyi dbyings la khyod spyod de//

119b1: bar snang mkha' dang 'dra ba yi// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la rton pas gsol pa// gang dang gang gi sgo dganas// skyes bu dam pa ston mdzad pa// de yi sgo
119b2: nas chos dbyings ston/ / de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la brtson pas gsol pa// mngon par brtson pas chos kyi dbyings// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen//
119b3: brtson pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// ye shes pha rol phyin par 'gyur// lha'i bu chos kyis tshim gyis gsol pa// dpa' bo khyod kyis skye bo 'di// chos kyis rab tu mtshim par mdzad//
119b4: chos kyi dbyings ni rnam mkhyen pas// 'dren pa byang chub mchog la zhugs// lha'i bu chos nyid kyi gting rnyed pas gsol pa// gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun// 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta//
119b5: chos dbyings rnam par mkhyen pa yi// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas pas gsol pa// mi mchog 'dren pa sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes gnas 'di
119b6: chos dbyings te/ / rnam par 'dran pa stobs bcu po// gang la spyod pa de lags so// lha'i bu gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/ chos kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te// thams cad mkhyen pa
119b7: bzhud pa'i lam/ / de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang // mtshan nyid gcig par shes pa lags// lha'i bu gnas mngon par shes pas gsol pa// khyod ni chos dbyings mngon par
119b8: mkhyen/ / mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa ste// sems can kun gyi bsam pa yang // rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu gnas nas nges par byung gis gsol pa// rnam par

120a1: 'dren pa khyod kyi sras/ / gnas su bya ba chos dbyings shes// gsal bar 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa rnams// rang zung nyid du nges par byung // lha'i bu gnas la bslabs pas gsol pa/
120a2: chos kyi dbyings gang bslabs pa'i// skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs// rab byung nyid du gnas rnyed pas// de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa//
120a3: gnas med pa ni gang 'tshol pa// de dag bde gshegs dgongs la mos// bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang // de dag rmongs par yod mi nus// lha'i bu gnas med pa mngon par shes pas gsol pa//
120a4: gnas med gang gis rig gyur pa// de dag bdag cag bdud kyi tshogs// bye bas byang chub mi bskyod ces// mkhas pa de dag shin tu dga'// lha'i bu gnas med pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol
120a5: pa/ gnas med 'du shes mkhas pa ni// chos nyid la ni rab gnas ste// sdig can bdud rnams bshal ba ni// ji ltar rta yis shing rta bzhin// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/
120a6: mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po// chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid pa'i// bdud kyi las ni gnas med de// gnas med do zhes rgyal bas gsungs// lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rtogs//
120a7: pas gsol pa// gnas dang de bzhin gnas min pa// byis pa'i blo can rnams la bstan// rang gis de ni thugs chud nas// sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu sbyin pa la
120a8: mkhas pas gsol pa/ / sngon chad rgyu ni gang dag dang // las 'dra 'byung ba ma 'tshal pa'i// rgyu de khyod kyis thugs su chud// las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu las la mkhas

120b1: pas gsol pa/ / chags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni// las kyi chu zhes khyod kyis mkhyen// gang gis chu yis bgyis de yang // gang zag mchog ga'i thugs su chud // lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/
120b2: ma 'ongs pa'i dus dag na// mi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur ba// de yi chu dang len pa dang // gnas dang las kyang khyod kyis mkhyen// b+ha'i bud ltar byung ba la lta bas gsol pa// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi
120b3: sems can rnams dang rgyu dang las/ / gnas dang las kyi len pa rnams// kun kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa// mi dbang khyod kyis ma gzigs pa'i// las dang rgyu dag ma
120b4: mchis te/ / gnas dang skye ba'ang ma mchis so// de bas khyod ni gang zag mchog/ lha'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa// las dang rgyu dang de bzhin gnas// dus la rnam smin rnam gsum dang // ji
120b5: ltar de'i len pa yang / / khyod kyis mkhyen pas de slad mchod// lha'i bu stobs kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa// rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // rnam par smin dang rkyen dang gnas// rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyen//
120b6: de phyir rgyal ba mnyam pa med// lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis gsol pa// rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyu rnams dang // rnam smin so so yang dag rig/ thams cad stong par rab tu
120b7: mkhyen/ / lha'i bu stobs la dga' bas gsol pa// rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgud kyi rnams// khyod nyid rang gis mngon mkhyen te// rang bzhin med par bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu
120b8: stobs kyis rnam par rtse pas gsol pa/ / rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams// 'pho med dbang phyug med pa ste// rten cing 'byung bar khyod kyis mkhyen/ lha'i bu stobs kyis

121a1: 'phags kyis gsol pa/ / rgyu dang rkyen dang las rnams dang // rnam par smin pa snyan pa rnams// de kun rang bzhin stong ngo zhes// seng ge'i re re khyod kyis gsungs// lha'i bu stobs kyi rjes
121a2: su 'brang bas gsol pa/ / 'jig rten las ni gang zhig gis// khams ni gang zhig spel gyur pa// de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos mkhyen// de bas khyod ni do zla med// rta'i bu stobs dang ldan gyis gsol pa/
121a3: khams gang las ni bsten bgyis shing // gang gis mngon par las bgyis dang // de ni rnam smin cing 'dra ba// de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa// khams gas
121a4: la ni bsten bgyis shing / / ci 'dra'i dang bzhin gyur pa yi// sems can thams cad khyed kyis mkhyen// phyag gi sor mo lnga dang 'dra// lha'i bu ba stobs la spyod pas gsol pa// khams gang la ni bstan bgyis shing /
121a5: bshes gnyen ci 'dra rnyed gyur nas// 'du 'dzi tsa 'dra ba gyid gyur pa// de dag bla na med pas mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas gsol pa// stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs mkhyen cing// 'dren pa de ni
121a6: khams dang ni/ / 'dra 'jo ba shes gas tshogs kyi rnams// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu khams nges pas gsol la// khams de dang ni len pa dang // bshes gtan de dang der 'grogs pa// des
121a7: khyod kyi mkhyen pa des/ / de phyir the tsam yang mi mnga'// lha'i bu lams brten pas gsol pa// sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i// 'khor ba de dang khams de dang // spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams// m-i
121a8: mchog tud kyis rab tu babyed/ / lha'i bu 'ams la mkhas pas gsol ba// re shes gang gis khams de ni/ 'dren pas mngon par mkhyen pa yi// mkhyen de mkhyen pas spong ngazhes// bla ma tshig ma las

121b1: yang dag bstan/ / lha'i bu khams na nges par byung gis gsol pa// khams gang la ni bsten bgyid ni// 'dus byas dag la ji srid gnas// de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen// khyod la de zla ma mchis so// lha'i
121b2: bu khams kyi rjes su song bas gsol pa/ / khams gang la ni bsten bgyis pas// yon tan ji snyed bskyed pa dang // rnam par smin dang 'bras bu dag/ de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu khams
121b3: la yang dag zhugs pas gsol pa/ / khams gang la ni bsten bgyis cing // 'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyid pa// de yang khyod kyis thogs med mkhyen// de phyir khyod ni mkhas pas mchod// lha'i bu lam mngon
121b4: par shes pa gsol pa/ / khams gang la ni bsten bgyis pas// 'gro ba ci 'dra mchi ba yi// sems can rnams kyi lam dag kyang // ye shes mkhas pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu lam la mi 'jigs
121b5: pas gsol pa/ / sems can log pa nyid nges shing // mya ngan 'das 'gro skal med pa// phung po gsum po de dag la// khyod kyi ye shes nges par 'dzag/ lha'i bu lam gyis nges par byung gis gsol
121b6: pa/ / sems can yang dag nyid des te// ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i skal med pa// de la 'jig rten sgron pa khyod// rtogs pa thogs pa med par 'jug/ lha'i bu lam la mos pas gsol pa// ma nges
121b7: phung por gyur pa la/ / gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams// de la ngan song ngan 'gro dang // mya ngan 'das pa'ang khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu stobs kyi brdas gsol pa// sangs rgyas brda'
121b8: tsam nyid lags te/ / de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang // mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du// kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs// lha'i bu yang dag pa mthong bas gsol pa// sangs rgyas

122a1: sangs rgyas chos rnams med/ / ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang med// don dam nyid du bstan to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs la gnas kyis gsol pa// sangs
122a2: rgyas chos la stobs gnas pas/ / des na de la 'jigs med de// rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs kyi sras// ji ltar 'dod dgur rnam par 'phrul// lha'i bu chos la 'jigs med kyis gsol ba// kun rdzob
122a3: dang ni don dam dang / / de dag rab tu bstan mchis kyang // kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang // brda' yang dmigs su ma mchis so// lha'i bu ye shes lhur len gyis gsol pa// brjod pa thams cad rnam pa
122a4: gzhan/ chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gzhan// mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod ma mchis// khyod kyis chos kyi mtshan nyid gzigs// lha'i bu lam la brtson pas gsol pa// nges par gyur pa'i sems can rnams/
122a5: gzhan gyi rgyud mchi'i gnas ma mchis// log par des rnams kun tu 'gror// drang srong chen po khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs kyis gsol pa// khams gang la ni bsten bgyis te// gang rnams
122a6: ci 'drar pos 'gyur zhing / / 'dod chags khams la sdug brdzam// de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mi sdug pa las nges par byung gis gsol pa// ma mchis yongasu brtags pas na// 'dod chags
122a7: khams ni rab tu byung / / de la mos pa des 'byung ba/ de dag ji bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu byams pas nges par byung gis gsol pa// ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// zhe sdang khams ni rab
122a8: tu byung / de la mos pa nges 'byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu rkyen 'das nges par byung gis gsol pa// ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// gti mug khams ni rab tu byung //

122b1: de la mos pa des 'byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu gtong bas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ 'tsho med 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag/ ser sna mngon par 'phel 'gyur te// de la mos
122b2: pa des 'byung ba/ / de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa// sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pas na// 'thun pa'i khams ni rab tu 'byung/
122b3: de la mos pa thob 'byur ba// de la 'dren pas rnam par mkhyen// lha'i rnam par shes pa'i snying por 'dzin pas gsol ba// 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis// ci 'dra'i khams la brten pa dang // mos
122b4: pa de mthar phyin pa dag/ khyod kyis ma lus rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu nan tan snying por byed pas gsol ba// 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyi// gang gi chu byung nan tan dang // mos pa de las gyur pa yang //
122b5: smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la mos pas gsol pa// sems can gang gis khams gang la// bsten na ji ltar
122b6: 'byung ba yi/ / rgyu de khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// des na khyod ni dga' bar mdzad// lha'i bu dbang po la spyod pas gsol pa// sbyor ba gang gis skye ba dang // gang gis rgya chen skye ba dang // dmigs pa dang
122b7: na zhing rnams dang / / dbang po khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byung gis gsol pa// 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang // sred par mngon par 'jug pa dang // sred pa ni
122b8: bar bgyid pa'i don/ / de dag smra ba'i mchog gis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa// dbang po nyams chung rnams dag ni// gzugs kyi 'dod chags dben par 'tshal// sred

123a1: pa rnam par gzhig pa yang / / rkang gnyis dam pas bsnyen pa mdzad// lha'i bu dbang po rnam par rgyal bas gsol pa// dbang po rtul po dur khrod bste ma rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar bgyid//
123a2: rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas// sred dang bcas pas khyod la lta// lha'i bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa// 'dod chags can dad 'dod chags dang // zhe sda shes dang mi shes dang /
123a3: sred pazhi dang dbang po rnams// rnam par gzigs na sngon ma dmigs// lha'i bu dbang po la gnas pas gsol pa// zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi// gnod sems med dang dben pa dag/ dbang po
123a4: tul ba sten pa'i tshe/ / khyod kyis 'gro ba'i bsam pa gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol pa// zhe sdang gnyen por byams par gsungs// sems can shes pa rjes su skye// zhe sdang
123a5: khar sa ni zhi bar bgyid/ / de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po tshol bas gsol pa// gnod sems med dang byams pa dang // zhi ba ngo bo nyid ma gzigs// bdag dang nyon mongs ma
123a6: dmigs te/ / nges ni 'jig rten khyad par 'phags// lha'i bu dbang po rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa// log par rnam par rtog pa dang // log par nye bar ston pa yang // nyon mongs dam phyir ku
123a7: sbyor ste/ / bzlog pas 'thar bar 'gyur bar zigs// lha'i bu ye shes yang dag shar gyis gsol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dngos la 'dzin pa mun pa ste// bzlog pas snang ba chen
123a8: por 'gyur/ / de ni grags chen khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu ye shes 'dod chags chad pas gsol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // mun pa sdang ba dngos po rnams// rang bzhin nyid kyis
