192b1: blo gros mtha' yas dang / blo gros rgya chen dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / sa 'dzin dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs
192b2: kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems pa dpe mang drug cu dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po
192b3: brgya byin dang / / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / lha'i bu mtshams bzangs dang / lha'i bu blo gros legs gnas dang / lha'i dbang po thams cad dang / klu'i dbang po dang / mi'i 'am ci'i dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang
192b4: po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'khor brgya stong du ma yod pa thams cad dang / 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/ 'khor ba rnams dang thabs gcig/
192b5: tra bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ lhun po ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad las ni/ mngon par 'phags/ nyi ma ltar 'jig rten thams
192b6: cad la ni snang / zla ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba ni mdzad/ tshangs pa ltar rab tu zhi bar ni bzhugs/ brgya byin ltar sku ni bsnyen par dka'/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi
192b7: rin po che bdun dang ni ldan/ seng ge ltar chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / ston par ni sgrogs/ me'i phung po chen po ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i sku dang ni ldan/ lha thams cad snang ba'i nod bu rin
192b8: po che kun nas bsdus pa'i nor bu rin po che rgyal po ltar gzi brjid kyis ni shin tu 'bar zhing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdang bas khyab par mdzad nas/ don shin tu rnam

193a1: par nges pa/ chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pas sems can thams cad go bar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis
193a2: chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge gabar du dge ga tha mar dge gdon bzang po / tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs par yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang g.yang dag par rab tu
193a3: ston to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khril bzhugs pa/ da ma stong /
193a4: bas lhag pa'i 'od kyis/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil tu rlag par mdzad nas/ shin tu lhang der bzhugs pa mthong ste/ dga' bo dang / mgu ba dang / dad pas 'dun pa'i sems kyis/ stan las langs nas
193a5: thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// lha tshogs lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci// klu dang nyan thos dag dang sangs rgyas sras// 'gro ba
193a6: 'di dag rgyal bas gzi yangs kyis/ / zil mnon khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar gsal// rgya mtsho'i dbus na bzhugs kyang rnam mdzes pa/ lhun po lha'i tshogs kyi gnas lta bur/ thugs rje rgya mtsho dbus su de bzhugs te//
193a7: 'od gzar stong phrag brgya dag 'gyed pa mdzad// tshangs pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i tshangs pa de// tshangs pa'i mdun na gnas te mngon mdzes ltar// bsam gtan nam thar ting nge 'dzin bzhugs pa// sems can
193a8: dam pa 'gro ba kun la gsal/ / brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum lha nang du// gnas nas gzi brjid yangs pas mdzes pa ltar// mtshan gyis spras pa ye shes yon tan phyug/ thub pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba kun la

193b1: gsal/ / gling bzhi'i mi'i bdag po snang ldan pa// 'jig rten mgon pa 'di la ston pa ltar// 'phags pa'i lam du 'dzud par rab mdzad cing // thugs rjes dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' 'di yang mdzes// mkha' la nyi ma lam
193b2: mamal ser/ / nor bu ma 'od mog mog byed 'di ltar// nyi ma snang pas khyad par 'phags pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas nyi ma 'gro ba 'di na gsal// dri med zla ba nam gyi gung gsal lta pa// shin tu rnam dag 'tho ba kun la
193b3: gsal/ / rgyal ba'i zhal nas zla ba nya ba 'dra// kun 'od zil kyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes// ji ltar ri bo'i zom la me 'bar ba// mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na kun snang ltar// gti mug mun pa ma lus bcom nas
193b4: ni/ drang srong chen po'i ye shes 'od kyang gsal// seng ge'i ri sul bstan pa'i sgra sgrog cing // sa la ri dgas tshogs rnams skrag bgyi da ltar// mi dbang stong pa bdag med gsung sgrog cing // pha rol mu stegs can
193b5: rnams skrag par mdzad/ / nor bu'i rgyal po bzang po gzi brjid 'bar// nor bu thams cad zal mnan lam me ltar// rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// 'gro kun zil gyis mnan nas lam mar bzhugs//
193b6: 'jig rten gang na'ang khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// lhag pa'i sems can mchis par ga la 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus thabs rnams dang // yon tan kun gyis khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// mi
193b7: yi dpa' bo 'grol lam me pa/ / mgon po yon tan rgya mtsho bdag gis mthong // gus pa skyes shing dga' ba rnams par 'phel// rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi mthil la bdag gis gtubs// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'jig
193b8: rten sgron/ / grags pa dam pa rgya chen thugs mnga' la// bdag gis bston de bsod nams 'dir thob des// 'gro ba thams cad byang chub mchog reg shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga'

194a1: ba rgyal bas/ bcom ldan 'das latshigs su bcad pa pang dgags mngadapar bsod nas/ thal ma gyur // mig gnas ma 'dums par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skalan // rdzas kyi dbyings la de
194a2: par dpyod / / zab pa dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / khong du chud par dka' ba dang / brtags mi du pa dang / rtog ga'i spyod pa ma yin pa dang zhi ba dang / 'phra ba la ni 'jug sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul
194a3: bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni rjes su rnam par dpyod/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa la ni rjes su rnam par sems/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa la
194a4: ni yang dag par lta/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi yul gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig gi tshul gyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug
194a5: pa la ni rtog/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas med pa/ nam mkha'i spyod yul du ni yang dag par lta/ chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'/ mtha' ma yin pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni mos// /
194a6: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la ni mngon par 'dod// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtags pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug pa la ni 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// zhing rab 'byams
194a7: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / sems can thams cad la// mngon tu phyogs pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan gyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur yang thug pa med pa ni rjes su dran
194a8: par byed/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par dpyod cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug par gyur to// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan

194b1: yong du dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te/ de zla ba gsum 'das nas/ chos gos byas te/ chos gos zin nas/ de lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te// dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / gas ba
194b2: las dang po pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa dag dang lhan cig tu/ mthar gyis yul rgyu bcu zhing / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po gal ba dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul
194b3: 'khor skyong / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs
194b4: gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis thal mo sbyar te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'
194b5: mtshungs pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rgyal ba yid gnyis gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// srid gsum mthar byon thub la phyag 'tshal lo// zhing rnams bye ba rab 'byams kun tu yang // 'dren pa dag ni khyad kyi
194b6: bsngags pa gsung / / rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos nas rab dga' zhing // yon tan rgya mtsho thub pa mchod du mchi// bde gshegs tshul dang 'thun pas mchod bgyis te// thub pa che las rdul bral chos thos nas//
194b7: de dag khyod kyi yon tan 'phreng rjod cing // yid rab dga' nas rang gi zhing du mchi// byang chub dam pa mchog ni tshol ba na// khyod kyi thugs ni spyo ba mi mnga' bar// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su//
194b8: sems can rnams kyi ched du spyod pa spyad// 'dren pa khyod kyis sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad// bzod dang brtson 'grus dang ni bsam gtan slabs// shes rab thabs dang dbang gis pha rol gshegs// des

195a1: na rnam 'dren che la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rdzu 'phrul rkang dang mngon shes mchog la mkhas// dbang po stobs dang rnam par thar pa bslabs// sems can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chud rtogs// mnyam
195a2: med ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyen// spyod pa gang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang / tshul sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyur ba// de ni bcom ldan mi yi mchog
195a3: gas mkhyen/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang gita mug 'byung ba spong // gang gis sems can ngan song gsum mchi dang // gang gis bde 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las// 'gro bas legs par bgyis dang nongs bgyis
195a4: mkhyen/ / 'gro ba phan mdzad gang dag 'das rnams dang // da ltar lha dang mi yis mchod rnams dang // gang dag ma byon yon tan mchog mthar phyin// bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen// dag pa'i zhing
195a5: dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang / / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos dang // drang srong chen po rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshang // rnam pa kun tu ma lus rnam par mkhyen// mya ngan 'das nas chos gnas ci 'dra/
195a6: dang / rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod pa ci 'dra dang // der ni chos mdzod 'dzin pa ci 'dra ba// de dag ma lus mi yi dam pas mkhyen// dus gsum rnams su rtag par stobs bcu yi// ye shes mkhyen pa sgrib pa mi
195a7: mnga' 'jug/ chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'// phyag 'tshal rgyal ba ye shes mtsho khyod la// khyod dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis ga la lhag/ skar ma rnams kyis nam mkha' spras pa ltar// mtshan
195a8: rnams kyis kyang sku ni rab spras pa/ / mi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// gzugs kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis yid du mchi// lhar bcas 'gro ba zil tu rlag par bgyid// tshangs pa brgya byin 'og min lha'i

195b1: rnams/ / khyod kyi spyan sngar de dag mdzes ma lags// khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar dri mi mnga'// dbu'i snum 'jam zhing g.yas su khyal par gnas// lhun po rgyal ba lta bur spyi gtsug 'phags// bsod nams//
195b2: rgya chen byung ba lam mer bzhugs// 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing // khyod kyi smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes// 'gro la thugs rjer dgongs pas gang gzigs pa// sman ni ud pal 'a
195b3: zhing yid du mchi/ / zla nya dri med mkha' la ji lta bar// rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhal ni lam me ste// lta ba'i skye bo ngoms par mi 'gyur ba// zhal bzangs mi yi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// dad pa rma bya re dgas
195b4: rgyal gyi stabs/ / glang po dregs pa dal gyis mchi stabs kyis// sa rnams g.yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs pa// stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum la mdzes//
195b5: sen mo zangs mdog dag cing dra pas spras// bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lha ngar reg cing slebs// sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor lo dra bas khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bas// sa steng ri mong mjed
195b6: cing ba rab tu gshegs/ / zhabs kyi 'od gzer gyis ni yongs smin pa'i// mi rnams gum nas lha'i 'jig rten mchi// chos kyi rgyal po nor bdun sbyin pa po// chos kyi sbyin bdag dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba// chos kyis
195b7: spyod pas 'gro ba rjes ston pas/ / 'dren pa chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa'i go cha dran pa'i ral gyi mchog/ tshul khrims gzhu dang shes rab thabs kyi mnga'// de yis skye 'chi srid sred 'phel bgyid pa//
195b8: nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par gyur// rgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol// grol nas bcing ba las ni 'grol ba 'grol// bde gshegs gang gis zhi ba'i gnas mchi ba// bde bar mis nad ma

196a1: ba/ / mchis lam yang ston// gang na skye dang 'chi ba ma mchis shing // 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba// gnas mchog zhi ba 'dus ma bgyis pa de// thugs rje brnyes nas khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// chos
196a2: kun dbang gis pha rol gshegs pa'i rgyal/ / thub pa chen po 'jig rten mchog bstod pas// bdag gis 'dir ni bsod nams gang bsags des// 'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgyar shog/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa
196a3: yul 'khor skyong gis/ / bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas// thal mo sbyar te/ stan las langs nas// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
196a4: ngas btsugs nas/ / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du// bcom ldan 'das
196a5: kyis bdag la skabs phye na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ / bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das//
196a6: kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong khyod ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas// khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad//
196a7: ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ljon pa yul 'khor skyong ga sa// bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ngu dang ldan na chos
196a8: thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyad par thob par gyur/ / gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i shes pa thob// myur ba'i shes rab thob// spobs pa rnam par nges pa thob/ snang ba thob thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la

196b1: 'jug pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / yid gnyis spong ba dang / som nyi spong ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rnam par nges pa thob// sems can 'dzud pa la mkhas pa dang /
196b2: skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / ldem po dag yang dag pa dang / sems can gyi khams la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob pa dang / zhu ba thams cad zhu ba dang / chos thams cad 'dzin pa
196b3: dang / nga tu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par ba nges pa// yang dag nyid
196b4: du ji ltar de 'byung dang / ye shes rgya mtsho'i bka' mchid rnam nges pa// mi mchog rgyal bas bdag la bshad du gsol// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi gzugs lta bu// sems can dam pa bsod nams mchog
196b5: bsags pa/ / khyod ni skyabs dang gnas dang dpung gnyen lags// byang chub spyod mchog dri med deng bdag gsungs// gzungs dang bdud rtsi byang chub 'byung ba ye// ye shes mi zad ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur// gang gis
196b6: skye bo'i dogs pa gcod 'gyur ba/ / shes rab rgya mtsho ji ltar rnam par dag/ 'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mang por ni// 'jig rten sdug bsngal nyen la lta bgyid kyang / skyo ba'i blo ni nam yang mi skyed cer/ de dag don
196b7: dge ston par 'gyur ba dang / / dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang // tshe mchog dang ni phun sum tshogs zhing dang // sems can ched kyi bka' mching bla med dang // byang chub spyod pa dri med bshad du gsol//
196b8: bdud 'jom mdzad pa lta ngan spyod pa'o// sred pa skams pa rnam grol reg mdzad pa// chos kyi tshul yang bskud par mi 'gyur bar// sems can rin chen spyod mchog bstan tu gsol// gzugs dang longs spyod

197a1: spangs pa phan sa pa tshogs/ / snyan pa'i gsung gas 'khor rnams tsham mdzad pa// bde gshegs spen ltar 'gro ba mar mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul legs par bstan tu gsol//
197a2: ka la ba ka'i sgra snyan gsung 'byin pa// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis blo ngan rab 'jig pa// chos 'chal gyur pa'i 'khor rnams lcags lags kyis// gtso bo bdang rtsi'i ro yas tsham par mdzod/ 8
197a3: rlab dam pa mchog la 'dun pa mchis/ / chos la 'dun pa bzlog pa'i ma rigs te// 'dren pa bstan pa mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags// rin chen dam pa bsgrag pa'i dus la bab// thub pa dag na
197a4: byang chub re ba mchis/ / bdag ga bsam pa rgyal bas rab tu mkhyen// rgyal ba gtso brim lags don tu gnyer// spyod pa dam pa legs par bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
197a5: 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la/ / 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong khyod legs so// // yul 'khor skyong khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang //
197a6: yul 'khor skyong khyod skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / da ltar dang / pa 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams// yongs su gzung ba'i phyir//
197a7: de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so// yul 'khor skyong byed de'i phyir/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so// zhes gsol/
197a8: dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos

197b1: na dang ldanan/ yangs su dag pa 'dad/ thag// can gang nan/ 'das// bsam pa dang / lhag pa' bsam pas nan tan kyad pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dag gang ba nyid rtsom bdag
197b2: dasmras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ yongs su dag pa 'di dga' thob bo// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di
197b3: skad ces bya'o/ / bsam pa thag pas rtag tu mngon brtson pa// byang chub lam las me ldog yid ldan pa// g.yo med tha ba med cing sbra med pa// ye shes mtha' yas ldan la de dag yod// de dag na dang rga dang
197b4: 'chis gzir ba/ / sems can mgon med sdug bsngal mthong nas ni// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba bsgral ba'i phyir// de dag chos kyi grwa ni yang dag sbyor// des pa sems can kun la sems mnyam pa/
197b5: ba cig pa bzhin 'gro ba rnams lta ste// 'di dag thams cad bdag gis dgrol lo zhes// gang zag mchog gi bsam pa de 'dra'o// stong nyid rtag tu rtogs par khong du chud// bdag yod ma yin sems
197b6: can yod ma ya ni/ / 'dus byas sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra ba la// byis pa mi mkhas 'di la rnam par rmongs// mkhas pa de dug ji skad tshig smras pa// de la nan tan byed cing kun tu gnas// dul zhing ni
197b7: la rtag tu skyon rnams spangs/ / rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lam la dga'// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dbugs 'byin pa thob pa ste// bzhi gang
197b8: zhe na/ / gzungs thob par dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa thob pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yang dag par spyod pa ste/ yul 'khor skyor bzhi po de dag ni byang

198a1: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa'o/ / 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te// de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gang gis sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'i chos mchog 'dzin 'jur
198a2: pa/ gzangs rnams grags pa chen po de dag gis na rtag tu thob// nam yang chung zad mi 'gyur phyir zhing blo gros rab tu 'phel// de dag ye shes chags pa med cing chos kun pha rol phyin// byang chub yan
198a3: lag 'phel bar byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed/ / de dag 'dren pa rnams ni gang nas bzhud pa'i lam mchog ston// de dag sdig pa'i grogs po dag la sten pa ma yin te// tshig byed bdag
198a4: nyid med ltar de dag ring du rnam par spong / / dpa' bo stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i zab mo'i chos thos nas// de dag bdag dang sems can srog tu lta ba kun mi 'byung // de dag tshul khrims skyon med
198a5: dal zhing zhi ba'i yid dang ldan/ / sangs rgyas tshul khrims bla na med la sems can rnams kyang sbyor// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar
198a6: byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong sangs rgyas mthong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong rjes su 'thun pa'i thos
198a7: pabyang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor stong bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na/ 'khod pa
198a8: rnams dga' bar byed pa'i tshes dang / yul 'khor skyong dmigs su med pa'i chos la bzod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te// yul 'khor skyor/

198b1: bzhi po dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos so// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gzi brjid kyis ni 'jig rten thams cad
198b2: kun nas snang mdzad pa'i rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas mi mchog tshe rabs kun du de dag mthong / / byang chub dam pa mchog tshol chen sems can dgrol ba'i phyir// dga' zhing gus par gnas nas de ltar mi dbang rgyal
198b3: po mchod/ / 'dren pa rnams las zhi ba rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyang nyan// thos nas bsam pa thag pas brtan pa tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor// dmigs med chos thos chos 'di thams cad sems can med pa dang //
198b4: 'di la bdag med par ni chos la som nyid de mi skye// de ni bdog pa thams cad yongs gtong rtag tu kun 'dzin med/ slong ba nyer ba 'ongs pa mthong na sems ni rab tu dga'// grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang /
198b5: bu dang chung ma dang // thams cad gtong zhing de yi sems ni gang du 'ang g.yo ba med// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi la blta bar mi bya ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems
198b6: dpas khyim gyis gnas la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la lta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim
198b7: la 'dris par bya ba la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas lus dang srog la blta bar mi bya ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag la blta bar mi bya'o//
198b8: 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// skyon gyi gzigs pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tu nor mi lta// yon tan ldan pa des pa de dag dgon par dga' zhing dbang po dul// de dag gang

199a1: du'ang bud med rnams dang skyes pa dag dang 'dras mi byed/ / bse ltar gcig pu gnas shing bsam pa dri med dag la rim bral// de dag rnyed pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur ma thob pa yid zhum med// 'dod
199a2: pa chung steng ngan don tsam la dga' zhing sku dang tshul 'chos spangs/ / sems can don phyir brtson 'grus yid ldan sbyin dang dul la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon
199a3: tan pha rol phyin/ / lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta sdug pa'i rtsa lag rnams spangs te// bsam pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub lam la sbyor// lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo
199a4: pa med/ / thams cad mkhyen nyid re ba phyir zhing brtson 'grus shin tu brtan 'dir rtsom// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul
199a5: 'khor skyong tshul khrims skyon med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung pa med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dgon pa la nas pa mi gtong ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos
199a6: dang / yul 'khor skyong 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi dang 'thun par byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdud pa med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong mang du thos pa thob par byed pa// byang chub sems
199a7: dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos so// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// /
199a8: sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing // tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srungs// de dag nga ni khrims ldan legs sdom yin mi sems// tshul khrims de nyid la ni rtag tu sems can sbyor

199b1: de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas par byed/ / de dag bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du shes med// gzugs kun rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa 'dra bar mthong // 'di la skyes pa bud med bdag gi med par mthong // 'phags
199b2: rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo med tshul 'chos med/ / bag yod de dag bsam pa thag pas rab tu sbyor// thos dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par byed// bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen don du gnyer//
199b3: skye rga na 'chi bcom zhing nad gzir bar// 'gro ba mgon med srid pa'i btson ra 'di bltas na// zhi ba dam pa mchog gi chos kyi gru sbyar te// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i tshul las skye bo sgrol bar byed/ 'dus byas gyur
199b4: par 'jig rten 'khyam pas skyabs mgon dang / / dpung gnyen byed pa gzhan ni gang yang yod min gyis// bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs dgrol zhes// de phyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon//
199b5: lam btab// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dad pas bzhi po 'di dag ni/ cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ bde 'gro 'thob ste/ yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'phrang ba dang / bla ma la sri
199b6: zhu byed do/ / de yang zang zang med pa'i sems kyis sten pa dang bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ste// de yang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / spobs pa thob ste/ de yang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan
199b7: pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas bzhi po de dag ni cing shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// brtan pa nags dang sul na rtag tu gnas
199b8: par byed/ / de dag rtag tu khor mor rnyed pa don gnyer min// chags med blo can rtag tu spobs dang ldan pa yin// zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing spros pa rnams dang bral// rtag tu 'khor mor bla ma rnams la sri zhu

200a1: byang / / de dag rnga skad sbas pa bzhan de dag spyor// bad gshegs dpag tu med pa mang po mnyas par byed// rgyal ba'i yags ched du mchod pa rgya chen byed// grags pa chen po rnams kyi 'grob nga/
200a2: 'gyur// lha mi rnams kyi nang na spyi bor phyin pa yin// rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtag tu sems can 'dzud// dge ba bcu po dag la 'ang yang dag sbyor bar byed// sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag dag/
200a3: 'gyur te// de dag ring por mi thogs nga dang nye bar 'gyur// de dag byang chub rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas// sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnams las 'grol// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di
200a4: dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos te// bzhi gang zhe na/ khong khro ba med pa'i sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / khags ga//
200a5: dang / thob kyis 'jal ba yongs su spangs te// dgon par gnas pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang / nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cang / chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul
200a6: pa mi tshol ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyad pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
200a7: 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa na// tha ba dri ma med cing khro sems med// de ni su la'ang skyon tshol byed ma yin// g.yo med tshul 'chos med cing spros sems med// khyim gyi blo gros
200a8: yang dmya ngan rtsa/ / skye bo ngan 'grogs tshul bzhin rang 'gyur ba// spangs te de la mi lta rab byung nas// thar pa 'dod pa ri khrod gnas par byed// dgon pa bas mtha'i rnam pa sten pa na// shes khe 'thob/

200b1: pa kun la mi rten zhing // lus dang srog la'ang ltar bar mi byed la// seng ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal// byang chub lam phyir ye shes tshol ba na// ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin byed cing // rtag
200b2: tu bya ltar sogs pa spangs nas ni/ / 'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no// dper na bas ltar gcig pu gnas byed cing // seng ge lta bur 'jigs pa yod ma yin// ri dgas lta bur sar 'jigs yid
200b3: marton/ / de ni mchod pas khengs par 'gyur ba med// g.yang sar ltung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/ rab tu thar par bya zhing 'bad par byed// gal te lagayod dge ba'i chos spyod na// bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di'i
200b4: dpung gnyen 'gyur/ / mi mchog spyod pa 'di dag 'dod pa na// 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rab snyan tshig smra zhing // sdug dang mi sdug rtag tu rnyog sems med// rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa med par gnas// /
200b5: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med la mos// 'dus byas kun la sgyu ma lta bur rtog/ yangs pa'i blo can zhi dang dul la dga'// de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi'i ro yis mgu// ci nas byang chub lam ni sgrub byed
200b6: cing / / de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongs su sbyong // gzungs dang spobs pa tshol bar byed pa na// yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brgya dag bzod// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'di bltas nas// gang zhig don tu gnyer
200b7: bde dgar 'gyuraro/ / gang zhig byang chub 'di la ma mos pa// blo chung de ni nyes pa brgya yang skyed// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i g.yangs ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong ma
200b8: gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yangs dang / yul 'khor skyong byas pa mi gzo zhing g.yo la sten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong rnyed pa// bkur sti la chags

201a1: pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyod tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gis rnyed pa dang / bkur sti sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yangs ste/ yul 'khor spyod bzhi
201a2: po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'phag pa dang bla ma rnams dang pha ma la// de dag rtag tu gum
201a3: pa med pa yin/ / de dag byas pa mi gzo g.yon can te// rtag tu kun du ma bsdams spyod cing rmongs// rnyed la rtag tu chags shing zhen pa ste// de dag tshul 'chos pa dang g.yo sbyor dka'// kha cig tshul khrims
201a4: brtul zhugs ji ltas kyang / / 'di na bdag dang mtshugs pa med ces smra// de dag phan tshun snang bar sems dpa' ste// glags tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa yin// de dag zhing gi las dang tshod la dga'// de dag
201a5: dag dge sbyong yon tan shin tu ring / / phyi ma'i dus na 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i// dge slong tshul khrims yon tan rab ring ba// de dag 'chang 'bru ba dang 'thab pa dang // phrag dog dbang gis chos 'di nub par byed// byang chub
201a6: lam las rtag par shin tu rang/ / 'phags pa'i nor las de dag shin tu ring // 'phags lam gya nom rnam par spangs nas ni// de dag 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyam par 'gyur// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang
201a7: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong le lo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs pa'i chos dang // yul 'khor skyong ma dang
201a8: pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong nga rgyal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyod pha rol gyi mchod pa

201b1: la phrag dog dang / ser sna'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chubal bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khod skyong bani po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed/
201b2: pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ mdang le lo rtag tu rmongs pa'i sems// de dag mngon pa'i can rtag tuH// bzod ldan rtag pa brtson dge slo
201b3: mamathong nas ni/ / gtsug lagakhang nas 'gro tsha b+han pas bde// pha rol mtshar byer 'dir ni brag dog ste// de dag sems ni gnas pa yod ma yin// thugs la/ byed cing 'khrul pa tshal ba can// sul du
201b4: yod gang la glen bya snyam/ / de dag nga'i bstan pa 'di las ring // de dag yon tan ldan ning ngan song gzhol// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni// ngan song shin tu mi bzad dmyal bar 'gro// de dag rnams kyi sdin
201b5: pa'i spyod pa dang / / chos min ldan 'thor ba sdig 'dir thos nas// rtag tu 'khor mor byang chub la ma la sbyor// ngan 'gror skyes shing gdung bar byur ta ra// sangs rgyas 'jig rten pan pa drang srong che// bskal pa phyi mang brgyal mthu
201b6: bar gyur/ / dalta ngas padam pa rnyed pa la// gal bar 'dod pag med spang bar gyis// yul 'khor skyong gang zag pa ni po 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dpa'as bsten par mi bya ba ste// bzhig she na/ yul 'ding stong byang chub
201b7: sems dpas/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen ci gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' dmigs par lta ba can gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor stong byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i rgyas
201b8: pa'i gang bag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas zang zingal brkam pa'i gang ga bsnyen par mi bya ba ste/ yul 'bod skyong gang zag bani pa de dag ni nga chub sems dpa bsten pa mi byaba'o// de nas bam ldan das

202a1: kyis/ / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rnam spong zhing // gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten byed pa// de dag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phel// dper/
202a2: na mkha' la zla ba yang ngo bzhin// dmigs par lta la rtag tu zhen pa dang // bdag dang srog dang gso bar zhen pa dag/ de dag dug phyis bzhin du rtag tu spong // gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don mi gnyer// gang dag
202a3: mi mchog rnams kyi zhi ba'i chos/ / 'dod chags bral ba'i bdud rtsi mthun spong pa// dper na ngan sngags rdza bzhin de dag spang // gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// zang zing dag dang chos gos lhung bzed chags
202a4: rtag tu khyim la 'dris par byed brtson pa/ / de dag rnams dang 'dris par mi bya ste// de dag ma'i 'obs bzhin spang bar bya// gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar bya ba dang // 'khor lo dam pa bla med bskor ba dang // de ltar
202a5: sems can don yang byed 'dod pa/ / des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spang bar bya// gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// de yis rnyed dang sdug dang mi sdug dang // grags dang 'tshang 'bru phrag dog nga spangs
202a6: te/ sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor myong shes pas
202a7: mngon par rlob sems su byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong phrag dog dang ser sna dang / ldan pa'i sems bya chub sems dpa rnams kyi sdug bsngal
202a8: rnams par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong / ma mos pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong yongs su ma dag pa'i shes pa dang / bzod pa'i

202b1: longs spyod yongs su tshol ba/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams par smin pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi pa'i de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i
202b2: chos so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sa la chos ni 'dzin 'gyur zhing // 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba// de la mi shes pas ni brnyas byed
202b3: na/ / des na de'i sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed/ yang bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshol// shes pa ma dag rtag tu 'dun cing 'dod// gang zhig rtag tu nga rgyal khengs gyur la// bla ma 'phags pa'i skye bo mi 'dud cing // sangs
202b4: rgyas la yang mos pa yod min pa/ / chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa med// bslab dang sbyangs pa rnams la de mi mos// sdig pa'i blo can ngan song gsum phyogs pa// de ni mi nang 'di nas shi 'phos nas// las kyis
202b5: dbang gisi pa mi mkhas rnam par rmongs/ / dmyal ba 'am 'on te dud 'gro'i 'gro rnams sam// yi dgas 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed// gang zhig 'jig rten sgron mar gyur ldan zhing // me'i dpa' bo sdug bsngal mthar
202b6: 'byin pa/ / de yis ngan song lam rnams rab spangs te// byang chub lam ni rtag tu brten par bya// / bam po gnyis pa// / yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
202b7: dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ / sheg pa ro la snyes pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis bsgom pa la sbyor ba dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams
202b8: kyi 'ching ba dang / kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / ye shes dang bral ba dang / bag med pa la snyen pa skyel byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis// khyim la 'dris par

203a1: byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
203a2: dag bka' stsal to/ / rtag tu gzhan dag la ni brnyes byed cing // rtag tu 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bsgom// ltar gyur 'di dag gis ni de bcings te// glang po lus ring 'angam du song ba bzhin// khyim la 'dris
203a3: byed 'ching dang ldan pa dang / / gang zhig bag med rtag tu kun 'dzin sems// ye shes spangs shing blo gros rmongs gyur pa// mi rigs spyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings// gang zhig sdug bsngal 'jigs pa
203a4: 'di dag dang / / skye rga 'chil sogs las grol 'dod pa// brnyas par byed dang rlom sems bor nas ni// byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur// sdug bsngal mtha' yas ma lus bzod byas te//
203a5: bde ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas// sdug dang mi sdug gnyen pa ma lus btang // brtan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur// pha rol phyin pa drug sa dang yon tan dang / stobs dang dbang po dag dang shes la
203a6: sbyor/ / yon tan kun dang rtag tu ldan gyur nas// rga ba'i dra ba grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par sngon spyad tshe// sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don tu// sbyin dang dul dang des
203a7: lo rtag tu spyad/ / gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par gyur// bas mtha' nags su rtag par rang dga' ste// byang chub ched du bsam pa rnam par sbyangs// brgya lam na yang brtson 'grus nyams ma gyur// skyes
203a8: chen rnams kyis ye shes de 'dra'o/ / srid pa'i brtson rar 'gro ba lnga 'khyim pas// sems can 'khyim pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni// sngon chad 'dir ni snying rje rgya chen skyed// 'gro ba'i don tu byang chub dam pa bsgrubs

203b1: bskal pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing / / rang gi bu pho bu mo chung ma sdug/ phangs pa'i srog dang shin tu 'byor sa dang // grong khyer nor dang 'bru rnams mang po btang // me tog 'bras bu chu 'byor nyams dga' ba'i/
203b2: nags su thub pa nga ni bzod dgar gyur// lid rgyal pos lags pa rkang pa bcad// de tshe nga ni sdang ba'i yid ma gyur// nags dang sul na bsngo ba sangs zhes bya ba'i// thub pas bla ma rgas pa gsol pa na// mi yi dbang
203b3: pos sra ba'i mangs bsnun kyang / / yid ni yongs su gnod par sems ma gyur// legs par gsungs pa'i ched du g.yang sa nas// lus la ma bltas rab tu mchongs par gyur// da ni byang chub mchog gi rgyu yi phyir// lus
203b4: dang srog la ltas par ma gyur to/ / stag mo bu dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir// lus btang nas ni stag mo tshim par byas// nam mkha' las ni lha yi tshogs rnams kyis// skyes chen brtson 'grus brtan pa'i legs shes/
203b5: bsgrags// gang tshe sngon chad srid par spyod pa na// sbyin la rab dga' bram ze'i khye'u gyur tshe// rin chen ched du rgya mtsho bskams nas ni// nor bu rnyed nas sems can bde bar byas// rgyal po zla ba'i bu zhes bya gyur te// brjod
203b6: pa grags shing da ni spyod pa'i tshe/ / nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po brgya'i// gsang bar byas pa myur du thar par byas// dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba'i mi mthong nas// phra yis phangs pa'i lus ni gtar byas te// nga yis
203b7: nor rnyed de ni phyug por byas/ / de tsher ni kun sbyin rgyal por gyur// nga ni 'dir mi yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe// skyabs su 'ongs pa'i phug ron mthong nas ni// rang gi lus las sha yang bcad byas te// rang lus ngas btang 'jigs
203b8: pas 'phongs ma btang / / rgyal po ral pa can zhes sngon gyur tshe// sman pa mchog gis nga yi ched du ni// mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyor ba yang // srog btar nga sa ni de dag gzhan la byin// 'gro ba'i don phyir sngon chad

204a1: bya/ spyod pa na/ rgyal bu mche ba bzang zhes bya gyur tshe// chung ma ma dri khyolas mi 'phyo ba// bur bcas bu mo ma chags ma bltas btang // gang che brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya gyur tshe// nga sngon lon stong du chang bar yang /
204a2: bya dka' brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzod par byas// nor dang dpa' yang sngon chad ngas btang ngo // rgyal bu gzi brjid dri ma med gyur tshe// nga yis rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rten bdun// mchog tu gus pas lus la me btang
204a3: ste/ stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la mchod pa byas// nga ni rgyal po zla 'od gyur pa'i tshe// me bzang mig can khros par gyur nas ni// de yis nga'i mgo bo bslangs pa na// da tshong yis mgo bo bcad de byin//
204a4: nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes bya gyur tshe// grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam srang sgo// thams cad du yang rgya che sman gyi rnams// de dag sems can don phyir ngas bzhag go/ srid pa rnams na spyod pa gang gi tshe//
204a5: sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa na// bud med gzugs bzang gser dang mu tig gis// lus brgyan stong dag ngas ni gtang ba byas// gang tsheng sngon mi yi rgyal po ni// rin can gtsug phud gyur tsha me tog dang // spos
204a6: mchog rnams dang gser gyis brgyan pa yi/ / cod pan dpal ldan dam pa ngas gtang ngo // nga sngon rgyal po mos ldan gyur pa'i tshe// shing bal 'da' ba 'jam pa lta bu dang // pad ma'i 'dab mnyen lta bur 'jam
204a7: gzhon pa'i/ / lag pa rkang pa dag kyang ngas btang ngo // ded dpon seng ge 'dzin tu gyur pa na// snying rje med cing mi bzang rab gtum pa// srin mo brgya dag shin tu tshar bcad nas// rgya shug gling du mi rnams 'god
204a8: par gyur/ / gang tshe mig bzangs shes byar gyur pa na// byas pa 'dod dang ldan zhing yid rmongs pa// srin mo dag lan chung 'du shes pa// tshong pa lnga brgya de dag thar par byas// gang tshe bsod nams 'od zer

204b1: gyur pa na/ / lha yi bum lta bu'i gzugs ldan pa// pad mad bye ba phrag bzhi sbyangs nas su// rgyal ba'i bstan pa lan rab tu byung / sems can dan phyir ngan spyod pa na// da mad dag pa'i gsar gyi bdag canaH/
204b2: rgyal por gang tshed ni gyur pa na// sor mo dra bas 'brel ba rgya chen btang // rgyal po ud dpal meg ces byang gyur tshe// pad ma sngon po bzang po'i mdog 'da'i mig/ yid du 'ong zhing snyid du sdug gyur pa// 'gro ba'i don dung
204b3: yis btang ba byas/ / sman pa'i rgyal po sgra 'drar gyur pa'i tshe// sdug dang bral bas nyen pa mthong nas ni// bud med cha byad gzugs dang blo nyams pa/ ngas ni snying rjes yongs su thar bar byas// sngon gyi sred par kun mthang
204b4: gyur pa na/ / nad kyis btab pa nang pa'i mi mthong nas// nga yis rang gi khrag kyang byin gyur te// mi de ngas ni nad dang bral bar byas// rgyal ba me tog bzang zhes byar gyur tshe// nga yis lus las rus pa phyung nas ni// nad kyis
204b5: ring bar gyur la rkang byin te/ / ngas ni nam yang sems can ma btang ngo // rgyal po don grub ces bya bar sngon gyur tshe// rang gi mdzod rnams thams cad ngas btang zhing // phongs shing yid du 'ong ba'i srog btang ste// phongs
204b6: par gyur pa'i mi ni thar bar byas/ / rgyal po phyogs kyi tog tu gyur pa'i tshe// byang chub 'dod nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir// 'khor lo mtshan can pad ma lta bu yi// lag pa phrugs kyang ma bltas rab tu byin// rgyal po thams
204b7: cad mthong du gyur pa'i tshe/ / snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don phan 'dod de// skyes pa bud med dag gis rgyas pa yi// gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang ba byas// rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan gyur to// 'jam zhing mnyen la dri med
204b8: dkar ba'i brla'i/ / dga' zhing mgu pa'i yid kyis bcad nas ni// rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no// bud med gzugs ldan zhes ni byang gyur tshe/ bud med bkres skom nyam thag

205a1: ngas mthong nas/ / gser ltar sar zhing shin tu gzhon pa yi// nu ma snying du sdug pa gnyis ga btang // rgyal po dpal grags shes byar gyur pa na// shin tu nyams dga' ba yi rgyan mchog dang // rin chen du ma
205a2: gos dang shing rta gzhon/ / btang bar dka' ba rnam pa du ma btang // rgyal bu byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe// rgya mtsho las ni byas pa mi gzo bsgral// rin chen phyir ni nga yis nga mig phyung // 'on kyang nga la khros pa'i
205a3: sems med do/ / srog chags go d+har sngon srid gyur pa'i tshe// grog sbur dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur dogs nas// lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang ba byas// de tshe nga yi sems ni g.yo ba med// spyad pa spyod tshe bya
205a4: sreg gyur pa na/ / rgan la bsnyen bkur bya bar rtag dga' ste// nga ni rim gro gus la rab tu dga'// nga rgyal ldan pa ma yin khengs pa med// skyabs su 'ongs pa'i don phyir nga yis ni// snying rje
205a5: bskyed pa byas nas lus btang ste/ / gdol pa mi yis mnga' rnams bstan kyang ni// spre'u thur ngas ne mi de ma btang do// rgyal po dbang du gyur tshe nga yis ni// glang po bla ma rgan dran lus bskams te// shin
205a6: tu yi de 'od zas kyang ngas ma zos/ / de tshe glang po bdag nyid thar par gyur// bgrod dka' gangs can ri la dred dbang gyur// nga yis zhag bdun bar du bsrungs pa'i maM// nga yis gsod pa nga la btang byas kyang //
205a7: dngani de tshe khong khro byas pa med// kha ba kun da'adra ba'i glang por gyur// byang chub mchod rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol// dug dang bcas pa'i mda' yas bsrun kyang ni// mche ba dam pa byin gyi khros pa med// dum
205a8: bu'i gling du nags tshal spyod yul ba/ / sreg pa'i phrug gu byams la gnas gyur tshe// mthong ba tsam gyis me ni zhi gyur nas/ lha tshogs dag gis me tog rnams kyang gtor// ri dgas gyur tshe gang gA'i brlabs

205b1: shugs kyis/ / khyer ba zhig ni nga yis bsgral byas pa// de yis gsod pa nga ni khrid de 'ongs// 'on kyang de la nga ni yi dam khros// rgya mtsho'i dbus su son te mgon med pa// chod pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgral byas/
205b2: nas// bkres pa de dag rnams kyis gsad gyur tshe// ru sbal skye gnas gyur kyang byams dang ldan// da ni byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na// sngon chad chu na rgyu ba'i nyar gyur tshe// sems can phan phyir nga yis lus
205b3: btang ste/ / srog chags brgya stong dag gis zos par gyur// srog chags nges par gang tshe gyur pa na// nang brgyas gzir pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas su// lus ni sman lta bur yang bsgyur byas te// sems can
205b4: bde zhing nad kyang med par byas/ / ri dgas rgyal po ser ger gyur pa'i tshe// mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying rje ldan// mnga' yis bsnun kyang khros pa'i sems med de// de tshegs de la nga yis byams pa byas//
205b5: dungad dang ba po lta bu'i rta rgyal du// nga sngon rgya mtsho'i ngogs su gyur pa'i tshe// srin mo'i nang du son pa'i tshong pa rnams// nga yis snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas bsgral// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub spyad spyod tshe// mdab chags kun lar
205b6: ni nga gyur ro/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang spangs nas// bud med dbang du nga ni song ma gyur// ge la ba'i nags gnas ri bor gyur pa'i tshe// legs spyod ri bod tshogs gyur de la bstan// thub pa gnas la gnas pa bkres phongs pa// /
205b7: de'i ched dungs ni gnas kyang btang // sdong po me tog 'bras rgyas na co tshe// sdong po rnams kyang ngas ni de ma btang // de tsha brgya byin byas gzong mthong nas// sdong po de ni lo 'bras byas par byas// nga ni spu'i rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/
205b8: mi yi rgyal po klu yis yul bcom ste// spu'i tshogs la gnod pa byung mthong nas// rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dag ngas bton te// nga sngon ne cor gyur te pha ma'i phyir// sa lu blangs tshe mi yis bzung nas ni// ne tse tsi byi ra da yis lu len//

206a1: lo tog smin 'di ma rung byar sems sam// ne tse des smras bzang po gsan du gsol// bdag ni rku bas khyod kyi 'bras mi len// pha margan gon gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir// de la snying rje bdag gis sa lu blangs/
206a2: gang tshe thogs ma sa bon 'debs pa'i tshe// 'gro ba kun lag chags sbyin no zhes// de skad tshig smras de ni bdag thos te// des na bdag ni rku bar gzhang mi 'gyur// tse legs so sa lu tsi dag dbyed/ srim
206a3: 'di ni mi yi nang na dkon/ / khyod ni mi min di ni dud 'gro yin// legs so khyod ni du bzhi yang dag bsdams// byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ba na// sngon chad spyod pa de la sogs pa rnams// spyod pa'i
206a4: tshe na dga' brgya pa la yang / / nga yi yid ni skyo bar gyur pa med// nang gi dag gam 'on te phyi yang rung // nga yis dngos po ma gtang gang yang med// tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam
206a5: gtan thabs dang shes rab ngas spyad do/ / sha dang pags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag/ de dag rang gi lus las sbyin pa byas// bas mtha' dag dang phug na rgyu ba'i tshe// ngas ni des tshe lus ni bskams par byas
206a6: gang la sbyar na rgyal bar 'gyur ba yi/ / sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa// sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te// sngon spyod chen nga ni rtag tu 'jug/ spyod pa'i tshe na nga yis gang bsten pa// brtul
206a7: zhugs rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang / / spyod pa 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams// tshig gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyur ro// 'ang thos gyur nas de'i tshe na ni// bstan pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya bar 'gyur// de dag zas
206a8: dang 'khrig pa lhur len cing / / rtag tu gnyid non khwa ltar g.yor na 'gyur// rtag tu 'phags pa ma yin chos lnga sdang// bstan pa sun pa byed cing yon tan nyams// zhi ba'i chos 'di thos par gyur pa na// 'di

206b1: ni rgyal bas gsungs pa min zhes zer sa/ / nga yi slob dpon thos pa rgya mtshor gyur// mang du thos pa smra ba gtso bo yan// nga yis 'di na rnam pa ji ltar yang // sangs rgyas bka' ma yin zhes dgag
206b2: byas/ / pha rol las kyang rgan par gyur de yi// bla ma de ni dpag med yon tan chung // nges kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyis// 'di la ma 'jug 'di ni nor pa yin// gang la bdag yod ma yin srog med dang // rnam pa
206b3: cig kyang gang zag med bstan pa/ / tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la// gang 'bad de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur// gal te theg pa chen po yod na ni// 'di la bdag dang sems can shed skyes med// gang la
206b4: bdag dang sems can mi dmigs pa/ / de la bdag gis ngal byas don med 'gyur// sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs dan mtshungs pas// rang gi blo yis rang bzor byed pa ste// dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni// tshig
206b5: 'di gsung bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro/ / ngo tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang // khwa ltar spyi brtol che la rgod gtum zhing // phrag dog nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig pa yi// dge slong dag ni nga yi bstan la 'byung // lag pa
206b6: dang ni rkang pa rdob byed cing / / chos gos grwa rnams kyang ni skyog par byed// chos gos thogs shing chang dang rgyags myos nas// grong dang khyim dag tu ni rnam par rgyu// de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas
206b7: ni/ / khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo sten par byed// bstan pa yon tan phung po 'di spangs nas// de dag rtag tu phrin yig khyer bar byed// de dag ba lang rta dang bong bu dang // de dag phrugs dang bran pho bran mo srel//
206b8: gang gi las dang tshong gi sbyor ba la// brtson yid ldan zhing rtag tu 'phags ma yin// de dag 'phags min tshig kyang mi smra med// bya ba ma yin pa yang gang yang med// de dag rnams la mchod rten nor dang ni// /

207a1: dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag nong de mtshungs// dge slong yon tan 'byor pa mthong nas ni// de dag la yang mi snyan marjod cade/ tshul khrims 'tshal ba sru bzhugs nas ni// bud med 'jig byed mi
207a2: bzang rab ces rjod/ / rab tu byung ba de dag brkam pa ltar// khyim pa 'dod pas brkam pa de lta min// khyim pa mtshungs par de dag chung ma dang // bu dang bu mo dag kyang yod par 'gyur// gang gi khyim
207a3: du de dag chos gos dang / / las dang longs spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur ba// de'i chung ma la ni yongs chags shing // nyon mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu 'phags pa min// 'dod pa 'di dag bsten bya ma
207a4: yin te/ / dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal bar ltung byed ces// de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing // de dag bdag nyid ma dul nye zhi min// ji ltar de dag bdag nyid ma dul ba// de dag slob mtshogs kyang
207a5: rab ma dul/ / kha zas dag dang 'khrig pa'i gtam rnams la// de dag nyin dang mtshan du 'gro bar byed// bsten pa'i phyir gyi yon tan phyir min te// de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin// 'gro las rtag 'dir
207a6: mchod pa thob snyam nas/ / rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor// de dag skye bo rnams la smra ba ni// bdag gis snying rjes 'di dag sdud byed kyi// slob mi'i tshigs de dag las nam yang
207a7: ni/ / rim gro don tu gnyer ba med ces smra// de la nad kyis non dang mngon can mang// lus la sha bkra can dang gzugs mi sdug/ rtag tu 'phags min mi dag kha cig kyang // 'ongs shing lhags parab
207a8: tu 'byin par 'gyur/ / lung nod pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams// de dag dge slong yon tan rtag mi brtson// de dag khyim pa ma yin dge slong min// de dag spangs pa dur khrod shing dang mtshungs// de dag so sar

207b1: thar dang bslab pa dang / / 'dul ba la yang gus par byed mi 'gyur// de dag rang nyam rang dbang 'gro ba ste// lcags kyu btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra// de dag nags su gnas par gyur kyang na// sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste// nyon mongs
207b2: me yis rtag tu rab gdungs la/ / de dag sems kyang gnas pa med par 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad la// bslab dang sbyangs dang thabs kyang brjod nas ni// rgyags dang nga rgyal drogs pa yod rgyas te// de dag mi bzad
207b3: mnar med ltung bar 'gyur/ / de dag rgyal po'i gtam la rtag dga' zhing // rkun po'i gtam rjod pa la'ang rab tu dga'// nye du bsnyen la'ang rab tu dga' ba ste// de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed// bsam gtan dang ni kha ton btang
207b4: nas su/ / rtag tu gtsug lag khang gi las la brtson// gnas la brkam zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed// de dag slob ma 'khor kyang ma dul ba// nga ni gtsug lag khang gi lag bla// bdag ni ched du 'di ni ngas byas te// dge slong gang dag da'i
207b5: rjes mthun pa/ / gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do// gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan// chos 'dzin skye bo'i don la mngon brtson la// dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa// de dag rnams ni sdud par ma byed do//
207b6: 'di ni nga'i gnas su bsgom pa ste// 'di ni da yi lhan cig gnas pa yis// 'di ni yi dga' bar byed pa yin// khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyis song // 'dir ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkod de// mal cha rnams kyang ma lus
207b7: bgos zin la/ / 'din rnyed pa 'byung ba yod ma yin// 'dir ni ci zhigi spyad kyis dag slong song // de dag la ni ma la stan bgo bya ba// nam du'ang srid par 'gyur ba ma yan te// de dag kyim pa lta bur sogs 'gyur
207b8: zhing / / mchog chas rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus na nga yi bu de dag/ kun du smad pa byas par gyur nas ni/ de dag pa yi

208a1: tshig ni dran gyur te/ / bas mtha' dag dang nags su de tshe gnas// kyi hung rnyed pas zil non yon tan sdang // dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa// rgyal ba dam pa yin bstan pa dag/ ring b.ram/
208a2: thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur// phyi dus tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dag/ rtag par yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ba ste// de dag grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams// spangs nas dgon pa
208a3: nags su gnas par 'gyur/ / 'byed dang zur zer thab mo dga' pa dang // yon tan nyams la rtag tu sti stang byed// de dag skye bo'i ston pa grags 'gyur te// de dag nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur/
208a4: 'dir ni nga yi bstan pa yon tan gter// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba// 'di ni tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog dang // rgyags pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur// ji
208a5: ltar rin chen 'byung gnas srabs pa dang / pad ma'i rdzing bu yongs su bskams pa dang // rin chen mchod sdong chag par gnas pa ltar// phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus
208a6: kyi tshen dam pa'i chos/ / rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin tu mi bzang tsho// dge slong dul ba ma yin de 'dra ba// de dge nga'i bstan 'di 'jig pa yin// spyod pa 'di la bsten par dga' ba rnams// de dag bzang
208a7: 'grog la yod de ring / / 'di nas shi 'phos yi dgas 'gro ba dang // dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas// lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa// mi bzang drag po nyams su myong bar
208a8: 'gyur/ / ji ste de yis mi'i lus rnyed kyang // rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur// sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di la rtag sten pa// long ba 'am zhar bar skye bar 'gyur// lus la rtag tu sha bkra 'byung bar

208b1: 'gyur/ / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur// sa 'i da / shi yu di ni cu ste// de yi tshig la yid ches mi 'gyur zhing // de ni rtag tu spa 'bab par yang 'gyur// de dag nad dang sdug bsngal
208b2: brgya yis gdungs/ / mtshon dang shi dang bong pa rnams kyis bstan// bkres dang sgom pa'i 'jigs pas yongs su gdungs// yang nang ni rtag par rab tu brnyas// sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas
208b3: ni/ / nges pa rnams kyis sdig pa'i spyod 'or la// legs pa'i spyod la rtag tu bsten par gyis// 'di nas byin chad 'gyod par gyur ta ra// gang zhig sangs rgyas dang ni 'phags tshogs dang // bslab
208b4: dang sbyangs pa'i chos la dga' gyur ba/ / gnyen dang rnyed dang grags brjod sdang byos la// de ltar rtag tu mngon par brtson par gyis// 'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dang // 'jig par 'gyur dang rmi lam lta
208b5: bu dang / / sdug pa kun dang mi ring 'bral 'gyur zhing // 'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtogs la// pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la// rtag tu rab tu sbyor zhing 'bad par gyis// ji srid byang chub
208b6: mchog gi sangs rgyas pa/ / de srid brtson 'grus nam yang nyams mi bya// / gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
208b7: gang zag phal cher la/ / skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te// mi brtson pa dag ni mi brtson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur// g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni g.yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur// mi
208b8: shes pa dag ni mi shes pa dag la sti stang byed par 'gyur la/ / zang zing la dga' bar yang 'gyur zhing // chags pa mang ba dang // khyim la ser sna byed pa dang / g.yog dang ldan pa dang / bya khwa ltar

209a1: mu tser smra ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / nye du lhur len par 'gyur// phan tshun bsngags pa smra bas rnyed pa bsgrub par 'gyur// rnyed pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ de dag grong du 'jug/ sems
209a2: can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur// de dag mi shes bzhin du/ ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang / dge ba'i chos dang
209a3: ldan par shes par 'gyur snyam du/ bdag shes pa dang ldan par khas ches par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de bzhin du zhes med par 'gyur// snod chag pa bzhin du 'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul
209a4: pa tshol ba dang / sbyor ba nyams pa dang / mi shes pa dang / le lo can dang / phan tshun mi 'thun pa'i chos bgro ba byed pas// ye shes la mi rtog pa mang ba dang / rang dgar byed pa dang / shar gnyer ba dam pa dang /
209a5: gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang bgro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyod par 'gyur/ yongs su mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang / chos mnyan pa don tu mi gnyer
209a6: bar 'gyur/ mi rigs pa'i spyod pas/ dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas/ rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba skyed par
209a7: 'gyur ro/ / de dag la nyes pa bshags pa yang med par 'gyur na/ ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams bor nas/ shes kyi khe dang / rnyed pa tsam gyis
209a8: bdag dge sbyong ngo zhes bdag nyid khas ches par 'gyur te/ / yul 'khor skyong du ni gang zag de lta bu de dag la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod par yang mi smra na/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lta ga la zhig/ de dag la ni

209b1: bde 'gro yang ring na byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos/ / yul 'khor skyong kang zag de lta bu de dag la/ byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa'i chos brgyad yod par smra ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ ngan song gsum du skye ba dang /
209b2: mtha' khob pa'i mi'i nang du skye ba dang / dbul po'i khyim du skye ba dang / rigs dma' bar skye ba dang / mdog ngan cing rtogs pa zhen pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrang pa dang / nang mang ba dang / yang pham
209b3: spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong chos brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub kyi bar chad byed par brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong tshig gis khas 'che ba la byang
209b4: chub ce sang mi smra'o/ / tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o// g.yo byed pa la byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes mi smra'o// zang zing lhur len pa la/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa zhes mi smra'o//
209b5: mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o// shes rab 'tshal ba la the tsom gcod pa zhes nga mi smra'o// ser sna can la bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// me brtson
209b6: pa mang pa la gzungs thob ces nga mi smra'o/ / yang dag pa'i yon tan ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba la bde 'gro thob ces nga mi smra'o// khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o//
209b7: spyod lam bcos ma can la// sangs rgyas dang phrad ba zhes nga mi smra'o// khyim la chags pa la ngag yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// ma gus pa la sems yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// tshad mi shes
209b8: pa la chos 'dod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ / lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang bcas pa la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes pa mi smra'o// yul 'khor skyong ji ltar skyes bu blun po de dag la smad pa ltar// ston pa drug la de lta

210a1: da mi smod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni gzhan du spru la gzhan du byed pa'o// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
210a2: bka' stsal to/ / yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can// mgus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che// nyon mongs zil non tha ba nyon mongs bcas// de 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ring // chags//
210a3: pas zil gyis non na le lo 'phel// le los zil gyis non na dad pa nyams// dad pa nyams na tshul khrims rab tu nyams// tshul khrims 'tshal bar gyur na bzang 'gro nyams// dbul por gyur pas rab
210a4: tu byung gyur te/ / mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las grol bar 'gyur// de dag gser gyi khur ni bor nas su// gso ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs// rnyed pa don du gnyer bas dgon par 'gro// der song nas kyang
210a5: gos dang nyadu tshol/ / mngon shes rig dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs// bor nas de ni phyir yang nyed du 'dzin// rmongs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan song du// mi kho ma 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po dang // dmar ba'i
210a6: rigs su skya dang long pa dang / / mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin// de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos// bag med rnyed nas dran pa rab tu nyams// g.yang sa chen po mi bzang lhung bar 'gyung // de nas bskas
210a7: pa bye bar thar pa med/ / gal ta 'dir ni 'thob pas byang chub na// de phyir b+ha sbyin gyis kyang byang chub 'thog// rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni bya lhung ltar// chags pas kyang ni de ltar mi rigs so// bsod nams nyams shi
210a8: gzhan gyi chub ma chags/ / tshul khrims ma dag dge ba rnams las nyams// byang chub sems kyis ye shes gang ma thog/ de dag bstan la mi gos dur shing bzhin// byang chub don gnyer sangs rgyas chos tshol ba//

210b1: dper na thar pa de bzhin mi gnas so// de ni rnyong gis spre'u la dam byas ltar// nga rgyal za'i non byang chub de 'dra'o// byang chub don du gnyer bas chos tshig phyir// da yis rang gi srog ni 'phangs pa
210b2: btang / / chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan pa// don med gyur nas bstan las ltung bar 'gyur// nga ni sngon chad legs par bshad dophyir// g.yang sa chen po me lce 'bar bar mchongs// de thos nas ni
210b3: sdug dang mi sdug pa/ / thams cad rnam par spangs te nan tan gnas// bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la// de dag nam yang 'dod pa mi skye na// chos min 'dod la byang chub gal yod// dper na
210b4: long pa lam gsal med dang mtshungs/ / yul 'khor skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa// rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mtshungs pa med pa
210b5: dpag tu myed pa/ tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas// rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
210b6: ba/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ don grub blo zhes bya ba jig rten du byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na// rgyal po 'od
210b7: gzer ldan zhesaHzhig byung ngo / / yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od gzer ldan ni 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad khri drug stong la rgyal srid byed do// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'dzam bu gling de grong khyer nyi
210b8: dang / khyim bye ba phrag stong yod do// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od gzer ldan nga rgyal po'i pho ba shang na gnas pa rgyal po 'od gzer ldan de'i grong khyer rin po che snang ba zhes bya ba/ shar nub tu chur dpag tshad

211a1: bcu gnyis pa/ lho byang du rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi byings rim pa bdun dang / mig mangs ris su bres pas mdzes par byas pa yod do// de'i tshe sems can rnams
211a2: kyi tshe'i tshad ni/ lo bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong / rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po
211a3: rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de bcas ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gter stong byung bar gyur to// rgyal po'i khang bzangs kyi nang du yang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gter/ mi bcu'i tshad tsam byung bar gyur to// yul
211a4: 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi'o/ / zer de btsas ma thag tu 'dzam bu gling pa'i sems can thams cad yid rangs par gyur to// sems can gang dag btson ran 'khod pa de dag kyang / btson ra nas
211a5: thar par gyur to/ / yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer des/ nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i sku rtsal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rtogs par gyur to// yul 'khor spyod de nas gnas gtsang
211a6: ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi gung gi dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la/ gzhon nu khyed pag yod par gyis shig/ mi rtag par so sor brtag pas mkhas par gyis shig/ gzhon
211a7: nu mi rnams kyi srog na chen po med pa ste/ tshe 'pho bar 'gro ba yin gyis/ 'jog rten pa rol la 'jigs par blta bar bya zhing / las dang bya ba dang / mi 'gal bar gyis shig ces bskul te/ de'i tshe lha'i bu de dag gis
211a8: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang sbas so/ / gzhon nubag med par ni gyur ta re// bag med dbang du song par gyur te // bde bar gshegs pas pag yod rab pa stod cing // bde gshegs

211b1: rnams kyis bag med rnams kyang smad/ / nges pa gang dag 'di na pag yod cing // legs sdom dga' la ser sna med pa dang // sems can kun la snying rje byams yid ldan// de dag ring por mi thogs
211b2: mi mchog 'gyur/ / bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang // 'di ni da ltar dag dang gang ma byon// de dag thams cad dge ba rnams kyis 'phags// bag yod lam nyid la yang shin tu gnas// bza' da
211b3: btung dang gos dang kha zas dang / / gser dang dngul dang nor bu mu tig rgyan// bskal pa bye ba de dag rnams kyis btang // byang chub dam pa 'dir ni don tu gnyer// rkang pa lag pa de bzhin na dang snga/ slong pa rnams la
211b4: rab tu dga' byin na/ / byang chub yon tan kun gyi bsam rdzogs nas// de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur// rgyal srid bde dang sdug pa'i bud med dang // nor rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te//
211b5: 'dus byas gar la lta dang b+h+ra ma 'dra // 'dod pa med par dgon par gnas par gyis// srog ni brtan pa med de/ rtag tu g.yo// 'jim pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jig pa can// brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu ther zug min//
211b6: gzhon nu 'di la rtag med dge ma yin// ngan 'gror lhung ba'i chen 'di na ni// pha dang ma yang 'dzin par byed pa med// mi yis dge dang mi dge gang byas pa// de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rgyu
211b7: yis bskal mang rgya mtshor ni/ / don med par yang gcig gis gcig bsad de// khyod kyis mi pa nam byas ci yang med// don med nyid du ngal ba bsten par gyur// da ltar khyod kyis 'gro phan byang chub zhe/
211b8: mtshungs me go 'phang dam pa btsal ba'i phyir// rkang dang sha dang pags pa de bskams kyang // de lta na yang khyod ni ngal ma sems// bde bar gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'// zhi ba'i chos thos

212a1: pa yang shin tu dka'/ / bsgrim pa byas te bdud kyi phyogs gsal na// sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs 'thob// bshes gnyen bzang la rtag tu yongs sten cing // sdig pa'i bshes
212a2: gnyen yongs su spang bar gyis/ / de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrod par byed// lam kol las kyang rtag tu zlog par byed// brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa legs byos te// lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnam
212a3: spangs nas/ / rdo rje lta bu snying gi bsam gtan par// sangs rgyas lam 'di nyid la gnas par gyis// sngon gyi mi mchog dam pa 'od byed pa// kun kyang go 'phang dam pa bla med ni// tshol ba'i tshe na spyod
212a4: yul dgon par dga'/ / khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs// dgon par gnas la rtag tu dga' bar gyis// pha dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyen// skye bo snying du sdug pa kun spongs la//
212a5: lus dang srog la sred par ma byed par// bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis// yul 'khor skyod de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de nas bzung ste// lo bcu'i bar/
212a6: dra nam yid rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis non par ma gyur// nam yang dgod par ma gyur/ rtses par ma gyur/ dga' ba byed par ma gyur/ yongs su spyod par mgyur/ nam yang skyed mos tshal du ma
212a7: song / nam yang grogs pa mthong nas ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin/ nam yang glul dga' bar ma gyur/ rgyal srid dang nor dang / khyim dang grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur te/ de ltar dngos
212a8: po thams cad la mi lta bar gcig pu sems shing gnas par gyur to/ / nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len cing / 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang / 'jig pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang /

212b1: mi sdug pa dang 'brad pa dang / sdug pa dang 'bral ba dang / byis pa 'bring ba dang / 'khor ba la dka' gar bro ba med pa dang / rgyal srid kyi bde ba su ba'i chos can dang / srid pa la mngon par dga'
212b2: bas chog/ mi shes pa dang / sa so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu mi 'thun par rnam par sems shing bdag ni byas pa'i skye bo mi brtson pa'i nang na gnas kyis/ bdag gis cang mi smra bas 'dal bar bya'o snyam nas
212b3: de phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar gyur te/ bag yod pa la sems shing / sdug pa dang bral bar gcig pu gnas par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis/ gzhon nu'i longs
212b4: spyod kyi phyir/ sa phyogs shin du/ grong khyer dka' mchog ce tu byas te/ lho dang byang gi ngos su la ma thang bdun brgya 'dun brgya byas so// rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa/ mu tig gi dra ba dang
212b5: rin po che'i srog shing dang / bla re dang ldan pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// lam srang thams cad kyi sgor yang / rin po che'i srog shing stong btsugs so// rin po che'i srog shing thams
212b6: cad kyang / rin po che'i skud pa drug khris spel to// rin po che'i skud pa thams cad kyang phyogs bzhi nas// shing ta la'i 'phro ba bye bas spel to// de dag rlung gis skyod de bskul na/ 'di lta ste dper
212b7: na/ rol mo sa li snyan brgya stong gi sgra snyan pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo // lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu mo glu mkhas pa gar mkhas pa/ 'ang cha dar la bab pa/ skye bo thams cad kyis spyad pa'i 'os su
212b8: gyur pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/ / de dag thams cad la rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis/ khyed nyin mtshan du glu dang gar dang / rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams

213a1: yang dag par dga' bar bya zhing / ci nas gzhon nu dga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ma byed cig/ sems can gang la yang yid du mi 'ong ba ma smras shig/
213a2: ces bsgo'o// lam srad de dag thams cad kyi sgor yang / bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la ni bza' ba/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni gzhon pa nas gos das
213a3: spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal dang rgyab rten dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / gser dang dngul dang / nor bu dang mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbra ma dang /
213a4: dngul sil ma dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / nor dang / rgyan thams cad byan zhing / skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su spyad pa'i phyir/ rin po che'i phung po yang bzhag par gyur
213a5: to/ / de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbus su/ gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ khyim khor yug tu dpag tshad tsam yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun mig mangs ris su bres pa/ rta babs brgyas rab tu brgyan
213a6: pa byas so/ / de'i nang du khang bzang gcig byas te/ der gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir mal bye ba phrag bzhi bshams so// de'i dbus su skyed mos tshal byas te/ me tog gi shing ston pa/
213a7: thams cad dang / bral 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyis khyab par bkang ngo // yul 'khor skyed bskyed mos tshal de'i dbus su/ rin po che thams
213a8: cad kyi rjed rin po che sna bzhi them skas dang ldan pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang shel lo// gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad btsugs so//

213b1: rdzing de'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad po de nas kyang cha 'bab po// me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po rnams rtag par rgyun tu rgyas so// khor yug tu yang rin po
213b2: che'i shing ljon pas yongs su bskor to/ / dus thams cad pa'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so// rdzing de'i 'gram du rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad
213b3: brgya bskyed de/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyang / rin po che'i skud pa rnams kyis spel cing / thams cad du yang shing ta la'i 'greng ba bye bas sbrel to// de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod cing /
213b4: rlung gis bskul na 'di lta ste dper na/ rol mo'i sil snyan brgya stong blangs pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo // gzhon nu lus la sa dang rdul gyis reg tu 'od zhes/ rdzid de'i steng rin po che'i dra bas/
213b5: bkab par gyur to// de'i tshe khang bzangs der rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te// khri thams cad kyi steng du yang / ras bcos bulnga brgya lnga brgya bting bar gyur to// gang du
213b6: rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'dug par 'gyur ba'i/ khri rin pa che sna bdun las byas pa/ 'bang du ma bdun tsam yod pas bgams pa dbus ma der/ ras bcos bu bye ba zag bcad
213b7: tsun bdun bar gyur to/ / b+h+rUM thams cad kyi drung du yang bag par nas a gdus bdags gang/ na lan gsum mtshan lan gsum rtag 'grems pa byed do// gser gyi
213b8: so/ / gser gyi pad ma rab tu sbyangs so// mu tig dang nor bu'i dra ba bres so// nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis snang bar byas so// rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu sbyangs so// rin po che'i

214a1: shing ljon pa thams cad pa yang / pa dan brgya rtsa sbyangs so// smad mos chal kun tu yang / nor bu rin po che 'od dpag chad tsam yod pa/ 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par gyur te/ de dag
214a2: gi'od kyis 'jig rten thams cad snang bar gyur to/ / yul 'khor skyong bskyed mos chal den bya'i tshogs mi'i skad du smra ba/ ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khrung khrung dang // khu blag dang / rma byA dang / dang
214a3: dang / ngur pa dang / kun la dang / ka la bi da ka dang / shang shang rje'u mas song do// de dag skad 'byin cing sgra sgrog na/ dga' tshal gyi lha rnams rgyags par 'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo // gzhon
214a4: nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ ro'i rnam pa thams maphun sum tshogs pa/ ro rnam pa lnga brgya ldan pa'i kha zas rnams rtag par rgyun tu bshams par gyur to// de'i tshe gzhon nu lo bcu drug lon
214a5: na/ lo nyi shu lon pa'i skyed dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams cad nas bsdus nas grong khyer dar btsud do// thams cad kyang bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas kyi bya ba shes pa/ thams cad
214a6: kyang 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang / 'tshog chas kyi bya ba shes pa bye ba phrag brgyad bcu grong khyer der btsud par gyur to// pha ma gnyis kyis de la/ bu mo bye ba byin no// nye du'i tshogs kyis
214a7: bye ba dang / grong rdal ba'i mis bye ba dang / rgyal po thams cad kyis bu mo bye ba byin par gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa sha stag go/
214a8: thams cad kyang ngan tshad lo bcu drug len pa/ sku mkhas pa/ rol mo'i sgo mkhas pa/ gang mkhas pa/ dgong mkhas pa/ skyes pa'i gan tu 'gro mkhas pa/ drang ba/ gzhon pa/ mnyen pa

214b1: ma pa/ gas bang sdug pan 'dzub pa/ rgyas pa 'as pa/ la thams cad kyi bya ba la mkhas pa/ hacang pa ma dag/ cang yang mthung btamang yang ma snyam pa/
214b2: cang yang mi sbom pa/ hacang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang yang mi sngo ba// kha nas me tog ud pa la'i bsung 'byung ba// lus rnams las can dan gyi dri 'byung ba// lha'i bu mo ltar
214b3: gsal pa/ 'i dngas su 'ong ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ glu dbyangs len pa de dag gi nang na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gnas so// klu dbyangs dang rol mo'i spri del/
214b4: kye ma'o bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po dang / bdag gis dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa byung ste/ blta bar mi bya'o// snyam pa'i sems bskyed do/ de de'i tshe 'di lta
214b5: ste dper na/ gsang bar bya ba'i mis mthong na/ ngo mtshar gyi sems mi skyed pa de bzhin du/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od gzer yang bud med de dag mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du
214b6: mi 'dzin to/ / grong khyer de la yang grogs dang / lhan cig ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to// lo bcu po de dag gi bar du/ bdag nam zhig na/ mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnam pa 'di lta bu'i nang
214b7: nas thar par 'gyur snyam pa dang / bdag nam zhig na bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / des bdag zar par 'gyur nas snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma gtogs par/ nam yang gzugs kyi
214b8: mtshan ma gzung bar ma gyur te/ de bzhin du rmi ya na ma dang / dri'i mtshan ma dang / ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to// de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po 'od gzer ldan la/ lha

215a1: na / sa pa mas dang/ daHsa sa spyad danas ka// sa pagasas pa ma ga/ thalal nanasaH
215a2: 'od zer ldan/ rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan gcig tu/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer/ gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ gdong las mchis ma 'dzag cing / lus 'dar te mya ngan gyis sa la skyel
215a3: to/ / de sa las langs nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bu gcig rin chen dam par la ltos shing spros// da ni mya ngan gzir te khyim nangs la skyel// su
215a4: yis khyod mi dga' byas de myur nga la smos/ / de 'dir de'u re chad pa chen pos gcad par bya// khyod kyi ched du ngas 'dir yid kyis gang smras pa// lha yi khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer deng ltos shig/ 'di lta
215a5: yan lag ma tshad ci yod de myur spos/ / brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa der de khyod la bstan// pad ma'i mig can mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa// lha yi bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs sgra ltos// mya ngan thul
215a6: de dag rnams dang de ring rtses/ / ci phyir zug rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug/ de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan// glu dbyangs pheg rdob dus kyi rnam par des
215a7: pa shes/ / khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig/ pad ma rnyis pa lta bur ci phyir der lus dman// me tog 'bras bu yal ga 'dab rgyas bskyed mos tshal// lha tshogs steng bzhag lha'i sna tshogs
215a8: shing rta 'dra/ / soms shig khyod kyi na 'od 'di ni thog ma yin// dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis der 'dir bu dga' gyis// khyod kyi khrus chen rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra// ud pa la dang pad ma dag gi

215b1: tshal gyis gang / / pad ma rnams kyang bung brgyags pa mchog gis brgyan// de la bu ma soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed// dad pa rma byin co 'u zug ri skegs dang // ka la bing ka shang shang de'u dang kun la// yid
215b2: 'od sgra ldan gangs nye spos dang ldang 'dra ba/ / thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba thob mi 'gyur// gzhal med khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu gtsug/ gser dang bai DUr+yas spras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra// rin chen khri mchog
215b3: dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba/ / gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i 'phreng ba sgra snyan pa// zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyan sgra bsgrogs pa// khyod kyi ched du srang rnams su yang sbyin rgya che/ bu mo stong dag glu mchog
215b4: snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ / dga' tshal lha yi bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog/ mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir// rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems kyis dga' mi byed// gzhon nu khyod kyi brtsen grogs lha yi bu 'dra
215b5: ga khu bo de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis/ / khyod kyi pa dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug/ skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci// 'dus byas yid byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod don ma
215b6: gnyer/ / yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa// 'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// thar pa don gnyer ba la smras pa yab gson cig/ lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga'
215b7: bgyis ma mchis/ / bdag ni da ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags// nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar ltung byed pa// sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung // mi mkhas bus pa skye bo
215b8: bud med de dag dga'/ / bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'chid pa g.yang sa che// rtag tu 'phags pa'i skye bos de dag de ltar rmad// sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir sten// bud med 'di dag balpags pa'i gzugs

216a1: kyis dga' ba tsam/ / bdag na rus rgyus 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi gnyer// khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag/ gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi// glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs skra
216a2: gzung mi bgyi/ / dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rmongs par bgyid// kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'dir brlag gis// ci phyir byis pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs khol// shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na//
